address: 12, Shanthinagara, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Wine, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Nice cozy place for a team outing. They have this make-your-own-bruschetta thing which is quite engaging and good to taste. We tried the veg and nonveg platters and these were amazing. The nv platter has chicken bruschetta, basa fried fish, garlic prawns and squids all of which were really fresh n tasty ( the dish looks appealing too) . The pizza and pasta are amazing. We tried the pesto chicken pasta. The chicken was soft n juicy and flavorful, the cheese fresh and the smell of olive oil added a nice touch of freshness. Service was good and people were helpful.', 'A pleasant and charming environ with ample seating. The decor is very minimal with wood and bricks which complements the contemporary lighting of the area. They have a good collection of wine and other signature drinks. I was also impressed with the menu...quite a spread. We started of with mini calzones followed by risotto and gnocchi. They were all very delicious to our palettes. The dish suited well with the sangria too. If you are in the lookout for a quiet and romantic place for your date night, Chianti is the ideal option.', 'Loves this place ‚ù§Ô∏è Bruschetta was too good today . We had home made ravioli as well. This dish is my all time favorite . Recommended dishes if one would like to try some Italian food', 'Being an Italian food lover i like to visit different restaurant.being from pune, i like visiting little Italy, k factory and Kryust which are famous for their for their italian food.

Came to bangalore for few days and friend took me to this place at MG road branch.

My experience can be summarised in one word " AWESOME"

LIKED EVERYTHING ABOUT OF THE PLACE

We ordered as per the recommendation from my restaurants. Dishes name are quite difficult so i have attached the screen shot of the menu highlighting them

And the glass of italian wine üç∑ was icing on the cake. Simply satisfacted with my craving for italian food.

The only thing i was disappointed was that they have stopped accepting zomato gold.

A must visit if ur in Bangalore.', "Chianti is delicious food. This is one Italian restaurant that keeps surprising you with it's delicious menu. Almost everything on the menu is worth try. Right from their soup, pastas, risottos, pizzas and desserts. The service is quick and the taste makes it more than value for money for the visitor. The Garlic bread with cheese is a must try.", "So far the best Italian food I have had. Oh God food was delicious. Loved everything. The drinks, the apetizers and everything.
We had ordered the prawns, calamria and egg plant for appetizers.
I don't know the Italian names though.
For mains I had chicken. But if ur duck lover should try the duck.
Had panacotta for desert OMG it was delicious.
Will definitely recommend and go again.
Thank you Chianti for good food and warm welcome.", 'Chianti opening near my office turned out to be quite the blessing especially when I crave a salad.

My picks here are their Caeser salad and their Pollo Ripieni. I have tried their Gnocchi and other Chicken dishes too. Their salad is fresh, just perfect however their Pollo Ripieni has sometimes turned out to be dry and difficult to swallow. This time Pollo Con Salsa Vino along with the Pollo Ripieni and I was bit surprised to see both dishes tasted almost the same except for the lemon flavour more evident in the Vino dish.

Expected more from a restaurant of this class.', "This place wouldn't let you down!
Be it the ambiance, the service or the food

Their ravioli is the best I have ever had and everything that they serves looks beautiful along with tasting delicious", 'Chianti is a good Italian place to hang out with friends and family. We went for dinner, it had a nice ambience and good service too. Ordered the duck ravioli and Del Chianti pizza. Enjoyed the ravioli more than the pizza. Their pastas are definitely better than the pizza. Will surely try the deserts next time!!', "Located near 1MG - Lido Mall signal, this place serves authentic Italian cuisine in a cozy setting. Funghi Al Forno was delicious and so were the desserts - Tiramisu ‚ô•Ô∏è and Pana cotta ü§§. Didn't like the Margarita pizza as much."]

address: 8/6, 3rd Floor, Alpine Kensington Point, Ulsoor, Bangalore
cuisines: North Indian, Asian, Modern Indian, Finger Food
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Private Dining Area Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, Nightlife, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Ellarigu Namaskara!

This place is very close to Trinity metro station, Has rooftop ambience which is good and they screen live sports too. 

Live music was amazing and most of the songs were enjoyable, They do accept zomato gold so it‚Äôs a plus.

Prices slightly on higher side however it‚Äôs worth for deliciousness. 

Ambience 4.5/5
Food 4.5/5
Service 4/5
Price 4/5

Overall 4/5', "This was a nice place indeed. After long time I got a new place and it's really very much near to MG road area. This outlet has 2 level where in I visited only the 1 level. It was really nice . They have a good options for the drinks and foods. For the drinks I ordered the LIIT and pitcher of beer. For the food we ordered chicken tikka pizza, peri peri french fries and chilly pork. Compared to the quantity it was okey but taste was really good. Staff is very nice. I would love to visit again and try few more amazing appetizers and main course. Kiddos to team Night Owl"]

address: 1080, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Nightlife, Live Music, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Great ambience a must visit place the only thing for which I gave 4/5 is the quantity according to prove 
For more detail review follow me on Instagram @foodienos and @the_biswajeetbiswal', 'I absolutely loved this place.
A completely Christmas-y set up really lightens the feel of the place.
Starters are very fresh and tasty.
Pizzas were pretty decent.
Dim lit ambience in the evening.
Kind staff but Service was slightly lagging.', "I recently went to this place for Zomato infinity dining (which this place has discontinued now). I was positively surprised by how good the food was at this place. We tried veg croquettes which was crispy and tasty. We also tried stuffed mushroom and pineapple cheese ice which were really good and tasty. Stand out dish for us was aloo tikki which is one of the best I have had in Bangalore. In the mains we had, Thai green curry with rice and veg cannelloni which were good as well. They don't have desserts on their menu which is one negative point but I will still give this place 5 stars because of that amazing aloo tikki.", 'Went here for a team lunch in June and the place is huge and since it was a weekday afternoon, was quite empty.
There were slow songs being played in the backdrop and winds gushing in and out.
There are some cool props like a van/food truck inside to help you pose and get some Insta worthy images.
The food and drinks are plenty in choices and good in quality too.
Liked the bacon and momos specially.

A good overall place in Indiranagar to spend a lively time with your people!', 'Went during the late afternoon the place gave good vibes because of the weather and the rooftop ambience. It looke more beautiful during evening when lights were on. Food was good and service was quick.', 'Found this place through zomato gold. As the name, Hangover has many indian & foreign liquor option with variety of cocktail . it was good to try something new which is "bucket" option, which serves in small bucket which is ok for 2-3 persons. Apart from that we had Veg Nachos (loaded with cheese , olive , corn , onion) and classic margharita pizza. The portions of the food was nice. Ambience was great with light music. Recommended for office dinner & friends get together.
Buddhi' bomb (Drink) - 5/5 üí•
Nachos -4/5 ( nachos were crispy till the end btw)
Pizza - 4/5', 'Hangover Indiranagar is a perfect place to chill on weekends. Good crowd, good ambiance, good food, nice service and some of the best cocktails...what else do you need on a Saturday night. The place is always packed on weekends, better you reach there early to grab a nice place. I did hear about the cocktails a lot but I thought I should try it myself and I was not disappointed at all.. unlike many of the pubs, the cocktails are not diluted and makes u really high...Love the place.. would love to visit again. :)', 'Nice place to have a fun evening with friends! The place is located in Indranagar close to Chianti. They serve quite a lot of beers both domestic and IMFLs too. The food is quite nice too and overall the experience was worth it.']

address: Building 65, M M Road, Near Haji Ismail Sait Mosque, Frazer Town, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews: ['I have been to their outlet in Kalyan Nagar couple of times and loved the food there, unfortunately coming to Frazer Town they have lost that food quality or probably they were only concentrating on the decor. I was introduced to Salta Fasah there and I was floored by it, the one here is not even close to that. The basmati rice they using in the madfoon is unusual and totally flavourless. Only saviour was the Kunafa. I hope they improve compete with the other Arabian restaurants in Frazer town..']

address: 915/1, Ground Floor, Devadas Building, Near Ram Medical, Nagarathpet, Near City Market, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Chikanna tiffin rooms
        We love this place for their masala dosa. 
Masala dosa of chikanna is one of the best dosa I‚Äôve ever had. 
It literally feels like you‚Äôre drinking a ghee, masala dosa is completely loaded with a lot of ghee in it. 
One masala dosa completely fills your stomach and make it heavy!', '']

address: 195, Seppings Road, Shivajinagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews: ['Feel like having food at homeüòçüòçüòçone of the best tong food joints in Shivaji Nagar.. worth tasting their food üëçüèªüëçüèªtheir service was really good üòç', 'If you love real tamil breakfast and dosa idlis pls go here murugan mess sooperb simple but powerful taste guys its seems really good food enjoy you all new comer we appreciate', 'Shivajinagar has so many tiny food joints and these kind of joints run by a single person with a support of one or two family members. Well, Murugan Mess is one of the hidden gem kind of restaurants off Commercial Street. He prepares brilliant Idly Vadas, Pongal and Palav for morning breakfast. The dishes here are Tamilnadu Style. The Quality and Taste are always consistent. Prices are decent for the Portions. People might not feel comfortable about the place, because of improper seating facility. However, we can stand & eat. I just love the Pongal & Palav.\n                                                bangaloreepicure.com', 'good ...................']

address: 1/4, 1st Floor, Lido Mall, Swami Vivekananda Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
cuisines: South Indian, North Indian, Biryani, Street Food, Fast Food
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating, Resto Bar, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, All Day Breakfast, Desserts and Bakes, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
["Theme : cocktail + street food.
It's really a awesome combo. They serve some amazing cocktails. LIIT was my favourite. Rosogolla chat, something unique you should definitely taste. Achari aloo was so delicious. Amazing decoration and lighting. They have both inside and balcony seating arrangements. Courteous staff. Loved the playlist.", 'Ambience : Good seating capacity with different Counters serving different types of cuisines. They have balcony seating as well.

Food :

Rasgulla Chaat : It is a must try. Curd and chutneys topped on the Rasa gulas. Good balance of flavors.

Street FoodIrani Saali Kheem Pav : It was delicious and a must try.

Bafat Masala Fish : It was great. Masala fried fish.

Rava Fried Prawns : Crispy rava fried prawns. Very tasty.

Red Rice Benne idli : The idlies were super soft and delicious.

Karimeen Fry : Masala was very nice and the fish was fresh and tasted great.

Service : Service was little slow. Staffs were friendly & attentive.', 'We had kawabs, fish , biryani and paneer. The taste was yummy and the value for price . As there is ample parking available hence it‚Äôs not a botheration . The ambience is good and with the choice of variety of selections . We loved the ambience. The service Leveln needs improvement though. There is a lack of clarity also in the offers as the staff seemed to be unaware about it', 'If you‚Äôre on the hunt for a quick amuse-gueule from the streets before a movie or full-fledged meal after a movie or wanna to spend quality time with your loved one with awesome food then THE BANGALORE STREET CLUB resto is a perfect hotspot for you. This simple yet luxurious restaurant is nestled on the first floor of Lido Mall and visiting this restaurant is like killing two birds with one stone as it combines the street-style theme with haute aesthetic. Urban, modern, eclectic, gleeful and ritzy are the few words that describe this place. This spot welcomes you with beautiful light shining through the strove of bamboo lamps and alongside artificial green turf wall says the watchword ‚ÄòMajja Maadi‚Äô to maxim in beguiling gorgeous environs with your squad along with the food. The space is spread-out indoor and outdoor.
                                                ...Read full post on abhinieats.com', 'The bangalore street club was a snoothing food stop option with vide range on the menu served. Basically the idea of bringing street food into club dining style was an amazing idea.

They have great ambience and friendly staff. Loved the place.', "Nice ambience, courteous staffs and good food all under one roof. I just wished they had more options of mocktails. Music is okay. Hop in, if you're tired after shopping in the nearby malls!", 'So Lido Mall has a new place where you can head to to catch a quick bite before a movie or enjoy a leisurely meal after your show has ended. Sounds intriguing now? Lets dive in. Ambience and Concept. Located in place of the rather tepid TGIF on the first floor, this place has been completely revamped and looks really pretty and spacious. The inside seating is well-spaced out, brightly lit and comfortable. The outdoor seating is more subdued and is perfect for a dinner date or a quick drink with friends while soaking in the lovely Bangalore weather.
                                                ...Read full post on theuncliched.com']

address: 12/1, Ulsoor Road, Sivanchetti Gardens, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I have had the sadya here multiple times(except during onam - avoided visting the restaurant amidst the heavy onam rush) and it has been amazing. The sadya is exactly what you would expect and it is a nice experience to take guests too as well to introduce them to kerala food. As nonvegetarian sides we had ordered the mutton pepper fry and it was an absolutely splendid melt-in-the-mouth meat dish. Good service.', 'Kerala being one of the top ten Paradise on earth, One should know about the heavenly food they make.

Talking about hospitality and food this restaurant located in indranagar is the bench mark for Kerala dishes. The ambience is very well maintained and soothes your mind. The staffs are so friendly and well behaved.
Sadya ( feast ) which origins from Kerala is of most importance to all Malayalis consisting of a variety of traditional dishes served on a banana leaf.

We tried the veg sadya and it was mind blowing and one can have it very easily. The sadya was cooked in traditional manner and one can smell the aromas of coconut oil and makes you feel you are in Kerala.

Well balanced food with no loaded masala and spices. Options of opting kerala boiled rice and normal white rice is also available.

Desserts were top the charts and had those 2 times.

One should try the sadya when ever they visit this food paradise.', "Every year we wait for Onam sadya at Ente Keralam. It's been 5 yrs we always celebrate Onan at Ente Keralam. This yr also we were at Ente Keralam and it was not up to mark or just as every year. Disappointed with it and especially the payasams were horrible. It was water, no taste. Pathetic!! Though we had early lunch around 1.00pm, it was water. Never expected and was not satisfied this yr. Also the crowd was also not heavy this year. 

Hope they will get back next year.", "Amazing Sadhya Luncheon. It was served within minutes and tasted awesome. The yellow curry served by the side being the best. It's located bin heart of MG road Ulsoor area and just a walk from Taj where i am staying. I think i will return for more in days to come.", 'I am rating it a 4 because of the unreasonably pricy menu. Barring that, a fantastic place to experience Kerala food. The food is as traditional as it gets and covers a wide variety in both veg and non veg. We took 2 sadhya meals and 1 neymeen polichathu. Great presentation of food. The kaachiya moru and payar curry in meals were delicious. Nice desserts as well.', "An amazing option for dinner! The unlimited thali is such a great option. I enjoyed everything on the thali. I'm definitely going here again for another (hopefully) great experience. Another thing - the servers here are extremely sweet and helpful, which was very refreshing to see."]

address: 52/2, Sujay's Pride, Church Street, Bangalore
cuisines: North Eastern, Asian, Naga, Steak, Momos
more_info: Home Delivery, Wine, Smoking Area, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Live Sports Screening, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['I went to this place to try steaks but instead preferred ordering Asian cuisines.
This cute little place gives a very positive and warm Vibe.
Dishes*
-Kwyteiyw( glass noodles with Tom yum soup and our choice of meat) was delicious. I tried both the pork and chicken (though i prefer the former)
-The chicken phad Thai noodles was a good choice too.', "This review is not based on steaks but on Chinese delicacies! Me and my friends went to Somilan Steak house during the late lunch hours but still we faced the unexpected crowd which was reflected in the quality of service provided! However the staffs did apologize for the poor service.
Coming to the food, I experienced best Chinese food here and was very much satisfied with the taste and quality. Quantity is also decent. Cost range for steaks is obviously high but for Chinese main course it is pocket friendly and zomato gold is worth using in this outlet.
Decor is posh and the outlet is located just outside the mg road metro station!
It's highly recommend if you are looking for good restaurants in Church Street.", 'All I can say about this place is that they have got the best north eastern food. Thukpa served there is so awesome that I went again just to have it again. The taste is irresistible with its super affordable prices. Both quantity and quality of the food will woo you for sure. The interiors are typical naga style with naga ancestors photographs which gives it a tribal look. Being a north eastern I just loved this place but I am sure you will like it too, just have a try. They have also got great beverages which taste wonderful, goes well with the food.', 'This quaint restaurant in church street turned out to be a brilliant delight. I ordered pork fried rice and pork hoison and the taste was great but the quantity was amazing.']

address: 28, Centenary Building, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews: ['Great food with great ambience! The service was great and I loved the starters. The Tandoori Mashroom and Raan were amazing. The Daal is great and goes along with the selection of breads provided. The Butter Chicken was not my liking and main courses were somewhat lackluster, but overall I must say my overall experience was great! Shoutout to the staff for being awsome!!', 'Á¥Ñ10Âπ¥„Å∂„Çä„Å´ÂæÄË®™„ÄÇ‰ª•ÂâçÂæÄË®™„Åó„ÅüÊôÇ„ÅÆÂç∞Ë±°„Å®ÂÖ®„ÅèÂ§â„Çè„Çâ„Åö„ÄÅÂêçÂ∫ó„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜ„ÅÆ„ÅØÊÑöÁõ¥„Å´Â§â„Çè„Çâ„Å™„ÅÑ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÇíÊèê‰æõ„ÅóÁ∂ö„Åë„Çã„Åì„Å®„Å™„ÅÆ„Åã„Å™„Å®ÊÑüÈäò„Å´Êµ∏„Çã„ÄÇ„É°„Éã„É•„Éº„ÅØ„Ç≥„ÉÜ„Ç≥„ÉÜ„ÅÆÂåó„Ç§„É≥„ÉâÊñôÁêÜ„ÄÅÂ∫óÂêç„ÅÆÈÄö„Çä„Çø„É≥„Éâ„Éº„É™Á≥ª„ÅØ‰∏ÄÊäº„Åó„Å®„ÅÆ„Åì„Å®„ÄÇ„Å©„Çå„ÇÇÂë≥„Çè„ÅÑÊ∑±„ÅèÁæéÂë≥„ÄÇ„ÇÑ„ÇÑÂ∫óÂì°„ÅÆÊäº„Åó„ÅåÂº∑„ÅÑÁÇπ„ÅØÊ∞ó„Å´„Å™„Çã„Åå„ÄÅ„ÇÑ„ÅØ„ÇäÈï∑Âπ¥Á∂ö„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å†„Åë„Å´‰Ωï„Åã„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„ÄÇ', "It's one of the few old restaurants in Bangalore and is located in the heart of the city. The food is on the expensive side and is quite over hyped. Must try the Tandoor platter as they serve a variety of options. The chicken and mutton biryani were decent. The first floor has a chandelier which makes the ambience pretty during night. Great for a family outing if you're searching for north Indian food."]

address: Old 2, New 4, Old Binnamangala Village, Ward 82, Mahadevpura, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Healthy Food, North Indian, Biryani, Continental, Beverages
more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['We were invited to review this place . We tried shunya lemon and lime infused green tea it tasted nice. They gave us option to curate our own meal so we went for noodles and chilli paneer which was served with salad and oat balls , it was good in taste and we also tried Dal makhni and chole with lacha Paratha , that was nice too. We absolutely loved the moist chocolate cake which was healthy and yet so delicious. Ambiance is great too.', 'Eat.Fit is a go-to place for budget nights (after 10pm). Not too spicy, not bland either, the food is a saviour of a happy tummy. The Paneer and Egg dishes are particularly appealing to me, apart from the Salad.

While the experience of having the choice to add anything to your plate is what we friends relish most, what we hate are their sample servings of so called "healthy" sweet (like the flax seed barfi or the sweet peanut powder) on the meal which is not something that is pleasant at the end of a sumptuous meal.

Even the rotis aren't always soft and sometimes are dry by the end of the day. The best bet then is the biryani which is always kept warm.', "Placed order for Lucknowi Veg Biryani biryani was to dry. I heard and seen advertisement about so planned to order, But got dispoitment with quantity as well.
Need a lots of improvement
Giving 3 star only for packaging.
Didn't get bill along with Order", 'üê∞Thai green chicken curry, sauteed veg, wok rice or should I say woke rice xD and a humble salad
üê∞I like the fact that I can get cost friendly healthy macro nutrient measured food right at my door step thanks to eat fit
üê∞Thai curry consistency - 7/10 over all but 10/10 based on the price
üê∞I liked the fact that the whole meal had a medley of veggies especially antioxidant rich ones
üê∞kcal - 400
üê∞major love for your weight watch menu', "Ordered the raw pressery juice along with a moist chocolate cake and the food came right on time. Was surprised to see that they gave me a complimentary lemon tea cake on my order. This was soo sweet and unexpected. Thank you. The moist chocolate cake had a very good consistency. Not too moist nor too dry.. Just perfect. The lemon tea chia cake was also very well made. I'd like to however give a small suggestion for the packaging. If the cakes could be cling wrapped before its put in the box, I think it would make more sense because I ended up getting the chocolate cake stuck to one part of the box with the top layer gone :'(", "Ordered fruits bowl... The miskmelon was a spoiler. It was way too raw to eat. Inspired by the Whitefield branch's fruit bowl o reordered here in office... Was a bit disappointing.

The walnut cake also was not great. Did not seem fresh. I liked its packaging though.", "Healthy, filling, and worth the money. Look out for their daily deals for a steal of a meal. I tried the rice with chilli chicken and paneer kurchan along with a healthy dose of salad. It's perfect for a healthy lunch and not heavy on the wallet."]

address: 295 & 296, Ground Floor, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bengaluru
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Nothing in food is justifying their ratings. Kashmiri dum aloo was very bad and not dum at all. Kabuli naan in name of fruit cocktail had fruit jam on it, seriously are you kidding me. Peshawari tikka- I was told is paneer stuffing but it was nothing but paneer tikka that too half cooked marination.

Everyone on floor had some issue with some food item and I am sure this is totally not worth of money.

And they charge service charge too :)', 'The ambience was so cool and very pleasant. Best place to have nice and peaceful dinner. 

Taste was good as well. 
Penne Alfredo Pasta was very creamy and must try in this place', "Firstly we book a group table (11ppl) for 9.30 pm and we got it at 9.50pm. When we started giving our order, the waiter noted down few and said I will send my senior to take order. Then we received 3 portions of pasta instead of 1. We had ordered some Indian food for kids, which we did not get till 11.30pm. One dish comes in an hour's time which is shared among the 11 of us. We told no ice in watermelon juice, but we receive a cold one. At 11.40 we asked for our pending order items, and the waiter days all items are served. When we said no, he goes in and brings some other dish. Utter disappointed and waste of money. I will recommend people not to go here. A big waste of money and time.", 'A very little place near the very busy KFC sognal, this place is a great visit for family.
Maintained clean and neat, the staff welcomes you with a warm smile.

We had to wait for ten minutes before we were seated.

A very little menu I would say, but it covers a lot of dishes, but not with a lot of variety.

We started with creamy spinach soup. It was delicious. Savoury, creamy, it was perfect.

Then we went to italian pav bhaji. I felt this was just an over westernisation of the traditional Indian food. Pav bhaji is pav bhaji because of the masala and not the concept of a pav and some random bhaji. I appreciate their efforts, but I personally did not like it. Otherwise the pav was buttery and the bahji had decent amounta of cheese. Could have been a little spicy.

Babycorn dragon - This was a mistake I guess. It was decent, normal..nothing great.

Only complaint is we had to call for staff many a times for water, forks, sppons and tissues etc

Follow me on Zomato for more reviews', "Wonderful .. food .. atmosphere and excellent service from Anu and her team we took the infinity plan and was amazed with the spread we could order and also kept in mind we don't waste .. it was an occasion we were celebrating and they did their best. The portions were perfect and the food from the taste to the presentation simply awesome..,!! It was a Monday so wasn't crowded.. we order quite a few things but the avacado salad .. the bake and the continental was off the hook .. the desserts are to die for..
They also wrote happy birthday on the plate which was thoughtful and customer service at its best. A must visit place.", "This place seems to be one of the hidden gem in the busiest of the lanes in Indiranagar. Located a stone throw away from Toit. However it's a little tough to identify the place for the first timers.

The ambiance of the place is simple, basic and neatly done. The staff help you to find a comfortable table and settle.

I was recently here with a few friends for dinner. The menu is a modern makeover of classic dishes,

The pear and walnut salad was a healthy and wise choice for me,

Next came the stuffed mushroom tikka and the peshawari panner tikka both well done and done to perfection.

The rosemary mix veg roast was a perfect alternative to a veggie replacing a steak.

The banana peanut butter shake was great one too.

Desserts were a modern makeover of the classic rasmalai and gulab jamoon.

Over all worthy visit.
                                                voiceofmytastebuds.com", "Jacqueline and Mohsin were the stars of the day!
We were here for dinner and these guys made the experience memorable and worth the second visit.
Everything was perfect!
Don't go by the space of the restaurant. These people wont disappoint you! Absolutely must visit!
Good job guys! Cheers :)", 'At the outset, this is a pure veg restaurant. The food was quite tasty. We ordered dishes that were both desi and continental, and found them all to pass muster. Good place for a quiet meal.']

address: 484, Signature Square, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Hyderabadi Biryani', 'Chicken Biryani', 'Mutton Biryani', 'Vegetable Biryani', 'Hydrabadi Biryani', 'Chilli Paneer', 'Mutton Seekh Kabab']
reviews: ["This legendary outlet perhaps serves the lightest form of Hyderabadi biryani on earth. It's easy on palate and unhaunting in the end! Although I personally like the spicier version but sometimes to be on the healthier side, I bank upon Paradise to satisfy my biryani cravings. Taste, quality and quantity-wise they have maintained parity with their Hyderabad outlets."]

more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available, Card Upon Delivery,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Phirni', 'Hyderabadi Biryani', 'Lucknowi Biryani', 'Chicken Roll', 'Calcutta Biryani', 'Chicken Biryani', 'Gulab Jamun']
reviews:
['I ordered a Hyderabadi boneless chicken biryani.Here the biryani is served with a pot.The quantity is good.The biryani was lovely and there was good amount of masala.
The flavour of biryani was spicy and nice.', 'Keep Calm and Add Dum to your Biryani !
.
Delivery Review : Potfull
.
When Biryani cravings happen you can surely reach out to order from Potfull , so many things to like about this outlet !
I often crave for biryani so decided to give this place a go specially because they serve in Mud pots .
Surely the packaging attracted me as I am big no plastic preacher but after trying Potfull Hyderabadi Dum Biryani and Khada Chicken Tikka .
I am surely impressed with the taste apart from the packaging .

The Tikka was succulent and well marinated .
The Biryani was flavourfull and the right amount of spice
.
On a first look Price might seem a bit high but the quantity and the amount of Chicken pieces justify it completely .

Note worthy Mentions :
Delivery was on point and reached quickly
They also send plant seeds along to reuse the pot and plant in it .
Though served in a mud pot , it was sealed perfectly keeping the Biryani really hot for long']

reviews: ['I had ordered mcaloo tikki burger which was moderate in taste and proportion. I even ordered plain fries which was better. To go with this meal, a soft drink was also ordered. The place is decent for a normal meal at an affordable price. I had ordered meals and desserts as well, they were good', 'This place is one of my favourite eating point. I truly love the service provided by them in addition to the various delicious food items. I love to try the various burgers,shakes,the meals and various other menu items. The best part about burger king is that you get really satisfying dishes at minimum price. I recommend it as a m']

address: 1st Floor, HAL 3rd Stage, Puttappa Layout, New Tippasandra, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['Please think twice before ordering food from this place. One of my friends ordered veg manchow fried rice. Recieved the item attached in picture. Being a pure vegetarian, my friend was not aware of the white pieces in rice. The item was actually egg fried rice and the gravy along with it was chicken munchurian balls. After having a bite, when my friend got suspicious of the taste, then asked a non veg eating person who confirmed it was egg and chicken. This is a matter of serious concern because this is linked with our beliefs and these people do not have the basic courtesy to check the order before packing for delivery. Not recommended at all. As there is no option for 0 stars hence giving one star.']

address: Next To BSNL, HAL 2nd Stage, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: North Indian, Mughlai, South Indian, Chinese
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Buffet,
reviews:
['Empire is one place that even if you go in the middle of the night you will get good food. I really like their Tandoori chicken which is spicy and tasty. Also like their ghee rice with paneer butter masala. The ghee rice is very mild and bland but with the gravy it tastes awesome.

Egg fried rice is not that good there. Completely value for money and quick service', "Empire's Indiranagar outlet is better than most of the other outlets in the city. The staff is courteous while Mansoor does a good job attending to us.

The Tandoori Chicken has a special taste here. My staple here is Chicken biryani along with Chicken Tandoori which I would definitely recommend.
Recommended to add Buttermilk or grape juice to go with the food.

Definitely recommended.", 'Apart from main course nothing really stood out. Waiters seem confused at times, wrong orders keep coming at your table. Chicken tandoori masala was superb, empire special chicken kebab could have been better', 'Hey what are you giving to your Customer.
You customer is placing order for biryani and you are giving what ? Your Manager is not willing to talk with Customer please train thatF**k*r.
What is quantity after spending 200rs.
What the hell is going wrong with you guys.
Sorry I am giving 1 star because zomato is not giving option for negative rating And Zomato
I am speechless. Your employee giving 32 rs to make up my bad experience. I am not a beggar. I am your Customer and Impire shame on you.', 'One of the finest places to eat. With over 40 branches and more than 3000 employees, the chain of excellent restaurants has maintained a standard in hospitality that only a few have managed to. Extraordinarily delicious food, combined with beautiful, friendly and serene restaurant environment is what anyone would love. Highly recommended by Travel Utopia Kashmir.

great food. reasonable price and good atmosphere. .love this place‚ù§

Visited one of the empire branch at indranagar with friends, the foods we ordered were very good specially tawa swarma....loved it...

I love the kebab and biriyani I love to visit again soon with my family

Good hospitality keep it up', "Went to Empire Restaurant for dinner. We ordered a biriyani and s starter and it was sufficient for two of us. The taste was really nice and there was a good quantity. They also have Zomato Gold, so the place is not expensive. The service was really nice . It's a good place to have some south Indian Cuisine in indiranagar at a reasonable price.", 'The food is very tasty and place is great for family lunches and dinners and parties.
The service can be a little more better overall good place for lunches and dinners with friends and family and the prices are also average.', "Empire always my first preference.visite Indiranagar empire last week.tried their spread buffet.they had almost 25 veriaty dishes veg and nonveg with the lowest price ‚Çπ199.

They have chicken and veg soup.kabab and pepper chicken starter. Romali roti and Kerala poratta the bread's.veg fried rice.chicken biriyani.plain rice.butter chicken.egg masala.dal fry.sambar.rasam.poriyal..Wow lot's veriaty the reasonable price unlimited quantities..
Must try to you once.", 'Not the first place that comes to my mind when I think about grabbing lunch. Still, due to colleagues vote we ended up here. We ordered grill chicken, chicken curry and Kerala Parotta. The chicken items were really on the spicy side. I like spicy food but I prefer pepper spice as opposed to chilli spice. The parottas were hot and crispy, which was nice.
The prices are slightly on the higher side for a simple lunch.', "Huge premise with lot of space for dining. Variety of food but I only went to try kabab which was very tasty and unique. There is no parking space that's one setback else it's a good joint to visit for lovely food. Staff is friendly and service is quick and they do accept zomato gold which was great."]

address: Building 3080, 2nd Floor, Hal 2nd Stage, 6th Main, Double Road, Opposite Esi Quarters, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews:
['So I tried out the place for the first time and had a great experience.
The place serves amazing food for great prices.
The delivery for my order was very satisfying too.
I absolutely loved their chicken biryani, amazing flavours, great taste, long grain rice. Even the meat was fresh and tender.
The chicken cheese tikka was amazing too, the only problem was with chutney they served. The green chutney was not that fresh, it could have been much better.
For dessert I ordered their gajar ka halwa, which was hands down one of the gajar halwas i have tried, it was exactly like my mom makes and made me smile as soon as I had the first bite.
So overall it was great experience for me.
Would definitely order from this place again.', "Guys please try biryani from this place. I am telling you one of the best biryani in Bengaluru. I came from Hyderabad and searching for good biryani in Bengaluru but can't find one. Somehow got to know about this amazing place. The quantity was good and chicken was tender and smooth. Aroma of rice was almost same as in Hyderabad's biryani.
Highly recommend. Also tried chicken Kebabs and truly speaking they were full of flavours. Looking for good chicken try celebreat.", "All of us unanimously agree that Biriyani is bae, don't we ?! This Biriyani from celebreat is one step above that !! Each grain tasting delicious,, the quantity was just right for one person.. The kebabs were simply delicious and left me licking my fingers.. The packaging was neatly done.. I would definitely suggest everyone to try this Biriyani for a wonderful experience
.
.
Overall Rating : 5/5", 'This is an awesome cloud kitchen where they serve amazing biryanis and desserts.

I had ordered

Veg Biryani: It was amazing and worth the price. The quantity was really good.

Paneer tikka Starter: It was good and you get some 7-8 pieces. A good thing to have with the biryani.

Gulab Jamun: It was just too good. One amazing desert to try here. A good dessert after the biryani makes your meal amazing.

Overall a lovely place to order food from.

Food- 4.8/5', "This new biriyani place in Indiranagar does grab your attention due to its delicious Biriyanis. Got this ordered for a dinner. As a new release, I had Afghani chicken biriyani from them. I must say this was the first time I ever ate a cheesy saucy Biriyani. As biriyanis are normally expected to be spicy, it's something different to try this. So I would recommend it to you all. A unique blend of sweetness in biriyani with succulent chicken pieces was a delight to have. The chicken Tikka along with it was delicious as well. It was well packed & was a good heavy dinner for me. Do try their different flavors of Biriyani.", 'Celebreat is a newly opened cloud kitchen in indiranagar,bangalore.

This is a place where you get one of the finest biranis. I ordered paneer biryani and paneer pakoda .

Paneer biryani is so tasty. They have used long grain rice, perfect ingredients to make this biryani. No extra masala and nothing.I loved the taste.

Coming to paneer pakoda. Biryani cubes are so big and soft and succulent.

The quantity i ordered is enough for 2 people.

I highly recommend this place to order.
Follow @pallavi.ganta on instagram for more updates.', 'This is one of the best place to get the finest Biryani in Bangalore.

Celebreat is the newly opened restaurant in the city. It is located near Indiranagar, Bangalore.

I would strongly recommend this place for all the Biryani lovers.

First of all, all the items are separated & properly packed.\xa0

I have tried Veg biryani, paneer pakora & gulabjamun.

Veg Biryani --> The biryani was really tasty & yummy. The rice & vegetables were properly cooked. It has a great authentic taste with lot of veggies inside. The quantity was good and properly packed in box.

Paneer pakora --> I really liked the paneer starter. Paneer pakora. It was served with green chutney and capsicum.\xa0

Gulab jamun --> yummy & tasty.

My rating would be 5/5.

Great taste & good quality.

Must recommend--> Paneer Pakora', 'Recently I tried their Special Veg Biryani and Gajar Halwa. I would say that the experience was really good.\xa0

The packaging was amazing. The biryani was packed in a cardboard box nicely. The raita and salad too came in little cups. It was handled very well and there wasn‚Äôt any spillage or so. 

The biryani had a good amount of veggies and paneer chunks. I loved the taste of biryani. It was cooked very well. I wasn‚Äôt expecting much from Gajar Halwa as it‚Äôs a biryani place. But it came out as a surprise for me. The Gajar Halwa tasted amazing. The sweetness was just perfect.', 'If you are a biryani person and if you love trying new biryani places, then this place is worth trying.
First of the it comes well packed with zero spillage.
I have tried Chicken Kabab, it was deep fried, well marinated and tasted good, the chicken chunks were tender, along with it I had Paneer Biryani, it has loads of veggies and decent number of fried paneer chunks, the rice was well cooked, it was not too spicy.']

address: 2019, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Tea', 'Banana Walnut Cake', 'Chicken Croissant', 'Saffron Chai', 'Chicken Puff', 'Samosa', 'Veg Puff']
reviews:
['An amazing small joint which serves one of the best tea of Bangalore. I just love there ambiance and the place where it is located . 

there will be always crowd here. Chai days serve amazing categories of chai...We tried the traditional Masala chai and Ginger tea. Both of them were simply amazing.

We went here midnight around 1am. roads were empty but this place is totally crowded.
Must go place for chai..

Overall:
Taste:4/5
Ambiance:4/5
Service:4/5', 'So here is the new chai joint into the business after chai point , chai resto and chai central in Bangalore . Located just next to the frozen bottle is the new Chai days . I just love there ambiance and the place where it is located . Coming to the chai i had a Medium size Ginger masala chai , it was really hot and the taste was really better than the rest of the chai store‚Äôs in bangalore  so if your looking for a new trending in chai go ahead and this store.', "This is not the first time I've had their tea but one of many and today, I woke up with a bad hangover and thought of getting myself some punchy tea to start my day with. Checked all the apps and many places to order from yet found everything either too pricey or inappropriate quantity. Finally I stopped on Chai Days as somehow it slipped my mind earlier.

Ordered 500ML Wonder Flask of Ginger Masala tea and boy, they sure delivered it with a punch in it. My system reboot was successful after 2 cups of their finest tea along with my friend who is miles from having a hangover unlike me. To add, saffron tea here is the best as I had a liter of the same delivered last weekend and all enjoyed it.

Loved the package and the cups and what I appreciate most about Chai Days is, they serve the mentioned quantity of tea which is not the case with many other joints. All in all, a great start to my day so thank you Chai Days.."]

address: 8/ 9, 17th F Cross, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['So this was my first order from this restaurant, after that I got addicted to their biryani. For 3 days I ordered the same and different biryani.
i ordered online
-chilli chicken biryani.
-pepper chicken biryani.
both biryanies was yummy but i like pepper chicken biryani the most.
but rayat was not upto the mark.
quantity was good and packaging also.
.
Do follow me on Instagram..
T.F.C VLOGGER', "I've tried their Biryanis for sometime now and yesterday had the chicken biryani. Although the taste is slightly better than a few other joints falling in the same price category, the quantity was quite less. At times it is fulfilling but most of the times its not. I wouldn't recommend this to those who expect good amount to be served. It's very reasonable but that quantity is just not satisfying. Their pepper biryani is the best and most of the times, that's what I order and always go for 2 instead of 1 if you're hungry. Worth it!! Diwali compliment was a delight!

Overall, a decent place but not too much on offer here."]

address: 297, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes, Smoking Area, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
['I always love to go at this place . And why not? When you get so amazing food ambience and service . It worth going again and again .

Last night after having my dinner at one of the restaurant . We went here it was late night and they were about to close . The cold weather have made us crave for the "Hot Chocolate" . If haven't tried yet do try it .

On our request they specially made 2 hot chocolates for us . Loved the way how they go extra mile to make the customer happy.

We also tried donuts . I say it was pretty ok .
But you should definitely try their other cuisine like pizzas , pasta

And if you haven't tried their red velvet cupcakes do try it . It's best here', "Most affordable place in and around Indiranagar, period!
.
Ambience: Just when you enter the place, you will witness a lush green atmosphere seatings are arranged outside the cafe(mostly filled) then you can enter their bakery section! Drool your hearts out seeing those lovely cakes n pastries! Then you have seatings inside as well as behind the restaurant!
.
What we tried:
Panner goes Mexico Pizza üçï: Wood-fired thin crust pizza, was too good!

Veg Lasagne: Cheese cheese all over!

Black currant blast: Just a black currant icecream mixed with some milk (avoid)

Cold coffee: worth a try

Red velvet Sunday, walnut brownie: it was too good, you can always choose this if u are in doubt!

Signature cheesecake: Don't know why, it wasn't smooth as it used to be, didn't like it!

Overall: If you are on a budget and want to spend some quality time, this is the place to be", 'An outstanding joint for breakfast or all day dine option at this corner house on 100 ft road Indiranagar, we had breakfast special non veg all in one combo option which came with sausages, toast, yummy juice omelette, cakes , buns and coffee , we tooksides like mote sausages, coffee and cake. Service was great , nice people around and it was just a perfect Sunday brunch for us - keep it up', "I've been to the Lavelle road branch and absolutely loved it. Ended up here after looking around for options since Glen's can NEVER be a wrong option. Ofcourse it was worth it. We just ordered Cheesy Garlic bread(it was so delicious I forgot to take a picture!) and Margherita and got one carrot cake to finish it off which was so damn cute! Would definitely recommend it to others.", "Visited this cozy place located very near to the Indira Nagar metro for some dessert after a heavy meal. The rainbow cake was very tasty and the cold coffee was heavenly with a scoop of chocolate ice cream and whipped cream.

Definitely revisiting Glen's Bakehouse for some of their pastries and other specialities.

Thank you, Team Glen's Bakehouse.", "Dessert Heaven. Sweet tooth paradise. Date worthy place. Need more reasons? It's one of a kind with hot chocolate that'll melt your heart and cookies that'll take your worries away (atleast for the moment)
Their signature coffee is too good to be true. A beautiful place with both indoor and outdoor seating. Don't forget to eat their gem cheesecake. I had the Belgian cheesecake and was blown away. Mindblowing stuff.", 'Right since I visited US and tried the Bagels there which is their staple breakfast, I always wondered if there was a place in Bangalore where I could find bagel and finally found out this place that offers a Cream cheese bagel combo. I was so tempted to try the cream cheese bagel here and ordered the Cream Cheese Bagel with Omelette and Veg Croquettes.

It took about 10 minutes for the food to come but right since it was on the table, I just looked at the plate till I finished it and enjoyed every little thing on the plate to the core.

I would definitely visit this place again to try the other items on the menu. It has a young crowd and a very lively atmosphere. My only complaint would be the entry and exit of this place which is super congested, better service and it‚Äôs a little on the pricier side.', "I love this place to the core. Always a stop when I'm in Indiranagar and wanted something to satisfy my sweet tooth. The best red velvet cake is served here and the taste havnt changed in years.
üî∏Croissant Cinnamon Roll is really good to try.
üî∏Pick up any combo breakfast to try.
üî∏Red Velvet cake - best in town
üî∏ Margherita Pizza.

Love this place and it always surprise you .Do lookout for the day specials when you visit.
                                                foodndestinations.com", 'I visited this cafe last week and it was good. It was bit crowded and busy but even though I liked it.
I ordered Red Velvet cupcake, Caramel Cheesecake and Chocolate Frappe which was good.
I had great expectation on Red Velvet cupcake but it was ok as per my opinion.

Food - 4/5
Ambiance - 4.3/5
Overall - 4.1/5']

['I‚Äôve been visiting the place since it first opened at Jeevan Bhimanagar. I love everything I eat here. Some are healthy and some are worth the love handles. I love all the burgers n salads. As usual their stuff is good. I again ordered chicken and falafel wrap. Both were excellent."]

address: 14, 2nd Floor, 10th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Standing Tables, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Got snacks ordered from this place. The packing was simple and neat. We tried potato wedges, kurukre french fries, veg and non veg kukure momos, corn and cheese mini samosas, chicken nuggets. These came with mayonnaise and chutney. The potato wedges and chicken nuggets were basic, a little more seasoning on the potato wedges would have been better. The momos and french fries were decent. We found the corn and cheese samosa to be good.
Food-3
Packing-4', "Snacks in the evening are as important any other meal as you need something to bring up your mood after a long day.

Came across snack house which has variety of snacks to some tasty fusions.

Loved their KurKure fried Momo's and KurKure fries along with regular all time favorite potato wedges. Not too heavy but very good snacks.

We have lot to choose from perfect option for light meal or evening snacks.
                                                eattravelcapture.wordpress.com", "In cool evenings at Bangalore, feels like having snacks which are served hot and delicious. Was checking in zomato app for best snacks place and found this. Reviews were pretty decent and finally ordered from here.

Kurkure Chicken Momo's: who can say no to momos that too for a deep fried one. Its yum and outside its so crispy and soft inside. #musttry

Potato Wedges are all time favourite. No one can skip this when its infront of us. üòâ

Nuggets: chicken nuggets are deep fried and its yummilicious. It tasted yum with that chilli chutney dip. It was spicy and very nicely blended.

Kurkure french fries: never tried this combination. The french fries coated eith kurkure crumbs are so yum that i enjoyed till the end.

Highly recommended place for this lovely climate at eveningsüòçüòçüòç"]

reviews:
["We landed up at delicacy for lunch today at around 2:30pm.
We decided to order chicken steamed Momos and crispy chicken.
The crispy chicken arrived first, definitely crispy but a little too sweet for my taste, if the sweetness is toned down, it'd be a great dish. The chicken momos were amazing, the peanut sauce that was served along with it was also amazing. This place has very generous portion sizes so it's definitely value for money, especially when the food tastes great as well.

Food: 4/5
Ambience: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Value for money: 4.5/5"]

reviews:
['Best place to have spicy briyani üòé
Fish fry is too good. U will get two pieces of Vanjiram fish.
Try Meghana 555,Chicken starter.
Try Mutton Kheema Briyani, other briyani will be normal or u may dislike but this one u will like if ur a spicy briyani lover.', "Convenient location, right near the Indiranagar metro station. The best andhra biryani you could ever try. Without a doubt the Chicken boneless biryani was really good, if you love spicy food. Dont expect great ambience as it usually gets really noisy and unorganized, but it's definitely worth it for the good food!", "My team was craving for biriyani and I decided to treat them at this place. It's about a 100 metres from the metro station. 

If you go to this place, there are two things that you might wanna try - The meals & their Biriyani (which is what it is famous for). The Dum aloo biryani wasn't great. For my vegetarian friends out there, try the Paneer biriyani & Egg Biriyani, and the non-vegetarians can have the boneless chicken biriyani. 

The quantity served is good & filling. It's easy on the pocket as well. Go belt some Biriyani! ü§§", "One of the best chickn boneless biryanis in Bangalore. It's like a festival inside your mouth. My all time favorite dishes from the place are meghnas special biryani, andhar chilli chicken and lollypops. But honestly if you pick just about any starter from their menu, it will be naturally amazing! This place is almost always full and they have super fast service!", 'Upto last year:
Wow.. one of finest birirani in the town... I tried almost all biririanies.... All are good... Veg Biriani also I liked lot.... My wife likes alot... Almost mnty 4_5 times we will have here

8th Sep 2019:
Today we visited same restaurant, we ordered prawn biriyani, meals and special fish fry.. we are totally disappointed with prawn biriyani and fish fry is totally waste, it smells lot.. 2 pieces of fish fry they are charging 350+. My total cost is around 950+. If I add few more money I can go with buffet and have very good starters.. ill not recommended this restaurant...']

reviews:

They accept my order and then later told me patra is not available then why you list this and accpet my order', 'Had the Misal Pav and Dhokla, both of which were very underwhelming. The Misal Pav was too oily and thr Dhokla too sweet. Not enjoyable.', "I have ordered from here many a times but never had the chance to visit.

Upon finally visiting we figured that it's a really tiny place with a seating capacity of not more than 10-12 people.

We ordered the fafda jalebi, khaman dhokla, kachori chaat and dahi puri.

The fafda jalebi was nice. It was served with the authentic papaya subji on the side.

The khaman was very dry and tasteless. It was so disappointing.

The chaat was good. It tasted pretty authentic.

I would love to come back and try the khandvi, dabeli and probably the undhiyu.", 'Nice place to eat good chaat and snacks. Service is also very good. Must try dabeli , khandvi and dhokla. Overall a good place for a quick bite.', "Visited this Chaat house multiple times and the reason is Dabeli. One of the most authentic place for having Dabeli in Bangalore. I didn't find pani puri upto the mark. Tried jalebi and Fafda as well, baith of which tastes great.
Will recommend this place if u r looking for a quick bite.", "Ordered Khandvi, Dabeli and dhokla. I really liked Khandvi and Dhokla. I felt dabeli was very sweet may be because i don't have Gujarati taste buds. Overall a good place to order or visit Gujarati dishes :)", 'Chaat options are good, food is average and bit oily. Food quality and the way it get served could be much better. Overall an okay economy fast food restaurant.', 'ordered aalo tikki chhole chaat, Jalebi Fafda. taste is below average. Jalebi was good but chaat was so bad in taste. Completly Over rated, may be fake reviews not recomended at all. It was below my expectation. I went there by reading social media reviews and rating.']

known_for: serving a combo of unlimited pizzas, desserts and a beverage
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table booking recommended, Valet Parking Available, Rooftop, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['A really peaceful, calm quite restaurant with a speciality for pizzas. They are delicious. The place ambience is overall great with colourful interiors and the staff are extremely friendly and polite. I would totally recommend this place.', 'This place is highly overrated. The only reason it is famous is for the name of the week offer. The pasta I ordered was not even fully cooked. The waiter was not the kindest. Lot of scope of improvement.', 'Onesta is a good cafe to try few specific dishes, the rest of the dishes are average here. You get good desserts and cake here. But the pasta and the pizzas are below average. The starters are good depending on which starter are you choosing.
We had ordered Nachos which was above average, pizza was not good enough. The pasta was absolutely poor. The desserts were good and the cheese cakes were good.
Food: 3.2/5
Service: 4.5/5', "I personally like the Indiranagar outlet ambience better.
Onesta is my favourite for desserts. Nutella chocolate mousse is personal favourite.
Pineapple corn pizza is good.
I ordered spicy hot nachos . It wasn't hot at all. But overall was good.
Alfredo pasta was Good.
Good food , good ambience.", "I have been a regular at Onesta pizza for quite some time. In the past they used to have an 'unlimited pizza + unlimited desert + one beverage' offer. Now they have made it 'one beverage + unlimited pizza + one desert'. This is a great deal if you are in a mood to hog pizza.

The chocolate and banana pizza is still one of my favourite.

Recently I ordered in magarita pizza and double chocolate cake slice. Loved the doodle on the pizza box too.", 'One of Bengaluru‚Äôs best Italian food place  to be,tried out the veg unlimited meal and penne‚Äôall Arabiatta with chicken pasta farmhouse,cream roasted veggies and cheese stuffed crust pizza were personal favourites the best part of the meal was the crust of the pizza it was so thin and all were served hot and we loved every bit of it 
Tiramisu and Nutella cheesecake mousse were brilliant 
the staff were kind and their service can improve as some of the staff members aren‚Äôt clear about the menu 
Looking at the 3 most important aspects:
Ambience-4/5
Authenticity-5/5
Taste-5/5', 'Best shop for pizza lovers starters ND desserts lovers.here the hotel serving with whole menu unlimited with 650 my most fav pizza is chocolate banana pizza such an mouth watering one. In starters like nachos potato wedges.desserts all are good.they are changing menu monthly once.', 'Must give a try for the ambience
Tried this place twice n found it to be decent enough
Ordered here a pasta n pizza and must when you use zomato gold membership then they reduced the quantity of pasta
Pasta was decent enough not something very good
Mexican pizza was actually better the tandoori mayonnaise kind of thing gives a unique taste to the pizza entirely
The ambiance is pretty good
Overall a decent place to hangout .']

address: 15, 19th Main, 60 Feet Road, Koramangala 6th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Board Games, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['An afternoon lunch at this place with a friend. Enjoyed a lot with different games placed on each of the table, ludo, jenga, 6 in a row. üòÖ.
Ordered a veggie feast pizza and a chicken Jamaican jerk (üòÜ) pizza. Veggie was just ok (no paneer üòí) . The chicken pizza was really good.
Since ordered two small pizzas, had to order one more dish. Peri peri pasta. OMG that was real spicy. But so tasty, we even licked the plateüòÑ.
Awesome place, awesome menu. Keep itup.
Not giving it a 5 star because the service was a but slow.', 'Pizza & Ice cream serves in one place which is separated by wooden book shelf,thats what i can say about Fiero Pizzeria.A decent place with good ambiance and service.This place is pocket friendly ( use Zomato Gold) and best for college students and people who wants to spend some quality time .Tried some veg pizza , pasta and some fries.It was decent and peri peri fries was excellent.If you want to try something different then go for choco fries.In beverages,cold coffee was quite good and worth a try.

Food:4/5
Service:5/5
VFM:4/5', "First off, cozy ambience with games like chess, jenga and the likes to encourage people to put down their phones for a bit! Coming to the food, liked the Peri peri fries and plain Garlic cheese bread. Chocolate fries were OK, as were the other garlic bread variants.
Among the pizzas, liked the Paneer tikka one better than the rest. Pasta was Ok.
However, there's some magic missing that creates the Wow factor. I hope they discover it soon as I definitely feel they have immense potential. 
                                                akshayamrecipes.com", "Fiero Pizzeria as you enter this place you can see a brick oven where the pizza is cooked with wood fire as the setting of the kitchen you can take a look of how they make pizzas were made here.

Quite cozy ambience with some music around and the table is filled with some board games where u can play while ur order is getting ready.

Services was quite fast amd we are happy with the service they provide.

And here comes the pizza section their menu has different types of pizza's, fries, nacho's, shakes, and much more.

French fries was crispy good and cold coffee was quite nice as expected. Their pizzas were good i liked the Non veg pepperoni pizza and Nacho's were also so good.Past was surprisingly awesome in this place.

Its the best place to hangout with friends.

Taste - 4/5
.
Service - 5/5
.
Hygiene - 5/5
.
Ambience - 4/5
.
Value for money- 4/5
.", 'A pretty little place with so much fun games to play and tasty pizza to taste with there in house made dough for the base and pizza with no preservatives ,also the woodfire pizza is made solely with firing the woods and not by half gas half wood fire method
.
I tasted All veggies pizza the base here is thick and also it was cheezy so if you are looking for a place with mocktails or for a alternate pizza place for domi or pizza hut u can hang out here', "This place is located in kormangala. The ambiance was quite nice though the seating arrangement could have been better. Lightings were nice. They have kept different games like chess, Jenga, ludo which made this place interesting. They make pizza of Neapolitan style which very less people in India knows about. You won't find the shape of pizza as purely round. They made the sides of the pizza thick and the\xa0 middle part was thin which was quite appropriate. The cheese stretch was longgggg. Impressed :P

They have a lot of items fries, nachos, different varieties of pizzas, calzones, pasta, garlic bread. Taste was nice.

Fries were really great. Collectively i felt good visiting this place. Would like to visit again .", 'Firstly, only because they‚Äôre priced low and their garlic bread was good and the place is clean, I‚Äôll give them a 4. also, they have Zomato gold making it so much more easier for the young college/school going crowd. They do not show any possessiveness towards the mozzarella as they put loads of small balls in their pizza. Honestly, the pizzas were not great and hardly had any meat on them. There was a lot of cheese on the pizza and had the pull etc, however, the cheese was a lil chewy for some reason. The crust is not thin so order a small one and see if you guys like it. The garlic bread was great with the strong olive oil, garlic n soft dough. Also tried the nachos which were really unimpressive.', "Fiero! Pizza is a small pizzeria located in Koramangala 6th block, pizza's here are baked inside a brick oven. the menu includes pizzas, garlic bread, pastas, nachos, fries and desserts. pizzas being the flagship item of the outlet.

BBQ Paneer nachos, Penne red and white pasta, peri peri fries and signature wood fired pizzas are many of the must try items form the menu. what makes this place different from other pizzerias as mentioned in a section of the menu is that the dough is left for to rise for 24 hours making it light and easy to digest and baked in the brick oven. we tried bunch of different wood fired pizzas from the menu and we loved it all.

they also offer 10% student and corporate discount from Mon to Fri upon showing up the ID card.
                                                foodrestorank.com", 'This place is right on the main road opposite to Anand sweets in Koramangala.. easy to locate.. well done interiors, nice hospitality... the place serves really good pizzas, pastas, fries, calzone and cold coffee... the place is connected to icebreakers so you can enjoy both food from Both the menu at one place... my personal favourite here is the peri peri fries and cold coffee (recommended)... over all a decent place to try üëçüèª']

reviews:
["Small little place in the middle of a food street of sorts in Keegan Bhima nagar.

Does a good job of bringing a taste Delhi to Bangalore with it's short and simple menu and a LOT of items based on soya chaap.

I had the Masala Soya chaap which was tasty and the Paneer Lababdar combo which was extremely generous in quantity but probably had a little too much masala in it.

Good place, will definitely return or order from here.", 'Grilled Malai Chaap was faadu. .kulad burtermilk was desi. . And soya chaap tikka gravy combo was above average. .
