address: 34/1-2, Meanee Avenue Tank Road, Sivanchetty Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Board Games, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly, Wifi, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Burgers', 'Pasta', 'Nachos', 'Peri Peri Chicken', 'Freak Shake', 'Peri Peri Pizza', 'Snicker Shake']
reviews:
["I really enjoyed my visit to this restaurant.It was really nostalgic when I visited this place because of its theme SCHOOL just as it's name suggests,it just made be recall some of the best memories I had of my school life.I really loved the way they lived up to their name,the menu was wrapped in a brown paper,pencil boxes,formulas on the wall,avengers toys and lollies I really loved it.Ckming to the food the food was amazing!!!The unicorn freak shake was really good ,the corner baskets were amazing,the pizza and peri peri burger was also good but my favorite was the monster freak shake it was huge and just amazing.This is definitely one good place to visit.", 'This place is a perfect place to take your kids or get back the childhood memories of your school days.
They have amazing shakes.
Personal recommendation I liked the frappe of the unicorn shake, the double chocolate shake was good. Peri peri chicken burger is a must try with their tender juicy chunk of chicken and their fish fingers so good.
They also have DIY pasta where you can choose what to put in your pasta, and their moster freak shake is a amusement.', "Ambience is very attractive as it has a school as name is. Couldn't get a peaceful as it is in Main road as well space between two tables is very less. I recommend everyone to visit it is very good place to hangout with üë≠üë¨üë´ friends", "This cute outlet has decor that will teleport you back to childhood. They had me when they gave me complimentary sip-ups as a welcome 'drink'(?). Hadn't thought about sip-ups in a long time until then.

A lot of effort has been put into the ambience, the walls, the seating, the cutlery, water bottles on the table, the menu, bill cover etc.

I ordered a regular white sauce pasta, a paneer tikka burger and chilly fries. The food was good. But we were more mesmerised by the ambience.

Staff was friendly.", "The moment that you walk into this place, it takes you back in time, back to our school going days. The walls have inscriptions of formulas, graphs and whatnot; the tables have pencil boxes, and the entire decor just screams nostalgia.

My absolute favourite part about my dining experience were the 'Ice Lollies'. They give it to you at the end of your meal,and it is just such a palate refresher and definitely nothing brings back your childhood like those good old lollies.

What I ate:

Golden basket - 4/5
Crispy corn - 4/5
Veg nachos - 5/5
Penne pasta - 3/5
Spaghetti pasta - 4/5
Project pizza - 4/5
Veg burger - 3/5
Paneer tikka burger - 3/5
Veg momos - 5/5
Monster Freak shake - 4/5
Snow ball - 4/5

My overall rating-

Ambience- 5/5
Service- 5/5
Food- 4/5
Value for money- 4/5

Will definitely be back for more!

Follow my journey on Insta and FB @aditieatworld.

Cheers!", 'Skool room cafe is school  themed cafe , which definitely will take back to your school days! Small small detailing about this cafe just refreshes all the school memories and childhood memories. From geometry boxes to Super heroes mugs , from Marvel heroes to Tom and Jerry. Coming to food we ordered 
Golden basket 
Crispy corn 
Veg nachos 
Penne pasta 
Spaghetti pasta 
Project pizza 
Veg burger 
Paneer tikka burger 
Veg momos -
Monster Freak shake 
Snow ball
Everything tasted good. Monster freak shake is one the main highlight of this place.', 'This is theme cafe 
U will remember ur school days memories 
Their menu book was like school books 
Cheese nachos was good 
Chill paneer was yummy 
Unicorn freak shakes must try 
If ur chocolate lover try chocolate shake', 'A very unique restaurant with a theme which would transport you to your childhood. The restaurant has been themed in such a way that everything is in sync with school, right from the menu card which is like a class copy to the cutlery being kept in a pencil box, to the Tom and Jerry being played on the TV, one would love it. The food too is lovely. Chicken Stroganoff was delicious. Another interesting thing is the bill comes in the format of a report card ;) Really enjoyed the visit.']

address: 50, Zatakia Centre, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Ice Cream, Cafe, Burger, Pizza, Desserts, Beverages
known_for: Unique combinations of ice creams and topping prepared on a cold marble slab
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating, Kid Friendly, Smoking Area,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Pizza', 'Chocolate Overload', 'Chocolate Lava', 'Caramel Custard', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Tiramisu Ice Cream', 'Waffles']
reviews:
['This place has good ambience and also friendly staff. The place is hygenic with nice wall hangings. I tried their Virgin mojito and it was top notch! One of the best virgin mojitos ever! I regret not having ice cream from this place. I sat right opposite to the place where they made rolled ice creams and the man was quite talented. He also presented it well with a lot of patience. I also tried their Desi Margherita pizza. I was disappointed because the cheese was tasteless the crust was too thick and not soft and the seasonings were taste less too. But I liked the sauces they gave for the pizza. They gave three of them and I loved the red one. I will definitely go back for icecream from this place.', 'Good  place to have your scoop of gelato.nicely decorated and different flavours
Not only icecream you can opt for pizza and few main course dishes with Cakes
Little overpriced what I felt
Very prompt and friendly service', "Amazing desserts place amidst the busy and happening 100ft road!!! Late night hours and ice-cream, that's what makes this place lit!!! We tried chocolate almond crumble and it was amazing!! Loaves the place!!", "A) Blueberry cheesecake- vanilla ice-cream mashed and topped with baked cheesecake and blue berry sauce ‚Ä¢ price - 210
‚Ä¢ Really good, the taste of vanilla, cheesecake and blueberries blend really well and just melt in the mouth
‚Ä¢ Rate- 5/5

B) Crunchy Ferrero - chocolate ice-cream with Ferrero Rocher, choco sticks, Nutella and chocolate fudge sauce
‚Ä¢ price - 210
‚Ä¢ it's chrunchy and yummy but a little too chocolatey
‚Ä¢ Rate - 4/5", "Ordered the mango and the chocolate overload ice-creams, both of which were very good. Good consistency in the ice cream and the flavouring and the sugar were on point. They were packaged well as well.\xa0Keep up the good work!
                    Edit: I went again and had the lychee and the chocolate cheesecake with moonstones ice cream and they didn't taste as well. The flavours were very off, and overall the ice creams were not that enjoyable at all.", "Best known for their Ice cream, however not to forget their amazing Pizzas and burgers.
The burgers are exclusively available at the Koramangala branch and they've got a very unique taste.

Stoner is also known for their inventions on regular basis and they've got two new ice cream flavours.

One of their best ice cream, is the red velvet cheesecake ice cream. Not just concentrating on the ice cream, they've paid a lot of attention to their redvelvet cake.

It's soft, easily breakable for the purpose of eating with the ice cream and of course extremely yummy.

Wishing you guys more and more success in the coming years.", "I am not the kind who gets overexcited to try ice creams üòí So went to stoner with no expectations.
A sudden meetup at Indiranagar led us here today. Thanks to India-Pakistan cricket match, the parlor wasn't crowded :)\xa0

Ambiance:
-outdoor seating: wooden tables, plant pots stuck to walls..etc\xa0
-spacious enough to walk around but has less tables.
-very clean.

Service:
-Attentive waiters. Guy at the billing counter made sure we got our pizza before ice-creams just like we asked for:)
-Got everything we ordered in 
Food:
-Crunchy Ferrero: Tasted good only when I could munch on ferrero rocher pieces in the ice cream
-tiramisu: Tastes average, have had better :|
-Bangalore express: I usually don't like pizzas without chilli flakes, but this one was an exception :)

Food: 3/5
Service: 5/5
Ambiance: 3.5/5
QFM: 3/5"]

more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Chicken Keema Paratha', 'Aloo Paratha', 'Cheese Chilli Paratha', 'Pizza', 'Paneer Parantha']
reviews:
['Got food delivered from this place. The menu has both veg and non veg parathas which is not very common.
We tried the achari chicken paratha and the schezwan chilli chicken lollipop. The paratha was huge, tasted good and had the right amount of stuffing. The starter was good but a little more of sauce would be nice. It came with curd and two chutney. The packing was good and neat.
Food-4.2
Packing-5
Price-3.5', 'Tried chicken paratha and chicken starter. The paratha was huge and tasted good as well. It came with 3 types of chutney and curd.The chicken starter had 4 pieces. Schezwan chilli chicken could have a little more sauce.
Food-4
Price-3.5
Packing-4.3', "The food was good. We had order paneer and aloo parathas. I personally preferred the paneer paratha over the aloo. The filling was apt and the taste was good. Both tasted good in fact. The mint and the tomato chutney and the curd that came along with the paratha were equally good.

The only thing we felt is that for the price we pay and the quantity we get, it doesn't match. Else it was all good.", 'Tried take away from this place. Was impressed by their packaging. There was no spillage of any kind .Loved the achari chicken paratha and the lollipops were well coated in the sauce . It was a little less spicy to my liking. A little costly but each paratha is the size of two that we make at home.I would rate
Food - 4
Packaging - 5
Pricing - 3.5
Overall - 4.5', 'I ordered this tempting parantha from this place,
- amazing food quality
- good quantity
- a little pricy
I would recommend this parantha place for all parantha lovers. Crazy bit paranthas. They give two chutneys - the mint is absolutely crazy. Remimds you of the rainy tandoori smell and a tangy housemade chutney which is really good. I tried it with a lot of things.', 'Recently ordered on a weekday at office hours for a refreshment and am not at all disappointed with my choice.

Tried Chilly Cheese Paratha and its so delicious. The aroma is so tempting and it is served with curd, mint chutney and tomato chutney. A must try dish in their menu card.', 'Ordered chicken kheema cheese paratha recently from this place.... Paratha came in a pizza like box with good packaging along with 3 containers for mint chutney, curd, tomato based chutney.

Paratha had enough filling of chicken kheema & little hint of cheese... Loved it much.... Will try out other paratha in coming days..', 'Next time you are craving some good
parathas order the cheese and aloo paratha or the periperi chicken paratha from here
The parathas are well stuffed, and unlike most other place these were thankfully not oily either', 'Had ordered for paneer Paratha and chilli cheese Paratha from this restaurant.

First of all, the presentation was too good. It was sent wrapped in foil paper in a box which was like pizza box. Also the size of the pizza was that of a medium size pizza... Cut In the same way.

Curd, green chutney and red chutney was given along with the Paratha...
The kids would definitely love it I can say, especially the paneer Paratha. It was filled with a lot of paneer.

The chilli cheese Paratha was more like a pizza itself with cheese on every bite. It would be more spicy for kids as it has chillies with cheese as well., but elders will definitely relish it... A must try and quite different taste altogether..', "Stuffed Paratha's that came like pizza. Yes, the paratha's were packed well in a box with 2 types of chutneys & raita. The chutneys were packed carefully in small containers without any spillage. My personal favourite was the Red coloured chutney which was a bit spicy.

I ordered Chilli Cheese & Spicy Paneer Paratha. The cheese were stuffed on the paratha, unlike other restaurants, who grate the cheese over. The paratha was hot & the cheese went good with it. The hot red chutney went good with the chilki cheese paratha. The spicy paneer paratha was good on it's way. The paneer stuffing was spicy and the paratha was delicious. Went good with the raita, which was very soothing.

Overall a good place to order from. Thank You for serving this good."]

address: 385, 8th Main, 4th Block, Vivek Nagar, Ejipura, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I was wanting to have homely North Indian meal and this place satiated my craving. The aloo Gobhi Matar with roti and paratha tasted delicious.
Prepared exactly in homestyle. Little spicy for me but loved it nonetheless. The preparation was fresh with crisp fried potatoes and cauliflower with some peas and spices.

Reasonably priced for the quality and quantity they serve. The delivery was done so quickly.

Very reasonably priced for the quality and quantity', 'One of the worst food i had in bangalore! Ordered gobi manchurian and chicken manchurian. Don't know what sauce they are using, both items was very much tasteless. Like, you are chewing some thing, that is it! No flavour, nothing. You feel surfeit even when you eat 2-3 pieces. Dont know how one made purposefully these much tasteless food! Actually i am curious, what is that ingredient which make a flavourful item like chicken so "dead".. Try if you want to know the most flavourless/emotionless food in bangalore.']

address: 621/B, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'I was looking for evening snacks so order from here.
Order veg momos and veg roll. Momos can be better with filling inside it, it was soft. Roll were soft and comes with good filling inside.\xa0
Overall it was value for money.', '', 'I ordered mushroom roll that is very small in size, not good in taste and waste of money, I always ordered in moonlight kitchen but that day moonlight kitchen was closed so I ordered in Pathaan sir, but it‚Äôs  not good, spoil my mood', 'For perfect snack a perfect pick i ordered chicken pepper roll and chicken tikka roll and chicken garlic the rolls are just amazing and the chicken garlic is little dry and hard but i am so happy with rolls...', 'I ordered chicken tika roll and was quite satisfied with the taste and was reasonable and filling. The roll was crispy and chicken was fresh. Overall it was good.', 'Very juicy rolls. Best rolls. Pepper chicken roll. Top notch. ......Need 140 characters Need 140 characters Need 140 characters Need 140 characters Need 140 characters Need 140 characters ....', "Extremely stale food. Paneer was like stone deep fried. Suggestive of extremely stale food. Laced with spicy and oily masala to fool customers of how stale it actually is.
Chicken jumbo roll is actually left over of masala. Same as that used in paneer roll. Chicken well I couldn't make out which was chicken cause it was all besan balls deep fried.
Very very bad food and one could make out just by looking at the amount of oil dripping out and the colored food inside the wrappers.
Please DO NOT ORDER ever.", "A late review but I ordered a non-veg combo.. I'd say the food was pretty decent, freshly cooked and nicely packed. It can mark up to the price. Very affordable and filling.", "I ordered a veg combo (roll+momos+fries) and a paneer roll but i got only two rolls. I called the restaurant and the manager simply said that he forgot to send the other items. Without apologising he proceeded to saying that he will issue a refund. I then found a hair in my roll. I called the restaurant again and he said ‚Äúfirst you have a problem with the order now you‚Äôve found a hair‚Äù. I wish I could personally go and take action against these idiots. They wasted my meal, my appetite, my time. What's worse than hair in my food and missing items, is the idiots behind the phone who have no sense to talk to their customers. Please learn some manners."]

address: 65, Markham Road, Ashok Nagar, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["'Belgian waffle factory' is yet another addition in the ever growing waffle business in Bangalore.

The place is tiny with barely any seating. Ambience is nothing great.

The waffles are the same as any other waffle place. They're freshly made so it takes a while for your order to be ready. The bubble waffles are new and this is the first time I tried them. It is a little difficult to eat, but they all taste the same. The only thing that is different here is that the waffles here are a bit pricey for sure.

Overall, it's a good place to have waffles. Obviously the seating is an issue and it is slightly on the pricier side but when you're in brigade and you're craving waffles, 'Belgian waffle factory' is the place for you.

Overall rating:
Food - 4/5
Ambience - 3/5
Service - 3/5", "Always a bliss at belgian waffle factory
Totally loved the overload and kit Kat bubble waffle
The best in town, no doubt
Small ambience. Could've been more spacious", 'They have a variety of flavours apart from the basic ones and you have an option of customizing your waffle too. We had the banoffee waffle and one whipped cream with bananas and chocolate. Both were really yummy and slightly larger than most her waffle places at approximately same price!', 'Lovely small little deck where you can chillout and have mind blowing waffles.

This has to be one of the best waffle joints in town..

Do try the red velvet one!', "The best part about the Belgian waffle factory for me is the fact that you can create your own waffles from scratch for minimal extra charges! I created my own waffle with bubble waffle base, strawberry crush, bananas, chocolate, nutella and what not! And guess what? Put anything and it's delicious. ü•≥ one of. My personal favourites is the Midnight berry waffle! It tastes so fresh everytime I try it. Other than that, bubble waffle are the new shizz! The bubble royale is worth a shot, it's so Loaded that you can opt it for a full meal.", "The best part about their outlets for me is the fact that i can create my own waffles from scratch for minimal extra charges! I created my own waffle with bubble waffle base, strawberry crush, bananas, peanut butter and come whipped cream. It was delicious and I would highly recommend you to try out the same. Another one of my all time favourites is the sin waffle, it's a sin to even look at it because it's too sweet for your tooth and too rich on the calories but you will make a sin and eventually consume it because it's sinful. Holds true to it's name! Had an amazing experience here.", 'This was one of the first places to serve bubble wrap waffles in Namma Bengaluru!!

I still remember the first time going there to try it and was really impressed by it(though it was a very messy eatüòÖ it was surely fun!!)

The waffles have come a long way but the taste here is as good as it was when I first had it!!!

It is a must try for waffle lovers out there..

I tried their bubble KitKat waffle, with the hot waffle topped with chocolate sauce topped with whipped cream and ice-cream and to top this all KitKat(like a cherry on top they have KitKat on the top ü§©) Highly recommended!!!

My review
Taste 5/5
Service 4.5/5
Ambience 4/5
Cost for 2 300-400', "BELGIAN WAFFLE FACTORY is the place where you can find the best waffles in town and i was happy to jump in again.
As you enter the arom in their vibe defines the richness of the waffles and chocolates and creams where you can feel before having the Waffel.
The chocolate sin Waffel was divine for the chocolate lovers and the chocolate overload bubble wrap was amazing.
And the Berry blast Waffel was soo Good that the blue berry and whipped cream gives you a wonderful taste.
Cozy ambience with friendly staff's with Great service.
I would like to visit again for the amazing waffel.
.
Taste - 5/5
.
Hygiene - 5/5
.
Service - 5/5
.
Ambience - 5/5
.
Value for money - 5/5", "They have zomtao gold which is a plus point.
But i feel there waffles can do so much better when compared to other waffles.
It just gets too sweet at the end here where you come to a point that you can't eat anymore. I think that balance needs to be worked on.
But waffles and chocolate is a go to go any day."]

address: 1/1 A, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['', "I ordered cheese burst pizza veg ! Was the worst I ever had .. I think the person who made was in a bad mood or dint like to make the food he is baked the dough, cut an onion with a partial onion skin still on it and just a thin piece of green capsicum and red capsicum and a small piece of uncooked babycorn never gave a sauce packet .. food was extremely bad tasting and had to pay around 300rs .. I had to throw the food was so bad ..all my money went for waste .. pls don't do this indranagar Pizza hut guys .. everyones money is valuable .. once in a while I buy n eat and such a bad experience .. never going to get back to ur store ..", 'The experience was overall disappointing, especially for the price. The pizza was very dry and doughy. It had very limited flavor and lacked sauce. I would not recommend. Dominos is a far better option.', "What's with the recent trend of Pizza Hut delivery guys demanding feedback proof at the doorstep?? Really annoying and a waste of time when you are in the middle of something!!

A couple of weeks ago, I ordered cheese garlic bread from Pizza Hut through Swiggy. The packaging was absolutely hopeless and pathetic...the brown paper bag was leaking and open! I am surprised these guys haven't learnt a lesson given the recent episode with a Zomato delivery guy! Yeah, and I'm writing this on Zomato!!", "I had ordered for margherita pizza with extra cheese and toppings. But it was total opposite to what I ordered. Not only was the pizza not according to what I ordered. The quality was so bad and everything felt so raw and burnt. Upon contacting the support team they aren't responding to my query. Totally disspointed. Had to pay extra to get nothing.", 'Today I wanted to order non veg pizza but I had a doubt that whether u r using halal non veg or not. please clear my doubt so that next time I can order non veg food.', 'Worst pizzas i have ever had,\xa0 pizza base\xa0 with just some low quality cheese?no taste at all. So bland.
The paneer on the pizza was stale. Pizza was stone cold. Horrible. Dominos is better in all the ways.', "It's not pizza's provided by Pizza Hut, it's bread with cheese spread on it and burnt to a crisp and they make a killing by selling this by delivery.", 'They dont put mozzarella cheese for their pan for all. Just fool people. They use some tube cheese which tastes horrible. And no proper toppings.']

['', '', 'there are other ways of making money such less quantity for so much money is not worth', '', '', 'Ordered 7 Non Veg rolls and 11 veg rolls. The kebabs are cooked in perfection. Superb mughlai taste. I also order chicken keema and mutton keema with rumali. After a long time i had good keema and rumali in bangalore.

Probably i had one of best in Bangalore.
Ordered Chicken Sheik tikka roll and mutton seek roll.
Both were good.', '‚ÄúAn expensive taste.‚Äù
Disappointed for the first time With Khan saheb‚Äôs Seekh Kababs. Thinnest of the kababs ever seen. Tasting upto the mark with no onions served. Not enough quantity for 1 person. Its not the photography which is making it inedible but the stretch marks and dry texture of it. ‚ÄúSweet Chatni! With Kababs. Seriously!']

address: Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only, Vegetarian Only,
reviews:
['They serve food with superb and fancy packaging. When I received the meal I thought the packaging is Ok Ok but when I opened the box I shocked to see the packaging everything is well maintained. Now coming to the taste no doubt you love spicy or medium spicy and full spicy in all small box you will get up to your expectations.
Delivery was one time and that credit go to Zomato Rider as well Restaurant.
I am deducting one rating due to quantity because if you add one more Partha surely no one can stop to give 5 rating as per taste and overall service.
Overall I am satisfied and recommend this restaurent.e', 'So i ordered paneer and gobhi paratha from this place. Loved the gobi paratha as it was well stuffed and has good amount of spices. But the paneer one disappointed as it was more dry and not flavorful. What attracted me most were the sauces that came along with it. 3 sauces came along with it and one curd. Green chutney, tamarind saunce and one sweet red sauce which was the best of all were the accompanying sauces. Overall experience was decent. Will try again from this outlet. 
                                                instagram.com', 'Ordered aloo cheese paratha, also taste was amazing.. but disappointed with cheese quantity.. Except that packing is too good... You will get 4 types of Chatneys, 1 pickle, 1 butter.. please add more cheese...']

address: 1131, 100 Feet Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['"Smoor" is the fine destination to satisfy all your dessert cravings. I have been here once and have savored the home delivery multiple times. I tried a "Blueberry Cheesecake" and a "Belgian Chocolate Truffle". The desserts are as delicious as they look here. The texture was very smooth, \xa0freshly prepared, and the taste, unmatched.\xa0

The ambiance is very classy and tranquil. I shall visit Smoor to try on more dishes apart from desserts. The prices are a bit on a higher side but totally worth it.', 'Wanna have deserts after lunch and one of my DiVaS suggested Smoor. And we went there post lunch with kiddos.

Crowded place with decent crowd and friendly staff.

Ordered belgium chocolate truffle, blueberry cheese cake slice etc', 'One of the best places in Bangalore simply! Don‚Äôt miss if you ever drop by in and around bangalore/Indiranagar.

We had Cajun spiced fries, Alfredo pasta, chocolate marquise and a cheese cake. Cheese cake should be been better but on a whole it‚Äôs a 5/5 place! Don‚Äôt miss this place.', "Exquisite variety in continental and oriental food.
I love the texture of the desserts. It's delicious and lip smacking !
And, experimenting the menu is so much fund each time.
I had visited Smoor twice and it has always made me happier ! :D
The decor and the atmosphere is quite chilled out and it's a great place to pop in on any time of the week.", "We went here for a late night nosh and ordered the vegetables lasagna, the Dutch truffle pastry and a chocolate Macaron. The lasagna and pastry were simply amazing. Normally lasagna's could be overly heavy but this was just right. The macaron however could be better. I would also like to request the restaurant to have more vegetarian dessert options.", 'Had gone here this evening. Earlier i have had been to Smoor Koramangala, thought will try here today. So i ordered one Rich Rasberry. Taste was awesome:) :), nice soft. Staff was also friendly, the service they gave was fast.
Ambience was also pretty good according to that location. Must visit place i would say.', 'Went there last night at 12:30am for a quick dessert and ordered the Strawberry And Cream Sunday which was quite amazing. I liked the well thought composition of the sundae, with the candied strawberries, sponge cake and thickened milk crunchy crumbs along with the strawberry ice cream.', 'A very nice place for the Sweetooth people. Not only it offers wide range of chocolates to choose but also has interesting desserts on plate. The price is little on higher end but the taste of each dessert will surely going to convince the price it is tagged with. The staff is very polite and courteous. The decore could have been little better but the dessert collection will take your focus away from such things. I personally enjoyed being there and will certainly recommend that place.', 'This is a good place to have desserts and spend quality time. They have variety of pastries to choose from. They look presentable and delicious. They do have colourful macroons and chocolates too. I had opera cake and it did taste good. It had dark chocolate taste in it. My review is 4/5 for it. Smoor do have valet parking too. Dessert lovers must visit this place.

Overall
Price 3.5/5
Quality 5/5
Ambience 5/5
Location 5/5
Service 5/5
Value for money 4/5', "Honestly I had great expectations from this place but it didn't deliver, probably because I just had drinks here.
Their tea was like hot water with some flavour. Hazelnut Coffee was not great, had much better coffee at star bucks. Didn't try the desserts however I would love to try it next time.
Enjoy."]

["This place is a savior when it comes to hunger cravings! Ordered Chilli Chicken today, very fast delivery and amazing packaging.

I'll definitely order more from here and update the review soon.

Till then, Keep Gorging! üòã", "Ordered from chef's cafe today. It's a non veg combo. After offer discount it costed me around 123 bucks. Taste was too good. Quantity was ample. Varity of menus. Loved it. Will order again surely.

cuisines: Fast Food, North Indian, Biryani, Rolls, Wraps
more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Chicken Wrap', 'Veggie Wrap', 'Rolls', 'Potato Wrap', 'Jumbo Chicken', 'Chole', 'Paneer Tikka Wrap']
reviews:
['Faasos rolls are my favourite. It contains perfect mixture of cheese And spice. I have tried potato cheese rolls and masala cheese rolls. Totally love it.
Biriyani is another thing which i like in Faasos. Paneer biryani is amazing.
I had ordered chole kulcha this time. Chole tasted very good.
Love Faasos.
Rating - 5/5', "The best way to celebrate the holidays is with some delicious food. Whenever I think about hot and delicious food, Faasos comes into pictures.
Let me share food items I ordered:
Chicken kheema combo
Chicken mayo wrap
Jumbo chicken wrap

Chicken kheema combo is just luscious. It is like even we have finished last bite feels to eat at least one more bite.
Chicken mayo wrap is full of mayonees and Chicken piece. It is well-prepared with with a packet of sauce.
Jumbo chicken piece: yes really name only indicates jumbo which is mouth watering and flavoursome.
Along with this I got choco lava cake which chocolaty.
With having all these succulent food I just liked to order again and again. Really it's great restaurant that provides delicious food with variety of items. I just wanted to let all of you visit this outlet once and have food of your choice.üôÇüôÇ", 'I had ordered paneer wrap and paneer biriyani from here. Loved both of them so much. The paneer wrap was soo stuffed and was soo good. Definitely try at this place. It came in good wrapped box, the content of it was really good and was heavy.
The paneer Biriyani tasted so well. The biriyani rice and its masala in separate layer was perfect. Loved it alot. Definitely try it at this place. They packing was done well and the quantity was just too much.
Definitely one good place to eat food in Bangalore.
Food: 4.8/5', 'My favourite place for wraps! For me wraps is faasos! I had jumbo chicken wrap and chicken mayo wrap along with smoked butter chicken rice feast! I loved it.. I never get disappointed! Jumbo chicken was really jumbo! A lot chicken and mayo chicken was having a lot of mayo! Thanks for great service again!', 'Faasos is a delivery only joint and has a range of varieties to offer in terms of Wraps, Rice feasts, various on the fly meals, snacks and desserts.\xa0
Recently I tried their Masala Paneer tikka wrap, filling was cheesy with paneer and onion based. The creamy cheese was the star of the wrap, Wrap was well cooked and soft. And they also provide you with extra red chilli seasoning incase you want more heat!
The second wrap I tried was Chatpata chole wrap, filling was bit spicy but good for my palate. The stuffing was bang on. Last I had chose shawl rice feast, though there was a little mismatch in the portion of gravy and rice but it tasted awesome.\xa0

Delivery was before time! Packaging was neat and excellent!', 'Faasos is famous for its awesome wraps. So, we thought of ordering one potato salsa wrap and paneer tikka wrap.

The wraps turned out to be awesome and freshly made with full stuffing inside. The masala provided along with it added more flavour to it.

Ordered one rajma chawal bowl along with it. It was delicious. The gravy was enough for the rice. Enjoyed my meal.', 'I ordered Jumbo Veg Wrap (4/5)- great taste with lots of veggie fillings, Chicken Mayo wrap (4/5) - quite tasty filled with Reshmi chicken and mayo, Chicken feast rice (3/5) - it was served with base tasty yellow flavoured rice and two kinds of chicken, the taste of chicken and rice didn‚Äôt go well. All the stuff was served right on time and warm.']

address: 11, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["I'll be eternally thankful to my roommate for introducing me to this gem!

Ordered half chicken roll with Mayonnaise, I had dunzo-ed so got it at just ‚Çπ50. The half roll itself is quite fulfilling because the size is huge, so only the full one if you are super hungry.

This is by far one of the best rolls I've ever tasted. Ample chicken pieces in green yummy chutney added an amazing flavor with the mayonnaise.

So, if you're in this area make sure to try this place if you are looking for some good lip-smacking rolls.

I'll try other items for this outlet very soon and update the review. Till then, Keep Gorging! üòã", 'Ordered some grilled chicken, chicken manchurian and mushroom manchurian for starters from this place. The grilled chicken tasted pretty good but apart from that nothing tasted that great. The manchurian coating wasn‚Äôt very thin and good.


Update: Their double chicken and double egg roll is pretty good and heavy!']

address: 462, Krishna Temple Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ['One of the admirable thing about the punjabi food is their variety. Based on the recommendation i had ordered my dinner from this restaurant.They have elaborate menu. The quality of food was good. It was fresh and tasted of the highest standards.\n\nI had ordered for aloo paratha and egg burji, it was a perfect combination for me,the paratha was soft and stuffed well, egg burji tasted good with the spices and then had rajma- chawal, it was pleasant to the taste. Lastly, had their desserts sweet lassi and gulab jamun both were very enjoyable. Jamun being my all time favourite dessert, made me much lovable as it was perfect in sweetness and juicy too.']

address: 5, 5th Floor, Opposite Meenakshi Electrical, New Thippasandra Main Road, 9th Main, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
["Samosa Singh is a staple place to order and enjoy your evening tea time with total bliss.
The packaging is what makes them stand apart other than their quirky flavors too!
I had tried their veg and nonveg samosas in which the kheema samosa and the sheekh roll were the best!
The chocolate samosa was actually good when I expected it to be a nightmare üôà
Next up I tried their kachori which was so crispy and tasty that they make better kachoris than samosaüòç it's a must try whenever you get to try this place!", 'Tried this place on a rainy day when I wanted to have some kachori and samosa, they have really nice Dal and ragda kachori. I also had a samosa platter which had 4 different kinds of samosa, though the size and taste was different from the street style samosa.
Also the best thing which I liked was the chocosa or the chocolate samosa which is available in four different types. A must try for kachori and chocolate samosa.
                                                foodtravelpedia.wordpress.com', "Staff and Ambience : Zomato online order so no comments on this one.

Food : Ordered 6 aloo samosas. Taste wise ok. The filling seemed good. I liked the shell material. I outer part did not carry much oil.

Price : Reasonable for the quality

Package : Neat. I did not understand why 2 samosas came in a different package though. May be someone else's canceled order. Not sure. But yes i liked.

Recommendation : Recommended aaloo samosas. I am yet to try the other types."]

reviews: ['I tried for the first time here a few months before. I was little skeptical before ordering. Went with the ratings on Zomato. Ordered a 10" Chicken Tikka Pizza & Choco lava cake. Delivery was very prompt. It was delivered hot & in a neat package. As they promised, it was indeed loaded with 2x toppings. Taste was very good. Chicken was cooked properly. reviews:
['We ordered a big bell box and it was amazing. It costed 250 bucks and it was worth every penny. Their taste, quantity and service, everything was amazing. Would surely visit TACO Bell again.', 'One of the most popular Mexican joints mostly known for unlimited coke. The Indiranagar one has a good ambience, nice graphic work on the walls. Coming to the food, I really love their Chickstar Wrap combo. Veg options are not that great but overall a good place at affordable rates.', "This was my first visit to this place located at indranagar Banglore. We tried the box meal consisting of two types of fries, a roll , a taco and a glass of coke. The complete meal was quiet good. I didn't like the fries much but the roll was really tasty and the taco was ok ok. Didn't like it much.", "We landed up at taco bell for lunch today and I cannot say I had a good experience at all.
We decided to order 2 crunchy chicken tacos along with a chicken burrito.
The tacos just lacked something, tasted average at best, the burrito was okay, nothing above average. The ambience is okay, the person at the counter taking our order was wonderful but apart from that, nothing else stood out. Don't recommend.

Food: 1/5
Ambience: 3.5/5
Service: 4/5
Value for money: 2/5"]

address: 2985, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Beer, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly, Desserts and Bakes, Rooftop, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['The restaurant was in my bucket list to try out restaurants in Bangalore. So today I got an opportunity to go to the restaurant. It was a pleasant experience today for us and we are delighted with the service which they have provided us. We ordered 2 varieties of pizza, 2 varieties of stuffed garlic bread, desserts and pasta. The food was fantastic , service was awesome. It had rooftop ambiance. Overall it was a fantastic experience. Thank you for having us.

Rating:
Food: 4.5
Service: 4.5
Ambiance: 4.5', "The MonaLisa painting with beer in her hand and beer froth on her lips had me in splits! Great work on that.
Overall, great ambience, the rooftop is amazing.

The staff are courteous and it takes a decent enough amount of time for food to arrive at your table. Tried the funghi misti, mixed fruit sangria, virgin cosmo and garlic bread with pesto and sun dried tomatoes. The garlic bread was delicious! The sun dried tomatoes are to die for! The drinks are extremely refreshing and yummy. They're also a nice complement to the food. The pizza was exceptional.

Great experience and great food!", "The best wood-fired pizza in the whole of Bangalore. The crust is just out of the world.\xa0
Ambience - This place has both indoor and rooftop seating. The froth on the Mona Lisa's painting - a funny touch to market their beers - is the first thing one would notice on the rooftop seating.\xa0
Drinks - Watermelon juice (178/-) and European hot chocolate (188/-). The hot chocolate is spot on and nothing like I have ever tasted before.\xa0
Food -  Chicken wings (558/-) and AOP pizza (318/-). Loved the pizza and the wings. Nice crust, great flavours - overall a great choice of food.
Desserts - Apple cake (328/-) - The cream, the crumble and the presentation - just perfect.
We were served by Desmond - enthusiastic service and extremely polite.\xa0
Nice ambience for a romantic meal, great food and service !!
Rating - 4/5
Meal for two would cost between 2000-2500/-", 'The sides are very nice and it‚Äôs very crowded, even though we reserved our tables, we got a table post 30mins wait! Ridiculous it is and I don‚Äôt feel a point in booking a table then! The wait is worth of that I feel! Food is really great over here! The roof top is nice!', 'I did a solo trip here, very cute lil place and gr8 pizzas I had the half margarita and half truffle funghi. It was gr8. I wish they had a wine menu, but they just have beer.', 'Rooftop, beautiful ambiance, great staff and their hospitality and equally great food. All sums up Pizza Bakery. Great sourdough recipes, we ordered the classic Garlic bread, truffle fries and the bbq wings along with uncle Dunkel trout.Great combination. The setting is perfect for a family dinner or a date. Thumbs up.', 'A very cute white painted Restaurant that serves delicious pizza....
This restaurant has a rooftop view as well...
Melo music with the pizza offered by this place is fabulous ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Overall rating 3/5

Ambience and staff courtesy - very good 4/5

Food - we have been hearing absolutely amazing reviews of The Pizza Bakery and decided to give this place a try after a movie night. Unfortunately the pizza did not live upto the hype we heard about and hence giving it 2/5
1. Parmesan spiced potato wedges
2. Cajun spiced chicken Pizza (however pizza was not spicy at all, was very creamy)

To drink we ordered two variants of tea 3.5/5
1. Minty candy green
2. Rose cinnamon black', "Ambiance is great here.. with great staffing
Food especially pizza is awesome
Price is bit more but it's worth for it
Overall a good place mainly for pizza lovers"]

address: 77, Swamy Vivekananda Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore

reviews: ["It's my nature to try out Biryanis from all the places in my vicinity and this happens to be one of those. Although the rates are very reasonable, the quality or authenticity isn't there at all. Just an average biryani preparation that one would find on every corner of this city.\n\nAppropriate quantity is a good thing but gets shadowed by poor quality and that's the case here with Taj. Hopefully they fix that. Also tried their Chicken Kassa and Kerala Paratha but as I said, quality isn't there. Wouldn't be ordering anything from here!!"]

reviews:
['Pathetic restaurant. Food what you don‚Äôt want to eat here', "Being as much polite as i can, the food served today via Dunzo delivery was terrible. Just see the image of the samosa chat and you will feel like puking. The chutney served with samosa was stale and smelling like it was 2-3 days old. The only saving grace was the samosa's which was atleast hot and crunchy. Why cant restaurants maintain the food quality, be it via any partner like swiggy, uber eats or zomato etc?? Bad food quality i must say", 'I ordered poha from here.I am a regular customer who only orders poha.The taste is very good.The amount is also perfect.The price is also reasonable.', 'Taste less food. I don‚Äôt think they deserve one star at least. I think Zomato have to remove this restaurant from there list more over they serve very late', 'Ordered chhole bhature and bhature was good but chhole was smelly. It was like chhole was prepared 2 days ago.
Quantity was decent though and delivery was fast', 'Food was pathetic.could be better.', 'Ordered following this morning:
Pav Bhaji - had the taste but zero character just gravy no bhajo, pav was decent and lots of butter.
Cholle Bhature - Looked the part but taste was not there at all. Puri had no fermentation taste and chole tasted and looked like the Aloobhaji.
4 Puris (Kasoori) and Bhaji: same as above but inversed, Bhaji was simple aloo Bhaji and worked the part but Puri nothing exciting just average.
Samosa - Not bad simple Aloo and garam masala filling same filing in the vegetable toast sandwich (exactly)
Vegetable Toast sandwich with cheese - same as above but bread had lots of butter but cheese and filling was way to less.
Chilli cheese toasted sandwich - decent taste good buttery but again filling way to less infact non existent.

Ok for people with a budget but definitely would not repeat.
Good packaging yes agree to other reviews.', 'good time.', 'Amazing quality snacks! Have been ordering even for corporate events and the quality and taste is really appreciable. Would strongly suggest to give a try.', 'food is very tasty. but it is little over priced']

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mutton Biryani', 'Mutton Sukha', 'Chicken Boneless Biryani', 'Kola Urundai', 'Basmati Rice', 'Raita', 'Sea Food']
reviews:
['Tasty biryani, packed crowds, courteous staffs and a nice homely smell of foodü•∞ is all I can say about this place. Definitely must visit. They also can provide you biryanis in huge buckets for home parties. Go and enjoy!', 'This place is a must for biryani lovers. Dindigul style biryani, made with jeera sambal rice, and with all the right flavors. We ordered mutton biryani and nati koli chicken. The biryani has about 4 pieces of boneless mutton and an egg, served with sides of onion raita, salan and papad. The price is on the higher side for the quantity that they offer.
Service is prompt.', 'Nice place to hang out. Service is very good here. The staff takes special attention from taking a order to delivering it.Food is also good here. We tried some fish starters and Biryani and it was good. Would definitely visit this place again.Very pocket friendly tooüôÇ', 'We went to this eponymous place for a Saturday lunch affair. Following was my experience-
Food - We ordered their signature boneless Mutton biryani (The rice is not the regular basmati rice, but the zeera samba rice, the mutton was very succulent and just off the bone, very flavourful and delicious biryani. This biryani is indeed their top menu items)
Prawns moru moru (spicy , small chunks of prawns saut√©ed in curry leaves. Yummy)
Paneer tikka(We realised that this place does not do justice to the veg food, the paneer tikka wasn‚Äôt upto the mark. The chunks of paneer was rubbery and chewy)
For desserts, we ordered their pista ice cream and hot Gilab jamuns(Well made, but tad too sweet!)
We had also ordered for their nati koli soup (Pretty spicy and light)
ambience- Very basic, clean place
Customer service- Quick customer service 
Value for money- Decent 
This place is a haven for all the biryani lovers!', "I visited this place with my friend to try south Tamil Nadu biryani.
We ordered crab pepper soup, Thalapakatti special mutton biriyani, Vanjaram fish fry, Mutton kola urundai and Kalakki. Everything is as good as it gets.
Their ambience is also quite nice. They've these old-time wall papers which would make you nostalgic.
They serve food in a very unique Banana leaf shaped plate. I've never seen such plate in my life.
Overall, I would definitely this place for Mutton biryani lovers."]

address: 3, 60 Feet Road, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Table booking recommended, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Big Wong XL is located in the busiest street of Koramangala. It is definitely a place to visit atleast once. They are an established name for Pan Asian cuisine in Delhi NCR and Bangalore. They are famous for their Dimsum and Sushi üç£

We tried their California Rolls, Tempura Prawns, Steamed Fish with black bean sauce, Basil Apple drink, and Pad Thai. For desserts, we had Daarsan. We recommend all of them.

‚ú≥Ô∏è Recommended for a good Pan Asian food experience
‚ú≥Ô∏è Recommended for date nights also
‚ú≥Ô∏è Zomato Gold on food is accepted but not always. I recommend you to call the restaurant and ask them about it.

In picture :
1. California Roll
(Fish stick, avacado and red tobiko roll with mayonnaise)

RATING ~
Food : 4/5

Price : 4/5 (‚Çπ‚Çπ/‚Çπ‚Çπ‚Çπ)

Ambience : 4/5

Service : 5/5

Hygiene : 5/5

Parking : 4/5 (Valet Parking available).

Overall Rating : 4/5 .', 'The food was served very late. Please keep a stipulated time within which the food can be served.', 'Late post...sorry for the delay. I am a big fan of chinese quisine so i have heard about this place many times. This dussera we had visited this place. We went in the afternoon and on a dussera so the place was free. Its a well taste fully anointed place . It is one of the best chinese i had . The menu is simple but it ll fulfill your urge for a good chinese food. To know how is a chinese food you have to know their sushi....and their sushi was awsome...the sticky rice was perfectly cooked....and obviously the momo and other dishes were awsome.', "The dimsum and starters were the highlights of the lunch. Hong Kong Chicken with burnt garlic rice was another noteworthy mention.

The Khao suey was disappointing because it was tending towards sweet notes. I'd skip this.", 'This restaurant is located at a hub area of Koramangala with valet service. The service of the place is really good and the restaurant can be easily booked by dineout or zomato gold can be used to pay the bills making it more pocket friendly. The food taste really good... At least those we ordered. I personally enjoyed their dimsums and sushi. The ambiance is good with the look having many quirky quotes hanged everywhere. I will certainly like to visit this place and try more food as they have a vast menu. I recommend this place to my fellow foodies to give of a try.', 'Big Wong XL is a place to visit atleast once.
Ambience is really great with its asian theme.
Great Variety in all sections.
We had the Chicken Sake Wine for appetizer - It tasted like Chilli Paneer which was a bummer.
In Mains , We had Hong Kong Chicken Noodles and Khow Suey , Pho , Ginger Chilli wine Chicken noodles (GCWCN)

Hong Kong Chicken Noodles and GCWCN tasted same.
Pho was okayish , lacked veggies.
Daarsan is a must try if you wanna try out something new.', "One of the best chinese i had here. I went there to celebrate my cousin's birthday and also rakhi. And I have enjoyed there food son so much. We have ordered thai basil chili garlic fired rice, chili schezewan noodles., pad thai noodles, honey mustard chicken and Hong Kong style chicken. Every item is yummy. For us quantity is also too good. And we can the difference in between each and every item. And it's ambience is too good. There all staffs are super cool. All toyalnits a high five place to enjoy. It's a must go place for every Chinese lovers. Highly recommend.", 'This place serves amazing Asian food . We ordered Seafood Dumpling (Prawn and Chives Thai Herbs) . It was delicious . For main course we ordered Malayasian Fish Curry and Vietnamese Vegetable Pho . The flavorsome Malayasian Fish Curry is served with a bowl of steamed rice and it is absolutely yummy . The healthy Vegetable Pho tastes too good  is full of fresh flavors of Thai Herbs which makes it refreshing . The ambience of this place is good and service is good .', "Food is really good, but as per quantity it's too pricey!

Definitely a must visit place for asian cuisine.

Food: 4/5
Ambiance: 3/5
Service: 3.5/5
Overall: 3.5/5"]

The portion size is sufficient for one meal, food quality is consistent, and food is not overkill on spice/oil. Good packaging too.', 'Ordered a Rajma Chawal box - delivery was quick. The food was hot. Presentation - excellent. Taste - excellent. Cherry on the cake was the salad, raita and chutney - all put together - just made the meal even taste better. :)', 'Hi. I‚Äôve eaten before at Box8, maybe 2-3 times previously. Ordered this box meal with a combination of rice, butter chicken n some veg cut salad. 
It was decent enough. 
Felt like I was in office and had ordered lunch to eat at office. But unfortunately it was night and I was chilling at home and wanted some good dinner. 
This combo packaging is more like for office crowd/or PG people who don‚Äôt want to order elaborate. 

For me, henceforth, I ll order individual items and not combo. 

Cheers']

address: G-2, G-3, G-4, Next To Total Mall, Skylark Palazzo, Corporation, Murugeshpalaya, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["Horrible experience. Worst service. It took 2 hours to deliver my pizza. And that is very special cold pizza. Delivery executive doesn't know how to reach to the location. Still that executive was asking for tip from me after delivery of my order in just 2 hours. I will never order from this outlet. Worst option of Domino's and Zomato.", "I ordered at 10:40 pm.. I got order at 11:50 pm.. The worst service I have ever seen. They delivered very cold and spicy pizza. Please don't order from this", 'Service is too bad and behavior of staff. M on my way to back youüòéüòä", "one of the worst place to order online. they say in their tag that they will deliver the order in 30 min.. but i didn't got it even after 1 hour. Ordered through zomato and got some discount too.", 'Located right next to Kempfort this outlet is compact and does attract good crowd, as this is at the walkable distance from my house I often visit this place.\n\nThe double cheese margherita with double cheese is a regular order along with either the non veg pockets or the burger pizza.']

address: 751, 80 Feet Road, Opposite SBI Bank, Koramangala 4th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wine, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Buffet, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Loved the ambience and food varieties and taste. We ordered Chicken Delight Pizza, Smoky Pollo Al Pomodo Penne Pasta, Spaghetti Milano Creme Pasta, Rocket Fuel Pasta, Verona Exotica Pizza, Ravioli and Lemon Mojitos..All of these tasted yumm and the quantities were also worth every penny. Recommended!!', "We'd been to this place with expectations that were actually high...because the first visit was in Indiranagar a year or 2 back!!

Pros :
-Lovely Ambiance
-Excellent Food
-Valet parking

Cons
-I really can't think of any!!! and that is suprising!!

THINGS WE ORDERED
-Chicken Lamb pepperoni
-Chicken Ravioli
-Cranberry Mocktail

The place is worth the visit and the price for the quality offered is excellent:)", "Whenever I think of amazing Italian food, Pasta Street comes to my mind. I didn't find many restaurants which served ravioli in this locality. I had tried wide varieties of food here a couple of times. Their service is excellent. Overall, it is an excellent place for superb quality food. 

Of all the dishes, I loved risotto the most. Be it tomato flavoured or cheese flavoured, it is excellent. That filling and that sauces in ravioli blend well. Pizza is thin and crispy. Palermo Pineapple is my favourite pizza here. That pineapple topping with cherry tomatoes feels like eating it again and again.", 'Had a great dining experience at Pasta Street, we ordered a Ravioli and a seafoood pasta, it was really good. Vivek ensured the service was taken care of in best way possible. Will visit again!
                                                grubitizer.com', 'Really liked the place. Ambience is top notch. Fine dine experience. Food is authentic and no compromise on service as well. I would say it was premium experience.', 'I enjoyed my visit here.I loved the food i had here.I had the veggie paradise thin crust pizza and a ravioli.I liked the pizza,the crust was crispy and it had generous amount of toppings on it,the ravioli could have been a bit better.The service was okay and the staff were kind.Overall I liked my visit over here and will visit this place again.', "Pasta Street is a go to place for your pizza and pasta cravings along with Wine
They have some amazingly yummy pizzas and pastas.

Tried their Veggie Delight pizza which is a thin crust pizza with a lot of veggies on top, it's extremely thin

Also tried their Cream Monte with white sauce, the pasta was also too yummy.", 'We had roasted veg pizza and spicy chicken prato.both were good in taste the non veg pizza had sausages sliced on top of it.Ambienece is good.the staff is polite.surely would love to their other items', "Taste 5/5
Serving size 4/5
Service 5/5
Hygiene 5/5
Ambience 5/5
Price 4.5/5

Great find!! To start off, kudos to the service, very good attention given by the lady there, was too kind and gave us great suggestions on what to have. The pasta options are plenty and you'll be spoilt for choice.
Every dish we ordered were amazing and I'm keen to visit their place again to try other dishes.

Only disappointment was the pricing of redbull, please avoid buying it as we were charged double the amount felt bad for it :/"]

address: 7/17, 14th Cross Road, 3rd Main, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Momomia. Went in with such high expectations and they were definitely not met.
First off, i have to say, this should be a order only place because when we got here we couldn't really understand the location. There's a momomia board on top and then there's a wooden wall, inside the wall is momomia, and almost the entire time we were there, they didn't even put out any seats.
Coming to food, their Zomato says open at 2, but they weren't even properly open at 2:30. The food took another 45 mins. First we got our Kurkure momos, these were the best out of all. Next came our Afghani momos, drenched in a creamy sauce, pretty okay, lastly came out tandoori momos, again, drenched in a yogurt sauce. Now, from all the tandoori momos I've tried, it's never come with a sauce, and i honestly didn't like it this way. I cannot say the staff is very nice or helpful. I don't recommend visiting this place, ordering it might be fine.

Food: 2.5/5
Service: 0/5
Value for money: 3.5/5", 'Visited this outlet for the very first time. This is a takeaway types outlet which serves different varieties of momos, rolls, tikkas, chaap, and many more. Their service is very fast and the prices are pocket-friendly. I ordered Veg tandoori momos & chicken chilli momos, both were finger-licking good.

This place is a must-try, please do try once.', 'Went here for the very first time and tried their Chicken tandoori momos. Service was really fast. Momos were delicious and big in size.

Honestly, the best chicken tandoori momos I had till now in Bangalore. The juiciness and quantity of chicken were really good. A must-try. 

Chicken lovers can surely head to this place and enjoy delicious Chicken tandoori momos.', "Amazing joint to have snacks which fills your stomach up to the neck. Had an amazing time having their delicacies. We tried Chicken Tandoori Momos, Chicken Tandoori Afghani Momos and Paneer Tandoori Momos.

Out of which only Chicken Tandoori Momos wasn't that good but the other two had a powerful sense of tandoor and was full of flavours.

Taste: - 4.5/5

A must try for sure", 'This place is perfect for your rolls and momos cravings. I have tried almost everything on their menu. Would recommend Paneer Tikka Roll & Chicken Kurkure Momos. Perfect taste and quick delivery. Definitely worth trying.

‚Ä¢ Taste: 5/5

‚Ä¢ Quantity: 5/5

‚Ä¢ Quality: 5/5', 'Good place for fast and tasty food.

I would prefer to order for delivery/ takeout.

Value for money.

We had a variety of dishes and everything satisfied our taste buds. Definitely a must try if you are in or around the area.', 'The best momos in town! These momos are to die for. The gravy, chutney, filling -5/5 !!

‚Ä¢ Veg tandoori momos 

‚Ä¢ Chicken tandoori afghani momos 

The momos are bigger than the normal-sized momos, they are filled with finely chopped veggies and coated with spicy paste! They are cooked in a tandoor for that delicious flavor! 

The aroma is so nice and they are served hot.

The chutney is very balancing and spicy. 

Must try! 

‚Ä¢ TASTE: 5/5

‚Ä¢ QUANTITY: 5/5

‚Ä¢ QUALITY: 5/5', "Ordered Chicken tandoori Momo's, Chicken tandoori Afghani Momo's, Chicken chilli gravy momos and Chicken shawarma via Dunzo.

Had a horrible experience. Firstly restaurant didn't provide the bill when asked for the bill which is the right of customer to ask for a bill. Secondly charged 40rs packaging charge while they charge 10rs per order on Zomato.

Coming to the food. Those are not tandoori or Afghani Momos. There was no hole of iron seekh probably made on tawa. Size of the Momo's is way too small for the price paid. Inside stuff was very dry as well. Chilli gravy had a weird tangy taste. Nowhere near they had dillikeoriginal taste. Disappointed"]

reviews:
['The Cafe decor is quite nice and the location is really good but its a quite small place, Youngsters and teenagers would especially like the place.

The chilli chicken was bland so bland not even close to Andhra style. Pizza was like they had no patience to make it so they just dumped some chicken pieces and gave ig", 'Visited Smallys a couple weeks ago and had a wonderful time.\xa0 No compromises when it comes to the food. My fish steak was done very well and tasted heavenly, washed down with peach ice tea. The menu was priced a tad on the higher side for my liking but the food more than made up for this slight issue. The service was quick and the captain made attempts at conversing with us and the other customers present. All in allI, a pleasant experience and tasty food on a Sunday, just made my day! best place to chill out with friends .', 'This place goes exactly by its name. It‚Äôs a small cafe with very limited sittings inside and outside. Their menu has a decent variety of options to choose. We were there for a light dinner hence stuck to their burgers only. The taste wasn‚Äôt as good as expected and wish they had some sea food burgers too. Food: I ordered a sausage burger it was too saucy and the chicken burger was ok. The chicken wings was good
Service: we were waiting for a waiter as we wanted the bill,the waiters were in the kitchen.', "Nice chill place for a quick bite.. Unfortunately, in this branch is with the pretty small table is comparatively smaller to the one in Koramangala so cannot spend much time here.

address: 7/1, G J Complex, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Ambiance: This place was pretty much empty on weekdays, but it has beautiful decor and really catchy phrases all over the walls.\xa0

Food: we tried their Combo meal, which included a grilled chicken American cheeseburger, an option of any flavor mojito and fries. The Grilled Cheese was definitely a must-try! It is loaded with BBQ sauce that oozes out as soon as you take a bite. We tried the lemon and lime mojitos, which was refreshing! The fries could be improved, it has a good quantity but they are really tiny.

Overall a wonderful pocket-friendly experience!', 'One of the best places to have an amazing burger. So far my combination had been American Double Patty Cheese Burger with Masala Wedges and I have never got disappointed. The ambience is pleasant and very bright. Ample and spacious seating arrangements. Overall I love it.', 'One of the best burger I had in my life.. awesome... chicken is very Juicy.. I had similar burger in Goa.. That was amazing after that, this is outlet is too good. Really feels me like a home burger.. good job..', "They provide one of the softest burgers. I had ordered American cheese double burger which was so soft and yummy. Should definitely give it a try. I had ordered cheesy fries, they were a bit spicy but were good. I ordered a red velvet milkshake, it is was kind of okey and wasn't much special.", "I'm here for the very first time. The food is good but the service is bad. I ordered for a combo and they took around half an hour to serve me. They make the customers wait. 
Ambience is also good ."]

address: 80, 3rd Cross Road, Thippasandra, Bangalore
cuisines: North Indian, Healthy Food, Fast Food
more_info: Breakfast, Takeaway Only, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
['I happened to order one night from here. An I was amazed to know that, all they serve are healthy, yet scrumptious. You can fulfill all your cravings by eating healthy and getting the similar taste of junk. I am just waiting for them to start delivering pizzas, so I can order daily from here.', "Tried the sandwich, Aloo pyaz Paratha, Chocolate coated fox nuts from here yesterday. The portion size is good and the Parathas were well stuffed. +1 for good packaging.
I am a fan of the foxnuts, very good munchies. They're affordable and a good option for people looking for a lunch subscription as well. .
                                                littlefoodiegirl.com", "TUCK-STRUCK
This amazing cloud based restaurant serves healthy mix jars and few unique snacks to check your hunger...ü§§
.
.
1. SAVOURY SEEDS - this is my personal fav.üòç
Loaded with Almonds, pumpkin seeds, cashew....
.
.
2. CARAMELISED MAKHANA/FOX-NUT - these caramel Fox-Nuts tastes yummiest ü§©
.
.
3. HOMEMADE HEALTH MIX - contains Almonds, cashew , foxnuts, cornflakes..
.
.
.
Do try there amazing
VEGETABLE RAVA TIKKI - this chat on every bite you'll have loads of mix veggies...
.
The taste is best..üòç
.
.
Suji vegetable Momos - healthy alternative for regular Momo's..üòÄ
.
. You can order them from zomato & swiggy
.
Get the happiness home...üè°ü§©

#justbengaluruthings", 'This place is amazing when it comes to food. They serve breakfast, lunch and snacks. I had tried their lunch and their snacks.
My order was:

Veg Meal box: This was the best dish among all. It was so yummy and stomach filling. It contained 2 Chapattis with daal, sabzi and salad. It also contained curd rice. This is a must try dish here.

Caramelize Makhana mix: Even this is a must try snack. It was so yummy and tempting. They are round in shape.

Nuts over nuts: loved this snack, it contained all the dry fruits mixed together. It is really healthy as well. Do try this one.

Crunchy Sabudana mix: A healthy snack which contains the healthy Sabudana, with other dry fruits and crunches.

Veg Masala Rice: It was like tava pulav dish and was good. It had an amazing smell and was really tempting.

Sabudana khichdi: A really healthy dish which consists of Sabudana and was tasting good. It was arranged well.

A definite place to visit as well as order food from.

Food: 4.8/5', "One awesome place to have breakfast, lunch and snacks. I had ordered alot of items, they were packaged so well. A must try place for sure.
I had ordered

Veg Meal Box: A definite must try dish. It consisted chapatis with daal, potato subzi, salad and curd rice. The taste of each of them is really good and the quantity is really good to overload your stomach.

Caramelize Makhana snack: This was so yummy that you won't be able to stop yourself from eating it. It was round in shape and so tempting. Loved this alot.

Crunchy Sabudana mix snack: This snack was made of a mixture of the healthy Sabudana and other dry fruits. It was good.

Nuts Over Nuts: This is just so amazing. It contains so many nuts mixed together. Absolutely amazing.

Veg Masala Rice: This was good. The quantity was also good enough. The smell of the dish was really tempting.

Sabudana dish: It was good with lemon provided with it. Really healthy food.

A must try place for sure.
Food: 4.9/5", "Healthy junk is a concept that makes your junk food healthy. Since healthy food is difficult to find in cities so, the tuck struck has come up with this concept and the best part is that you don't have to compromise with the taste.

Recently visited this food truck and I say you must try their Bhaji Bruschetta which is nothing but a healthier alternative to Pav Bhaji. Similarly, they have Suji Momos, Veg Rawa Tikki, Sabudana Khichdi, etc.

They even have gift hamper set containing Caramlized Foxnuts, Crunchy Sabudana Mix and Dry Fruits Mix which are apt for small occasions.

Follow @_kitchen_snaps for more food updates"]

reviews: ['', "Today afternoon I ordered aalu-partha from innerchef. The potato stuffing was bad smelling and bad taste, I throw 3 set of paratha. All my Colleagues feel the Fear of seeing Foul smelling Veg burgers & Rotten Brownies every friday, >80% Of the Food brought from Innerchef is going to Waste Bins without Opening the seal in next day in my office as none of us would dare to eat Or donate as well . Don't know why my management is not acting on this after Complete boycot by all the employees. Superb preparation, very fresh and flavoursome!\nGiving 4 stars only because the delivery was delayed by more than 20 mins', "We ordered Rajma Chawal ! The food , the packing and the taste were simply super , cannot beat that at all ... how ever ... the delivery was at it's worst .. this was a delayed delivery. I accepted the fact that Innerchef called me and updated to me that this will be delayed by 20 minutes , when it went beyond that , it simply means that they have not kept their promise of a good delivery . Food Taste and Quality , it is a 5 star !", "Ordered through another app. There is barely any dal makhni and it doesn't taste good either. I'm basically eating dry jeera rice. Disappointing!", 'The food was nice and so was packaging, delivery was on time as well, overall a nice experience.\nExtensive nice menu and most of the things I have tried have been nice , totally worth it !']

reviews: ['Your go to place if you want to grab a quick delicious shawarma or bring home a grilled full chicken. Both are absolute value for money. I often visit this place. I like Tava chicken from here its taste is yummyüòã. The quantity and quality of food is satisfying. address: 25/1, NR Chambers, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
reviews:
['', 'Tried their masala dosa and plain dosa. Both tasted really nice. Their sambar was a bit on sweeter side. Chatni had a flavour of pudina. Overall good.', 'Udupi Park\xa0 is located on the old airport road which serves great South Indian and North Indian food at very fast service and at a affordable rates. I have tried many of the outlets of Udupi, every place have there own specialty and different at price too.\xa0
Over here you will get great options of food when it comes to breakfast lunch or snacks.\xa0
I have tried there upma, bisal bhat, rava idli, plain idli, dosa, masala dosa, pongal and many more dishes, They have option of thali too in veg and non veg both.
When it comes to service, its a self service place where you will get your food very fast.\xa0
They have ample space to sit. Place is clean and rate wise its very affordable and one of the very famous place for everyone.', "Ordered extra pav with pav bhaji and didn't get any. The restaurant number is always out of order", 'Chutney as well as Dosa Packing was not as good as Residency Road outlet. They use plantain leaf for packing dosa and chutney will b spicy n tasty. However dosa was ok.', '', 'Incomplete order', 'Food is not Jain which I have requested', 'Cheap and best..
Only lacks space to eat comfortably.. Which is ofc for the food..
Good south Indian food.
No other comments required.
If looking for cheap, fulfilling and yummy South Indian food.. What are you waiting for?', "Can't judge this place in real sense. Only decent outlet around the vicinity.

South India -
Can get the order quick at off- peak hours. Frustrating in peak hours.
Taste is decent. Chutney is good compared to the outlet near manipal hospital.
Dosa master is the best here.
Idli Wil be mostly dry.

North Indian-
Earlier okayish.
Now: Its worst. Just have to eat for name sake. Almost all the varieties are done by some South Indian chefs

Juices- mediocre
Sandwiches- Better to avoid
Chats - decent, but costly

If you are planning for a quick eat with self servicego for it.
If u want to dine in... U will be late for sure.
If u want to make parcel, make sure u have plenty of time available."]

address: First Floor, Shanmugha Arcade, Bearing 39, Ngef Lane, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ['Mama Mia is an ice cream parlour for which i hear raving reviews. I went there to try on my own and they do really have some quite good options on ice cream scoops. The Alphonso Mango became my favourite. Then we ordered Chocolate Mudpie, which was totally not upto the mark. The chocolate sauce was less and the Mudpie lacked softness.\n                                                foodndestinations.com']

address: 1st Floor, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews: ['', 'Small place near 100 feet road which has the best chaap in Bangalore. The peri-peri chaap starter is the best among what we ordered. It is a small place and has self service. But the food really does make up for everything !!', 'Grilled tandoori chaap, and grilled Peri Peri chaap these two items I had and it was great and the chaaps were prepared well and it was something different. The chef was very well talented to prepare such tasty dishes with mixture of great food and items and also the place never disappoints their customer', 'Grilled pudina chaap and also had the grilled Malai chaap and these both chaap items were great and awesome to have and I loved the food like very very much and also liked the quantity of food and I must say the food was prepared well by the chef by using quality ingredients.', 'Soya lababdar chaap curry, this was awesomee and the curry was thick and nice and I loved that and I was happy to have that curry and was happy to have the food from here as their food has great taste and flavour and prepared really very well.', 'There were some really amazing and mind-blowing items to try out over here and so I had the soya chaap tikka gravy and with that had the naan and the other roti too and In this the gravy was too great and too tasty and had a good quantity and th taste of the gravy and even their starters is great', 'Soya chaap gravy combo, this I had and this curry was great and tasty and the gravy was very different. My whole lunch was this only and this alone combo was enough for the lunch and I loved the food and all very much and these items were worth to have and I loved the food very much.', 'Had the items from here that were recommended by my friend and also had the items that are really prepared very tasty over here and so had the grilled Malai chaap, grilled Peri Peri chaap and other combos too from here. Just loved the food.', 'After being highly impressed with the food of this place, I have recommended people to try out food items from here as the food from here is really great and so I had the soya chaap curry and laccha paratha and these curry was great with too many chaap pieces in it.', 'Had the grilled Peri Peri chaap and with this chaap had the other starter was also grilled and it was very great and so the chaap I had was the grilled masala chaap, and these two are my and my friends favorite starters and we love these starters alot and we are so impressed with this place']

address: 656, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Japanese, Korean, Thai, Asian, Sushi, Desserts
more_info: Home Delivery, Wine, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Table reservation required, Free Wifi, Table booking for Groups, Wifi,
reviews:
['The place is very cozy and the seats are squeezed. The service is good but it seemed like the waiters were confused and in rush. The food was decent but not great , the portion size is too less for the price. Can visit once and experience the food.', "Food - 3.5
Staff - 5
Ambience - 4
A small two section eating place which serves pan asian food.
Coming to ambience it's beautifully decorated but it's not for bug groups which is more that 5 - 6.
Ordered their chef special litchi wonton which i didn't liked it.
Bibimbap was good and tasted well.
Bingsu at that time was not available.
Service was quick and prompt.
Overall the experience was good..", 'What a beautiful minimilistic place. This was our random pick. We were going somewhere and saw this on the way and thought of trying something hot in this super chilly weather. The ambience, food everything was so nice. Loved the tempura Prawns. Staff behavior can be improved. They were not present most of the time in the 1st floor. Would love to visit again soon.', "loved the food and ambience here! we had the Crab and Salmon Maki rolls, they were really tasty. Their Nigiri platter is excellent! Please try their Christmas specials!! The Scotched eggs and Strawberry Chicken were few of the best dishes I've had this year. Their Matcha Latte was very good and the waiter was kind enough to help me order as this was the first time I was having it.", "A lovely place with minimalist and tasteful decor. A great place for Pan Asian cuisine. Tried the Veg fare here.\xa0My special reccos for Litchi Wantons (dont miss), Ramen Yasai, Gyoza and Pad Thai.

The Ramen wasn't too spicy but had a great after-taste, the spice hitting at the right time. The Broccoli and tofu Gyoza were melt in the mouth and the Pad Thai was a great melange of flavours. The Stir fry was good as was the Thai rice bowl. I'll definitely go back.
Bingsu is an interesting dessert, it's an experience to just watch it being made. Tried the Strawberry one, taste was OK.
Would love to see more traditional Asian desserts on offer, which will take the meal experience here to a whole new level in my opinion

Ambience - 5/5
Presentation - 5/5
Taste - 5/5
                                                akshayamrecipes.com", 'Taiki, is a tiny pan asian cuisine restaurant located on the 100ft road, Indiranagar.⁣
⁣
Serving some really authentic asian cuisine, their menu includes Japanese, Korean, Thai and some great options of Sushi.⁣
⁣
Along with that, there are some really yummy options of Ramens and a plethora of amazing sushi options. My favourite being the Dynamite Roll and the California Roll Uramaki.

The dishes are really very authentic and the fishes are fresh and yumm. What stood out to me was the Glass Noodle salad, it was so refreshing and the noodles were very flavourful and smooth.

Even the desserts are authentic, one of the amazing options was the Korean Bingsu. It is a shaved ice dessert with different fruit flavours

Food: 5/5
Ambiance: 5/5
Service: 5/5', 'Lovely place in the heart of Indiranagar, cosy ambience, quite unique seating arrangement. Coming to the food, we had ordered Tom yum chicken soup, it was absolutely lip smacking. Loved it a lot. We ordered Sichuan pan fried fish which was soft and super delicious. We also ordered a traditional chicken salad: Yum Takrai. The seasoning was worth praising and also one Teppan Phad Thai which was equally tasty. The Brazilian lemonade was quite invigorating too. The food was absolutely palatable. Definitely revisit this place again for sure.']
