address: Srinivasan Towers, ESI Hospital Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Free Parking, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Outdoor Seating, Free Wifi,
reviews:
["Very fast service, courteous staff and amazing food.
Taste & plating are both top-notch. I'm really glad we chose to wait 15 mins for a table rather than going elsewhere. Definitely going to visit again üòä", 'I went here during the Navratri season to try their Navratri special menu. The ambiance was warm, with cozy seating and perfect in terms of hygiene. One thing that caught my attention was the air purifying plant kept on all the tables. Coming to food, we tried almost all the delicacies available for fast. Everything was just so perfect and well presented. Desserts and salad were my fav pick. Overall recommended.', "Small place tucked in Indiranagar that serves some deliciously different Vegetarian Indian food!

It's the place you would want to go with your family, parents or anyone who loves good food. Recommended dishes:

- Corn cake
- orange and kaafir lime
- bangkok stir fry (this is a must - the surprise element is the ingredient)
- pan fried momos
- rajma ghee khichdi

Overall gread food and amazing service!", 'one amazing vegetarian place to relish the Asian cuisine !', "This is a warm cozy restaurant run by a lovely family who are always around looking after everyone's comfort. It was a Wednesday and yet the place was surprisingly crowded, which shows that is place is becoming popular fast, and rightly so. We ordered:

Raw mango beverage - 4.5/5
Paneer shikanji - 5/5 (must, must try! The paneer is literally melt in your mouth, the best I've had in Bangalore)
Thai corn cake- 4.5/5 (different and yum!)
Khow suey - 4/5 (not the best I've had but good enough)

Cannot wait to try their rajma chawal the next time I visit.

Highly recommend this restaurant!", 'The place serves some amazing veg food with fusion
Ambience is nice and simple
Rates are affordable for the quantity they serve
I loved the shikanji paneer and coffee caramel 
The mock tails are different and refreshing
Loved the fact they use micro greens in all their dishes which they grow in house
Must visit place', 'I had a different experience at street storyss, the place is cute and has a lovely ambiance and the food is experimental so if you like new things you can check out this place. They have given their own unique modern twist to Indian dishes and the results are absolutely delicious. I loved the rajma ghee kichdi and the kokum masala. My absolute favourites from the menu.']

reviews: ['Paneer fried rice was not at all cooked well. I kind of felt weird inside stomach after eating.', 'Ordered chicken hariyali gravy. It's a hardcore Muslim home-cooked style Biryani which can get you salivating immediately. Just try it.", 'Worst food and service. Biriyani was waste along with paneer butter masala and pahadi chicken. Will never go there.', 'They have an a gravy on offer which is 100rs for 100 ml and only a photo can explain the rest. I‚Äôve been a customer if this restaurant for years and I dint expect them to have such a corny offer to cheat customers ...very disappointed', 'Biryani was not that bad but pricing and ingredients make it bit bland in taste. 310 per plate is way more than expected when you are not getting basmati rice.\n\nI m sorry I might be wrong but it is nothing but properly cooked ambur biryani.', 'Best mutton biryani in this style of making. Taste was great but very oily, looks like they cook in lots of fat to get the flavour. Aroma of mutton was ingrained into each grain of rice. The sides were average. I had better experience in delivery order than dine in experience which was nondescript kind of outing.', 'Though the food was good, the amount of kheer that we got was only a spoonful. Will not recommended Chicken Biryani. Parking is a challenge. Not very friendly staff, but Biryani are quick to serve.', "Just because you give offers doesn't mean you cheat people and give the food quality so less I am not a kid to have in a small quantity bases. Spend 150 for this stupid shit. Really ?? Rahhams ?? And you call this Superhero combo !! well just turned out to be SUPERZERO !!!"]

reviews:
['Best place for milkshake lovers !!
My best choices here are red velvet shake with ice cream topped and spicy chocolate milkshake which is new thing here !!
Overall very much worth for money !!', "This is by far the best Red Velvet cake I have tasted in a Sundae. The Sundae that goes by the name 'Red Riding Hood' had me intrigued and I said to myself that I think I should just see what's that. It's like any other Red Velvet cake sundae, but a better one. Better in terms of look, taste and richness. There were nuts and fun in every single spoonful. Thoroughly enjoyed this one.

As you can see the ice cream on the top was 'shake-like'. It melted. Also, the portion was very small as compared to its price (218/-) in my opinion. So, no perfect 5."]

address: 2985, 12th Main Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Wifi, All Day Breakfast, Indoor Seating,

reviews:
['Me and my friend had gone this evening to this place. Fir me it was my 2 nd time today, as last time i had gone so review i had forgot to put. Anyway, today i ordered Elaicho tea, and other was ginger tea. Ambience was good as it is in Indiranaar so one can expect good vibes. Both tea were good. Would love to visit there soon.', "We visited Tata cha today and ordered the following

Nimbu Da (lemon) , Chatpata Churan (tangy) - both of these are black teas and we found this just average

Exotic pan choco bites - we also tried Paan flavoured chocolate that's packaged in cute boxes. This was decent.

The ambience of this cafe is really cute. And during the weekends this place is jam packed.", "Friendly environment and nice to spend time and do your work. I had the filter kappi(don't hate) as m not a big chai person. But I do love my Iced teas and was surprised that the variety was so less. If only they could have the classic lemon iced tea or something, that would be great. Iced green tea? That's an acquired taste.
Tried their poha as well and that was good. Well spiced and flavorful.", "Tata Cha is one of my favorite places to cath-up with friends. They have a variety of beverages (both hot and cold). I love the chilli guava (it's a guava crusher with chilli). They have a good huge menu with our favorite snacks available from various states of India. A few things which I tried are matar kulcha, Mumbai Vada Pao, Bun Maskafied, Poha Misal and Parsan and loved them all.", "I love the ambience and the location of the place..But i guess the it's a little overrated!

Tata Cha the name itself gives a authentic feels.
But the prices definitely doesn't!

The chicken Khichdi is a must try at this place!"]

more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available,

When reported to the restaurant they said they will send veg next day when called to check with the restaurant they say they aren't responsible for it.Be warned before you order.", 'I ordered the felalfel salad and expected good flavour. This salad was horrible it had 2 bits of tomato and 4 bits of radish and the remaining was only lettuce. The sauce given along had no salt or pepper whatsoever. If I am paying so much I expect a good salad prepared and not that I have order a meal again cause the salad given was bad. The lettuce wasn‚Äôt even fresh. It was bitter. It very disappointing', 'Have been ordering from the outlet quite a bit off late and there food has been if high quality and great value for money. They stick to their name and have a good range of items. The foods are fresh and tasty and im so glad they use less oil in their food. The onky dissapointment is that the food looks very different in the pictures than it actually is', '', "I'm extremely diet conscious and healthie is one of my go tos for ordering. Their keto thalis are a blast! I ordered the butter chicken paneer Bhurji thalis and I could not believe it!!! Only 310 calories and 11g carbs!!! And I know how hard it is to cook low calorie keto meals. Believe me I've tried. And these guys are doing a great job. Based on macros nutrients and serving size, this is value for money!", 'I had ordered Waldorf salad which had only apples in it with barely one walnut. The yogurt was sweetened defeating the purpose of healthy food. Further what irked me the most is a sticker on few pieces of apple which makes me doubt if the fruit was even washed. Please see the photo evidence. @zomato: I know you delete bad reviews. But deleting bad review and retaining good ones you are not providing a fair feedback about the restaurant   Please retain this review.']

reviews:
['Went there in a hurry enroute to movies on a Saturday morning. Was surprised to see the place open. Apparently they are open from 8 am - 11 pm on Mon to Sat. We were in a rush but the manager assured us of quick service and it was quick indeed. We ordered a Greek Chicken burger and a Chicken Start sandwich and Ginger tea. They served us real quick and the sandwich and burger were decent and fresh. The tea was good too and the quantity was more than we expected.

Overall it was a good experience. Will visit again with more time in hand some day.', 'This is a cosy comfort zone. The interior was a surprise for me because I was not expecting a great ambience because it seems dull, an old cafe from outside. The food was good I had ordered lemon paneer and French toast.

Food-3/5
Service-3/5
Ambience-4/5
Menu-3/5

I hope I see more on my next visit.']

reviews:
['They should know how to pack for delivery. Worst experience. pathetic.', '', '', 'This is my weekend evening place. I always go with my friends there for juice. there provide things at very affordable prices. I have tried a lot of their juices for watermelon, mango, orange.
                                                foodavengersblog.blogspot.com', 'its an average place , with lot of crowd from close by schools and others who drop by
the accept both cash , card , online wallets . Usually fast delivery . Stand and eat along the road ...', 'Ordered Falooda and Cocktail milkshake, Falooda was really good and all the ingredients were well mixed, but cocktails shake was a disappointment.', 'I was having chikoo\xa0juice for last one week from so many restuarants\xa0and juice shops,No one has provided such a good quality chikoo\xa0juice and really good to have juices here', "Today again the cheese corn sandwich and paneer cheese sandwich wasn't good. Less cheese, more mint flavour was coming.", "The best budget juice shop for delivery (around the Indiranagar area) during those fasting days or vegetarian days. They have an optimal juice menu and I love the chikku with dry fruit. The fresh strawberry shake, pista shake are ok types. Fruit salads also ok, They serve good wheatgrass juice and this needs to be had over the counter, not available for delivery.\xa0 Sandwich I have tried only the mushroom corn one which was average. address: 295/296, 2nd Floor, 100 Feet Road, 1st Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Lassi', 'Amritsari Kulcha', 'Dal Makhani', 'Chicken Lollipop', 'Butter Chicken', 'Sarson Ka Saag', 'Garlic Naan']
reviews:
['Loved their garlic naan and butter chicken
Even their non veg and veg thali was great.', 'The ambience here is good , even the service. The food can definitely improve! We had the Tandoori chicken, it was nice. So was the Paneer Tikka. The Mushroom Pulao was not up to the mark, even the Mix Veg. Improvement needed.', 'Bhatinda Dine is nicely placed eatery. This Dhaba style restaurant has good north Indian vibes with some amazing music at the background but ideally, we were there for food apart from trucks hanging on the wall. Service and ambience are good but coming to food, it was not that great, ordered Dahi Kabab which was not tasting like one. The main course was decent, we ordered Paneer Makhanwala with Dal Tadka and garlic nan which was too crispy as a papad.

Ambiance - 3.5/5
Food - 2.5/5
Service - 3.5/5
Location - 4.5/5

Feedback: give more priority to food, ultimately that brings the customer back, not the only ambience.', 'Went here on a weekday with some friends for dinner.
Never tried this place before, so thought of giving it a try.
Bhatinda Dine is a Punjab theme based restaurant. The ambience is made to look like a typical Punjabi village. It was really great to see the creativity they have used.
We ordered couple of starters.. First we order the Garlic Chicken. It was amazing! Secondly, we ordered stuffed Tangdi Kebab.. I must say, i have never eaten such a delicious kebab ever. It was juicy, it was flavourful and it was so so so amazing! The Stuffed Tangdi Kebab is a must-try!
We later ordered the main course. In main course we ordered Punjabi Chicken Masala along with some Laccha Paratha and Garlic Nan. The naan was very soft and really fluffy. I do not recollect having such a good naan and Kulcha ever in Bangalore.\xa0
Service was also great! The staff was courteous and professional.
Overall, had a great time at Bhatinda Dine. Keep it up!']

address: 311, 2nd Floor, Gowra, Binnamangala, 1st Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating, Private Dining Area Available, Available for Functions, Wifi,
reviews:
['Powerhouse - last name not pronounceable is like a jack of all trades and master of none.
Their menu is so versatile , however expertise is not present in all but one.
I‚Äôll get to that later.
Service was slow , they took a while to get us our beers , they even forgot in the middle.
Got us a virgin Bloody Mary instead of a vodka fueled one.
The Lotus stem starter was decent , little sweet and Spicy.
The soups were pretty bad.
The Dal was sweet like they had thrown a bucket of sugar into it.
The Thai Green curry tasted like Indian curry with rice.
The Canadian Chicken was decent.
However the Pizza was just fantastic.
Ordered the Chicke Tikka Pizza.
This rectangular piece of heaven was just amazing.
I will definitely go back there for the pizza alone.', "Warm service, lovely music, delicious food. So many tempting options to choose from the menu too. Food came quite fast. We ordered the Chicken Piccata and the Grilled Fish LBS - both were heavenly, especially the latter had an interesting zesty taste. However, all wasn't good for the tummy the next day.
The decor is interesting but not different. The seating was quite comfortable though.", 'Ambience brings up a feel of being seated in a power station which describes their theme having transformers, mcbs and many more electrical appliances.

Lover their Sliders , Lahsuni Kebab and nachos do give it a try.

Follow @mysurufoodiewalks on Instagram for more updates on food', 'Nice place in indiranagar to go with family and friends
Ambience was quite interesting n different n its a theme of a powerstation
The staff were quite active n responsive
Food was fresh n nice ..the taste was 4/5
Ambience 5/5
Price is also attractive
Food service was little slow
But over all a great experience', 'This place is really good, i really like everything but we ordered fusilli arrabiatta pasta which was cooked in coconut oil just want to say for a north indian it tasted like horrible for us, but ambience, service and everything was amazing. I really enjoyed my evening', 'We have been to this place for couple of times now and am sure the number of visits is going to increase!
Very courteous staff.

They have two dining spaces - one for food coma(ideal if you are with your family) and another one for Pitstsa(ideal if you are with your friends or even date).
Both are very uptight in their own nature.
And coming to food,i have tasted their dimsums,steaks,etc but my personal favourite is their crab soup. It is just awesome- perfect spice,flavorand quantity! Same goes for steaks and dimsums as well!

Must recommend to visit this place!', 'The place has an electric feel to it, literally; with fuses, power lines and transformers, the ambience is definitely unique and one to remember. No complaints in the service section too. The food is flavourful and the mocktails have a complex touch to it. The only disappointing aspect of the visit was the size of the food portion served. We ordered fish sticks and a tenderloin steak. The steak literally had two extremely tiny pieces of meat which in my opinion was chewy. However the overall experience did have a spark to it. No pun intended.', 'Ambience - 5/5 
Food - 5/5
Service - 5/5

Totally loved it.. great dishes in chicken.. best thing was different side sauce with each  starter.. (just not a great fan of mint sauce with every other dish) .. so loved it ‚ù§Ô∏è And yes Appy Toppy (green one) mocktail is a must try üí•‚ò∫Ô∏è', 'So much to say about this place! The theme was very unique, this place truly is a powerhouse with the transformers, fuse boxes and so much more. The menu has SO much variety that they literally give you 3 menu cards. The staff were super friendly, especially Marie who made sure everything was perfect during our visit. We ordered the Chicken Piccata, Country chicken (must try) and Grilled fish lbs. We also ordered Tiramisu which was heaven. A big thumbs up to this place, must visit!', 'This was my 1st time I was visiting this place.
We ordered a tenderloin steak with Demi glazed sauce and tournadous steak,both the steaks were tasty.I only felt that the quantity was a bit less especially with the mashed potato.
Ambience: is really and unique decor
Staff: is very polite and courteous']

address: 89, Near BDA Complex, 11th Cross, 60 Feet Road, Off Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
known_for: Calm and serene ambience and befitting healthy  food.
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Wifi, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Kid Friendly, Outdoor Seating, Pet Friendly,
reviews:
['This place tops my list of breakfast place in Bangalore. So different from the rest, calm, laid back , clean and healthy. It takes you back in time where life was all about eating in peace and eating right. It also happens to be a pet friendly place, and that‚Äôs why it further more special to me. One must try them when in Bangalore', 'Is eating out and eating healthy a myth ?
Not at all ...specially at this Yoga studio cum cafe .
The ambiance calm , serene and the decor very refreshing .

A place you can spend hours without being disturbed . So if you want to spend some ME time... this is the place. ..btw they also have a cute library.
Every thing in this place has a charm of its own ...
Everything served is fresh , organic and healthy ...even the cutlery they serve in is in brass and copper only .
I tried the sandwich platter and the salads . Yum and healthy is a amazing combination ...eat with out guilt ...
Oh yes ! You cannot enter this place with your foot wear and that definitely was the first time for me !
So visit this cafe to Find the Yogi in You ;-)', "A hidden gem I would say, though many of you might heard about the place but m sure because of its location it's not all fully known or explored..One good thing of this is it's less crowded and you can feel the calmness, stillness and serenity of this place..This is basically yoga studio n cafe..All the items in the menu are healthy..instead of sugar they use jaggery/honey..As most of these place I explore alone so not able to taste much options..I tried what has been written as must try..multigrain bread with ghee and jaggery and blv me I never knew we can have toast of ghee n jaggery..It's so good!! This is definitely must try..

Food : 5/5
Ambience : 5/5
Service : 5/5
Value for money : 5/5

In case if you want to spend some me time, having your own company then this would the best place..Grab a book from their shelf and enjoy..Oh yes it also has one small boutique..", 'This place has amazing ambience. The ambience is very different and the place is serene. You can sit there for hours and have fun.
One thing I like about this place is that they serve very healthy food.

I have tried oven roasted vegetable sandwich and it was very healthy.
Pasta was ordinary and yes different from the other places pasta.
coco mousse was ordinary.
Mango smoothie was ordinary.

Ambience 5/5
Food 4/5
staff 4/5']

address: 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, ESI To Domlur, Service Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
['Mahapanchami: with the Pujo kicking in, let‚Äôs get the Bengali spread out already! 
1. Luchi and Kosha Mangsho 
2. Moghlai chicken paratha from kitchen of joy is something you must have of you‚Äôre in Bangalore for Pujo! #bolodurgamaakijai #joymaadugga #pujo #dishiidish #bangalorefoodblogger #bangalorefoodiesclub #foodie #calcuttafoodiesclub', 'After a long time been to  kitchen of Joy , Indiranagar we order . Kolkata Biryani, Mughlai Paratha , Dim Pauruti Guguni , Misti Doi & Langcha   
Service is good and quick . Staff are sober . Food quality was average / regular  what pull toward this place  is the wide Bengali menu . 

Biryani can be improved. Mughlai Paratha was perfect. Misti doi was ok üëçüèº, langcha was too sweet . My rating did this place is 3/5', 'Small cafe but truly bong.I love almost everything they serve luchi kosha mangsho, rolls, chops, muglai paratha , tea and authentic Bengali sweets. Place is small but very cozy and lively.This place is pet friendly ( outside sitting area) and have 2 cute resident indie dogs .My go to place for small catch-ups and conversations with my friends and family.', 'We went for a late lunch and had fish chop and mutton kasha with luchi.The luchi was soft and warm, loved it. the fish chop was really good.would definitely recommend all of you to try it.The mutton kasha was decent. We recently tried the chicken mughlai paratha it was really good. The masala chai is also quite kadak(liked it)
Though i must say the drinking water in the jar on the table had a lot of mud like taste,so i would just suggest you to avoid drinking water from there.', 'On a drizzly day, memories of the chai n bun here beckoned so went again for the same items to see if it was as pleasing as my memory. The ginger chai was perfect - one of the best in this area. The mutton keema bun was average. The keema was ok but the bun though big was a bit dry. Maybe it would tasted better with a softer fresher bun. Tried the samosa as well, this was not worthwhile, there were some other luscious looking items on the menu that are worth trying.

This is a small cozy place when there are fewer people else a really crammed place most of the time as this place seems popular.

Update: After visiting here couple of times for chai n snacks, I ordered for delivery of chicken biryani which was fresh enough but one of the most tasteless I have ever eaten.']

address: 789/B, 12th Main Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Cafe, Beverages, Tea, Fast Food, Desserts
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Chaayos is my all time favourite, I am glad they are in Bengaluru as well now :) and Indiranagar outlet ambience is quite impressive. One of my favourite outlets in India :)', "The best thing about chaayos that you will get your kinda a tea.. lil milk tea, whole lot of milk tea, without milk tea, you can just customize as per your need, isn't it great.. And I loved their decor and the cosy feel, where you can spend hours reading a book or chatting with friends..Last but not the least is their finger licking snacks.. Bun Omlette and palak patta chat are must try!!
In chai my favrt is lemon ginger honey tea as I am a black tea person , but you can try their new addition the Winter special i.e. gurwali chai.. I got very good feedback from my tea lovers friends..
Only one suggestion that they can provide the only chutney separately instead pouring it onto Chaat..This will prevent the crispy Chaat to become soggy..

Food : 4.5/5
Service : 5/5
Ambience : 5/5
Value for money : 4.5/5", 'Chaayos was always a favourite when we visited delhi. I did a little happy dance when it finally opened in Namma Bengaluru. 
By now there‚Äôs atleast 5 to 6 outlets in Bangalore. The first one opened in Indiranagar.
This Indiranagar outlet is huuuuggggeee. There‚Äôs indoor/outdoor/swing seating. I absolutely loved the ambiance. Quirky with fun wall art. Beautiful lights all over the place. 
We always have meri wali chai here. Value for money. Well made. Staff is always courteous. Service is quick. 
We stop by atleast once a week for a meri wali chai. Also dont miss out their Poha, its super yumm. They have a huge menu with a lot of choices. Must try!!!', 'Chaayos!!! The place centered around tea with some innovative food options and classy service.This is absolutely brilliant place with great ambience.The place offers ample seating space.
Chaayos is the brain child of IIT alumnus Nitin Saluja and Raghav Verma, who founded the company in 2012.The brand has in total 7 outlets in Bangalore and 73 across country.
Best thing is Choose your chai - Desi, Green or Black Tea with Free Add-ons like Tulsi, Adrak, Elachi, Saumf, Laung, Ajwain, Cinnamon, Masala, Mint, Hari Mirchi, Moti Elaichi, Kali Mirchi, Lemon.
we tried there Cheese chilli toast, Mac & Cheese pasta,Palak patta crispies, Kulcha with Matar curry.
Loved everything and this is a must visit place.

Overall Rating :
Food : 4.5/5
Ambiance : 4.5/5
Service : 5/5', 'New tea destination in town with great selection of tea and quick eats. Located next to 12th main Indiranagar this outlet is so well branded which invites every passerby to try them atleast once. Once you enter the space you can see how ambient is this place, be it the walls, furniture, floorings or the furnishings. Food and beverages are reasonably priced and super delicious. You should give them a try soon.

Fav things off the menu
‚Ä¢ SHAAHI CHAI
‚Ä¢ PALAK PATTA CRUNCHIES 
‚Ä¢ LOADED OPEN KEEMA PARATHA 
‚Ä¢ MOONG DAL HALWA', "The Chaayos Indiranagar outlet is really beautiful with an indoor and outdoor seating space, making it really aesthetically pleasing. It's a great spot for a rainy day!
The highlights of this were shahi chai which was so thick and dessert like, we couldn't stop having it. The palak pathe in starters was a hit, and the chicken kheema paratha is a must try for a full meal on its own. The selection of desserts were all great in their own way, but the date and walnut cake stood out the most- a must try. This is more than just a chai place and you can spend time here lounging with your loved ones!", "Over 800 varients of tea you could ever ask for, yummy food, great for hangout & the cutest place in the fanciest area. What more could you ask for?
There's also a kid's special menu curated just for the kiddos, so this place is apt for all generations!

PARKING : There's a road opposite to and a parallel one where you can park. It's Indiranagar! So, that's that.

AMBIANCE : Spread over the ground and first floor, this place has ample indoor & outdoor seating. Lots of books to read & cozy corners for simple dates.

MUST TRY :

Kulhad Chai
Aam Panna Iced Tea
Shahi Chai
Palak Patta Crispies
Loaded Open Parathas
Samosa Matar Chaat!"]

address: 954, 12th Main Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Appareddipalya, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Bubble Gum Shake', 'Chocolate Waffles', 'Nutella Waffle', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Sweet Cream Cheese', 'Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Banana Caramel']
reviews:
['This place is situated right infront of daddy Bangalore. After having a heavy lunch in daddy Bangalore, we craved for waffles and shakes and went to this small waffle shop. The staffs were kind and humble and helped us choose the best waffles and shakes too! We ordered dark chocolate waffles with vanilla icecream and red velvet waffles which was filled with white chocolate. Loved the taste! It was not too sweet. Also kitkat Shake was good. Totally loved the experience:) If you‚Äôre craving for not too sweet waffles head over now to xo belgianwaffle.', "Love love love ü§§
What waffles should taste like, newbies gotta learn from these guys! So fresh and crisp, melt in the mouth flavours. Must try this place if you're around you won't be disappointed. The staff and service as wellüëç", "Had the Red Velvet Waffle and the Banoffee Choco Waffle. The waffles ended up a dry affair and somehow the waffles and fillings just didn't come together. No where close to the best in Bangalore, I found the waffles passable compared to the likes of Belgyum and Belgian Waffle Factory. The waffles are not worth the price unless you are a Zomato Gold member which entitles you to 1+1 on every waffle.", 'I have been here multiple times and XO is definitely my favorite go-to waffle place. Absolutely love the red velvet waffle and also knight and day waffle.I would definitely recommend this place to people that love creamy and delicious waffles!


Update: So we tried a bunch of new additions to the menu, we tried\xa0
Night and Day - which was a beautiful combination of dark and white chocolate and a thick layer of creamy white chocolate and chocolate sauce.\xa0

Classic Red Velvet waffles and a yummy oreo Waffles.

The newest addition to the menu is the crispy fries and dip.\xa0
we tried the ecstasy fries and dip which I would most definitely recommend for all the french fry lovers out there! The cute little box the fries come in is definitely worth mentioning!

We even tried the Coffee hot Chocolate, which had such a strong taste of coffee and chocolate and is perfect for a rainy day!']

address: Sai Suraksha 1090, 12th Main Road, Hal Ii Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Bubble Gum Shake', 'Chocolate Waffles', 'Nutella Waffle', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Sweet Cream Cheese', 'Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Banana Caramel']
reviews:
['I visit often as iam big time filter kaapi lover ,they have the Jaggery coffee option making it even more enjoyable for a health conscious person.Tried the vegan vada on your recommendation with regular filter kaapi ,it was good thank you', 'I like this place because it has a great combination of indoor and outdoor seatings in addition to good snack items (mind it some of them are microwave heated). 

However there are couple of things they can improve on is stop allowing smoking in the outdoor seating area because its deterrent for anyone to get inside the place especially with kids. Second, they should look into tea quality and being served Hot. Another item which needs attention is button idli‚Äôs ( they r really dry when served hot because of heating them in microwave) But they standout for their taste and service with good staff. Will keep visiting for sabudana and bread pakoda‚Äôs :-)', 'After finishing some shopping in Indiranagar, the craving for some coffee led us to try Hatti Kaappi.

Overall rating 3.5/5

We tried the following and I would rate the food and drinks 3/5
Kaapi - strong filter coffee
Mysore Kaapi - coffee that is a tad bit less strong
Sadudana Vada served with slightly sweet chutney

Ambience - the decor and ambience is cute, would rate it 4/5

Their coffee, tumblers and filter is also up for sale in case you are interested', "If you are a fan of South Indian filter coffee, this place is a must visit.

It has a simple decor and some really cute cutlery. The service is good and are quite friendly. The pricing is decent considering it's in Indiranagar and it's totally worth it if you sit there for a while. (Otherwise, ofc, it doesn't make sense to pay Rs.50 for a quick coffee) Coming to their speciality - coffeee, it is one of the best outlets serving filter coffee in Bangalore. Their food is affordable and tasty. Try their idly chaat (it's spicy), bisi bele baath (very tasty with the right amount of vegetables) and Puliyogere (tangy and the right amount of spice). The only problem I have with the food here is that nothing is served hot. I hope they work on that.

I'd definitely recommend this place if you want some good coffee and food (south indian).", 'Place to go for a quick shot of filter kaapi. Their coffee is really good and tasty. Place is hygenic too. However, the price is not at all justified. It costs almost 3 times what it costs in regular South India food joint. The serving time for food is too long here.']

address: 16/3, Ram Kunj, Commissariat Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, Smoking Area, Brunch, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Wifi,
reviews:
["We went here on Christmas night and I was surprised to see this place empty. I did hear a lot about the fusion cuisine
 here and went in. We ordered 'Donne Biriyani
, Nalli Biriyani, Gongura Chicken Wings, Samosa, Appam, Bhindi fry [Forgot the name from the menu]'.
I always love BBQ flavored wings, but this was an interesting twist. It felt like the wings were literally dipped in pickle sauce, because that's exactly how it tastes.
Donne Biriyani was well Donne Biriyani and it was good. Nalli Biriyani had this huge piece of meat which was a bit chewy and no one wanted to eat it.
The desserts gave a good feel at the end and it was a pleasant experience. Visit here if you would like to give your taste buds a wake up call once in a while.", '4.5 and quite a merry Xmas at this place! Visited this very recommended place and was not disappointed at all. Portions are great for the price and such an interesting menu of food and cocktails. Pandi curry is gorgeous and so is the coffee cocktail.
Disappointing was a dessert called chocolate Bumble though. Great for the eyes but left us wanting with its such small quantity and no remarkable flavour. We resorted to packed plum cake and vadilal vanilla ice cream after and those were heavenly instead.', "We came here for an informal team lunch. Absolutely loved the place. The food was delicious and it's presentation on point. We tried so many items off the menu. The chilli cheese bacon bajji, beef dry fry pickle, the filter kappi pot du creme were some of my favorites.", "Permit room has always been my favorite for it's food. The ambience is lovely with vertical gardens and cuts you off the traffic and bustle outside. I prefer the smoking area on the ground floor. It's also pet friendly.

Coming to food, my all time favourites are Iyengar bakery egg puff - a twist to Bangalore's famous egg puff served with hollandaise sauce.
- Chilli Bajji - this is stuffed with cheese and Ohh the amalgamation that happens when you take a bite üòç
- Bellary Babu's badnekai- eggplant mash served with jowar crackers, something I like here but definitely not a crowd pleaser.
- curd rice here is a must try!
- my favorite cocktail here is the Paati's magic Rasam - a whiskey based cocktail mixed with rasam powder, curry leaves and chillies.

The staff are courteous and responsive.
Food - 4.5/5
Ambience - 4/5
Service - 5/5", 'When in doubt to choose a place I say go to Permit room. Beer is amazing. Me and my friends had the crafted beers. It was good. BBQ Madras mushrooms, calamari 65 and chicken curry with rice the Kerala style. Food was just mouth wateringly delicious. It has lot of plants which give you good oxygen. Courteous staff. Definitely visit again', "Permit room is just the perfect place to chill at.
We actually landed up here around noon for a quick lunch and everything just blew us away.
Starting with the drinks, we tried a melon mocktail and their kokum based cocktail, the cocktail was great, the mocktail was average.
We tried their gongura chicken wings next and this dish is absolutely not to be missed. It's amazing. We also tried a dosa-pumpkin dish from their kodava menu and that's another show stopper, it's beyond anything we could've expected, must try! We ended our meal with their filter coffee pot du creme and the mousse itself was Heavenly, the banana fritters weren't great, had a weird slimy feel but the mousse more than made up for it.

Food: 4.5/5
Ambience: 4/5
Service: 4/5
Value for money: 4/5", "It is located opp Garuda mall and they've a rooftop space that overlooks that junction, giving you the quintessential Bangalore feels.

We were a large group of 6 and were promptly shown to a big table. Ordered wine and mocktails. For starters it was Bangalore Banana Bhajji, Puliogare Poppers, Samosas, Pepper Chicken, Bhindi Fry. Everything was so good and had this modern twist to your day to day Karnataka food.
For mains we ordered appam and ghee rice with 2 veg curries viz., Muushroom Curry and Veg Hyderabadi.

They also have Geist Beer which just takes the food experience to another level.

The ambience is done with a fine taste showcasing Kodava history and the Kodava staff just adds to the whole experience.
Definitely going there again to try the pandi curry and appam. 
                                                seekingthatperfectlife.com", "The cuisine is not my personal favorite, but Permit room is amazing.
The menu is unique, service is incredibly fast and the portions are massive and have some great accompaniments.
The servers are very efficient and are around however busy the place is.

It's definitely a place I would bring any non Bangalroean to, to experience the entirety of Permit room :)", "Great location, great view, great ambience. Overall perfect place to spend your weekend. It's a bit pricey when compared with other local pubs, But its worth. Ask them for their special while ordering. They do have food only zone, where alcohol is not served, if you are planning to go with your family. A must visit place.", "Permit room is one of the highest rated places of Bangalore. It is south Indian fusion food, I have been to this place in the past but didn't get a chance to review it. This time I went on a Friday night. This place is huge and is usually packed so it is better to get a reservation upfront. We tried baby potatoes, tapioca chips and fried okra in starters and all three were good, especially baby potatoes. In the mains we tried potatoes in mango curry and dal vada curry both were very decent. In the desserts, while we didn't like chocolate dessert, we absolutely loved the baked mysuru pak. It was absolutely mind blowing."]

address: 1088, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Off 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly, Wifi, Indoor Seating, Gluten Free Options,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Peri Peri Chicken', 'Burgers', 'Mocktails', 'Peri Peri Fries', 'Garlic Bread', 'Peri Peri Wings', 'Wedges']
reviews:
['My all time favourite place for grilled Chicken. I just love their Peri Peri grill chicken.

Whenever I visit this place I go for Chicken Livers and Portuguese Roll and Peri Peri Grilled Chicken.

This time I went for 1/2 Peri Peri chicken which is sufficient for 2 people and it is accompanied with 1 sides of your choice. You will get one leg and one thigh piece. But, on request they will cut and make it four. The chicken is so tender, not at all chewy. I prefer medium spice. But, you have the option of choosing the spice level.

The Chicken liver just melts into your mouth. Cooked with a tangy sauce, it is just too good. Goes really well with the Portuguese roll.', "Thank you Anamika for being lovely, helpful waitress today.
As usual, Nando's has never ever, ever ever disappoints.
Ambience - 4.5/5
Lime soda - 4/5
Veg Pita - 4/5
Veg Burger - 4.5/5
Potato wedges - 4.5/5
Fries - 4/5
Garlic bread - 3.5/5
Value for money - 3.5/5", 'I felt the price was bit overboard and was low on quantity. Though the interiors , ambience and service staff was excellent.

Overall not so great but if you love African delicacy and taste then this is the place.', "Nando's menu mostly caters to American chicken food. To be honest, their hot sauce is not that hot upto Indian standards.
I tried their extremely hot sauce and it wasn't what i was expecting. The menu is elaborate though and mostly chicken base. The recommended dishes are :
üî∏Spicy Mixed Olives
üî∏Chicken Caesar Salad
üî∏In the meal deals, try the Chicken Skewers and Pita combo.
The peri peri chicken off the bone isn't that spicy as one might expect.
                                                foodndestinations.com", "Whenever I craves for grill chicken, all I can think of is Nandos.
I've visited Nandos multiple times and in different locations, but this time it's in Indiranagar.
I remember Nandos have 2 floors of seating setup but now it's only 1 floor. However, I love the ambience and the paintings frames on the wall.
We had the Peri Peri full chicken with 4 sides which includes rice, beans, vegetables, salads, and I have no complaints on the food.
The chicken skewers was good too.
The staff are courteous and service is quick.
Would love to go back soon!", "Nando's is located at Indiranagar in Bangalore serving Portuguese, wraps, burgers & salads ! Nando's is famously known for their absolutely mouth-watering delicious peri-peri sauces .
We tried Nando's special dish - The Espetada Carnival.
They refer to this dish as a 'hanging wonder of the world' ~ Flame grilled peri-peri chicken thighs stuffed with peta & parsley skewered with mixed peppers ! Served with one regular side of your choice.

This was absolutely mouth watering & was a unique experience. I definitely wanted one more plate of it! ‚ô•Ô∏è Nando's is an international chain popular in serving peri-peri style chicken dishes

Another outlet is located at Orion Mall Bangalore.", "I love Nando's! I'm a loyal customer and a fan of their peri peri chicken preparation with mild sauce. From Delhi to Bangalore, I have tried at plenty of outlets and never been disappointed. They are one of their kind and I am so happy to have found them!", 'Love this place for their classic grilled chicken with huge array of peri-peri sauces, chargrilled vegetables, and potato wedges.

I have been coming here since last 6 years and their quality has been ever consistent which is a great thing because I always know what I am getting into and never is disappointed by their service.

I had great experience most recently when Shiva suggested helped me with the menu and was more than ready to adjust extra chicken piece with already added items. Kudos!', 'Chicken on a stick is always good. Well marinated and beautifully arranged. The cooking was perfect.
Price: 250
Taste: 3/5
Value for money: 2/5
Quantity: 3/5
Ambiance: 4/5
Service: 3/5
Parking Available: Vallet

#foodblogfeed #foods #foodblogging #foodblogger #foodtasting #foody #foodphotography #foodlovers #foodgram #foodinbangalore #foodpic #foodforfoodies #foodinspiration #foodie #foodblog #food52 #foodstagram #footfetishnation #fooddiary#foodgram #foodgasm #foodiesofinstagram #foodpornshare #foodpornography #indiafood #indianfoodblogger #bangalorefoodblogger #bangalore #bangalorefood #bangalorefoodiesclub #bangalorefoodbloggers', "Whenever you crave for peri peri, think nando's! They just do it so perfectly, especially with the sides like coleslaw and lemon rice, it is simply a firecracker of foodgasms to be there everytime. Add to it the very chic ambience and lighting... It is one of my safe hits everytime i am confused about where to go."]

address: Level 5, 1 MG Lido Mall, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Mall Parking, 4/5 Star, Table reservation required, Kid Friendly, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Disabled Friendly, Wifi,
reviews:
['One of my favourite places in Bangalore to have lunch dinner with friends or for causal meetings 
Amazing services 
Pleasant atmosphere 
Welcoming gesture 
Food and beverage at its best', 'Actually something new and exciting cusine actually we had great experiences with yauatcha
FD definitely will prefer this restaurant again
Food was delicious as well as service
Food 4/5
Service 4/5
Ambiance 4/5', 'They serve amazing delicious and high quality food. The prawn dimsum was awesome. The ambiance and service is really good. Would go back again to try their other delicacies', 'Delicious Dumplings Great presentation Yummy Food make the place amazing. Special mention about Mr. Arun who explains well about the speciality of the restaurant and provided a good service. Classy ambiance- A must visit place if you are in Bangalore üòä', 'Food - 4/5
Service - 5/5
Ambience - 5/5

Brilliant Shanghai dumpling and chicken Udon noodles. Not a big fan of those noodles, but everything else was a very good. Excellent staff, very courteous and friendly. Ajay specially was very nice and polite.', 'Food- This place is famous for pan Asian especially the Cantonese cuisine. 
For starters we ordered their famous crispy duck roll(Loved it!), the turnip cake, water chestnut & asparagus dumpling was equally delicious (I only wish the portions could have been better), my favourite was the crispy prawn sushi roll (Very well balanced), their main course, Kung pao chicken and prawn fried rice was absolutely delectable too. 
Their signature cocktails are really great, we had water under the bridge (This was a white rum based cocktail), we also had another cocktail, which was a mix of vodka, basil, cranberry juice. Divine!
Customer service- Business friendly and knowledgeable staff
Ambience- Classy, high chairs as well as comfortable couches 
Value for money- Expensive', 'Undoubtedly this place is the best in town for pan Asian food. There is no place in Bangalore which can beat their dumplings. This place is my all time favorite. They have got simple and decent ambience but their food is extravagant. We ordered soup, veg crystal dumplings, cheung fun ( a must try. Absolutely loved it), fried rice, chocolate pebble, macaroons
Desserts are exceptionally good here.. Especially their signature chocolate pebble will keep u droling.', "üå∏so I dined at Yautcha last night
üå∏originally, a dumpling and tea house, Yautcha received it's first Michelin star within a year of opening in London
üå∏From Monday to Thursday it serves a 7 course meal called Supreme Taste of Yautcha at Rs 1488 per head which I opted for
üå∏ The meal included a soup, a salad, 6 dumplings/person, a stir-fry, a side (noodle/rice), a dessert and a cocktail
üå∏What's best is that you can even pack up your leftovers and take it home with you
üå∏The ambience was very minimalist and posh
üå∏The service was also immaculate. After each course, the table was cleaned and the condiments and cutlery were replaced
üå∏very impressive indeed
üå∏is it worth the money? - I think it's a huge bargain", 'Been to this place so many times that I am at loss of count . Every time the service is impeccable and warm . Just few of the names that deserve special mention starting from manager Ajay to the wonderful wait staff preetam , Sita etc have always been courteous and knowledgeable in suggesting the menu and even remember what you like in the menu .Coming down to food there is nothing I don‚Äôt like here everything on the menu is Just amazing. Some of my favorites are all the dumplings,cheung fun ,four styles veg on mountain chill sauce and the ho fun noodles . And their yum cha menu is prefect and I absolutely love it ! Hands down my most favorite place to dine in Bangalore!!', 'The wait staff are polite and the serving staff are super knowledgeable about the menu. Jamie helped us decide on the menu. 

Hot and sour soup and the Asian green soup were tasty and yummy. The asparagus and water chestnut dumplings and the crystal dumplings were really really good. The steamed roll with a tempura and fried turnip were really good.

The main course was fried rice and four season veggies. And the dessert was a dark chocolate mousse. Lovely ambience and support']

address: 172, 2nd Cross Road, Off Indiranagar Double Road, Indiranagar
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Pet Friendly, Wifi, All Day Breakfast,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Momos', 'Kesariya Chai', 'Pasta', 'Ginger Tea', 'Masala Tea', 'Veg Club Sandwich', 'Hot Chocolate']
reviews:
['Nice, calm breakfast. Really quick service. Liked the quaint seating. Nice chill area for a weekend breakfast. Not much I found lacking as I had only the Full English Brekkie.', 'Pros - ambience, tea
Recommended - kesariya chai, potato wedges

What I ordered
Peri Peri wedges - Loved it. Crispy and delicious
Kesariya chai - Amazing tea with kersari.
Chilli Paneer with jeera rice - Rice quality can be improved.

Experience
Cozy and beautiful cafe. Loved the interiors and artifacts exhibited. There are some artifacts for purchase but the prices are high.

Overall, would come back to try out other menus', 'First I came here was 2017 ‚Äì and absolutely loved the food.

That time we tried the paneer steak and the chole bhature. Don‚Äôt even think that‚Äôs on their menu anymore. 

A small little joint ‚Äì with super cute quotes on the wall, and super kind and courteous staff.

Their teas my friends have tried ‚Äì have been amazing.

1.	Gud ki Chai (Jaggery Tea)

2.	Kesariya Chai (Saffron Tea)\xa0
3.	Ayurvedic Soother (I loved it)

4.	Thai Curry with Rice (was excessively salty ‚Äì but maybe that a one-off situation)

They lack more vegan options ‚Äì especially in their mains and smoothies/shakes ‚Äì but all in all ‚Äì a nice cozy place to hang out. However ‚Äì they shut early ‚Äì before 10:30ish.', "Tea Brew - A Comfortable, Cozy and Cute Cafe in Indiranagar !

Ambience:
A bungalow converted into a Cafe with beautiful ambience. The artifacts and warm lights adorn the setting inside. There's a seating space outside too. Soothing music makes the atmosphere pleasant.

Food:
We had Cheese and Jalepeno Balls, Peri Peri Potato Wedges, Mediterranean Pink Pasta, Nutella Waffles and all types of Kulhad Teas.

Service:
Staff is courteous. Service is Ok.

Overall,
Food: 4/5
Ambience: 5/5
Service: 4/5
Value for money: 4/5", 'Ambience: Cute little cafe with greenery all around.

Food: I had Nutella sin pancakes and hot chocolate. Both were quite delicious.

Service: Was quite lacklustre. People over there needs to swiftly attend the customers and not let them wait forever for even taking the order.', "Tea Brew is my new favourite place to hang out in Indiranagar. It's an old house converted to a cute cafe. There's seating outside and inside and both are equally enjoyable.

The chai here is top notch. It's served in a matka which adds to the allure. The staff are courteous and polite and serve quickly.

Would love to come back here for a good Sunday breakfast!", "Landed in this place accidentally. It's a cute little cafe which is full of pretty lights and small indoor plants. Nice place to relax. We ordered a chocolate chai,Detox Mojito and a Nutella, brownie ice-cream. Wasn't as good as we expected it to be. Mojito was the only thing worth giving 2 or more stars since it was a sultry day and that was refreshing. Over all it's a good place to relax but food isn't that great", 'One of the quaint little and silent places in Bangalore. A place which can be your go to place with great food and ambience. Definitely recommend this for a rainy evening.', "Lovely place for a tea lover.. We absolutely loved their Ginger tea and lemon mint tea. What's amazing is the range of food options too! They aren't extremely pricy but decent enough. The sandwiches and the omelette were great but the crispy chilli potatoes were a bit of a disappointment. The service was pretty fast and the staff were friendly and courteous too.
Should easily be one of the must visit places in Bangalore for a tea lover :)", 'My go to place in Indiranagar. Pet friendly and pocket friendly. Good to sit and cut chat over a cup of tea, peri peri French fries, steamed momos, stuffed mushroom or Maggi . Total comfort place with outdoor and indoor sitting area. Service is great and so is the food. I can‚Äôt stop visiting them, I go there almost every week üôà']

address: 1016, 1st Floor, 80 Feet Road, Koramangala 1st Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Today we visited koshe kosha Koramangala branch and had our lunch. As suggested by the person over there we should have taken mutton kasha but we took dhakai mutton which was not good at taste and also the mutton was not good quality. The chanar dalna was very good we loved it. Again planning to go to try more dishes', 'Visited on Diwali, and totally bowled out by the taste of all the dishes. Took prawn cutlet and fish kobiraji in starters. The prawn Cutlet is probably the best cutlets I have had yet. Fish kobiraji tasted amazing with a huge serving size. In main course tried Basanti Pulao with Prawn Malai Curry both of which were delicious. Also tried Bhetki Paturi, lovely it was. So was the Echor Kalia. Ambience was good and price is towards the higher range. Couple of suggestions, the servicing time can be improved and wish the place could be more spacious. Rest everything was amazing.', "Got myself a takeaway dinner order... mutton kosha, prawn cutlet, chicken cutlet, mutton pulao n 3 rotis. A good meal. All dishes to the point, the cutlets are yum. The kosha mutton gave a smell of the gravy being predominantly liver paste. Or maybe it's the mustard oil used. Pricing seems a tad high for the kosha but it's ok.
Next eve tried the dhakai mutton too. Spicy n flavourful.
Good neat place n decent food. Parking is a hassle, climb 2 flights of stairs. Go try.", "We visited this place on Sunday. The place is too crowded on weekends, you will have to wait to get a seat.
We had wanted to order Echor Kalia, but it wasn't available. So we went ahead with Aam Pora Shorbot, Tetuler Shorbot, Plain Rice, Jhinger Alu Poshto and Ilish Bhapa.
The Ilish was really good, and so was the Jhinger Alu Poshto. Didn't like the Aam Pora Shorbot much.
It was kind of disappointing to know that they don't have Mishti Doi.
Service is good, you will have to wait for a while to get served. The prices are a little too high.", 'Any Bengali outside Bengal would crave for the authentic Bengali food. And this place is the saviour. We ordered fish kabiraji, plain rice, sorshe ilish, chingri malaikari, alu bhaja and sukto. The taste was very good as well as the portions. The chingri malaikari had the best taste. It is a highly recommended place for all people who wants to taste the authentic flavours of Bengal.', 'Heavenly place if you are a bong and have a natural craving for Bengali cuisines. An excellent blend of quality and quantity. We had ordered sada bhaat, murir daal, jhuri aloo bhaja, basanti polao,kosha mangsho ,luchi,aloo posto. Needless to say all were exceptional in taste and satiated the taste buds to there max. Be it the amount of ghee in polao to the tenderness of mutton to the crispiness of aloo bhaja, everything seemed perfectly sorted. Decor wise also it gave an old heritage touch of old Calcutta. All in all a wonderful experience.

Food:5/5
Decor:5:/5
Staff:5/5']

reviews: ['', '', 'I order juice and maggi...i had vomit for my first sip for watermelon juice', 'I have ordered my lunch today here. It was a bad choice of choosing this restaurant because he got the spoiled bindi masala delivered. This states the quality of the restaurant and the grade of food they prefer. Never order food from this restaurant and get hospitalized. Worst experience. Waste of money and time.', 'They Make nice homemade food in fair price\nI always order from svi food&juice at night recommended to everyone\nNever had such a good food quality preparation from any restaurant at night time', 'Very tasty food. Pulao and puri was very tasty but banana shake was like shit. Plz dont charge so high price for items which smells like shit and urine. Very honestly telling. You charged 70 rupees for this shit banana shake. 1000 times better banana shakes are available in street shops with only 20 rupees.']

address: J B Nagar Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', 'The rate chart is great. It is really nice place to have evening snacks.
But I think they should improve the quality of food.', 'Superior quality preparations, the best samosa i tasted 8n JB nagar so far.. Dessert are too good in both quality and taste but yet to taste their laddos...', 'Very clean and tidy..chats were very good..I am shocked to see the low rating..service very quick and polite.. overall this will be my go to place for chat and some quick meals which are easy on the pocket', 'We went around for a pav bhajji craving and ended up here. The place is filthy. Cracked tiles has cockroaches coming out. The pav bhajji 1 bite and I wanted to spit it out. It was spoilt from probably being out all evening. Places like this should be shut down for such unhygienic practices.', 'Very bad taste... i had ordered kachori and there was noo stuffing in it just the green chutney and tamarind chutney... need to improve a lot..', 'Had a lassi here today that tasted awfully bad and was 40% costlier than the excellent neighborhood "Lassi shop" store. Laddoos' chaats are average quality and costs at least 20% more than similar north Indian snack joints that serve way better chaats at lesser price. Avoid.', "If there would be zero star i want to give . There was house warming ceremony for my new house . We ordered sweet from here . At pray time when we open the box\xa0 , sweet was having sour taste and it was stinking . Because of this i feel so ashamed and its destroy my\xa0 happiest moment. I'll just say don't go for any discount these people are worst , After taking there sweet there are chances for food poisoning .", 'I ordered onion & paneer paratha from laddoos. They were tasty, value for money and packaging was good.

Pickle and curd provided alongside were tasty. But it would be better if while ordering they asked if I wanted spicy curd or not.

I would recommend.', 'I had this Bengali sweet from laddoos .. In love with this sweet. And the Rasamali inside the sweet makes me to eat the whole box without giving it to others']

address: Shop 82, Ground Floor, Vasanthappa Garden, 13th G Main, Doopanahalli, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I was searching for a good Indo-Chinese resturant in the Doopanahalli neighbourhood but could only find expensive ones nearby. That was until this food joint opened near my office.

Being from Kolkata I miss the authentic Tangra Style Chowmein and momos, and this place does not dissapoint. The prices are reasonable and the food is authentic indo-chinese. I have wasted so much money in California Burrito and I wished this would have opened earlier.

I have tried the fried veg momos, chicken steamed momos and the non-veg fish combo. I absolutely loved the thin chowmein that they offer in the non-veg combo. The chilly fish reminded me of Kolkata. Really a wonderful experience for a foodie like me.']

address: 8, Old Binnamangala, Off 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', 'Cake Taste is mind blowing.
If we taste once here u will never ever go to other bakery.
For birthday cake we have variety of designs.
Price is also reachable.', "Cake palace is a small bakery cum confectionery on the road opposite Toit. They specialize in pastries. They also have a few different kinds of cookies which are always fresh and aromatic,

It's not a restaurant where you can munch on goodies and wile away time. It's only a take-away shop.

What they assure you ALL THE TIME is quality and freshness!! i live a stone's throw away from here and i frequent this shop (about 2-3 times a week) and i have never found reason to complain.

They also accept orders for birthday cakes. Best thing is that if you visit them late morning / early afternoon, they may bake a birthday cake within 30 mins!!! if you live in the vicinity and need a cake and you haven't placed an order anywhere,you can walk right in here.

They also have puffs, sandwiches and other titbit snacking options. They have a juice / ice cream shop adjoining this one too.

They don't accept cards for payment."]

address: 621/B, 12th Main Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Table booking not available, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Blueberry Waffles', 'Belgian Waffles', 'Pancakes', 'Sandwich', 'Chocolate Chip Waffle', 'Fruit Pancake', 'Banana Caramel']
reviews:
["Neat and clean Waffle Magic offers the perfect waffles and dessert options after a good meal on bustling 12th Main, Indiranagar. Its location is to its advantage, walking distance from some great restaurants and pubs.

There are sweet and savoury waffle options on the menu, which is great. As we had come for dessert, we opted for the sweet ones. Good selection, I must say. We had the Dark Choco-chip waffle and the Deluxe Blueberry Waffle. Both were nice, well presented, the waffles were big and crisp, ice-creams were good too. Staff is decently courteous. They didn't have the Belgium Strawberry Waffle at the time, else this would have been our first preference.

All in all, we had a nice fulfilling waffle dessert! :)", "A nice cool place on the far end of the 12th main. Main item on the menu is waffles though they have limited variety of burger and sandwiches. The selection of waffles are mind blowing! They have savoury varieties too if one is not in the 'sweet' mood. Tried 4 varieties and milkshake too. It was excellent and a nice treat for the kids. Prices are slightly high but guess it's because of the location. Definitely a recommended place for occasional treat."]

address: 58, Ground Floor, 7th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Banglore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Rating 4.5/5 (half mark deducted for the lack of visibility on when breakfast ends and lunch prep begins üòÜ)

Superb vada & idlis - fat yet soft, thick fragrant sambhar (full of vegetable, including what seemed like huge chunks of raw mango), 3 types of chutneys (loved the coconut and the red chutney, not fond of the mint variant) - all on a nice banana leaf. Been to Sendhoor coffee multiple times in the past, often to be disappointed they are out of idlis. We got lucky yesterday - we were the last folks to be seated for breakfast (it was around 11.30am), and then they shut down (they were preparing for lunch) as we were half way through our breakfast.

What a great start to the Dussehra holiday yesterday ü•∞. And we in Bangalore are blessed to get multiple styles of idlis - each style unique and delicious.

CoE: Old outlet, been multiple times, I paid for the breakfast.', 'Yummy food and hospitable service. No more is expected early morning :)
Podi dosa is highly recommended. Crispy, buttery and soft sprinkled with tangy chutney powder....mmmm...', 'Amazing food.. Everything just tastes wow.....üòç
They serve in banana leaf..üçÉüòç
.
The famous ottu parota is just out of this world... Very delicious... U need to wait for quite a time to get your hands on these Sendhoor special parota... Because of huge demand.....
.
In between we tried padu . Which was really well cooked and tastes wow... And they provide 3 different types of chutneys too.....üòç
.
And also tomato bath and dosas were really good...
And
Finally coffee . Really goodüëå
.
.
.
Zomato Gold you need to buy it now! Use my code TEJD7161 to win surprise freebies!']

address: 3, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, Resto Bar, LGBTQIA Friendly, Pet Friendly, Wifi, Nightlife, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Great place and feeling very much confi as soon as we enterand theme of being tropical, greens all around feels so clean and fresh to sit around, The food was great as well and definitely its a pocket friendly. Will visit with friends once again.
Ambience : 5/5
Food : 5/5
Service : 5/5', 'We visited the place over weekend and the ambience is pretty chilled out.
Whatever we ordered was delicious and my personal favorite was veg dim-sum which we repeated in our order. Only thing I felt the service was quite slow.
We had to remind them for beverages twice and the sitting inside was not so comfortable in sofa section.', "Loved the ambiance, staff behaviour. But expected the food quality to be on higher side. Won't say all were bad but we ordered lamb that was not cooked well though but other items were awesome. Please try chilli garlic calamari and shrimp bowl. You would love it. Overall average ..", 'Went there on a weekday.i liked the ambiance. It was super cool with all the greenery all around. They have indoor and outdoor sitting.food was great and the drinks as well.staff were very friendly.music was nice . A nice place for a couple dinner.they have zomato gold on drinks. I spent some quality time.', "This place looks beautiful. Pictures will not do justice tbh. Cocktails were great, we had LIITs, Manhattan. Food was average, especially the prawns and drums of heaven, lacked spice and overall it didn't taste that good, Pizza had very less topping and tasted above average, better than other stuffs.
Ambience: 5/5
Service:4.5/5
Food:2.5/5
Alcohol: 4.5/5
Value for money:4/5", 'Ellarigu Namaskara!

This place is located right on the main road so don‚Äôt have to struggle to find. Had been here late evening, the ambience is good and waiters were friendly.

They accept Zomato gold as well which is a plus point.

Prices were little higher than average but it is worth paying for the delicious food. 

The veg platter was amazing with more quantity that can easily be shared amongst 4. 

Ambience 5/5
Food 4.5/5
Service 4.5/5
Overall 4.5/5', 'Lono is a perfect place to hang out be it with your friends or as a couple. Amazing crowd and weekend vibes. So full of lush greenery.

Went there for a couple of drinks and a few bites. Zomato gold accepted on drinks which was cool.
We ordered Paprika Hunmus and Mishroom Cheese Balls.
The hummus tasted good but the garlic taste was over powering. Pita bread was soft and yum. Mushroom wasnt very interesting and had a basic taste. It had quite a hard crust. Could do better in terms of veg food, rest all is on point.

Would visit again to try more varieties!', 'Cool restaurant with all Greenery all around.
Ambience is really soothing.
Staff is very Courteous.
Food is very tasty.
Pasta is a must try.
Indian Cuisine is too tasty.
Go ahead and a book a date.', "Visited to this place on Sunday night, ambiance is pretty good with beautifully decorated music,
Food was delicious drink was amazing, üëå
Staffs are friendly and courteous ,üòÉ
We loved everything about this place,
We will definitely recommend this place to my friends, üòÉ
Thanks for great hospitality,,
We'll visit again for sure
Ratting,, üòÅ
Food. 5/5
Drink. 5/5
Ambiance. 5/5
Location 4.5/5", 'A decent place for dinner. Has the tropical theme with a superb ambience.
The food is good with a lot of variety.
Regarding the taste, I felt that they use the same spices for most of the dishes. It does not mean the taste is bad but it still tastes almost the same.
Service is a bit slow.
They do not have parking but I think that is the problem with most of the restaurants.

Must go atleast once.']

address: 197/A, Double Road, 2nd Stage, Opposite HDFC Bank, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Free Parking, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Valet Parking Available, Free Wifi, Buffet,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Dimsum Platter', 'Tom Yum Soup', 'Dumplings', 'Mocktails', 'Momos', 'Pad Thai Noodle', 'Sweet Coconut Milk']
reviews:
["If you're looking for authentic Thai place with a twist, this is where you should go. Every item that we ordered was perfect including the prawn Tempura tacos and Cantonese noodles and especially the corn spinach dimsums. They were steaming and full of flavour. You can also try out the Sunrise Mocktail which would give you the necessary cooling. Try out there various chicken starters like Cajun chicken as well.", "It's a perfect family dining place with limited but brilliant choice of food in all menu sections. This restaurant runs from the same place where the Bangalore Mandarin existed till 8-10 years back. Dimsums, Pad Thai and Desserts are brilliant. Soups etc are average. Great and silent place for a family chat and dinner.", 'This is located at CMH road just opposite HDFC bank.
Food:we ordered Dan Dan mein which was spicy and nice 
We also had thaichy special chilli coriander noodles which was bit a salty.
Service: was very good
Ambience: simple and nice.This place is well air conditioned
Staff:very polite', "Ordered the non veg set of dimsums..liked the lamb and chicken ones. The prawn one wasn't great for me but I really enjoyed the dips that they gave with it.

For main course, ordered their thai chilly coriander noodles and prawns in lemongrass. Loved the noodles, prawn could have been better in terms of quantity.

Enjoyed the food overall, clubbed with some really pleasant service by the team there. Appreciate it. Will definitely come again.", 'Disappointed with the food, never try breaded king prawn which was suggested by the staff. Food taste and quality was not that great only thing i like was the service. Final verdict:
Ambiance: üòäüòäüòäüòêüòê
Food:         üòäüòäüò°üò°üò°
Service:      üòäüòäüòäüòäüòê
Cost:           üòäüòäüòäüòêüòê', 'I am a sucker for Thai food and decided to try this place for my birthday. We were welcomed warmly by Joy Chakraborty and his team. He was always there for recommendation and seeking out for when we needed to make the right decision about the dishes. We ordered the dim sums, Chicken Nasi Goreng, green Thai curry fried rice, volcano Rice and many others. The highlight of the menu are all the ‚Äò‚Äòmeals in a bowl‚Äô they are worthy of the money you spend in terms of taste and quantity. We enjoyed my experience here.']

address: 27, Dickenson Road, Commercial Street, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', 'Sells stale snacks and nothing great about the sweets as well. I bought some chips from this shop along with some sweets. The chips were fried in repeatedly used oil and was smelling bad. There was no manufacture date, only month so no idea how many days old it was. The sweets that i bought were very average.', "A warm spot for chats and resting after or in between a tiring shopping session. The shop offers a range of novel mithai's from the ghee-filled to the low calorie types.
Their barfi is definitely the best I've had in Bangalore!!

Must try: Kaju Barfi (katli), motichur laddoo, rasgulla, milk peda", 'Best Rabri in town, has been for as long as I can remember.
Have been going here for over 10 years.
Palak chat is a must try and so are the gud rasgullas.
Best part - everything here does not have onion or garlic!', 'good but not too much......', 'not happy', "This place is without any doubt the best restaurant to eat sweets in Bangalore without burning a hole in your pocket.
If you are in Bangalore for just one day and gave a opportunity to eat a breakfast, one should visit this place and have the kachori early morning. It's a paradise for all the chat lovers.", 'I want to give you 0 rating. Nightmare of an experience.

We ate here on Friday the 30th March around 3pm

We had palak chat,Raj kachori,lassi and rabdi.

Trust me the chats had an off taste and rabdi was kinda wierd too. (maybe this was the cuplrit of food poisoning of me ,my mother and my 13year old brother. since the container on the display was almost nearing the end.(IF u Knew ur food had gone bad , why give)
also this place has become very unhygienic and you Can see THE COOKS COME OUT in the open,in their vests, dripping in sweat.(no wonder we are all sick)

It has been 3 days since then and we are still under the trauma of food poisoning (loose motions & vomitting ),nausea and high fever.

Never going back to this place. Never ever mentioning to any one about u either, you horrible place!!!!

I hope the food & health orgs come and check out this place and shut down immedietly.', "There is noticeable degradation in quality of food. We had chosen a Sunday (17 Sep 2017) as some special items were hyped to be available. Kulcha chaana was horrible and served with the normal chaana not the chhana motor. No fluppiness - appeared to be made out of the preceding day's stock. The accompaniments of chaana was watery and fit for taking sips from cups rather than taking with Kulcha /Dalpuris. Papri chaat was with sour curd and just could not be eaten. Sweets and big orange coloured Rasgullas, too, were just ordinary. Next time we would think twice before visiting the joint."]

Overall good cake and can be recommended", "Wow wow, Today I had a cake for my wife birthday ... Chocolate Gaute .. Its gud now a bad taste .. Its fresh ...
All the thing cake we'll decorated ...", 'One day when I had guests at home I was lazy to make a desert. I order blueberry cheesecake from Ocean cake instead.

address: 73, RK Mutt Rd, Dodakattappa, Halasuru. Landmark next to Sri Ganesh Bakery
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Moderate priced place with good quality and average portion for a normal appetite person.üôÇ

Ordered Sausage Omlette and English Meal. 

Thought Omlette wouldn‚Äôt be sufficient before ordering and even after seeing it. But after finishing I felt heavy for more than 4 hours. I was not hungry at my usual lunch time. ü§≠
It had good amount of meat pieces. Due to vapor, the bottom was filled with water. Bottom part of  Omlette was wet.

English meal had 2 Sausages, 3 pieces of Bacon, 1 bread, Tomato & Mushroom and peas.

Liked all the dishes. Delivered within the time but nothing was hot enough. I feel the price is bit more for the portion they provide.']
