These items were great. Dal makhani was tasty and even the paratha was good. Loved the taste of it very much.']

address: 442, 9th Avenue Building, 9th Main Road, HAL, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Free Wifi, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Keto Options, Pet Friendly,
reviews:
["Nice place in the middle of Indiranagar but away from the hustle and bustle .we took our dogs along , their dog area is the same as the smoking area , so be careful and plan in advance . We waited for a few minutes for the smokers to leave and then had the small area to ourselves ,this area can seat 5-6 people on bar stools . Over looks a beautiful tree . The weather was overcast ans hence this area was very comfortable .
Coming to the food ,we ordered wings ,butter prawns , a beef burger , a bacon pizza and a few shakes (strawberry , chocolate and filter coffee shakes ) .
Pizza was above average , burger was good but it had too much salt for all of our liking .
Starters were the wings which is more like a chat powder infused taste,was decent . Overall it's a nice place ,but if you expect your dog's to have acres of place to run ,then this is not the place .
The service was nice.

Pizza was", 'We tried the Broccoli & Almond Cream soup, the mushroom stroganoff with cauli rice and the BLT chicken salad from the Keto menu, and found the food to be really tasty albeit quite highly priced for the portion size. This is my opinion for the Keto dishes, particularly.
Also, despite being the only customers in the restaurant, the service was really slow and quite inattentive.', 'One of the not so popular and hidden places in Indiranagar. This place has its own charm, calm ambience and peaceful surroundings. Coming to the food, the taste is really good, especially the crispy corn and Mushroom stroganoff. The deserts are really interesting and called the BOMBS. Check out for Oreo or KitKat bombs. The dishes are rightly priced. Good work and really hope it gets more publicity.', 'I am in love with their burgers and chicken steak. Probably, one of the best in the city.

I tried the below items. Let me know individual views.

1. Spinach, Broccoli and Almond Soup with Chicken - served with garlic bread, medium thickness, creamy, could taste each of the content as a distinct flavor, good amount of chicken chunks. Since I went with a friend, I requested for 1/2 soup. Both of us had good portion üëå

2. Juicy Lucy Clachic - A chicken burger with huge chicken patty inside. The patty was made of minced chicken and had cheese inside. The other contents were lettuce, semi-cooked onions, pickles, cheese slices, tomato, mayo and one more sauce. The bun was soft and not at all dry. Loved it.

3. Chicken Steak with Mushroom Sauce - Extremely tender juicy chicken steak (3 pieces), grilled vegetables, flavored rice, mushroom sauce with amazing quantity of Mushrooms in it.

The taste, the portion, the service, everything was amazing. I am certainly visiting them again']

address: 39, Opposite IBP Petrol Pump, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Standing Tables, Outdoor Seating,
reviews: ['This is definitely not worth biryani. It is over priced and tasteless. Only the chilli chicken gravy seems bit better. Biryani‚Äôs from this place are definitely big NO. Please try to include nice biryani flavour and donot make biryani very dry. Not pocket friendly too!']

address: Main Road, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
["I went to the restaurant directly. They have a seating capacity of about 20 people. I already had a bad experience on ordering the food online from this restaurant.

The grilled chicken which they gave is not at all eatable. It was not cooked/grilled properly. As in the posted photo, it still have blood and was not cooked.

The chilli gobi was also of same kind. But as its veg, we had the food. It was not cooked properly and the cauliflower was so hard to eat.

I pointed the issue to the person who served me the food and he didn't even respond to it. Such a shitty behavior from the people.", 'I ordered veg munchow shoup here and found mutton bone in that soup. On complaining the cashier started to fight with me. Then I had to file a police complaint. Better to avoid this place.', 'Craving for some spicy shawarma on a rainy evening? This is the place you ought to visit. The tiny place on a bustling street can be spotted by the crowd savouring their shawarma. With 3 options to choose from,you can customise the type of roll you want. The pickles vegetables and the fries with the spicy mexican sauce is a real treat.
Food:4.5/5
Service: 4.5/5', 'TASTY FOOD. A LITTLE BIT OVERPRICED. QUANTITY IS ALSO NOT SATISFYING. THE FOODNIS VERY VERY TASTY AND SERVES THE BEST BUTTER CHICKEN AND KERALA PARATHA. THE SEATING IS NOT QUITE COMFORTABLE IN ANTHROPOMETRY. STAFFS ARE ALSO NICE', 'Today I have ordered from Savoury Paneer Tikka Masala.\xa0 It took 1.5 hrs to get delivered and also the quantity and quality of the item was very poor.\xa0 Will never prefer this service provider again', 'Last week went indiranagar so seen Savory restaurant on the way two of we ordered one chicken biriyani and one my favorite shawarma taste wise good.', 'Ordered Chicken shawarma roll and Mexican chicken shawarma roll. Pretty average roll. Not great not bad either. Onion quantity was way to more as compared chicken and Mexican shawarma was oily as well. Otherwise tastewise it was good', "This place being popular with so many branches over Bangalore my family went there to give it a try.
Popular for it's Arabian cuisine we didn't try much but the fried fish, a parotta with mutton rogan Josh gravy and a chicken shawarma roll.
We went there on a Saturday night it was crowdy and the locality at which it's located in jeevan bhima nagar is a muslim area so u could see variety of other Arab eateries and related industries there.
Good for trying once.
The waiters weren't assisting enough because it was a rush time and yeah cost wise its average. Neither too less not more", 'I ordered a Chicken roll and it was awesome. My order was received and they prepared it very fast. When the delivery boy reached me the roll was hot enough and tasty. Even the beverages are nicely prepared.', "Pathetic food quality and irresponsible manager he is not ready to listen our problem. I ordered Al faham and it was smelling very bad and I informed manager He just said if you want have or else leave it off. Even this food animals also won't eat it was smelling very very bad. It was a very bad experience for us. I frequently visit Frazer savoury and I consider savoury as a best brand for Arabic cusine but this time it dint happen. Jeevan Bhima nagar outlet is not fit for having food @savourymanagement kindly look after this or else your going to loose your brand value."]

address: 383, HAL 2nd Stage, Opposite Croma, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["Ordered about 18 cupcakes last week for my husband's birthday.These included 6 personalized cupcakes. The red velvet & choco ones were very good. The cupcakes were a little smaller than I had expected.... Taste was pretty alright.

One extra point to the management/owner whoever handles online ordering. I had to change the address 2 times in an attempt to surprise my husband and they obliged without any fuss. Thank you so much for that, really appreciated.", '', 'Was walking in Indira nagar and happen to see cupcakes shop just like that visited the shop and picked an cake and cupcakes it was yum and gud', "Why you should buy here:
One of the least-priced cake makers.
Orders can be placed online without even having to call them.
They're easy to contact and are very responsive.
User-friendly website and payment options.
Timely delivery anywhere in Bangalore at no extra charge.
New customers get a fat discount.
Existing customers get a cash back into their Bite Me online wallet.
Same-day delivery is possible as long as you order before 4pm.", 'I have been ordering cupcakes from this place for all office events and the crowd loves it!‚ù§Ô∏èüòä..They have very helpful staff and also provide the best delivery service. This place is my go-to for any events that are organized cuz of the great offers they have. Great job guys!', 'Tiramisu cake was a surprise order from a colleague to celebrate my daughter‚Äôs half year birthday. The delivery was given within the mentioned timings and my place was almost 25km from this outlet. 

The cake was too delicious and the cream was fresh and tiramisu has always been one of my favourite dessert..! It looked simple and yumilicious..! 

But what I really didn‚Äôt like about the whole order was delivery person asking for tips. Tip should be given and not demanded.

Thank you ‚ÄúBite me‚Äù for this amazing cake which made my daughter‚Äôs special day very memorable..üòç', 'I have ordered cupcakes from bite me cupcakes in the past using their (10 + 2 offer), there were quite a few flavours in the box and my favourite was red velvet.

Recently during a heavy rain I ran into bite me for some shelter and ordered their blueberry and mixed berry cupcakes.

The cupcakes both these times were moist, the cream is also not too sweet. For the budget friendly price , these are pretty good.

Overall rating - 4.5/5

Value for money - 5/5
Ambience - 3/5
Taste - 4/5
Staff courtesy - 5/5', 'I have ordered cupcakes from here quite a few times now and I can say that it is the freshest and tastiest I have tasted in Bangalore. I have tried red velvet, blueberry, strawberry, tiramisu, butterscotch and the irish coffee cupcakes..all of them were very soft and melt-in-the-mouth..delicious!! I loved the red velvet cupcakes the most, with the gooey and moist cake on the bottom and the cream flower frosting on top...', 'Bite me is a fantastic place to grab a bunch of cupcakes. They have a great selection of cupcakes that come in all shapes and sizes. 

Ambience: (3/5)
It is clearly not designed for seating though it has a small table inside. It‚Äôs mostly a quick pick and run store. It‚Äôs slightly hidden as the store in slightly inside the building. All the cupcakes were really well displayed. 

Food: (4/5)
Great selection of cupcakes that come in various colours and flavours. They have an excellent cupcake packaging boxes. These are much better than Glen‚Äôs where there isn‚Äôt something to hold the cupcake in place. There was also a great deal on buy 10 get 2 free. We took 12 different ones and binged them all. Most of the are very good save for the odd one here and there.

Summary: (4/5)
Best place to stop and grab some cupcakes to take to a friends house or for a casual meeting.']

address: Shop 2, Basement, SRCC Complex, Swami Vivekananda Road, Halasuru, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
['I was cravings for pizza so i ordered from this outlet of yumlane. Order Pesto chicken tikka pizza  for midnight meal. The crust was too much soft with full of cheese and soft chicken on it. Packing were excellent in box.', "Yumlane pizza has become one of my favorite place to order pizza's recently. They used high quality cheese in the pizza's and the base is also perfectly cooked which force me to order again and again from yumlane. My recommendation Chicken seek kebab pizza.", 'I had a feeling that this might be not so good, but the experience turned out to be good, with Bocconcini cheese margherita pizza which I tried it was much tastier and juicy which would definitely fill your empty stomach nicely. Must try Nut brownie also from dessert.', "Ever think to have pizza then yumlane is the place. It is one of my favorites place to have pizza's from. I recently ordered chicken seek kebab pizza from this outlet .The delievery came on time and packing was good which helps to keep food hot and fresh.", "We were having the pizza cravings so decided to order from yumlane . Food was really very awesome and we'll prepared . Base was not thick topping was good and service was also nice. I had chicken seek kebab pizza and I will recommend every one to try chicken seek kebab pizza from yumlane.", "Order Bocconcini cheese margherita pizza  and  Craramelized onion & feta cheese pizza from their premium pizza. Toppings were up to the marks and much juicy...pizza base was so thin and soft like it's not even there.... You made my day . Thank you yumlane.", 'I ordered Basil pesto paneer pizza and it was an absolute delight, a pizza is more than enough for two people. Along with pizza I had Molten Choco burst which was a desserty heaven, a must have.

Overall, it was a good experience, loaded with a lot of cheese and sweetness. Recommended.

Delivery- 5/5

Quantity- 5/5

Quality- 5/5', 'Yumlane pizza- Peri Peri chicken Pizza, Pesto chicken tikka pizza and Hazelunt chocolate cake jar got delivered at my doorsteps today .. I loved the pizza totally.. It mesmerized my taste buds.. plenty toppings upon the pizza.. Pizza for me goes 5/5.', 'This place makes amazing pizzas. I simply loved their pizzas. They have variety of vegetarian as well as non vegetarian pizza. Order combo of peri peri paneer pizza & chicken tikka pizza along with coke which contains veg and non veg pizza both. Taste was amazing. Thank you yumlane.', 'Yumlane serves delicious pizza and some mouth watering sides. I seriously loved the Bocconcini cheese margherita pizza from veg option. It was perfect spicy and crunchy. The food was properly packed and it was airtight and fresh before it reached me.']

address: 195, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, No Alcohol Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Andhra Meal', 'Mutton Biryani', 'Chicken Biryani', 'Andhra Biryani', 'Chilli Chicken', 'Andhra Thali', 'Butter Naan']
reviews:
["Never ever go there when they are about to close!

Ambience:
It was welcoming, we booked our table and he called us waiter came with a smile took our order, it was crowned yet is was peaceful!

Food:
We took meals, in which we got Pappu, sambhar, rasam, majjige, palya, sweet, hapla, unlimited rice, unlimited everything!
Taste too was super yummy!!

Service:
We went there around 3PM it was open till 3:30PM we were having nice food! We enjoyed having there everything was very good until the clock ticked 3:30!!!
If we asked for rice, they had a rude face.
Sambhar, the same rude face!
Even while paying our bills!!
Seriously?
If you can't treat us well stop people coming inside from 2:30 why ull get us in and treat rudely??
Disappointed", 'Ambience is good.

It is one of the great restaurants in the city.

We enjoyed here a typical Andhra style food recipes which was delicious in taste.

The food has a peculiar taste which we loved.

Staff is courteous and helpful.', "This is one of the best Andhra restaurant in Bangalore..I loved their veg meal, it includes rice, daal, sambhar,rasam,one dry sabzi,chatni,papad,curd, butter milk and payasam..it's quite cost effective and service also very prompt .. The only thing is dry sabzi could be one more", 'Great and soulful food is what you will get here.

Superfast service they will not make you wait for anything.
Should build your appetite and then go there as it will suffice all cravings.

Apart from the Thali try there Chicken chilly a very unique preparation yet delicious.

A must visit place.', "Biryani > Pizza person? Well then you've got to try the lip smacking flavour filled biryani from Nagarjuna ü§§ the mouth watering starters and sides are an add on to the biryani üíØ Head to Nagarjuna for some amazing Andhra style cuisine!
üìç Place - Nagarjuna, Indiranagar
üí∞ Cost - Rs.800 for 2 people üîπ Rate -5/5", "Andhra cuisine is my all time favorite cuisine! Nagarjuna serves everything full of flavors in the exact right amount. The Andhra meals and chicken biryani are my favorite. You will definitely be food high after having the power packed lunch. However, ambiance wise and service wise the place is not too much appealing. Since it's almost always crowded, you usually have to share the table which is sort of a negative point. But it's worth it."]

address: 617, 2nd Main, 1st Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["This is one awesome place to drink juices and keep yourself healthy. They make healthy juices where theyas well.

The cups they use incase you want to take it away is recyclable including it's caps.

I had tried few juices and salads and sandwiches among which,

The juicemaker special milkshake: this is one of the best healthy milkshakes you will get, it is so yummy and healthy. Definitely try it here.

Pomegranate juice: This was good, no extra added sugar, so you can be sure that you are a step closer to living healthy.

Salad: The salads here are good. It contains a lot of vegetables, fruits and it tastes fine.

Sandwich: The sandwich is also good here. It is healthy and yummy.

Do try this place for sure if you plan to live healthy and this place has an awesome ambience. It is big enough for you to come in groups even.

Food and drinks : 4.8/5
Service and ambience: 4.9/5", "Love their concept of No plastic. They don't use plastic at all.
Also, juices, milkshakes and salads are absolutely healthy.
My personal favourite has to be the juice maker special milkshake. Do try this here.
Pomegranate juice , Avocado milkshake is also amazing.
Salad is absolutely healthy and tasty at the same time. Loved it as well.
Also tried their sandwich.
I would love to visit often.
Rating - 5/5"]

reviews:
['', '', 'Was in search for a good delivery place for Bengali food in Indira Nagar and came across \xa0Kasol Cafe while browsing on Zomato. The owner was really helpful in catering to my party needs within a short period of time and even arranged for sweet dishes which were not part of his menu. \xa0
The taste of all dishes were as close to the ones available in Kolkata.
I would surely reccomened \xa0this outlet for wholesome, value for money and tasty Bengali food.', '', '', 'This is one of my favourite bengali restaurants in Bangalore. Whenever i miss kolkata, i head to this place.Thumbs up to the taste, quality, and pricing. Owner is very friendly and open for feedbacks from the customers.
Overall, an awesome place for authentic bengali food.', '', "It's not often you're treated with great food that breaks the boundaries your taste buds are accustomed to. Kaushik's food is innovative and exemplary in taste and aesthetics. An explosion of flavours that I simply cannot stop raving about! address: 191, 1st Floor, Chinmaya Mission Hospital Road, Hoysala Nagar, Below Metro Station, Indiranagar, Bengalore
more_info: Delivery Only, Sugar Free Options,
reviews:
['A place that‚Äôs specialises in coffee, ordered their Classic Cold Coffee. 
Received it in great condition without any leaks or spills. 
Loved the packing, so colourful and hassle free.
The coffee I received was chilled just the right amount, good drink but has steep prices.', "SLAY is fast becoming my go to place for coffee delivery. They have excellent flavors and the coffee is available sugarless and with extra caffeine. What's not to like.

Plus I love the packaging. It stays hot for more than 30 mins inside that cool box. So I'm in no rush to have it as soon as it arrives. Perfect for a foodie like me who wants to click pictures first.

I'm going to keep ordering from SLAY Coffee. What about you?", "Being a coffee lover I always prefer to go to a coffee shop and then have a cup of coffee or make it my own instead of ordering online.But there were days when I really crave for a cup of strong coffee and feel too lazy to make my own.Then I heard about this new coffee delivery joint..So thought of give it a shot. And guess what I was so surprised by their packaging, and also the quality of coffee.Its too good. Price is a lil higher than usual coffees but that's totally worth..
I have tried hazel nut latte, skinny cold coffee and Madras mud. So if you're a coffee lover too, do try SLAY..I am sure you won't be dissapointed!!"]

address: 26, ESI Hospital Road, HAL 2nd Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Vegan Options, All Day Breakfast, Desserts and Bakes, Table booking recommended, Keto Options, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Love the interior and overall hospitality of the place.
Being an avid tea lover this tea cafe is a total blessing.
Place will surely remind you of neighbourhood CAFES in abroad with big glass framed windows, warm ceiling suspended lights and cozy sitting arrangements. True to it‚Äôs name this place has great tea assortment for those who loves trying out tea flavours across the globe .

One can try both healthy and conventional food options with great service. Only thing I felt was missing was the food presentation.Specially when you order food worth 700 bucks should look worth the price. Parking is also one more issue .

If you care less  about the pain points it worth every penny.', 'Several visits later ‚Äì I finally review this place. Been coming here since 2015, never disappoints. I primarily come here for the fancy teas, the peaceful setting. Very occasionally have I eaten the food here ‚Äì but it‚Äôs always been good.

I‚Äôve tried so many teas here ‚Äì I can‚Äôt even recall all the names.

Some that I remember ‚Äì and can highlight were good ‚Äì are ‚Äì

1.	Egyptian Peppermint (Has to be one of my favorites ‚Äì very refreshing)

2.	Strawberry Rose

3.	Organic Desi Stress Blocker

4.	Japanese Matcha Green

5.	Hummus and Pita

6.	Summery Pasta

7.	Chicken Parmigiana (My friend tried this ‚Äì said it was good)

Will hopefully keep coming back as and when I can.', "If you like your teas fine, infinitea is the place to indulge in some of finest. I personally wish their selection was wider but that's just me. A pot of tea sets you back 200 bucks on an average and that's totally worth it for the tea you get in exchange. the food's good but sadly on the pricey side (a plate of fries, slice of banana bread and 2 crostinis will altogether cost you upwards of 700 rupees. But you come to infinitea for the tea and the good ambiance and the kind service and for that top marks.", 'Lovely little place. Generally go there for a calm weekend evening.
Large variety of teas. The food is equally good.

My personal favorites are there refreshing mint tea and chilli cheese toast.

Even Bengali samosa and pizza are pretty unique.

Must visit.
Make sure you go at a time when you expect less crowd else it becomes too noisy to enjoy your tea.', 'Infinitea is one of my favorite places to go. I love the ambience and the quiet. Quite the aesthetic little cafe with a beautiful selection of tea and a staggering menu for health freaks from keto to Paleo... This is the place to be. During my visit I had the tropical Fruit Tea which was a dream and the estate and caprese salads. I never knew that apples and chicken would be such a good combination but infinitea put it together really well. Infinitea definitely has my vote']

address: 618, 2nd Floor, Near Chicco, 12th Main, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating, Kid Friendly, Smoking Area, Buffet,
reviews:
['One of the best Punjabi restaurants in bangalore.. Loved the malai Chicken.. Mutton was average.. Pista lassi was thick and yummy.. Must try..
Service was bit slow.. Ambience is good..

Food-4 Service-3.5 Ambience-4', 'Food was awesome. Staff was excellent. Rahul was extremely courteous and gave great recommendations and served everything with smile. Lassie was amazing and so was gelawati kebab.', 'Wow, perfect Dhaba vibes with the pinch of Punjabi taste in everything they do. Located on floor below Sly Granny, this place had the best North Indian I‚Äôve tried in Bangalore. 

We ordered: 
- Dal Makhani
- Mix Veg
- Tandoori Roti
- Lassi

Dal Makhani could not have been better. Also, the utensils are heavy so try not to lift much!', 'Awesome experience starting from ambience to food to the people serving us.. The galouti kebab was just lip smacking. Butter chicken at its best.. The tender chicken so juicy and full of flavor along with the tandoori roti was just a treat. I found the cocktail which was the paan one a bit less strong.. Felt that the alcohol content was a bit less but still I would go for 5 stars for an overall experience.. And Anil was our host.. I would call him host coz he was so courteous and polite.. Cheers. Recommend this a 100%', 'Just had dinner there as we got late night cravings for butter chicken. I have been to the Marathalli outlet but the Indiranagar one has even better food.

I loved the butter chicken here and the garlic tomato cheese naan is just off the charts.

And the chhoti glassiyan is a wonderful option. All restaurants should have mocktail samplers. I loved the rangeela (lime plus passion fruit), the aam panna and the shikanji.

And the service was really good. Prompt and sweet servers who made sure we had a great meal. All in all the best place for North Indian cuisine in Indiranagar.']

address: 24, Banaswadi Main Road, Maruthi Seva Nagar, Banaswadi, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Basically tried this eatery because I wanted to see what Chicken Fries are. I am not sure whether I would go for it again, but it was not that bad. It had this really funny taste and the fried batter outside was all crumbly. I did not like the overall experience. Burger was fine though. Enough lettuce, enough Mayo and the fresh bun. Delivery guy placed the Coke on the hot parcel of Burger and Fries, when this order reached me, by the law of transfer of heat, everything was lukewarm. :)

So in short, it was ok.', 'Paneer crust Burger is tasty, all veggie ppl shuld try.', 'Waste of money.', 'ordered online.. nothing much to say
not worthy', 'Some strange oil odour .. not good quality may be', 'delivery were very very late', 'worst service ever', 'good', "Order was delivered very late.. delivery guy attitude was too worse.. 

 zomato customer care and helpless and restaurant won't receive the calls to check by ourself", 'Terrible.']

address: 73, Kamaraj Road, Commercial Street, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Happiness on a plate.... The Tibetan Thali at Utse.... A gem of a place in an obscure part of Commercial street... Discovered it courtesy a friend n boy am so glad... This was the Tibetan Thali with a scrumptious meat pie, amazing steamed momos, a simple potato dish with fresh herbs, fresh spinach tossed with garlic, a light soya sauce based chicken dish with glass noodles and a hearty delicious soup... It was all comfort food presented is one fabulous Thali... With decor to match the amazing food... With traditional Tibetan chants playing at the background, no sound of the maddening traffic outside ... This tiny oasis in middle of the city is like a tiny piece of Tibet in Namma Urru!!!', "Found this hidden gem in the buzz of Bangalore's commercial street!

This place has some amazing dishes on its menu and is a must visit for Asian Cuisine lovers!
Dish 1: Himalayan Chopseuy 4.5/5
This is the only non-American chopseuy that has not disappointed till date! Its a moist creamy chicken gravy on crispy noodle base and is super tasty
Dish 2: Chicken Thukpa 4.5/5
It's a classic dish and full of flavours. Those who haven't tried thukpa before, its noodles in a flavourful chicken broth!

Dish 3: Fragrant mushroom & chicken fried rice 3.5/5
It was a decent friend rice with chicken and mushrooms
Dish 4: Thai glass noodles 4/5
Thin glass noodles in a thick gravy with veggies

Dish 5: Manchow Soup 4/5
Taste was amazing but quantity was very less for a by 2 soup. Adviceable to take full portion

Service is a bit slow but ambience is good! They also serve a thali. Looking forward to have it next time :)", "Looking at the ratings and also since it was nearby we wanted to visit this place from a very long time. But, it was not as expected.!

In case, ou prefer some personal time with peaceful and calm ambence, this is the place. You can spend some qiality, quite time here. We love the Tibetian decoraton which is photogenic.

In food we ordered Chicken hot & Sour- which was thick and spicy. Chicken momo with peanut sauce is a Must try.
In starters Sweet & Sour Chicken which we expected to be dry, was a gravy. The taste was sweet with pine apple slices in it. We were disssapointed.! Among noodles, veg Dan dan mein pan fried noodles was tasty with good amount of veggies. This was appetizing.

The food is served & managed by a humble Old man.
One suggestion about service- they need a dedicated Staff as we had communication problem while ordering food. Also thy don't have sufficient parking which has to be taken care of.", 'Amazing and Authentic.
It is a very simple and quiet restaurant. The decor is authentic and soothing. We were served by an old couple who were pleasant and friendly.
We ordered Tibetan set meal. It had soup, momos, rice, spinach salad, potatoes and Tibetan style curry. Thoroughly enjoyed each dish. The presentation was also good. We also had butter tea, which was very unique with its salty flavor. For dessert, we had chocolate spring rolls. They were okayish, there could have been more chocolate filling.
It is one of the best places to try Tibetan cuisine. Everything about this place is authentic. It is not very expensive given the quality and the quantity. One of the must visit places.

Decor - 4.5/5
Food - 4/5
Service - 4/5
Price - 4.5/5', 'Reviews of this place looked very promising but the food was such a disappointment... Ordered the chicken fried momos, chicken American chopsuey and honey chilli chicken - all of them were bad! The chicken momos had no chicken in them and the cover was tooo thick, the chopsuey was just too sweet and unedible and the honey chilli chicken was also too sweet - very honey heavy! Such a disappointment...']

address: 62, 2nd Floor, Solitaire, 1st A Main, Koramangala 7th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Chilli Pork', 'Beef Chutney', 'Smoked Pork Ribs', 'Pork Meat', 'Wine', 'Beef Pickle', 'Pork Momo']
reviews:
["True Naga cuisine in the heart of koramangala.
I discovered this little place that's easy to miss one fine day while scrolling through the streets.
I decided to go in and try the smoked pork which is prepared with sun dried bamboo shoot and garlic.
They also have beef pickle which I bought for a takeaway.
And I tried the rice with pork which is one of their best recipes!
You can taste the bamboo fragrance in every dish and a quaint little eatery. Overall a different but good experience.
Won't be liked by all taste buds though.", 'Went for a late night dinner but unfortunately, we were quite late as they were taking last orders. We ended up ordering a plate of smoked pork and another plate of fresh pork thali, both Naga style. The food was tasty and spicy. However, the smoked pork was a bit chewy. The place though has a decent interior, the seating was not that comfortable. Just select a normal chair for your meal.']

address: 1138, 13th Main Corner, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['When i was on hunt for desi north indian chat taste , i came across this place. This place isn‚Äôt only amazing for sweets and indian snacks ,but also specifically great for bhalla papdi , pav bhaji etc. I would refer this place if u r looking for taste of north.', 'A great place in Indiranagar to have some great North Indian breakfast with a cup of Kadak Chai. Tried their chole kulche , puri sabji and Ginger tea.
Well they have a collection of nice namkeens as well. Even the jalebi was mouthwatering', 'Must visit place for anyone looking for some yummy fast food...One must go for a different experience all together if you are a fast food lover..Have been here couple of times and it has never disappointed me..My wife got parcel as well and even in that the quality was the same..Packaging was quite neatly done..Kudos!', 'Staff and Ambience : Zomato online order so no comments on this.

Food : Ordered normal Kachori. It did look premium with quality filling. The two types of chutneys were very good.

Price : Acceptable for the quality served.

Recommendation : Recommended.', "Pretty decent and hygienic chaat and snacks place in Indiranagar. It has multiple sections. The sweets and mithai section is small, but it looked like a decent selection. Chaats and the dining section is where you can sit and eat.\xa0

The pav bhaaji is amazing, so is chhole kulche and chhole batoore. Gives you proper Haldiram's feels. Some of the chats are nice, could be a tad better though, but this is subjective. The saunf-supari section is pretty cool, very nice selection, we ended up buying a few items from here before leaving. Staff could be more courteous though.Quite a cool joint, definitely warrants multiple visits. :)", 'The festival season sets your mood for the different type of Indian sweets and taking this opportunity I decided to order the besan ladoo from Bhartiya Jalpan.\xa0

The ladoos were promptly delivered and extremely tasty. What I like most was that the gram flour was well roasted during the process of making the ladoo. However, I did feel the ladoos could be a little less sweeter than what the were.\xa0

Will go back to try their other goodies.
                                                diningtales.com', 'This place actually satisfies my North Indian taste buds. I have always found it difficult to get authentic North Indian Chaats in Bangalore. This place is real delight when it comes to that. Also, I love the samosas and kachori there. This place also offers a wide range of sweets, do try the khowa malpua, it can easily give anyone a feeling of ecstasy.', 'A good place for vegetarian food. The place is always crowded be it weekdays or weekends. The price is quiet high for the food but the quality of food is good. The panipuri is good and tasty but costs 70 rs for 6 pieces which is very costly. Had the dahi bhalla chaat from this place, the taste was good and quantity was fine. The price for the chaat is 105 rs. Overall a good experience. They have large number of snacks ranging from dhokla to chole kulche.', 'This family restaurant is never a disappointment! Food like so good and affordable. The samosa chaat was really good. Also the paneer paratha. Their Ginger masala tea is their speciality. Weekends are tough to get a seat.', 'It was one of my favourite place for snacks and jalebi until i ordered online from swiggy. The jalebi was cold and dry. I ordered papad bhruji which was soggy and pathetic. Waste of money. They are fooling customers by wrong images in the menu.']

Change the quality .. Hope you will take action.', 'nice quantity']

more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['As a part of food review program, received Newyork cheesecake and Chocolate Truffle along with Choco Lava cake.
The packaging was neat.
Very rarely you get to taste a perfectly baked cheesecake and this was really good.
Chocolate truffle was moist. Too much chocolate overload though. Perfect for all the chocolate lovers out there.
Best of all, was the choco lava cake. It was perfect!

I have tried multiple items from their menu earlier as well.
If you have crazy craving for desserts, this place is a must try.']

reviews:
['I ordered Tandoori chicken. The chicken was stale and smelt really bad. This was my second attempt attrying out tayabbs, and it turned out horrible again.', 'I ordered few items for door delivery. Instead of paneer tikka roll they delivered Paneer tikka. Instead of chicken tikka roll they delivered chicken baida. Taste is ok, but the quantity was less. We were left hungry after having dinner. Not recommended.', '', 'It is a very nice hotel. Food is very tasty.butter chicken Biriyani is a must have. We had mutton Kali Mirch.... Quantity and quality of mutton was great', "Location: on 80feet Indiranagar opposite to BSNL, prime location easily visible.
Ambience: A basic setup, no fancy decorations. It has outdoor as well as indoor sitting. Accepts only Cash/ Card. They completely rely on the taste of their food.
Food: Huge set of menu items which are mostly quick bites. Specialized in rolls and keemas. We had ordered Chicken Ismaili roll, Mutton keema combo. It's a very affordable place. Coming to the taste, the roll was average, expected it to be more juicy and succulent but not bad either. The mutton keema is a must try. It's cooked and fried perfectly with correct amount of spices and flavors.

Staffs: 4/5
Service: 3/5
Ambience : 3/5
Food: 4.5/5", 'Asked for extra mayo in roll and it wasn‚Äôt provided', 'I ordered paneer kalimirch tikka and this is what they have delivered. Absolutely disgusting in taste as well as quantity! Will never ever order or recommend this food joint to anyone.', "Giving full star because the food is great and this place is open till late. This is a must try place especially for non vegetarians. Don't expect an awesome ambience.
Go for Mutton Baida.", 'A great food joint for Tandoori lovers ! I have been eating and ordering from here from last 3 years and they have hardly dissatisfied me.. I love their barbecue chicken starters and rolls.. 
Must Try:
Chicken Reshmi Kebab
Chicken Haryali Kebab
Chicken Achari kebab 
Chicken malai kebab 
And my fav Chicken Kalimirch !

Ambiance is decent not that great, mostly for casual dine out with friends !
 Staff is courteous and friendly & prompt service!', 'Craving Rolls?? This is your rescue and trust me the perfect one. After a shot of Dj Suketu , we were looking out to curb the hunger pangs and Tayabbs happened. We had the Chicken Cheema jumbo roll and believe me i wished they had less chicken in there. Every bite will keep you engaged with the taste and the best part is they have wheat rolls. A Thumbs Up!! to the joint.']

reviews:
['Love the ambience and the food here . Been here thrice .\xa0 The lotus stem was irresistible\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0.', 'Very delicious food and courteous staff. Liked the ambience and the music. Maki sushi and dimsums are a must try. We were served by Malika who was really sweet and polite. Looking forward to visit again.', 'Mamagoto is one of the best Asian restaurant in the city and it surely lives upto its name. The menu is totally Asian and loved the dishes here especially their turnip cakes. Other recommended dishes are :
üî∏Crispy Lotus Stem
üî∏Basil Cups
üî∏Smoky Tacos
üî∏ Asparagus Tempura
üî∏California Roll
üî∏ Rainbow Chicken Dumplings

In the mains, try the Khao Suey and the Mamagoto Goreng. The Rice bowls are fantastic and filling. The Hawkers flat noodles is a good option if you are going for individual mains.
Try the banana split or mango sticky rice in desserts.
                                                foodndestinations.com', 'The place has a comfortable vibe to it, with courteous staff. They have an interesting menu, with lots of options across the Asian soectrum. We ordered Siracha maki rolls and veg dimsum platter for starters (really enjoyed them), lemon iced teas, and for the Main course - Chicken pad thai and Chiang Mai station noodles veg. The portion sizes were very generous, we actually had to pack up half the main courses and take back home. This is a great place for groups of friends or family. This is, however, an expensive place. Our total bill was 2400‚Çπ (despite the fact that we got one main dish complimentary due to an offer).', 'ZOMATO GOLD: ‚ùå
PRICE: ‚Çπ‚Çπ‚Çπ‚Çπ

--------------------------

1. Prawns tempura: MUST HAVE . ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

5. MAMAS HOME MADE CHOCOLATE CAKE: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êüòçüòçüòçüòçüòç. one of the best DESSERT I HAVE EVER HAD. you can see it in the first picture', "Okay trust me it's expensive, but then again your experience with the food served there is gonna be definitely worth the penny they charge. The portion sizes are decent enough for 2sharing.
The food was very flavoursome and very nicely presented. The service was slighly on the slower side as we went on a weekday and there was not much of a crowd but still ended up waiting for 30mins before any of our orders came to our table.

Anyways apart from that glitch, the food was perfect and we were very happy customers. Definitely recommend this place", 'I‚Äôve always wanted to visit Mamagato because I‚Äôve heard a lot about it. But sadly Mamagato did not live up to my expectations. The Sushi platter was quite nice and the quantity was quite decent. But the Pad Thai and Ramen were quite disappointing. address: 3155, Opposite EST Hospital Road, HAL Stage 2, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Misal Pav', 'Vada Pav', 'Mutton Thali', 'Pandhra Rassa', 'Puran Poli', 'Chicken Thali', 'Roti']
reviews:
['It is a simple and cute joint. Only 12-15 people can fit at a time. It gets over crowded quickly as there is no place to sit. 

Coming to our order, We ordered 1 Gala thalis, Misal Pav, Sabudana Vada, 3 Lassis. 

1 Veg Gala thalis, was good in size and was tasty with 3 chapathys ,2 curries, rasam, Solkadi, Papad, Kadi and Sweet which is around 160/- each.

Sabudana wada was tasty, 2 big pieces with Yoghurt and Green Chutney(we asked for it).

Misal pav was good (wud have been lil hotter) 

Batata wada, wow.. Do not think, just order.

Lassis were good in size and taste.

A lil more space and a lil hygiene is needed 

Food was good ( lil more chilies pls ;-) )

I recommend this place for snacking.
Snacks are very tasty and good worth the money.
Home made taste.', "Being a half Maharashtrian. And spending all summers in Mumbai. My love for it's food never died. After relocating to Bangalore. It was very difficult to settle in and being a foodie. It was difficult to find places that serve food to my taste. After some suggestions I tried the food here.

The best misal pav and kheema pav I've tasted. The kheema pavs aroma took me back to Mumbais lanes and got back umpteen memories.

I also tried the sea food. Loved the fish fry and crab fry was a steal deal. Super spicy and yet finger licking good.

Also loved the soul kadhi. Was a tad bit spicy for a drink. But went really well with the thaali.

Also not to forget the crispy and scrumptious sabudana wada. And the wada pav. For me the garlic dry chutny was the best :)

Head to this place to try some lip smacking thaali and some tasty starters..", "Most of the people in Bangalore might have heard how famous the suryawanshi restaurant is. So I decided to try them out. It's a very small place with very friendly and courteous staff. First, I had the sabudana vada which is cooked sabudana made like a tikki and fried, which is very great.
Then I had the misal pav, which is served with Freshly chopped onions and lemon wedge. It's really spicy though.
Then I had the rawa fried prawns which is also just amazing and a must try dish here, the seasoning of the crumbing is also on point. Also, I had the river pomfret fry which was perfectly marinated and had amazing flavours.
Moving on, the mutton keema pav which is basically minced mutton in a thick gravy served along side pav Or buns was also very nice,hot and fresh.
To end the meal, I had the puran poli otherwise known as Holige in kannada which is like a sweet chapati with loads of ghee. It is just fantastic. Anyone craving for Marathi food, this is a place to visit!", "This small food joint in Indiranagar, serves authentic Maharashtrian food. They have multiple options and varieties for both veg and non veg thali's.
Their sabudana vada is a must try.
Though they can work a bit on their service, else this is a good place to explore a different cuisine.", "What an amazing experience it was to be at Suryawanshi! It's a small outlet with limited seating but the staff is courteous, friendly and will make efforts to make you feel like home.
To begin with, I loved the sabu dana vada - soaked Sago pearls deep fried in the shape and size of galauti kebab served with a really nice coriander dip.
Followed by the rava coated prawns that are deep fried. You can also get a hearty portion of Pomfret coated with rava and deep fried. They also have bangda and surmai fishes available.
For main course, I had the keema roti - basic mutton keema served alongside chapatis.
To end with, I had the puran poli - an Indian flat bread stuffed with a sweet lentil filling made from skinned spilt bengal gram/chana dal and jaggery. In marathi language, the sweet filling is called as puran and the bread is called as poli.
Also consider their thalis, they're on the higher side so it's best you share them.
Loved the experience. Truly marathi authentic food.", 'We visited this place during Ganesh Chaturthi, although the tables were all occupied we got a place to sit within no time. It is little congested when it comes to seating arrangement but the well lit decor, corner roadside view makes up for it. Coming to the food I have no complaints regarding the taste. We ordered Veg thali which had very limited and simple items. The thali was not even worth half the price of what they had kept. Hence the rating.', 'As it is known for amazing seafood, so had been over dinner to this small joint located in Double road Indiranagar, next to Street Stories. Tried out the fish thali, Pomfret Fry, Surmai fry & the anda masala burji with Pav.

Great food indeed.', 'A small place that serves Maharashtra cuisine in indiranagar.
Can accommodate about 12 people at go. Service can be a bit a slow if he is running full house.

Had aam ras with puranpoli and poori with aamras..

Both tasted good. Best part being both were made fresh and served hot.
Pooranpoli stuffing was really great. With perfectly cooked dal and right amount of sweetness to compliment aamras. And that generous dose of ghee added to the magic .

Pooris were hot cryspy and fluffy.

Sabudana vada was awesome too. Crypy hot n mildly spicy ..']

address: 54 MSK Plaza, 2nd floor, Defence colony, 100 feet road, indiranagar
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Wine, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['I have always loved Cafe Max, their food and ambience and vibe. Today I was especially surprised because they were super crowded but I still got my drink very quickly. Thanks to Biren who went out of his way to make sure I have a lovely experience. Hope to visit soon! Highly recommend this place :)', "Oh the Salmon, easily the best salmon I've tasted in a long time. The cook was perfect. Love the cozy atmosphere and the service. Their cheese cakes and pies are definitely worth trying. Can be heavy on the wallet.", 'This is a cafe on top of the German max Muller institute with no markings below. The place had a very formal cafe charm. Hot chocolate, coffee are accompanied with a salted cookie.
The breakfast menu is quite elaborate. Loved the eggs with the bacon!
Hot chocolate is pretty good!', 'This places serves Italian and German Cuisine. 
Food: we tried chicken strangonoff which was ok.Beef roulade fillet was good.Zaragozza sizzler in this dish the meat is soft and the flavour is sweet it was fine.Chicken 
Schnitzel was not good it was to blan.
Drinks:we had red sangria which was sweet and nice.
Ambience:it‚Äôs a rooftop,this place has a got a retro  vibe.
Service:extremely slow, we got our food almost after an hour of placing our order.', 'A cute little place for some European cuisine üòçüòç The Tiramisu was divine ü§§ü§§ also love their selection of wines. Ambience is so perfect for a date night.', 'Visited this place on friends‚Äô recommendation. Calm cozy place but was unable to impress me with the food...
I liked the Classic pasta or I would say this dish was a saviour for us.', 'Had a lovely little vegetable sandwich with potato wedges from this place. The sandwich tasted pretty nice, nothing extraordinary though. The wedges were still crispy.', 'Its been years since I have been wanting to visit Max Caf√©. Finally made it for breakfast yesterday.

A cheerful terrace in the terrace of Max Muller Bhavan where Goethe Institute is housed.

For sure it has this airy and an abundant vibe as you enter.

We ordered for Bockwurst grilled sausage, Spanish chili chicken sandwich with multigrain bread, cappuccino and water melon juice.

The Bockwurst grilled sausage was good, but somehow was bland and lacked the mild white pepper paprika flavors it is known for. In fact, was less on salt too.

The sandwich was fantastic. The grilled chicken was terrific, and the bread was fresh. In fact, the best part of our breakfast was the combination of the sandwich and coffee. The watermelon juice was nice too.

Wanted to try their blackberry cheesecake but were in a hurry. Will try the next time.

Service is impressive. The staff is very polite, courteous and quick.

Price is reasonable .', 'Had been to this place a couple of times and must say the food here speaks for itself..

Simple cafe atmosphere, not here for the decor or ambience. Very casual and friendly vibes.

Food is what steals the show here.. their continental cuisine is yum..

Hope to visit again soon.']

address: 54, 1st Floor, Monarch Plaza, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['This is a cozy cafe next to Monarch hotel, I visited this spot with a friend to have tea, we ordered Thai Maggie, Iranian tea and Adhrak Chai. The outside seating and the taste of Thai Maggie did make that evening perfect for us. I so loved the small copper chai containers.

Overall- A cozy spot to enjoy good chai and the Bangalore weather.', "Tea trails is a cosy place to stop by the hustling street, especially if you are a tea lover. Or even if you aren't, this is the right place to try something new.
The cafe is situated in a complex, at a corner where you can be seated with the road side view.

In case you don't know much about tea and what to order. They are kind and helpful. The service is neither too quick nor too late.

Most of the items in their menu is delicious. You should try the Tea Maggi!! And all the kinds of tea. Kashmiri Kahwa became my favourite. We tried the other dishes, Chilli Cheese Bruschetta, Thai Maggi, Paneer Bhurji Paav, Cheese Pizza, Pastas, Cheese Balls, Nachos and ohhhh!, the Chole Kulche is a must too!

It is a perfect place to catch up with a friend and try different flavours of tea together!

Cheers with the Chai!", "A perfect place for tea lovers..And in case if you're not a tea lover then also you should visit this small cafe..why? Because of their amazing food..mostly they offer snacks..For tea I would recommend rose and lavender tea, which is very good..The aroma is divine and it's so lite..And for iced tea I loved Macha latte..it's so refreshing..Now coming to food have tried Pao and paneer burji, white and red sauce pasta, cheese fritters, Pao bhaji, cheese toast, Thai style Maggi, tea Maggi..Yes you heard right there serve tea Maggi and tea sundae as well.So it's a worth try ..It's not hard to locate this place, it's on the main road, just beside the monarch hotel..So I would be recommending this place if you are in and around brigade road .And this whole September month they are offering 25% discount on total bill..

Ambience : 4.5/5
Food :5/5
Service :5/5
Value for money :5/5", 'Tea trails is just a perfect when it comes to good tea and also good food, they have a long list of tea choices which we can try out and almost everything tastes amazing. coming to the ambience of the cafe , it in the centre of Brigade Road and the view is just perfect. When it came to food, everything was so good, they serve vegetarian food and had long menu. We started with fries and nachos which went pretty good and tried out the pasta, pizza and few desserts. They make their own pizza spread so it pretty good. The overall experience at tea trails was amazing, recommend to every chai lovers.', 'To experience the complete veg food, this place on bridge road has opened. You get the best experience with tea here with a beautiful presentation. I got in love with the vibes of this place. And the food is too good.
The basics but worth trying. Also they use a very good amount of cheese in everything which makes is absolutely a WIN.', 'Located bang opposite U.S Polo Association (USPA) Showroom Brigade Road.This cafe is located on 1st floor of the facade next to Monarch Hotel. You can‚Äôt miss the bright lit up Board inviting you to step in and try this cafe. 
This cafe is warm and has both indoor and outdoor seating. Both has its own plus points. You can see some steaming chai  in making and soak in the aroma to brighten up your mood being seated inside.On the other side the outdoor bar stool kinda seating overlooking the Busy Brigade Road makes it a different experience all together.

They got great milk/ non milk tea selection served hot/cold .Interesting savouries to accompany your tea. Do try their Tea Maggi, I could literally feel the flavour of tea while gulping down each bite of it.', 'A cafe that focuses a lot on the promotion of tea, has a lot of varieties of tea. The food here is quite exemplary. We had quite a few items here last evening. Mr. Bharath was very kind and courteous. The Fondue Pav Bhaji very well conceived tasted great. The thin crust Three Cheese Pizza was very fluffy. The Cheese Chilli Bruschetta, Tak-a-Tak Fries, Nachos, Cheese Fritters, TT Special Khakra Pizza and Arabiatta Pasta were all tasty. The umpteen varieties of tea stole the limelight in the evening.']

address: 4032, 100 Feet Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Near Domlur Bridge, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Nightlife, Outdoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['New Year

New Place

New App

Ringing in the new year, tried out the new place on the block Urban Deccan Pub. The starters blew our mind while we finished the gluttony by none other than Biriyani.

Seconding to what a foodie friend Nimish earlier mentioned this place should be called Udupi Deccan Pub. The Ghee roast, the Prawn thoka literally takes you thru the lanes of coastal Karnataka especially the Udupi belt. The Coorg style pork also was flavoursome though not from the same belt.

To add to the finishing touch we had the chicken biriyani which was served in a Potli. The biriyani was decent though lacked a certain punch which one would expect from the green masala.

Loved the ambiance and the friendliness of the staff which always adds to the whole experience.', "Urban Deccan Pub - located in Indiranagar. Has cosy dim ambience perfect for pub. Easy to reach even by bus. Staff is friendly. They have variety of dishes made in their own style. Also the signature cocktails worth to give try for.
Ordered Deccan Chips, Bisi Bele Poppers
Deccan Paneer Chilli for starters.

Ghee Roast Chicken, Yelagiri Chicken Lolipop
Tawa Fish for mains. Tawa fish was yummy.
Coorgi Style pork is also available.
Baked Moong dal Kuzhipaniyaram, Bengaluru Masala Pizza are their own specialities.
Potli Biriyani is udp spl. Idli Chinnavengaya Sambar is a variety found in idli.

Desserts:
Elaneer payasam pudding - must try
Ajji's Apple Crumble Rolls

Every item is worth to give a try and tastes yummy.", 'This beautiful place is blend of udupi Resturant & urban style cuisine inspired some of the places in Karnataka, Kerala, Tamilnadu and Andra. They have various veg and non veg starters. Deccan chips is definitely a  show stopper which made of malabar parata turned out to be munchies. Starters where really a twist and mouth watering. Totally the menu is on to give you homely feeling through food. Cocktails and mocktails are filled with freshness of coffee, syrups and many more. To talk about the sweet section you must try their signature elaneer payasam. Ambiance was üî• LIT. Light on your pockets. Highly recommended.', 'Really impressed with this new place at indhiranagar. So good to chill out and their food my good too yummy. I recently had been here and with couple of friends. The ambiance is so good perfect place to have fun in weekends and pubbing with great Cocktails and mocktails and lip smacking food.

Coming to what I loved is
Chicken Ghee Roast
Pork fry
Prawns
Pizzas
Deccan Chips
Elneer Paysam

I really had great time and totally enjoyed the food here please go visit this place üòäüòÅ', "Absolutely loved their menu. It's so unique and it was a very refreshing experience to try something new after a long time.

They have a lot of things shaped and inspired by South Indian cuisine like the glasses that some cocktails come in. They use filter coffee glasses for that.

Loved the following and they are a must try:

Deccan chips
Chicken lollipop
Quick gun Morgan
Anna by the beach
Elaneer payasam pudding
Potli chicken biryani

Overall an amazing new place with Innovative dishes and a retro touch .", "Do you become nostalgic when I talk about Proper Udupi Cuisine? Then visit this Super Dope place which has given this traditional food a Urban Touch.
Talking about food, Every Single dish that we tried is a master piece right starting from Urban Deccan Chips made up of Deep Fried Malabar Parotta with Podi Hummus their best seller and must try. Their Coorgi Pork is the best you find in the town, the melt in mouth pork with the Coorgi masala is to die for. The Potli Biryani is chef's special one of the must try.
Are you a Dessert Lover, then you got to wait after your main course to try their Eleneer Payasam (the Star Dish) and Gulabjamun Tiramisu. Don't Miss it.
Are you Fond of trying Cocktails, then don't give it a miss. UDP has some specially curated cocktails with even interesting names like Anna By the beach, Vo-co- co and many freshly cold brewed cocktails to try..", "After experiencing their curated menu with the South Indian touch and amazing fusion of all the ingredients in their food and drinks , this place has become one of my favorites !

They even have a page in their menu that describes items' meaning to make the correct choices while ordering.

I tried many cocktails and each one of them had a very unique taste with appropriate ingredients making them very smooth !

They have covered almost all the top flavors of South India in their drinks - Coffee , Curry leaves , Pickle , coconut blended perfectly with the alcohol base.

My favorites are : Vo Co-Co , Anna by the beach and Tam-Tam.

Food :

Podi Podi Hummus with Paratha Crisps - It goes well with your drinks and I guarantee you wont be able to stop munching on it.

Arbi Podimass- My second favorite after the chips.

Bisi Bele Poppers - Very unique. Must try.

Mini Dosa Tacos - Very good

Dessert :

Gulab Jamun Tiramisu - Must try

Elaneer Payasam Pudding - Very nice"]

["I ordered akki roti thali and butter milk. Rotis are missing. Wen I called hotel they are not reachable. Delivery boy said complain. After complaining also no action was taken. Cheaters don't order from this restaurant again.", '', 'I might have given zero if option was there.
1. If you order of something they will send something else.
2. Food quality and taste is so pathetic (not want to say), I just thrown it away.
3. Best part is no salt in curries which was like hell.
Never ever recommend to this.', 'It‚Äôs a place with daily menu and fresh food.  The holige/ Purab poli, is amazing(thin & not too sweet) and made fresh. So you can also see how it‚Äôs made. North Karnataka cuisine. Jowar roti must try. Very reasonable pricing. The best place for budget meal.', 'You must come here around 8 to taste the best Ragi rotti and Akki rotti..! Must try: Pickleüëçüëçüëç
Price is very very reasonable plus u get kadak rotti as well. Rice items are above average tastewise.', 'I like the food here - Uttara Karnataka style. Fresh, hot and cheap. Only thing is you have to literally stand on pavement and eat. They maintain good hygiene around the food, you can eat as many chapathis you want with the 2 curries of the day. There is fresh n yummy akki rotti that is made right in front of you. Then there is rice n rasam, all for a pittance.']

The food and games they offer will have me going back for more!"]

address: 649, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The place is near where I stay.. typical north Indian style chats and paratas you will get here. .they serve  the food hot. But I feel the place is lil unhygienic.', 'If you are craving for chaats and you're in the indiranagar area, you can drop in here. All you need to have with you is a taste for north and east Indian chaats and about Rs. 150/- for two people. 

This one is a small teeny weeny roadside eatery on CMH Rd (underneath the metro line) which had a limited menu but most items there are with a try.

The aloo parathas are really nice and so are the samosa chaat and dahi puri! Secondly their items are fairly priced and aren't too expensive. They prepare their fare in the open, hence you can see what they add to your chaat and ask them to add a little more of what you like and not add what you don't fancy. Th

This is one of the few outlets where the chaats and parathas don't have that "forced" south Indian flavours even where it's not required.

Overall- recommended at least once. You'll then visit more often!', 'This is a small place on the cmh road. Not only chaat items, their parathas are also very good. Tried alu chaat, paani puri and paratha. The taste was very good and price is also reasonable.', "This place is in the main road,very close to the bus stop and yes it's Calcutta famous chats!!!

The first time I was here,I really liked all that I tasted.Their masala Puri ,pani Puri etc.But the taste has changed now ,it is not the same anymore.", 'When I think of junk street food I just head to this place.
Best chats parathas n the pani puri wow üòãüòãüòã
All at the best price üòã u passing by CMH road make it a point to stop here for some lip smacking chats', 'One of the best street food joints I have come across. The panipuri was decent and the aloo chaat was delicious. We tried their samosas too which were also worth. A sure recommendation for a quick bite']

address: L-5,LIC Quartes,Jeevan Bhima Nagar Main Road, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['Consistently serves stale food when asked to deliver beyond 9pm. Its been multiple times this has occurred. I would suggest people to not order food from here.', "Rating: 3.5/5
Good food at a cheap price!
Not a fancy place for a dine out. Its clean but that's about it. I'd suggest takeout to be a better option. However the food is tasty and makes up for the shabby ambience. Tried their Kathi rolls on different occasions and most recently tried the laccha parantha with chicken. Mouth watering!
Try the food.
I recommend.", "Please don't confuse this place with the Delhi Nazaam's. - it's not the same. This place has one upi which is they can give you the option for egg white roles", "Got mutton kati kabab from this restuarant on 15 Dec 2018, the taste was horrible and doesn't look that is mutton. They used high amount of food colour and mutton pieces were beyond recognition.", "Had ordered double egg chicken egg roll from Nizaam's kaati rolls and Kebabs. The roll was delicious and pocket friendly too. Recommended for roll lovers. Cheers!", "sad food reheated with rotton rice the chicken chap was sad don't ever go for this restaurant", 'Excellent but too pricey!', 'it was bad roll ful of oily nd ful chill', 'Very poor quality of mutton pieces in biriyani. complete fraud and worst restaurant.', 'it was a bad experience. not properly made biryani']

Please dont serve food if you really dont want to', "1) Chicken butter masala was GOOD and tasty. CHICKEN well cooked and very SOFT but quantity very less. order full size because half size is not enough for one person.

2) Kerala parotta PERFECT not too dry and not too chewy

3) Mutton Biryani was GOOD. With 50% off I got it for just 133rs. Lot of mutton pieces and well cooked rice for such a cheap price. It's not the best mutton briyani in town but definitely worth tasting."]

address: 275, Opposite E-Zone, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Small little place with mouth melting kebabs.
We were full from a big lunch, but could not give this a miss and glad we did not.
The most yummiest part of the meal was the finale, the phirni, the most tastiest i have had do not give it a miss, we almost did, but thank god, our friend pushed us a little to get it and vola it was lip smacking!', "Locating the place is easy. No dedicated parking in Indira nagar that is not a big deal.

What's good
Simple menu & economical prices.

How's Food
Very good. Easily the best Galauti kebab outside Lucknow. Flavorful and actually so soft that one need not chew. Nihari is good. Paratha is both crispy and soft. Overall very satisfying. Have to visit once again for biriyani.
Somebody who don't like their food too soft can miss Galauti kebab a miss.

What's not so good - Nothing noteworthy.

Bottom Line- Good Food. Economical Prices."]

Awesome staff.\nLove their chilli chicken momo and also the schezwan rice noodles, chilli chicken and Gobi Manchurian. A must have for Chinese lovers.', 'I like the Gobi Manchurian, the taste is suprb.... The price is so cheap. Recommend everyone to visit.. Have the nice food with a good smile on their face..', 'Must try dishes from this place: chicken chilli momos, veg chilli momos veg/chicken Shanghai rice. \nThe staff is extremely friendly and always greets with a smile', 'This place is all about food, dilecious food unique taste. Must try Schezwan lollipop, Schezwan momo, Thai basil chicken rice and Hong Kong chicken etc. All time favourite place for food.']

address: 2984, Ground Floor, North Eastern Side, 12th Main, HAL, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Self Service, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["A very good looking place with big swing outside and flooring of artificial grass. Though place is not huge but they have spent on ambience and kept it clean. Now talking about ice cream, we first tried waffles, which was not at all good. They have various flavours of icecream. You can try if you want but don't go for waffles.", "Ambience - 4.5/5\xa0 Food - 5/5\xa0 VFM - 4/5 Parking - No
Iceberg is one of the newest chain of Ice cream and dessert parlours to hit Bangalore. Giving tough competition to the existing players, Iceberg specializes in cold stone ice cream in a range of flavours.They even have a blue coloured bubblegum flavour a hit with kids.We went for the Snicker Bash, a mashup of a small bar of Snickers with Belgian dark chocolate and dark and white choco chips. The ice cream was really delicious, and one of the best chocolate ice creams I've had in some time now.Will surely be trying their other flavours soon.", 'A place that serves good quantity of icecream with good quality of icecream as well which is very flavorful in taste along with being true to its flavour that it needs to be
.
.
They have opened their second outlet after successful feedbacks about the first one in bannerghatta road bangalore
.
They have this cute swing one which you would love to have ice cream and remember all the nostalgic times of your childhood
.
Other than just the ice creams they have
Waffle sandwich
Milkshakes
And
Variety in icecream not only in taste but also the way its been made example
Coldstone icecream to be precise
.
I tried the Rum based icecream and it not only tasted like one but also gave that kick which Rum gives
.
Also tried CONTATA
Coconut based milkshake in love with this its too yummy do try if u like anything with coconut base and chocolate', 'IceBerg...

Upcoming dessert chain Iceberg had finally opened its doors in Indiranagar 12th Main... With greenery & swing at the entrance with bright lighting, People cannot miss while going on the road :)

Had Choco Ferrero ice cream which is based on Belgium dark chocolate along with Ferrero rocher .. pretty decent in taste... Ferrero & cashew added the crunchy texture to the dessert.

Lychee Fruit Shake: Thick shake based on Lychee. They would use fresh fruit for Lychee for this preparation. Tasted okayish, Wish it is little tastier & fruity though.

Charcoal Waffle: Something new that I had for the waffles category... The batter is mixed with charcoal giving that color, is filled inside with white chocolate chips... Unique & crispy outer gives it a good shape.

Good for people to drop by for dessert cravings in Indiranagar without a burning hole in the pocket.', 'Located on 12th main road of Indiranagar, Iceberg Icecreams has opened its second branch here with all the numerous options for shakes, Icecreams, cold stones and more. The area is not very huge but the interior is pretty with apt seating available.

I amd my friend decided to try out this place on a Sunday after lunch. So we had the Bulge Secret which was made up with Caramel Nuts ice-cream, roasted almonds, butterscotch nuts and caramel sauce topped with chocostick and it was worth choosing for, sweet and scrumptious to the core.
Then we had the Nutella chocolate shake which had a lesser sweet palatte. It worked out for us balancing the ice-cream we had earlier but could have been a bit more sweet.']

address: Shop 6, Chandni Chowk 2 Bangalore, 1st Floor, 10th Main, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Keto Options,
reviews:
['', 'Everything was good except salted caramel.', 'Ordered hot chocolate fudge. The quantity is really less for what they charge. The vanilla ice cream was just sad. For the rates these people sell at corner house is far far no better. The quantity of chocolate sauce was not enough even for 2 spoons of ice cream.', 'A perfect desserts place, ice-cream at doorstep!! Ordered saffron rose, honeybliss and dark chocolate. All of them were amazing!! Their packaging looks great too. Delivered quick, properly packed and delicious!!! üòã Worth a try for sure!! üíØ /üíØ', "One of the yummiest ice creams and authentic taste !! Tried first time with them and as per my expectations, they delivered the best service along with a proper packaging, ice cream being one of the most sensitive items to be delivered was there at it's best !!!üòä", 'Amazing ice creams. Have been ordering from this place a few times. Like most of their flavours. Just ordered their new sugar free range and I was impressed. I have tried quite a few ice cream brands and their sugar free offerings but this one takes the cake in terms of taste. The chocolate is just amazing and I loved the peanut butter choco chip as well. Could hardly tell the difference in terms of taste.

Only crib is that it is slightly icy to eat, which melts immediately when you put it in the mouth, but I think they need to fix this bit to have a üíØ üíØ winner.

Their label says that they use a blend of stevia and erythritol for sweetener, which is great. Natural as their other flavours. Overall, will recommend to every ice cream lover.', 'I ordered the mango thick shake through zomato. They said they use real Alphonso mangos. The milk shake was very thick and creamy. No smell of any essence or colour. I liked it a lot. I am going to try another flavor milk shake next time', "Yesterday I ordered what they are calling mocha truffle. It was a mix of coffee and choklat flavors. I have never tasted such a combo. I don't know if it was availabel in India. They make nice ice creams. I want to try other flavors", "If you are a pure vegetarian who cares even what his ice cream contains and also wants the authentic flavors, this is the place to order from. I have been ordering from them on multiple occasions and have tried many options. Yesterday I tried the sugar free chocolate and absolutely loved it. Honestly, I haven't experienced any flavour from them which failed to meet my expectations. Always a delight. My favorite flavors are dark chocolate fudge praline, dark knight, paan, saffron rose and now their sugar free offerings", 'I love that their ice creams come with all the ingredients clearly listed. Normally with food delivered online, you don‚Äôt see this kind of detail. It makes Artinci an easy choice for a compulsive ingredients label-reader like me, besides their delicious ice creams of course.']

address: Shop 9, St Patricks Complex, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The Mutton pulao, Chicken pulao, buttermilk and rasam were all fab. I‚Äôm sure their sides would have been good too, unfortunately, I jus wanted to taste their rice items. 
No extra masala, no dalda n shit, simple n plain making sure u have an easy belly to carry out.

Why not 5?
Coz the Pulao wasn‚Äôt hot and that my friend, was disappointing üòå', "Good place to hangout for food, located at the right location visible to people easily. Paloa is Mildly spiced and flavourful with rightly Cooked meat and the best part is that it comes in Donne, Chicken fry stands out with idlis. Kabab is crisp could have been little spicier, mutton chops was juicy and yumm but it could have been spiced up as well. Go with zero expectations you'll be satisfied for sure."]

address: 123, 1st & 2nd Floor, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Rooftop, Available for Functions, Wifi, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area, Group Meal,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Cocktails', 'Neer Dosa', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Squid Masala', 'Prawn Ghee Roast', 'Badam Milk', 'Coconut Rice']
reviews:
["Co.Ba.Ja is a two floored restaurant with a amazing ethnic decor, full of decor artifacts, old style wooden furniture with floor and chair both seating. and there roof top outdoor seating is superb.
A lot of varieties of drinks including cocktails and mock tails being served here. We had ele oota here which started from  Neer Dosa, chicken curry, prawn curry, Kori Roti, sambar, rasam, Chicken Sukha and fish tawa fry.Everything was too yummy.Then we tried there puranpoli with ghee which was amazing.
The service was good and the staff was super friendly. Definitely make your visit cause I'm sure for all non veg lovers, food here won't disappoint you at all.

MY RATING : 4.5/5

Ambiance : 4.5/5
Service : 5/5
Staff Behavior : 5/5
Food : 4.5/5
Drinks : 5/5", "Mangalore food at it's best . This place in brigade road gives you the most amazing mangalorean food straight from the coasts of Karnataka. From their neer dosa to kori roti and their brilliant ghee roast and fish kebab , which is a must try .
Their beautiful cocktails and mocktails go so well with the cuisine.
Comfort food + beautiful ambience + affordable prices .
What more do you want?
And by beautiful ambience I mean the place has a rooftop seating which is gold. It's got this amazing view with decked up interiors and it's all kinds of pretty ‚ù§Ô∏è
The service was good and the staff was super friendly.
The prices are super pocket friendly too . So without digging your wallet you can eat your heart out at this cute little place in bridge road.", "This place is located in a bustling Brigade Road still has a calming ambience to it. The food was authentic, and full of Flavours from coastal regions. Everything that we had starting from Neer Dosa, chicken curry, prawn curry, Kori Roti, sambar, rasam, Chicken Sukha was just bomb. The Fish Fry was the Star Dish. We also had the famous Chicken Ghee Roast and Neer Dosa, the spicy goodness was just right for your taste buds and if you love spicy food then it is just the right thing to order and you won't be disappointed. For deserts you can order Holige and you can't stop at one. To the traditional and rustic Cuisine the place serves some really interesting Cobaja Special Cocktails and they are a must try. Even in mocktails Lichee Blossom was just love. Try this place if you are in search for authentic coastal flavours....", 'YUMMY BUT MINIMAL PORTIONS WITH ABSURD PRICING!!!
I had mixed feelings after dinning at Cobaja, Brigade Rd.
First, their preparations are yummy. Not just yummy, damn good lip smacking yummy. Same time they priced the menu absurdly high. If they think, provinding tasty food demands absurd pricing, I beg to defer. Cobaja is just a small joint on a 2 storey building, with very limited seating, which may get crowded and noisy. And there is nothing special about the ambience and service by staffs are below AVERAGE. Above all, the portion of squid fries, prawns ghee roast etc were very minimal.
Highly recommend the management to rethink either about portion size or pricing.', "This place is definitely going to catch your eyes when it comes to its interior.. Very calm and peaceful setup with light colors. These guys serve fish and chicken thali at a reasonable price with no compromise on taste.
Being in Richmond road it's tough to get good food places here at a reasonable price and hence this will definitely be an attractive option.
Amazing fish thalis, amazing chicken thalis and awesome well cooked mutton thali.
Just go for this place without thinking twice.
U will love the low sitting arrangments.
Overall a great experience.
Will definitely go here again and would highly recommend this place to everyone.", "While exploring bridge road, got my eyes on this place Cobaja. They had this food festival going on which I tried and was super Delicious.
From the starters to main course to dessert every thing was full of flavours and worth trying.
I love the ghee roast chicken and prawns. Ordered the mutton balls which were absolutely yummm.
In main course I loveeed the chicken pulav and chicken Karan the most. Their mutton was so soft and juicy, just melts in your mouth. Amazing and worth trying.
I highly recommend the food here and also the service is worth appreciation. If you have never been to this place, definitely make your visit cause I'm sure for all non veg lovers, food here won't disappoint you at all."]
