address: 608, 12th Main Road, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Serves Alcohol, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Visited Sanchez many times with my friends. They have awesome Mexican food....one of the best in bangalore 

Few dishes I love there are fiesta nachos both veg and non veg...I‚Äôm a hard core non vegetarian but love the veg nachos more... portion of sour cream, guacamole is all generous and lots of toppings 

Also love the ajillo chipotle chicken, habanero chicken perfect for spicy food lovers like me. Habanero cottage cheese taco also is very nice

Desserts you must try tres leches- 3 milk cake which is too good. Churros are also nice. Service is excellent. Little high on price but quality they give is worth it', "I've been going through this horrid jinx of eating at bad places. After Sanchez its finally over! Absolutely loved everything about my dinner here. 

The Michelada- a mix of spices and beer; and the Whisky Sour were delicious. With that we had what I think the best nachos I've eaten till date. SO SO good. The avocado toast with beets was a little alright comparitively.

Also please a special mention goes to the churros! Splendid. Ive been eating the wrong churros all my life! They were beyond crispy, gooey and chocolaty than I could ever imagine. The staff and ambience with all the beautiful lights made the dinner an overall amazing experience.
                                                stylepsychic.in", "Just wow!

Like everything about this place was wow.

I am a big texmex fan and have tried it at the best places in India. This was definitely one of the good places.

Very good menu and even better food. Tastes just right. Not too indianiased nor too authentic.

I had the veg enchiladas, the guacamole on table and avocado cocktail, and churros All great.

Highly recommend the guacamole on table. It's delicious.

Can't wait to go back and try everything else (their menu is huge!)

Service was very very good. Special mention to the staff to take our order on phone since we were getting late and they were closing and this was only way they could accommodate us.

They also had nice live music when we were there who was great and continued playing even when only the two of us were left.

My FAVS score -

Food: 5/5
Ambience: 5/5
Value for money: 4.5/5 (if they had some promotion like Zomato Gold this would be awesome).
Service: 5/5

Kudos!!", 'Love this place for a nice weekend dinner treat. The ambience is like that of a restropub and service is prompt and proffessional. I had some of the best mexican food ever here. We had the shrimp taco salad, Chicken chimichangas and a chicken quesadilla. All 3 dishes were delicious and had no faults. Pricing is as expected and not very expensive. Definitely recommend for all mexican food lovers to try.', 'The rumours about the place being a tad bit expensive for the portions served are all shut when you eat the food here ! Undoubtedly one of the best places for Mexican and Tex mex ! A must visit for every taco lover ever üåÆüåÆüåÆüåØ', 'It was a decent place. Its certainly not 800 for twoüòÑ after spending around 1500 for both, we were still hungry and had to go someplace else. Outside seating and smoking room available. Courteous staff. Food was just alright. The portions are too small and ridiculously priced. Presentation is great. Chips and salsa was awesome. Really good chips. The tamale and enchiladas and tres leches were just alright. If the price was less I could have appreciated the food better.', 'A nice place on a Friday evening in the heart of 12th main. Fancy decor, no loud music and very airy inside sets up for a great conversation and some good food.

It went right from the start. I tried the chicken Chipotle and some habenaro paneer. I kept debating if it really tasted like Mexican food or just tasted like good Indian food but maybe the closeness of two cuisines makes that line a bit blurry anyway.

The mains was of perfect quantity. The chicken was soft and juicy. We ended with a cake soaked in condensed milk that tasted like a Bengali desert to me.

In all a special shout out to Rinku who kept helping us on an otherwise exhaustive menu. Very well behaved staff, worthy of a 5* experience.', 'Went there about a month ago and ordered the Chipotle Chicken Baked Potato Skins and Serrano Chicken Torta. The Potato skins were alright, but the Serrano Chicken Torta sandwich fell really flat. The description said that it has a refined bean paste and guacamole which seemed exciting, but the sandwich barely had any of those. The sandwich was too dry and tasteless. We approached the server and told him about this and he suggested to bring the two fillings separately in a bowl, and we agreed. Somehow, even with the dips it did not appeal to us. We left the sandwich and politely asked the waiter for the bill. No hard feelings. Seeing that we did not have a pleasant experience, the staff gave us a complimentary Tres Leches dessert, which was SO GOOD that we ordered another one for ourselves again. We went there day before after dinner just to have the Tres Leches dessert, its really that good.']

address: 3th Floor, Garuda Mall, Magrath Road, Ashok Nagar, Brigade Road Area, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["This place has good pizza. Had been there after shopping at garuda with my family. I personally didn't like it much . Had ordered potato wedges there. This was good. My little one enjoyed it.

They do have varieties of pizza. Pizzas are dry and lacks much of flavours.
Overall
Price 4/5
Quality 3/5
Service 5/5
Value for money 3/5", 'Horrible pizza to quote "expensive horrible pizza" totally don't recommend it. The service was too slow and they had no information about their menu. Overall bad experience.', 'Purchased Crazy Pizza in Garuda Mall food court...It was a buy one get one free pizza offer...Pizza took like 30minutes to be prepared.But the Chicken Sausage & Salami Pizza was not that fresh..it had some stale smell...But managed to eat it...Even the Pizza base was very tough & chewy to eat...Hardly any cheese was topped on top....Not at all value for your money...Its better to order from Pizza hut or Dominos outlet...Atleast there is no compromise on what you are eating.', "Not good .... pizza is tasteless... total waste of money... They don't pay a heed to your comments when you tell them over there as if their responsibility is over once food is on your table ... So a no no from my side ...", 'Liked the pizza.
We ordered the simply veggie with extra cheese.
Would give a 100 points for the extra cheese, the crust and most of it, but it was cut down a little on the toppings. The tomatoes somehow didn‚Äôt suit it a lot, instead a little more onions would‚Äôve done a better job, the tomatoes really brought down the dish.
Otherwise it was fine. 
Not so great pricing, but would love to try it another time and I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôd have my mind changed.', "We did try one pizza here in order to see if it tastes better than dominos or pizza hut but unfortunately, it didn't. Also, i didnt like the taste of oregano or say their oregano was somewhat tasteless or whatever. So, it's on your head if you wanna try some new brand pizza. There is not much difference in rates. Almost same as dominos. But doesnt taste like dominos."]

address: 3302/L, HAL 2nd Stage, 12th A Main, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["Went here with colleagues for lunch. Finding the place shouldn't be difficult. But yes, parking is a matter of concern. The road was dug up and we had to find alternatives to park.\xa0

Ambiance is good, spacious and wooden interiors. They have two floors. The floor above was open air.\xa0

For food, we ordered:
Rayalseema Chicken (Boneless)
Hyderabadi Dum Chicken Biryani
Pepper Fry Chicken Biryani
Hyderabadi Drumsticks Biryani

The Rayalseema Chicken was not as spicy as we expected, it was on the tangier side. All the three Biryanis were equally good but for me, the winner was Hyderabadi Drumsticks Biryani. It was light, flavorful, non-greasy and absolutely yum. The Drumsticks were Tandoor grilled and were cooked to perfection.\xa0

Overall, a good place to dine if you are looking for some Andhra spicy food. The quantity served is good. The service is prompt and the staff are amicable", 'Visited this place on a Sunday for lunch. Worst service i have ever had, they served quite late, had to ask thrice for everything right from water to fingerbowl. They didn‚Äôt serve gravy, raita for biryani till we asked. The worst part is they added an extra item omelette of 150‚Çπ, which wasn‚Äôt ordered or served.']

reviews:
['', '', 'Very clean and well maintained place. Looks hygienic too. I had Chikku shake. Tasted will. But definitely over priced
I would give 5 star for the hygiene but 3.5 star for the shake as its over priced', 'They had new promo of 99 for 2 with limited flavors to choose from, what I ordered was an\xa0 coffee and Rasmalai\xa0 those shakes were pretty descent not so great to talk about., however the Sundaes seems to be a huge let down, "The Dark conspiracy sundae" just had oreo biscuits and a scoop of vanilla ice cream nothing special, they could have just renamed as oreo vanilla sandwich not worth the money, Frozen bottle is always the best.
Food-2/5
Pricing 2/5
Quantity 2/5', 'I visit and order from here more frequently. I almost tried most of the shake. I like all the chocolate shakes. Chocolate shake are must have', 'Had gone to this place few mins back. I hve heard a lot about Keventers so today i made it finally. And i had taken Strawberry shake which was worth of money(Rs 104).', 'If you are looking for shake then this place is best. I really like their Hazelnut thickshake. Since they have lots of options, you can definitely give a try to their shakes.', 'Never really got the hype. The shakes are pretty okay, I like that they are thick but I find them too sweet and they add way too much ice cream. Not a big fan, but that applies to any other shake place.', "I love keventers. And the kit kat shake they have is delectable. Can't get over it. I even love oreo shake. Butter scotch shake is ordinary.", 'Too sweet and thin milkshake, felt as if I am drinking the left over juice of a rasogolah. Cavin 30rs tetra pack are much better than this liquid.']

reviews:
['', 'The batter smelt really bad, masala paddu was tasteless. Onion uttapam was ok but again the batter smelt really old. Overall not a good option. Weird smell and taste. Never gonna repeat. Unhygienic.', '', "I was kind of looking for a 3.5-4.0 rating.

Anyway, Namma Madurai serves good food. And ofcourse, while there are a few places that will for sure serve better idlies and dosas etc, I have a soft spot for Namma Madurai's spicy veggie filled sambhar, its' different chutneys and the masala paddu.

Get anything from the menu and have it with their Sambhar and the Red/White Chutney - It's really, really good guys.

Cheers.
                                                instagram.com", 'Order ID : 1894889084

I have ordered idli 4 pieces( 2 * 2) qty and vada 1 piece via zomato, but I got only 2 pieces of idly and remaining 2 is missing.

Worse experience.

Also the delivery guy has charged cost for full items. However 2 items of idly qty is missing.

Attached the bill summary for reference', 'Ordered breakfast combo via zomato. Really very happy with the choice. Taste was amazing. Worth it !! Keep up the good work team!! Will definitely recommend.', 'Ordered Madurai special Podi Idly, the taste was superb! Paddu with Red chutney was the favorite one for the week! Keep up the good work team', "Worst food I have tasted ever in my life, spoiled chutney and only water in sambar, I don't know how this is tied up with Zomato brack fast combo they charge 100‚Çπ but not worth to it", 'Food was not at all hot. And the delivery boy was asking me to give 5 stars. This is not good at all. If his service is good then we know to rate them.', "I've ordered breakfast combo, it was simply superb. The taste of the sambar was awesome, I'm addicted to it, Keep it up the good work. Thank you."]

address: 14, 2nd Floor, 10th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['Finally had really good andhra food after a long while. The veg meal was really what i was looking for in a lunch. And the best part was - GUNPOWDER, that speaks for itself. Loved the food. Specially the fried thing and brinjal was really tasty. Make sure to order from them if you like andhra food. Definitely addictive.', 'I ordered an Andhra veg meal from this place which costed me just Rs.160 which is quite reasonable considering the quality of food and packaging was up to the mark. The meal had various items in it which included daal, sambhar, rasam, baingan palya, fried potatoes with peanuts, curd, papad along with pickle, ghee and huge amount of rice. It took two of us to complete the whole meal. The food was very delicious and filling.', 'This meal I ordered from Andra Gun Powder was worth the money and they delivered in time with excellent packing and the food was very tasty and this is one of the few restaurants who servers authentic Andra food and quantity was also sufficient. I had a festive meal üòãüòãüëåüëåüëå. #best #andrafood', "Ordered food from this place and must say that this is a great experience. As i heard from many people that this is one of the best place to have South Indian meals.

Even am south Indian, i don't prefer veg thali mostly. But after trying from this place, must say that am fan of veg meals tooüòÄ

There are many items that i got confused what to taste first. Along with curries, fry, dal, sambar, rasam, curd, pickle, papad, bajji & chilli.

Loved the packing.", 'This is a cloud kitchen that serves authentic Andhra dishes. One can order from Zomato or other.
I ordered Andhra meals. Thali was so good.
Packaging was very good. Everything was packed very delicately. Food was still hot when it was delivered.

Meals had Pickle, Ghee, Pappu, Sambhar, Rasam, Palya, Chatnepudi , fried dry chilli , brinjal curry, Paapad along with Rice.
Honestly, everything was so good. Pappu was just like authentic Andhra dish. Rasam, sambhar were also good.

For all those who are looking for authentic Andhra meal, this is the place for you guys. Order and enjoy. Definitely worth it.
Rating - 5/5', "It is a Authentic Andhra Restaurant. I had ordered Veg meals from this place. It is a cloud kitchen.

The veg meals came with awesome packing and the quantity was huge. It is sufficient to fill 2 people's stomach. The items which came with the meals were palya, pappu, rasam, sambar, ghee, pickle, chutney powder, curd, papad, fried cilly.

The pappu was amazing and was worth it. Sambar was also good.

Overall a good place to order food from.
Food- 4.8/5"]

reviews:
["I used to order Honey spicy chicken lollipop, it was good around 4-5 months back, but now it's pathetic.
Had ordered it again on 12 Dec 2019, it was so bad, chicken wasn't fresh, wasn't cooked properly, the taste wasn't good, the packing was bad, the mayonnaise was stinking, the whole food was itself disastrous.I could feel while eating itself that I would get stomach upset, I wasn't wrong. Waste of money, not recommending, atleast this dish.", "Online Order : We ordered Chicken Steam momos and Chilly dry pork fry for our house party. Momos weren't good at all, I would anytime prefer street momos compare to this. But we loved the chilly dry pork fry, it was well cooked, juicy and everyone loved it.", 'I ordered the soup and veg salad,
Soup was packed in a packet, with so much oil in soup it was not healthy , now in office I dont know how will I eat soup , most restaurants send in bowl and look at the cost its not that cheap,
Next veg salad is literally salad that i can cut at home , it was laughable no dressing nothing they just gave me cucumbers onion carrots tomato like some dhabha 
ps: My lunch was destroyed', 'The kind of food served was very bad in quality compared to their Ejipura branch. We ordered Pork, Chicken and Paneer momos along with Manchow soup and Pork chilly. Chicken momos were ok but Paneer and Pork momo seemed to have stale fillings and the pork chilly was very rubbery. Highly disappointed with the food.', 'I ordered food and everything about it was horrible. Noodles were half cooked, hunan chicken was partially cooked and bland.', 'Had chicken momos, chicken spring rolls and schezwan chicken rice. The momos were nice, but not filled enough. The spring rolls were filled to the brim, but very oily. The noodles were fine though.', "U guys have to reduce the quantity of the noodles...it's too much...I feel very sad to waste so much..next time don't send this much..I don't have anyone else to share it with.", 'I ordered a plate of Schezwan noodles from here. The order arrived quite late and it was all mushy.
The noodles were not noodles but actually thin seviyaan type with all mushed up vegetables and stuff.
Very average taste and a lot in portion for one person.
                                                foodndestinations.com', 'Good service', 'They prepare food very Delicious and yummy, Also this restaurant provide very nice Quantity. For one person which is more than enough. Thank you MOMO RICE NOODLES']

address: 21, Opposite Syndicate Bank, Kaggadasapura Main Road, CV Raman Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['We have been visiting this place, and during each visit we try different dishes. Be it shawarma or tandoor items or curry, etc. its so appealing. Prefer to order by calling them directly.
We usually pick up our order or dine in.', "Wrong order, late order, cold order, pathetic service from Zomato. Will never order from Zomato ever gain. Ordered for grill. Got tandoori chicken instead. Didn't have the courtesy to call and tell about the order.", 'The tandoori was good but they gave pudina chutney which was spoiled , it was not fresh at all..The shawarma and roll was not hot. they should check and taste the food before giving it to customers', "Good for most tandoori stuff(as the name says). Tandoori chicken and grilled chicken are definitely good. I recommend staying away from ordering gravies. Shawarma is also ok. I haven't tried the biriyani yet. If anyone does, do tell me about it in the comments.", 'I have been a regular customer of New Tandoor since they had restaurant on ground only , i love their masala mushroom.. prices are very reasonable.', 'Used to be my favorite economical food joint when I was staying in Kaggadasapura.
I must have tried all their dishes but my favorites were tandoori chicken, lehsuni and kalmi kebab.
The services were prompt and staff courteous.
Nothing much on ambience but a must visit place if you stay around c.v. raman nagar.', 'Very bad food. Not worth to go there if you are staying just next to it. Mutton, afghan chicken, paneer butter masala, paneer malai sheek kabab and many more are just junk.', 'Ordered for tomato soup, butter roti and anjal fish curry. All three were very good. The staff also is very polite. Had always had good experience here. Keep up the good job guys', "The food is really good and fresh. The kebabs and grilled chicken are really yum. They do have dining space upstairs but I don't know about the ambience and all. We usually opt for take away.", "Good Food for starters especially. I prefer to have food from here when we have house party.

It's a good joint. Dont know about sitting area exposure but food quality is good...."]

address: 729, Ground Floor, CMH Road, Binnamangala Layout Extension, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegan Options, Desserts and Bakes, Board Games, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly, Wifi,
reviews:
["Ambience: From outside it looks like a small cafe, it has good seating capacity inside. Decor is decent and gives a good vibe.

Food:

Pesto Chicken Flatbread : Flat bread with pesto sauce, grilled chicken chunks, tomatoes and mozarella cheese.

Chicken chunks were huge and it wasn't nicely grilled. It didn't taste good.

Coffee:

Pumkin Spice Latte : It tasted great and a must try.

Pumpkin Spice Frappe : Espresso shots blended with pumpkin spice and whipped cream.

But there were no flavors of pumpkin & it did not taste like coffee.

Service: Quick & fast.", 'I really liked this place, specially their banana tea cake is my favourite. They also serve really good coffee. I would recommend this place, incase you would like to visit coffee place other than starbucks.', 'Third Wave has made a niche for itself and justifiably so. We ordered two coffees and both were decent but barely warm let alone hot. 5 minutes in, it was at room temperature.

Thembience is spacious and great for reader and laptop person alike', "This is one of my favorite places for coffee, have always loved this place over any other place for coffee. Both the hot coffee's and the cold brews are really good.", 'I love this place SO much! It caught my attention because of the rustic decor and because it smells like coffee. They use fresh beans to brew their own coffee and you can see the bags of beans stashed in the back of the shop. The food portions are hearty and the bagels and pita bread we had were really good!']

address: 3168, Ground Floor, 12th Main Junction, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Free Wifi, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Tried the death by chocolate from here and loved it. The ice cream was delicious and the presentation was spot on. They have other desserts and sundaes too, a good dessert parlour in Indira Nagar.', 'Kunafa was a must try dish, they have very beautiful ice cream flavours and absolutely value for money, had cranberry & apple infusion (hot tea) it was superb, stuff was very courteous.', 'Cream and Cha - unique name- isn‚Äôt it üòä 
A cute place to enjoy dessert and company on the busy roads of Indiranagar. I discovered this place while searching for ice-cream at midnight.\xa0
We tried a few samples and decided to go with Cookies & Cream in a cone.\xa0
A must visit place for your midnight cravings.

Edited - I‚Äôm editing my review after second visit... I‚Äôm in love with this place... Zahir is such a sweetheart... 
must try: malai ice cream', "Cream N Cha is a heaven for those have the sweet tooth. And ofcourse as the name says, they do have delightful varieties of Tea too. I visited the place on my friend's recommendation and I loved this place. You must try out Pizza Toastie, Apple Pie Toastie, Belgian Dark Chocolate Shake, Cupcakes, Death By Chocolate and, for sure, Coconut Falooda.

So if you looking for a place to hangout while having national drink, Tea, and some quick bites, this is the spot for you.

Ambience: 8/10
Taste: 8/10
Cuisine Range: 7/10
Price: 8/10
Service: 7/10"]

reviews: ['Ordered paneer parantha combo. Taste was not bad at all. Tastes like ghar ka parantha. Although size of parantha was small. Paranthas were served with good amount of curd, pickle and butter.\nAnd their packaging was so good and unique.', 'I ordered the Laccha parata combo. They first of all took so long to give the delivery, after waiting for an hour and a half, they sent bad rotis and also sent dried paneer. The paneer was not even fresh. It was so hard. Very bad service!', 'They make rotten food with rotten ingredients. Curd and food is sour in taste and rotten. The smell is like a garbage pile of rotten food. Thats what they serve to their customers :). I ordered from this place and all food went straight into dustbin because it smelled like rotten food. Very bad experience.', 'Horrible paneer and dal makhni with rotis and rice as home delivery. rotis were uncooked from the inside, paneer was just 3 solid cubes in tomato and onion curry.', 'I ordered chola and jeera rice through zomato. Jeera rice was gud but the Quality of chola was not upto the mark. My expectations was little high from this restaurant as i have ordered before too but the chola which i ordered today Needs improvement. The taste was not good.', 'Please control salt quantity', 'Not liking it anymore.\nSomething is missing, and definitely needs improvement. The taste is not good like earlier. Also why it is not present on google and no google reviews? it sounds suspicious to me.', 'Chatpata chhola with jeera rice is a must try, so is the kadhai paneer with lachcha parantha, haha. Truly does remind you of meals from back home, wonderfully cooked food just filled with flavours, served in great quantity, even the packaging is done so well. Love it', 'Excellent design. Definitely one of the best packaging observed on a delivery. The food quality was was average. But extra had to be given for the presentation alone.', 'Pathetic place.. have cancelled my order saying they had the wrong number.. the delivery person could not find the house.. the person on the phone was so rude and said that I should not talk to him but to zomato.. what kind of pathetic and ridiculous service is this where you let people be stranded for food. Had ordered food at 12:50 and have been waiting since only to know that the number was wrong and the person could not find the place.PLEASE DO NOT ORDER FROM HERE']

address: 188/1, 6th Main Road, Opposite AXON Hospital, Defence Colony, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Walnut Brownie', 'Triple Chocolate Brownie', 'Chocolate Shake', 'Chocolate Fudge Brownie', 'Brownie Sundae']
reviews:
['We have had many brownies, but golden brownies are special, special because of their distinct style, presentation and taste.
.
I tried my best red velvet brownie from here, it was hot and droolworthy. Also the Chocolate mouuse brownie was quite good. I also tried rich chocolate brownie jar with rich spongy brownie, crumbles and Chocolate sauce. It was really a delight to finish the full jar. And even the Chocolate brownie was one of the thickest I have ever had. Made with pure ingredients with no preservatives, these brownies and shakes are a must to order and experience.
.
Their presentation is so adorable that you are gonna fall in love with your brownies, the packaging is also very reliable, reasonable prices, perfect service.', "As I was craving sweet but wasn't in the mood for ice cream, I came across this particular place called 'Golden brownies' and I'm so glad I did.

We ordered the 'Pack of 5' that comprised of 5 different varieties of chocolate Brownies. I don't remember the names but I definitely can't forget the taste!

The Brownies were a little hard - not as soft as I would've wanted them to be, but it wasn't an issue. They tasted great. Each one tasted different and unique. I'm sure they would've tasted even better with some vanilla ice cream. Overall, I was really happy with it. I do believe that the place is a little overpriced. Other than that, it's a pretty decent place to go to or order from if you're craving brownies.

PS: The variety is insane! You cannot even imagine how many flavors they have.

Overall rating:
Food - 4/5
Packaging - 4/5
Value for money - 2.5/5", 'As the name suggests, Golden Brownies is definitely the flag bearer of delicious, fresh and flavorful desserts. With a unique texture and an exquisite taste to its products, this brand is bound to win your hearts.

Products tasted-

ü•§The Chocolate Shake- 4/5 (Thick, right amount of sweet and amazingly chocolaty)

üçßThe Brownie Sundae- 5/5
Nothing describes "heavenly" better than a thick, gooey and lip-smacking brownie sundae, and Golden Brownies has made sure of that.

üç∞ The Red velvet Brownie- 5/5
Oh My God! A dense brownie infused with a sweet flavor and topped with delectable white chocolate. Hands down the best I've hade in this flavor.

You HAVE to try these products and get swept away by the deliciousness this brand has to offer. Also a big shout out to the freshness and hygiene. Loved everything üåà', "Midnight cravings for desserts is sorted with Golden brownies. These guys deliver amazing brownies around Bangalore.
Got triple chocolate brownie, red velvet brownie, a jarcake and chocobrownie shake delivered around midnight. While i loved all the 4, the red velvet brownie made my day.
Whenever midnight dessert cravings strike, head to Zomato and order these mouthwatering desserts from Golden brownies. You won't regret for sure.
Packaging: 5/5
Taste & Freshness: 5/5
Value for money: 5/5, considering the late night delivery as well", 'Recently I got to try some of their brownies and chocolate shake. The packaging was really great. The shake came in a glass bottle while brownies came in small cardboard boxes. The chocolate shake was quite thick and amazing. In brownies, I tried Gajar Halwa, Coffee and Red Velvet ones. I liked Gajar Halwa most among all. Coffee one had a subtle flavor of mint making it a good combination. Also they were quite moist and fresh. Overall experience was quite good.', 'Golden Brownies are my new favourites! Such fine quality brownies that one would eventually find it stop until they finish it all! üòÑ
I loved both the triple chocolate brownie and the red velvet brownie! Amazing composition! The brownie eclairs ice cream was ah-mazing!
The chocolate shake was pretty refreshing ! The overall taste is so perfect!
Finally this outlet would be my go to place to have some lipsmacking brownies!üíû', 'They have some amazing brownies which taste really good, some of them are even really unique like the Gajar halwa brownie I tried which was one of my favourites as it had the perfect balance of sweetness and there was a hit of carrot which just right. I also had the chocolate brownie shake which was genuinely one of the best brownies shakes I‚Äôve eaten! 
All in all, I‚Äôd definitely recommend this place to my friends.', 'I had ordered brownies and shake from this place and I must say it was really yummy and I loved it.

I had ordered small pack of brownies and a shake from get brownies and it got delivered really quick.

Packaging was neat and it contained below varities of brownies:
üî∫Cashew chocolate brownie: chocolate brownie with whole cashews that u get cashews in each bite.I loved this.
üî∫Red velvet brownie: perfect sweet and soft red velvet brownie.
üî∫Gajar ka halwa brownie: Now this is something different but i must say it was really good and had a different taste.
üî∫Chocolate brownie Shake: This is a treat to chocolate lovers, not too sweet and thick shake with rich taste of chocolate and brownies....I would definitely recommend this.

So what are you waiting for? Order your box of happiness in form of these cute and yummy brownies.', 'I was pretty much excited when I saw their menu for the varieties of brownies they offer. I tried the triple chocolate brownie and it was brilliant. Simple loved it. I also had the red velvet brownie which was a good one.
Brownie shake was delicious and made well with not too much sweetness. And lastly had the chocolate sundae which was yummy... I look forward to trying more of their brownies soon.', 'As the names say it really is golden Brownies when it‚Äôs comes to the taste and the quality of the products which they have in the shop. Coming to the food I tried out tai toes of brownies which was red velvet and chocolate brownie in which chocolate Brownie was just amazing, I loved it so much because it wasn‚Äôt that dried out or kinda flaky, it was to the perfect proportion where it is kinda fudgy and had that amazing texture to, I loved the red velvet one too, but chocolate brownie was just epic, also I tested out there which was pretty good too,  i loved the consistency of the shake not too thick or not that watery. Finally we ended up with the sundae jar which was lovely, definitely worth the price. Recommend for all the sweet tooth out there']

reviews:
["I have visited this place a few times and have ordered for delivery as well. Overall the hotel is decent but isn't completely authentic as per its name. The rates are reasonable and food is decent but I find it a little too spicy.

The last time I ordered peas pulao and Punjabi chicken and the pulao didn't look or taste authentic and so was the chicken with very few small pieces.

Hopefully they work on their preparations going forward.

Overall, this place is still a good bargain for people looking for decent food at reasonable price.

Good for Indian preparations and avoid Chinese here."]

address: 311, 1st Floor Gowra, Binnamangala, 1st Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: North Indian, Chinese, Kebab, Biryani, Desserts, Beverages
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Free Parking, Free Wifi, Available for Functions, Disabled Friendly, Private Dining Area Available, Wifi, Group Meal, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["When opulence meets lipsmacking food, then the place has to be like WOWWW. The place has different corners and the ones with sofas is the best one as it ensures a separate nice corner end for a quality family time. We were on bingeathon and has the following:

Crispy Lotus stem - Another name of foodgasm
Achari Paneer Tikka- Couldn't have been better
Cheese Balls- Simply addictive
Veg Pizza- Something different and a must try
Any mocktail- Simply lickworthy
Dal Makhani- The best one I ever had, don't miss it
Paneer Tikka Masala - Again not less than a benchmark
Desserts- Again everything can be tries but will specially recommend American Cheese Cake. The way they present their dessert is amazing.

Lastly, the quality of service was perfect. However, the timeliness could have been better. Overall a perfect place for family and friends!!!", 'Saturday Special - Food Coma

I have been wanting to visit the place for a long while now and repent not having gone earlier. A great place for lunch with family or friends or just a dinner date.
The ambience is beautiful with private seating for groups of 6, 8, 12 etc., with calm light music. The food is delicious. My recommendations would be:
- Lotus stem crispies
- sliders
- green apple shake
- Cheese balls
- dal makhani
- kadhai veg
- American cheesecake

Please do not miss the main course even if you are full. The food is just lipsmacking. The staff is very well trained and give good suggestions.', 'This place is paradise for food lovers. A cozy ambiance , courteous staff, perfect food presentation and delicious in taste. Everything is just perfect. We had started with their mock tails pine passion, dirty mango and banana milkshakes, my favourite pomegranate basil, kiwi cooler and green melon. All drinks were just perfect in taste. In starter we tried veg golgappa, crispy lotus slim, Mushroom ghee roast, paneer achari tikka. Tried their soup tofu glass noodles soup it was ok in taste. In main course we tried daal makhani which was amazing, kulcha and sabji. Mini sliders and Chef‚Äôs special dish. Food was very well prepared and yummy. In desserts they have so many options to try. We tried  tiramisu, cheese cake, bread pudding, chocolate almond tart brownie and trio mousse. Overall great experience.', "Located at Indira Nagar, this place is made for fine dining. If you are looking for a place with a lot of options in food without compromising the quality, then this is your next stop. Appetising staters, great soups, Amazing Main Course and Surprising Mocktails this place has it all. And the final showdown started with a great range of desserts that this place showcased along with their artistic skills. I won't mind visiting this place again and again with their courteous staffs and ambience.

.", 'Had been here with DiWaS for lunch. Both veg and non veg are tasty with value for money. Moctails are good along with virgin toddy worth trying for soothing throat and temperature. Good place for kids with no much crowd. Open kitchen with friendly staff is another plus. Would like to refer this place for both veg and non veg

Clean place and value for money. Nice ambiance for get togetherness.', 'An average place to have lunch or dinner in Indiranagar. The day we went the restaurant was mostly empty, which is never the case in Indiranagar üòÅ
Coming to the food, overall rating is an average. The staff was quite courteous and professional.
We had ordered Lung Fung Chicken soup along with Crispy Paneer, Pekking Fish as starters. The soup and the starters were tasty. And for the main course we had ordered Pepper Mushroom and Masala Kulcha. The pepper mushroom was a bit on the spicier side but taste was good. And for beverages we had ordered Green and Queen Mocktail, which was quite soothing and good.

Food - 3/5
Hygiene - 3/5
Staff - 4/5', 'I decided to try out this place in Indiranagar and was happy that it stood up to my expectations.

The ambiance is calm and soothing. They have 2 floors, the lower one is more for dining/families and the above one had a pub like feel to it.

Coming to food , we had murg dum splitwood tikka and mutton pepper fry in starters and chicken kosha and tandoori roti in mains.
For drinks we ordered mocktails- blue dream, kiwi punch and sunset punch.

Both the starters were very good. Chicken tikka had a creamy marination, while mutton was all fiery. Only thing i did not like was that mutton had very less mutton in it. But the masala was superb.
Chicken kosha in main course was also awesome. Its not really on the menu and was suggested by person managing the place. It was really good.
Mocktails were decent and had a nice taste.

Overall i really like the place. They have zomato gold which is a bonus. Service is bit laidback which can be worked upon.
Recommended.', "We ordered baby potato, fries, topped nachos, crispy lotus stem, pizza and a few mocktails. The starters were amazing. Freshly made and a pungent taste. The pizza here is differently made than the rest of the places I've been. Made a mistake ordering the Flamo(half of the pizza is on fire using rum). It was too strong. The mocktails were very good.", 'Food coma us equipped with a minimalistic yet adequate decor.
They serve a mix of North Indian, Chinese and Continental food.
Food was delicious and filling.
To me the menu seemed a bit incomplete. Can be improved']

more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only,

address: 318, 6th Main Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Wine, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Rooftop, Table reservation required, Kid Friendly,
reviews:
['Forage has been on our go-to list for some time. The menu is interesting with its healthy eating options. To top it up, the ambiance is amazing. The seating area is cosy, private and non-intrusive. Lots of green, lots of books and lots of space. Definitely would go back to Forage!

P.S : we absolutely loved the kale pasta. Thanks Forage! Keep the great work going!', 'Discovered a wonderful place at Indiranagar. It‚Äôs a proper fancy date restaurant but the food is spot on! 
I ordered 1) Jalape√±o mushroom pasta with Parmesan and lemon-hands down one of the best I‚Äôve had that includes pasta from Italy.
2) veal and bacon wrap roast- the meat was absolutely tender 
3) shroom wraps- packed full of flavours feels good on the tummy and taste buds 
4) and some ros√© to go with it 

Price wise- I‚Äôd say heavy on the pocket. So save this one for the special nights.
For more such reviews follow my page @dishiidish on Instagram! #dishiidish #bangalorefoodblogger #bangalorefoodies #bangalorefoodiesclub #bangalorefoodie #europeanfood #pasta #mushrooms #veal', 'Quiet and earthy, forage has a homely feeling. On a weekday, you‚Äôre likely to be the only guest visiting. So if you‚Äôre looking for a quiet restaurant for some me-time, this is your best bet. 

Go there with a book or pick one from their selection to keep your coffee company. 

The food menu was exclusive and presumably healthy. The portion sizes though were a tad disappointing. I went home and had dinner over my mains at forage. Not the kinda place that would give you value for money.', 'Love the bespoke and artisanal food, but not the service. The portions are small, but delightful, and surprisingly filling! Will go again, probably, a few times, just for the food. For some reason the waiters tend to be a bit pompous and come up with excellent excuses not to "serve ice with water because they ran out of ice" (who runs out of ice when you have a kitchen to prepare the delicacies offered on their menu?!) In any case, this place is quite a treasure, and a needed change from the high-end joints that only promote "tikka kebab masala". Hope this establishment survives in Bangalore. Disappointing that they only serve international/imported wines -- it means that your bill doubles if you want to enjoy a glass, they should consider putting some high end Indian wines (Sula ain't that bad, you know!) if possible.']

reviews:
['Biryani served in clay pot with good taste, flavor and meat. A pot can easily serve two people. Along with biryani the other dishes are also great in taste. Place is neat and the service is quick and responsive.

Lunch hours are jam packed so plan your time accordingly. Overall a good experience.', 'This is the best biryani place we have got nearby Domlur area. whenever I go to the Domlur office I always try to have my lunch with a delicious chicken biryani they serve.

They have almost all Biryani options available in market and I normally prefer chicken dum biryani which is spicy as well as they can make it less spicy on the request but every time the makeup awesome taste.

Service is normally good however this is really crowded between 1:30 to 2:30. Even the rest time this server really speed fast however anything else than Biryani but might take time.

Overall my go to restaurants for biryani near around the Domlur office.']

reviews: ['Best Butter Chicken in the city. No doubt about it. My standard order here is butter chicken with missi roti or choor choor naan. The food is absolutely great. It is exactly how punjabi cuisine should be. In starters I like the chicken tikka or the nargisi tikka. Down all the amazing food with the sweet lassi. The quantity of the food is also very good and there‚Äôs no way you walk out hungry. Absolute must visit for butter chicken lovers !!']

address: 2023/A, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Butter Chicken', 'Dal Makhani', 'Murgh Lababdar', 'Paneer Tikka', 'Roti', 'Mango Lassi', 'Bhindi Masala']
reviews:
["Now a days, Bengaluru has got many places where they serve Chaap, Punjabi Chaap corner is one of them.

They have very good Chaap varieties and quality of Chaap is good and Tasty.

They have seating of 20 and is family restaurant too

I loved the Achari Chaap had a succulent marination and tangy and tasty chaap and jaljira was spicy and good Chaap, best amongst chaaps Malai Chaap was good.

Onion kulcha was good with Chaap gravy which was really balanced and very flavorful gravy.

I loved Carrot Halwa! It was mildly sweet and Kesari Flavor was popping in it.

Overall a great place for Chaap I'm Bengaluru", "***** New Place alert*****
Trust me this place serves best chapps in the bengaluru which is located opposite Horizon School,Indiranagar.

What are chaaps ?Primarily chaaps are made of Soya beans it's mocked meat which has similar textures of meat but it is 100% VEGETARIAN and protein diet.

Ambiance :
It's two floored building with kitchen at the ground floor and dining at the first floor which can easily accommodate max 25 people.

Food:
Starters:
\xa0We started with jaljala chaap i must say it was best at it's taste.
then we tried achari mushroom tikka, malai chaap, afghani stuffed chaap, lemon chaap tikka all tasted really good.

Maincourse:
In the main course we tried bhindi masala, soya chaap fried rice, aloo onion kulcha, tandoori naan,chaap gravy
for me what stood out from all was Soya chaap fried rice and chaap gravy must try at this place
\xa0
Desserts:
\xa0we had Gulub Jamun and carrot halwa both were extremely good

Overall rating:
Food : 5/5
Ambiance :4/5
Service:5/5!", 'Punjabi Chaap Corner is a new place in Indiranagar that specialises in serving an array of chaaps. It‚Äôs a vegetarian restaurant, a quaint little place tucked away in a by lane. It‚Äôs a small place that can seat around 25 people. 

Recently went there with my friends to try out their chaap delights. We started with the Tandoori paneer tikka burger which was flavourful and tasted good. In the chaaps I really liked the Afghani Chaap, Afghani Stuffed Chaap and Jaljala Chaap. 

The achari mushroom tikka was delicious. The stand out dish was the Chaap gravy with naan and onion paratha which was very tasty. The Chaap fried rice was very unique and subtle in taste. Bhindi masala was a bit bland. Afghani chaap roll was scrumptious too. 

We also tried the gajar ka halwa and gulab jamun which were decent. 

Overall really liked the unique varieties of Chaap at this place and it‚Äôs worth a try.', "Swaad Jo Dil pe chaap jaaye : Punjabi chaap corner.
Had been here over a Saturday night for dinner with couple of friends.
A small cozy place. Simple decor and comfortable seating.
Had Malai chaap, jaljala chaap, achari chaap, lemon chaap. Bhindi masala and onion parota.
Loved the chaap preparation they are made fresh and served hot.
I personally liked lemon chaap because of its tangy taste and a hint of ajwain in it.
Jaljala chaap I'd another favorite as it's spicy .
Bhindi masala was nice .
Dessert i liked gajar halwa. It's just right .
Chaap pulav is nice. Fills you up. Not too heavy on tummy.
Mushroom Tikka is good. Fresh and crunchy shrooms used adds to the taste of the dish .", 'Guys they are the Ultimate Chaap Specialist. If you are a Chaap Lover or you have never tried Chaap then this place will change your perception. Crafted to perfection these chaaps just Taste Great and are full of Flavours. So you can try their Paneer Tikka Burger, Chaap Fried Rice, Chaap Tikka Masala, Jaljala Chaap , Afgani Chaap and a lot of other stuffs. They also have desserts and my personal favorite is gulab jamun.
Ambience-4/5 (small place and if more people are there it becomes little stuffy)
Food-4.5/5..
Service- 4/5.', 'Baap of chaap, punjabi chaap is now in bangalore.. Good news for all chaap lovers and for those who are missing delhi food.punjabi is a place which serves amazing chaaps and its purely a vegetarian restaurant.
Coming to the ambiance, its a two floored building which can accommodate 20-25 people at once with kitchen at ground floor and dining at first floor.

Coming to the food, tried paneer tikka burger, chaap roll, jaljala chaap, achari mushroom tikka, malai chaap, afghani stuffed chaap, lemon chaap tikka in starters. Must try items are jaljala chaap, achari mushroom tikka

And in main course tried bhindi masala, soya chaap fried rice, aloo onion kulcha, tandoori naan and everything were amazing...
Coming to the desserts, both gulab jamun and gajar ka halwa are delicious...

Follow @pallavi.ganta in instagram for more food updates.', "Punjabi chaap corner is a new place in Indiranagar for all chaap lovers. It's a small place to hop into and try their variety of chaaps. They also serve various other Chinese items as well.
I did try their:
Lemon chaap Tikka
Achari mushroom Tikka
Jaljala chaap: if you are spice lover
Tandoori paneer Tikka burger: good and very soft buns, loved it
Bindi masala
Soya chaap fried rice
Aloo onion kulcha: loved having it crispy and hot
Gazar halwa & jamun: halwa was good having minimal sweet, jamun could have been bit softer
Overall a good place to try their variety in chaaps. It has good ambience & hospitality.", 'This is the first time I tried Chaap in Bangalore and I loved it. There were 3 types of Chaap and a Chaap gravy with fried rice which were all fab. 

Can‚Äôt wait for my veg friends to try the place üòÅ', 'Soya Chaaps- the protein filled dish are recently introduced in Bengaluru. These things are made from soya beans and used in various ways. This place has a wide variety of Chaap dishes to offer to its customers.

As we were excited about Soya Chaap, we tried a few of them- Malai Chaap, Jaljala Chaap and Afghani stuffed Chaap. The soya was very soft and tender, every dish was very much distinct in flavor and taste.

Achari mashroom Tikka was little spicy but it was very well grilled and it had absorbed the marination properly.

They also had soya chaap curry which went well with stuffed onion and aloo kulcha. The kulcha was soft, stuffings were of adequate amount.

One dish which got our attention was Soya chaap fried rice. It is one must have dish here. And for dessert Gagar halwa, Gulab jamoon to end the radical adventure
Cheers!! #BurpOutLoudly
                                                burpoutloudly.com', 'Pocket friendly menu.
Food is tasty.
Thali options are great.
Good for friends gathering.']

reviews: ['A delivery service that offers some unique samosa in town being a vegetarian was impressed by the samosa and chai for a perfect rainy evening\n1.Maggi Samosa : Maggi stuffed in the samosa ( As i prefer my samosa much more flakier i felt it was a little hard)\n2.Ginger Tea : A chai can never go wrong it only can get better and they have got it right', 'Love for chai makes me try chai at different outlets. Found the menu of chainama interesting and ordered maggi samosa, gud wali ginger chai, chicken kheema samosa. Samosa were hot and looked Mouth-wateringly yummy. Chai was hot when delivered. Impressive packaging. Samosas were given with sweet onion sauce in Kolkata style. The sauce was fingerlicking good. Maggi samosa is something unique that I found in their menu. And, it definitely tastes very good. Chicken kheema samosa was again upto the mark. Gud wali ginger made with jaggery tasted very good. So, I had a perfect snack time with lip-smacking food from Chainama.']

more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Valet Parking Available,
reviews:
["Looking for authentic North Indian/Punjabi food in the heart of Indiranagar? Do not think twice, head to Tandoori Taal right away!The ambience is pretty cool, gives a very Pind Punjab feel! :) Start off your meal with aam panna or a glass of tall lassi, delicious. The tandoori chicken is absolutely delicious, a must have. If you're a tad confused about what appetizers to order, simply order the non-veg (or veg) platter. Problem solved, the kababs and tikkas are awesome.\xa0 There are multiple options for main course and you can order based on what you feel like eating on that visit. Might want to avoid the sea food here, go all out for the chicken and mutton with lachcha paratha.The staff is ourteous enough and the delicious food will make you want to return very soon. :)", 'Service was quick and friendly.. Ambience is good too.. Must try Mutton chops.. It was really good and yummy.. Chicken briyani was decent..

Food-4 Ambience-4 Service-4', 'Superb Ambiance and very Courteous and Efficient Staff. Excellent food and awesome Taste. Tandoori aloo, peas pulao, Dal masala were superbly made and lip smacking in taste.
Huge variety of North Indian food and not very costly also. Hats off to the Chef for giving such a huge variety and not compromise on Taste. The starters are delicious and the main course were also delicious. Really worth every rupee.
I would Recommend it highly for a stupendous quality and quantity of the food and excellent taste.', "One of the best casual dining places in Bangalore for north indian food. Went here on a Saturday afternoon without prior booking and easily got a table. Ordered the palak mushroom starter and chaas,the mushroom starter didn't look great but tasted delicious ! For mains we ordered naans, paneer butter masala and mutton Biryani. The naan with the gravy was out of this world, it was perfectly buttered and the portions were good too. The biryani was not spicy but extremely flavourful and totally worth the money. The service was prompt and quick so we didn't waste time waiting for the food.
I am going to be a regular to this place going forward !"]

more_info: Home Delivery, Standing Tables,
reviews: ['', 'In love with this place totally. Everything i ordered starting from pav bhaji to vada pav to chaats was totally worth it. The price point is also good, a good pocket friendly placed for people like me who order regularly from outside. Would love to try other menu items as well. Great work guys! Keep it up.', 'Highly recommended if you are looking for some authentic mumbai style food and on time delivery. Zomato delivered my food on time and the restaurant made my day by offering me awesome pav bhaji late night. The butter pav bhaji was amazing!', 'Placed an order for Pav Bhaji and Vada Pav. The best part was i had an authentic mumbai pav in Bangalore after a long time. The bhaji was also nicely prepared and the vegetables were mashed properly just as authentic as mumbai pav bhaji. Loved the food and the packaging and the delivery was also on time.', 'Placed an order through zomato for pav bhaji and vada pav. Really liked the food and the quality. The food came in an awesome packaging and was delivered on time as well. Loved the over all experience form this place. Highly recommended if you are craving for some authentic Maharashtrian street food.', 'The best part about this place is the taste of the food and packaging. My favourite here is pav bhaji and vada pav. Indiranagar finally has some awesome mumbai stuffs. Lovely menu and lively food.', 'Lovely place and best part is their offerings which is authentic Mumbai style street food. My favourite being pav bhaji and papdi chaat. The packaging is something was is really impressive and the food was also delivered on time by ZOMATO. 5/5 for food, 5/5 for packaging and finally 5/5 for delivery. Pocket friendly place and worth a try for sure. Highly recommended.', 'Best food so far in Bangalore if you are searching for Mumbai style food. I placed an order for pav bhaji and the best part was I finally found a place in Bangalore which serves authentic Mumbai style pav. Highly recommended if you are looking for a place which serves authentic maharashtrian street food. Good menu and great food and awesome packaging.', 'Great place if you are craving for some authentic mumbai style food starting from vada pav to pav bhaji. The packaging is great and the delivery was also on time and totally loved the food. Big fan of this place for mumbai style food.', 'This place offers some awesome Mumbai menu. As the name goes it serves some of the famous dishes from Mumbai and after trying their food I can say that they totally understand the Mumbai style food starting from pav quality to vada and bhaji. There are few few places in Bangalore who gives authentic mumbaiya pav and this place is for sure one of them. Pups love to try their chaats soon to give a final verdict on their expertise :)']

address: Skywalk, Lower Ground Floor, Assaye Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore

reviews:
['', "I ordered 2 chicken shawarma must say it's pathetic. All i got was onions and garlic cream . Heard so many good reviews about this place. After ordering from here i recommend not to order from here. Seriously paying 180 to receive this is an embarrassment .", 'Had 2 regular chicken shawarmas long time back. The place is quite small with some space to sit. The shawarmas were okay but nothing special. Overall, its just okay for a quick bite.', 'taste of the shawrma is really good. nice sitting arrangement and staffs are very professional...keep up the good work............................', "They do one thing but they do it right. The name is more than apt.
That's as precise a description as any. They have a few choices for a shawarma and they're all pretty good.", 'I was feeling hungry in office around 5 pm so order Whole Meat Shawarma from just shawarma.\xa0
Food was packed well and get delivery also on time.The quantity was sufficient for one person but the taste of Shawarma was average.', 'So I like the fact that the staff are amenable and that we get healthy options like whole wheat kubooz here. But the restaurant is not at all clean. The tables are really really greasy. üò¢üò¢', 'You probably would have named it Just Onionsü§®

I never had a worst shawarma like this before even at a roadside shop. Actually, they make better.
Whole Meat Shawarma which is filled with 60% of onion. And a few meat pieces.üòí The size was small for the price.  

I liked the package and wrapper. The wrapper is a thick paper and foil kind of a coating inside. So shawarma is not sticking to the paper. 
Quick delivery anywayüöö', 'Highly recommended the Malgoum Shawarma if you like Shawarma with juicy meat (not spicy). I ordered this one for an evening snack and was left craving for more. Absolutely delicious!', 'Ordered a "Shawarma on your Plate" combo which had Shawarma, Pita Breads, Fries and Mayo. The quantity was sufficient for one person but the taste of Shawarma was bit bland and the fries were very oily. Packing was decent.']

reviews: ['Tried rava masala dosa from adigas Indiranagar branch, a relatively new branch and was pretty satisfied with my order. The dosa tasted good and was decently crisp on delivery. Best thing was serving both sambhar and coconut chutney in plastic bowls, unlike other brands that serve flat dried chutney inbetween polythene layers and sambhar in a polythene bag. This was good and I could happily enjoy the Chutney with good fluidity. Packaging is good and delivery on time. \n                                                instagram.com']

address: 8/6, 1st Floor, Kensington Point, Ulsoor Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
known_for: Cheerful Goan ambience and befitting food.
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Outdoor Seating, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area, Table booking recommended,
reviews: ['Lovely ambience, has got a open space and a closed ac place too. One can see the busy ulsoor area near 1MG Mall from the windows. The interiors are beautiful and very colorful. Coming to food, had chicken cutlet, which was mouthwatering. Tasted Crab Rachaedo too, I m personally not a fan of crabs so I m not justified to judge it. In main course, tried Mangalore style pulimunchi prawns with Appam, and it was delicious. In desserts, tried the infamous Bibinca with icecream and Dodol with icecream, which has the essential Coconut Jaggery taste. Both the deserts did full justice to their hype. What they really need to improve is their service time, which is huge. Apart from that, a great visit.', 'After watching Stand Up comedy in Tekhla Auditorium, my friend and I decided to visit this restaurant for some good seafood. This restaurant is located just 1 km away from the auditorium and has a great cozy ambiance. We ordered seafood pizza and crab soup. Seafood pizza was great with a good amount of toppings. Crab soup was spicy with good crab chunks. I would definitely visit this place again to try out more items. ü•∞\n\nWith Sampad Rout', 'ÈÄ±Êú´„ÅÆ„É©„É≥„ÉÅÊôÇ„Å´ÂàùÂæÄË®™„ÄÇÂ†¥ÊâÄ„ÅØ„Ç≥„É≥„É©„ÉÉ„Éâ„Éõ„ÉÜ„É´Ââç„ÄÅÂêå„ÅòÁ≥ªÂàó„Åã„Çπ„ÉÜ„Éº„Ç≠Â∞ÇÈñÄÂ∫ó„Ç∞„É™„É´„Éè„Ç¶„Çπ„ÅÆÁúü‰∏ä„ÄÇ‰ªä„Å´„ÇÇÊ≠¢„Åæ„Çä„Åù„ÅÜ„Å™ÊóßÂºè„Å™„Ç®„É¨„Éô„Éº„Çø„Éº„Åß‰∏ä„Åå„Çã„Å®„ÅäÂ∫ó„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„ÄÇÁùÄÂ∫ß„Åô„Çã„Å®„Åô„Åã„Åï„ÅöÊú¨Êó•„ÅÆÊµ∑ÈÆÆ„Çí„Éó„É¨„Çº„É≥„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Çå„Çã„ÄÇ„Ç¥„Ç¢ÊñôÁêÜÂ∞ÇÈñÄÂ∫ó„Å†„Åë„ÅÇ„Å£„Å¶„ÄÅÈÄöÂ∏∏„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„ÉâÊñôÁêÜ„Å®„ÅØÁï∞„Å™„Çã„É°„Éã„É•„ÉºÊßãÊàê„ÄÇÂë≥„ÇÇÊú¨Ê†ºÁöÑ„ÄÇ‰∏ÄÁÇπÊÆãÂøµ„Å™„ÅÆ„ÅØ„ÄÅ„Åì„Å°„Çâ‰∏ã„Å´„Éê„Çπ„ÅÆ‰πóÂêàÂ†¥ÊâÄ„Å®„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Åõ„ÅÑ„ÅãÈ®íÈü≥„Åå„Åã„Å™„ÇäÊøÄ„Åó„Åè„Åæ„Åü„Éõ„Ç≥„É™„Å£„ÅΩ„ÅÑ„Åì„Å®„ÄÇ']

address: 39, Opposite IBP Petrol Pump, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,

reviews:
['Bengaluru has always disappointed me when it comes to food . Luckily I came across this restaurant the food is delicious , serves the taste osdf hyderabad as promised\xa0 unlike the other restaurants\xa0 who serve pathetic food . Biriyani is superb , lollipos are delicious.', 'Spicy, There should be option to curate the spicyness as per customer. Otherwise it was good', 'Well maintained taste, lollipops are really good.', '', 'I expected a hyderabadi biriyani, apparently I got a plane rice with 2 pieces of chicken with it, please remove the pic if the biriyani is not like as it appears.', 'Had ordered a boneless biryani, its was nice and the quantity sufficient enough to have you over loaded. The only thing that was a little too much was that it was extra spicy and that they should provide some extra raita it was very less in quantity', 'Ordered boneless special chicken briyani.
Taste was ok not so great. Chicken pieces adequate. Rice was dry and only raita is given and no curry.
Overall average taste.', 'Biriyani is good. Must try chicken biriyani.. too good. Very spicy... And chicken piece is less for biriyani. Some time I will get salad, Rita and onion salad, it depending upon luck.. they will not maintain consistent... Dont expect every time.. bad luck...For some times you will get plain Britain without salad and ritha', "From this place, I order at least 4-5 times in a month. Love to taste the paneer Briyani and chicken Biryani. It's served Briyani along with kebab.

Very reasonable price and on time delivery. It serves really hot and delicious. On weekdays when tired of boring food, wanna try a tasty food then this is the perfect one.", 'I ordered paneer biryani combo from this place through zomato. The combo had Gobi Manchurian and Paneer Biryani although it was mentioned Veg Kebab in the menu. The biryani had 2 big fried chunks of paneer. It was served with raita and salad. The taste was good but I felt the paneer chunks could have been more. Overall it was an average experience.']

address: 541, Ground Floor, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Vegan Options,
reviews:
['Visited this place with my friend recently. As the name suggests its known for its crispy falafel and middle eastern food. Ordering at the counter is very easy and simple and it‚Äôs like a fast food chain system but healthy food... I liked the falafel platter a lot. The pita with dips was also good but I liked the hummus the most in it..

Rolls are large and fill you up easily. Burger was also nice. But both roll and burger was little bland to taste.
Lemonade and grape juice were awesome, very fresh and tasty 
Price is very cheap and everyone can afford. Quantity and quality is great for that price.. value for money. Give it a go', 'I enjoyed the Big meal which came with Bread, falafel n hummus, however, did not enjoy the pocket which was very dry. 

Coming to the price, I think they are very decently priced and the hummus is tasty. Surprisingly, their drinks were superb, even the basic Lemonade was awesome. So, if ur working around CMH, run down their for a quick meal and get back to work üòä', 'The place is very neatly maintained and one of the best & clean open kitchen that I have ever noticed !!! The staffs are so friends and the interiors looks so classic and elegant. Now talking about the food this place is exclusively for authentic Mediterranean street food, fresh, affordable, quick and healthy falafel rolls and sandwiches.

At Habibi Falafel we get the most authentic falafel that one can find & also the freshest. Everything is homemade, from their falafel balls, which are fried to perfection right before your eyes the moment you order, freshly cut veggies of your choice from the salad bar, homemade hummus, mutabbal, tahina and pita bread is always baked fresh daily.

They also pickle their our own cucumbers, carrots and green chilis to make sure everything is natural, healthy & tasty', 'A nice small place on Indranagar main road, for Falafel. People from gulf will probably relate to this food.
Went with a friend for dinner, and ordered the Falafel Plate. The quantity was great, and we shared it, the salad was fresh, so was the hummus with fresh pita bread. Even the Falafel balls was well made.
For drink alongside it,we had Lemonana mint lemonade and orange, which was again fresh and a great with the main course.
The service was fast and friendly. The ambience was also great, with well adorned walls and nice lights.', "The food here was so so good. If hummus and pita bread are the kind of foods that get you excited, you have to try it out. They have a falafel version of various fast food variants, but their falafel plate is their best seller. It's for good reason - they have great pita bread, falafel that's perfectly crispy and three dips. The hummus is perfect, and the baba ganoush is accurate. The best part about this place is when you dine in, almost everything is below ‚Çπ100. That makes for a filling meal at such a cheap price. It's a definite must try and I'll be going back here often!", 'Well the food might be good but it was not my type. I ordered the Falafel Plate which was tasty and plate full. And then I made a mistake of ordering Hummus Fatteh which was no good for me.

Overall I would rate it as an average restaurant though the interiors and the staff were quite helpful.', 'We were invited to review this restaurant so we tried mint lemonade , grape juice , Falafel platter , Falafel salad and baklava. Everything tasted amazing and yet it was so affordable. The staff are really nice too. Must visit place for all Lebanese food lovers.', "I ordered food from this outlet for home delivery through zomato. The potato thing had fungus and they were smelly as well as the strings were coming out of it, I tried one piece and I knew this has no life left...how can a restaurant do that to a customer and send them such food. Guys be cautious when you visit this place, looks like they don't have customers and that's why they are sending rotten food.", 'If you are looking for vegan/healthy food, this is the place for it. Also its near to Indiranagar metro.
Staff is very friendly and they provide good service.
Ambience is good as well and they place arab music.

Things i ordered :
1. Falafel plate - It had falafel balls and hummus. 4.8/5
2. Pita chips and dips - 4.5/5
3. Ordered juices as well. They were good for the prices.
4. Burger - Burger was good as well.
5. For dessert, ordered Bakalva. Bakalva is the dessert pastry. Must try dish here. Would recommend to everyone.

They serve middle eastern street food in their authentic All the dishes are completely healthy, vegan. Do visit this place. They also have a branch in Koramangala.
Rating - 4.8/5', 'Some great food being served at this restaurant. Everything was made fresh and served hot! The ambience is nice with some Arab tunes playing in the background. They also serve quite a few vegan dishes. Will definitely be going back here. üòÅ']

address: Pyramid Food Court, Embassy Golf Links, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['This is the first time we placed an order here. And to say completely satisfied. The taste of the cakes were excellent. All friends enjoyed thoroughly. It‚Äôs truly a must try. Will get back here again and again. Special thanks to Pooja to handle the order exactly as required. All guests kept asking for more.', '', "The key lime pie was really eggy and the portion size was incorrigible for the price. The cookie was uncooked and inedible. It had raw dough and bits of butter and sugar that were not baked through. I was left disappointed considering their ganache tart that I've sampled in the past (despite the tiny portion size) was actually quite nice.", 'This place offers really mouth watering desserts. The brownies and the cookies are simple yummy and the Nutella jar is to die for. The cakes are also extremely tasty and is the perfect place for a person with a sweet tooth, with an added love for chocolate ü§§It is a little expensive but worth the money.', 'When life gave them lemons, boy did TGF deliver the best damn key lime pie known to man (at least in this side of the world). I‚Äôm a sucker for lemon desserts and never have I ever come across a fresher lemon curd or whatever lemon it is over the perfect amount of crisp. 
The tres leches is to die for too. Not too sweet because that‚Äôs the problem with most places that do it, but this one comes in a jar and it‚Äôs bae.', 'Ordered a brownie cake from this restaurant. It was pretty delicious and delivered on time. Also, the customer service is excellent. Keep it up guys!', 'This is Payal Review. Please continue giving discounts. Ganache is the best place in EGL for cakes and pastries. I love their flavours as well', "They have a small place at the entrance of pyramid. 
This place has some real tasty cheesecakes and pastries. 

Tried their Nutella, Red Velvet and blue berry cheesecakes. The Red Velvet cheesecake was the best, followed by Nutella. 

Would say they're a little on the pricier side. Will come back to try some more!", 'Amazing ganache tart. It‚Äôs sooo chocolatey and rich. I visit this place very often. Would recommend it . Amazing other stuff too but never had the opportunity to try anything else', 'They have amazing chocolate chip and dark chocolate brownies. Since I don‚Äôt live in Bangalore , I‚Äôm having to order to my city very often. They‚Äôre soft , adequate in sweetness and light in the stomach. And they come at very affordable prices. Hoping they expand to other cities as well !']

address: 30, K Kamaraj Road, Near Commercial Street, Commercial Street, Bangalore

most_liked_Food: [4, 'Sweet Lassi', 'Faluda', 'Mango Lassi', 'Fruit Salad', 'Kesar Badam Kulfi', 'Fruit Juices', 'Pudina Lassi']
reviews:
["What started out as a roadside stand that sells kulfis on Lavelle Road has grown into one of th most iconic spots on th city's food map,, with a branch in Dubai too !! They serve delicious Lassi which is so thick,, that we can eat it with a spoon.. Th desi matka they serve it in makes it feel closer to heart.. They also offer a crazy variety of ice creams,, sundaes,, shakes,, kulfis and sweets,, leaving you spoilt for choice.. Sreeraj Lassi Bar is the perfect place to satisfy all of your dessert cravings !!", 'I make it a point to visit this place every time I‚Äôm in Bangalore. Located right opposite to Westside on Commercial Street, Sreeraj Lassi Bar is famous for its lassi and kulfi. The taste is good and the price is super pocket friendly. It‚Äôs not like Lassi Shop where you have to stand and eat. You have seating available here. So that‚Äôs a plus! Perfect place to rest while shopping in Commercial Street. 
What we ordered:
‚ú®Mango mirchi sharbat: A unique blend of raw mango and green chilli and topped with Sabza seeds and ice cubes . Somewhat tastes like the pani of Pani Puri.
‚ú®Shrikhand
‚ú®Kesar kulfi
‚ú®black currant icecream
‚ú®Lassi
The bill was below 200 bucks! Kudos to the management. I will always be your loyal customer ‚ù§Ô∏è']

reviews:
['The place has good ambiance. We ordered a pizza which was average. However, for a place called chocolate heaven, the myraid of shakes we tried were Abysmal Most of them tasted sour!! Not recommended.', "This Place Has A Really Good Ambience And Also Decent Music. The Best Part Is That A Few Of The Tables Have Swings Instead Of Chairs. P.S Dont Actually Swing On Them üòÇ

The Menu Include's

1) Triple Decker Chocolate Fudge - Rs 220
2) Ferrero Rocher Sundae - Rs 250

Both Of These Were Alright Nothing Special, The Ferrero Rocher Used Was Really Old As It Was All Soft And No Crunch, Had A Similar Experience A Few Weeks Back With An Old Stock Of Ferrero.

Triple Decker Chocolate Fudge Is Alright I Suppose So You Can Go Ahead And Give It A Try.

Have Any Suggestions For Me, Go Ahead And Drop Them In The Comment Section üêº

Value: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
#thebighungrypanda #zomato #alwayshungry #sundae #chocolate #desserts #foodporn #foodgasm #foodblog #bloggerlife #foodieforlife #foodphotography #foodgasm #foodblogger #foodlover #foodblogfeed #foodcritic #foodreview #karnataka #bangalore", "We came across this outlet while we're out and about in commercial street. The staffs were really nice and service was pretty quick. However, the food was not all that impressive. We ordered coffee, hot chocolate, pancake and waffle. Almost half of the coffee cup was filled with just bubbles, hot chocolate was watery and needs more thickness to it. Both the waffle and pancake came with ice cream, however, everything was just too overly sweet that we couldn't finish half of it. We left the place with a high sugar rush. I would still recommend this place, however, just make sure to go easy on your order, like order a pizza and waffle or something to prevent the sugar rush.
                                                foodietrek.com", 'Stopped by to explore this place located on Kamaraj Road!

Good seating options and music in the ambience!

Ordered a chocolate waffle with marshmallow.
The waffle was very crumbly and the moment you use the cutlery the waffle breaks into small pieces unable to eat comfortably.
The taste was good, the marshmallow quantity could have been better.

The watermelon mojito was average! Lot of flavoring syrup was overpowering!

Overall a 3/5']

['Brunch with lots of food, music, and kids games. Food was average for the price.', 'This place has to be shut down immediately. We just wanted a soup on a rainy day. this small place may

address: 1st Floor, Pai Layout, Tin Factory, Old Madras Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Vegetable Biryani', 'Tandoori Chicken', 'Fish', 'Chilli Chicken', 'Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani', 'Afghan Chicken', 'Chicken Boneless Biryani']
reviews:
["I tasted my first Dum biryani at this restaurant. As I am a Vegetarian I found very limited options here. The Veg Dum Biryani was very tasty. It's priced at Rs. 140 which I found pretty decent compared to other biryani restaurants.", "Please dont order from this restaurant.. First they don't respect their customers ans they don't know the difference between normal Biryani and boneless Biryani.. Worst experience with hotel management", 'I don‚Äôt have words to say about the Taste, You guys are made our day awesome with Tummy full üòú Thank you management peoples to allow this meet ‚ù§Ô∏è So Best place we can go with our office team, friends and families. Very Descent and Hygiene food ü•ò', 'It is located at main road at PI layout.
Service is ok.
For non veg foodie, it is good.
veg food is okay.
over all average. you can consider this for casual dine.
Hyderabadi Biryani Utsav :)', 'This is what Zomato delivered to me from this restaurant. Extremely poor service. The package was not sealed .Our team was working on the weekend and decided to place order from this restaurant which is about 2 km from our office. Not only did the food arrive late, it looked pathetic. Attaching photos here .\xa0 It cost me INR 918 and Zomato did not even reimburse the amount ,because we sent back the package . Never place an oomline delivery from this resto.', "Hotel located on a prime main road and there are parking available outside. There is waiting here as many people come for eating here but their service is very quick. Taste is good not authentic hyderabadi but taste similar. Large combo is not that sufficient for two people and dragon chicken is awesome. It's a must try restaurant if you are around this place", 'Ordered paneer biryani, but i got a box full of white rice + some paneer pieces. i had to eat with pickle, didnt think anybody could cook this kind of worst biryani. really disappointing restaurant', 'Ordered Mutton Biriyani family pack.. it was really tasty. Good number of pieces. The mutton was tender and juicy. Quantity not sufficient for 4 people though.', 'Worst service. What is the use of taste if service is bad, making customers wait for ages. Better go for meghna or boriyani house, where service and taste go hand in hand']

address: 6/2, Primrose Road, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating, Wifi, All Day Breakfast,
reviews:
["To this amazing little cozy cafe at mg road! It is little but lot to explore it has such good ambiance and summer look vibes.

The food is fine one who usually enjoy English breakfast and who loves desserts it's a perfect place, to chill and hangout with your friends or mates or you can just head to get a cup of coffee as well.

The staff is very much curtious and friendly.

There is a cool section for kids as well to play and enjoy.
They have some amazing cup cakes and cakes to try for and one can order the customized cakes as well!
The caramel pancake is must try here when you visit.", 'This place is little difficult to find and roads are dug up which makes it little difficult to reach this place. Tried cold coffee and caramel cheesecake and both were really amazing. Set up is small and cute, has outdoor as well as indoor seating.', "A neat and clean place located on the inner roads. I ordered an almond fudge cake and lemon mirangue pie. Both of them were amazing,true to their names. The quality and quantity matched the prices quoted. Although I did feel that there were few things that were pricy on the menu.
The staff was friendly and interactive. It's a nice place to spend your evening with friends. Oh,they play nice music and they books for who would like to induce in some light reading too. There were many people who got their laptops and we're working there,so I'm guessing maybe there is free WiFi,I'm not too sure. Do check out the place once.", "This is a perfect place for people who enjoy serenity, it's stacked with books and people are encouraged to take books after dropping one of theirs. That itself was enough to make me happy!

They have a good range of baked goodies and entremets. I tried a rich chocolate cake, it was a delicious bliss in my mouth moment, I fell in love with it. Later, we had a refreshing lemon tea.

I bought home their apple pie, which is tasty. And the Innovative chocolate mousse in a cup and gooey brownie, which was decent. Not to forget, the rum truffles, which was great. Rum filled centre was worth every penny.

If you love a quite place to enjoy your book or an intimate conversation, this is the place! The ambience is true love, everything is subtle and neat. I so want to visit again!

Hope this was helpful! :)", "I've tried the Brownies, Cupcakes and Chocolate Mousse from Happy Belly Bakes in the past. But, I've always called for Home Delivery.
It was the first time I visited their outlet, and it's such a cute little cafe. So vibrant and lively and the desserts will keep you drooling.

I was here to attend a Chocolate Workshop on World Chocolate Day, and the Chef taught us how to make Salame Dolce and Molten Chocolate Cake. It was such a fun event, and the outcome of our desserts was pretty awesome.

Apart from mouthwatering cakes and desserts, they have quite a few tempting savouries on their menu too.
With everything priced reasonably, it is definitely value for money."]
