address: 28, 4th B Cross, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Free Parking, Indoor Seating, Catering Available, Kid Friendly, Live Sports Screening, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['awesome food, great ambiance ....specially the sitting arrangement......we enjoyed a lot , along with the facilities given like soft music, charging slots and pillows to spent a quality time. service was also awesome they were contentiously paying attention towards our need with a smiley face. üòäüòäüòäüòä......you should try barbecue mandi there...it is delicious.', 'Nice place and comfortable seating.......The here is good and tasty.....specially the Lebanese Grill and chicken mandi is a must try.', "Ambience wise it's nice. Tried Sheesh tok and chicken faham mandi, both were very tasty. Desert wise they have very less option and not everything from menu was available. For beverages they should include few options like lime soda or fruit juices", 'Well this review was due for while - been to Arabic Kitchen 4 times already. The first taste of Boneless Faham chicken was heavenly and we ordered that every time we visited this place. We are ardent lovers of Arabic food, Kabsa or mandi. First time we had mutton fry mandi, we were taken aback by the succulent nature of the mutton (falling off the bones) and the magnanimity of the guys at restaurant willing to offer more fried onion and cashew nuts. The rice is flavourful and every time we visited this place we attempted to have the same combination of food (although sometimes their mutton run out early). We also tried Sheesh Towk and found it yummy too. A must return place for us.', "I went by the reviews and I ordered a Chicken Faham Mandi, a Mutton Juicy Mandi and a Full plate Malai Kabab through Zomato. Let me tell you, NONE of them were upto the mark, not a single item.

They gave copious amount of bland, tasteless Biriyani rice, but that was the only item they gave generously.

Chicken of the Faham was extremely dry and hard. It was rather overcooked.

Juicy mutton didn't taste like mutton at all and was more fat than meat. The poppy-seed gravy that accompanied the mutton tasted the worst. I felt like I was chewing on rubber.

The only thing that tasted good was Malai Kabab. It was perfectly cooked, soft and juicy, but the portion was definitely not worth the money.

Overall, I didn't like anything from this restaurant. Two of the items I ordered are supposedly best-sellers, which is what proves the point that ratings on Zomato are often fake and done purely for marketing.", "If you looking for proper elite mandi, Then this should be the pick. Trust me, It's a flawless Mandi out there, Can't say about other stuffs in the menu but I would be visiting here only for Mandi.", '', "Tried all chicken mandi's. All r gud n my fav is chicken bbq mandi. I tried all veg mandi's too.
Never choose a veg mandi as its worthless for the cost.", 'Hi had ordered chicken mandi and Lebanese grill chicken mandi was good and Lebanese chicken to was good but the quantity of the grill item was very less compare to the price see to it that you increase the quantity as per the price try to maintain the same taste', '']

address: 54, 3rd Main Road, Defence Colony, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Chettinad, South Indian, Chinese, North Indian
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
reviews:
['Legendary place with some legendary stuff being served. Dry mutton gravy was amazing, mutton cooked to perfection. Surmai or Vanjaram was stale and not upto mark. Mutton biryani was good.', "Ordered Chapatis and Appams for which I had wait for 1 hour. To add to that agony, Chapatis were smelly. I don't know if it was the dough or the chapatis that were stale, but I did not touch it further. Appams seemed fresh, but they were unusually fat in the middle like some potbellied person. Edible, but just to fill the stomach.

Not satisfied.", "Visited Anjappar on Saturday with family as we were looking for some great Chettinad food. And we weren't disappointed!

The restaurant is on 3rd Main, 100 feet road, near CCD and you won't miss it. The place looks neat, but not over-the-top fancy either! Coming to the food, we ordered Special Anjappar Chicken masala as a starter. This was good, quantity could have been a lil more though. For mains, we had Chettinad fish curry which was delicious and special Karaikudi chicken which was also great. The naans were fabulous, so soft, warm and perfect, best naans I've had. You must try the elineer payasam, which is served in a glass (like milk) and not in a bowl. Absolutely delicious, full of tender coconut goodness!

Staff is helpful and recommends dishes to try out. Request Zomato to upload their new menu which is much more elaborate than what's currently visible. Many more visits to Anjappar are required to try out more delicious dishes!", "I loved this restaurant and I would not rate them less than 5 because I could not find any flaws. It was my first time trying chettinad style food and I knew what to expect because I was aware of the flavours and cooking techniques implemented in chettinad cuisine. And what I got surpassed my expectations. We ordered idiyappams, mutton kothu parotta, mutton varuval, and prawns 65 that was chef's special and lemon soda to water it all down. Everything was just so right. These prawns, they were the crunchiest, but not at all oily and they retained their sweetness and juiciness. The mutton was perfectly cooked and oozed out flavours. The idiyappams were light and the chutneys served along with them complimented everything so well. The kothu parotta was very very different from what I imagined it to be, but was a bit heavy.
All the staff were exceptionally good, the service was prompt and the orders sprung out of the kitchen full speed. How?

Going again for sure!"]

Guy give it a try you won't regret it... #bangalorefood", 'Absolutely love the soups. My favourite is the apple tomato, the mushroom and leek, and the broccoli almond. Wasn‚Äôt well this week and wanted soup so been ordering nonstop.']

address: 777/K, Nitin Elite Complex, 13th Main Road, 100 Feet Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Chimney coke for the first time,loved the food and the ambience.The savoury cone is so yumm,the red velvet dessert cone is my fav..loved the ambience and the host Ruthwik is super good..
Must recommended', 'Best Hungarian cafe is opened in Indiranagar with authentic price and chimney cones ice cream and chicken savory are must try.
Food-5/5
Price-4.5/5
Ambience - 5/5
Give it a try', "This place have amazing sweet and savoury chimney cones/cakes. They are a speciality of Hungarian split cake specially from Transylvania.
They come with a twist to the Indian way in Kurtoskalacs inspired by the famous Hungarian cake.
My personal favorite is the spinning corn with corn and spinach in veg, ghee roast and Carolina chicken, if you prefer a little tinge of sweet.
In spicy the Green Street is good.
In desserts I loved the Nutella Curl and Tiramisu.
Watermelon cooler was nice and even the green apple one.
They even have amazing shakes to offer like the Nutella shake and the Banana Peanut butter shake etc.
Highly recommend if you are looking for some lip smacking desserts which aren't that sweet..", "A m a z I n g food, trust me when I say that. This outlet is serving so good. I for myself ordered Green street andra style chicken, more on a spicy side, ahhh just loved the flavours. In shake I had red velvet, perfectly made not that sweet. Tried some other shakes too, completely balanced.
My friend had their ghee roast and it was the best she said. Not only the savory, I loveeeeeed the desserts. I had sumrf, it's a white chocolate based dessert and it was too delicious.", "This was my first visit to kurtoskalacs not particularly kurtoskalacs but first time trying out the chimney cones n cakes.

I always wanted to visit the Koramangala branch but I got a chance to visit the newly opened branch in Indiranagar.

Started off with the Nutella shake n also tried the caramel banana shakes, both were super good.
The Nutella shake indeed had a Nutella flavour in it unless like other I tried which had a more flavour of chocolate ice cream rather than Nutella.

I went here to try the chimney desserts n cakes but also tried their Savory which turned out to be damn delicious.

Tried almost all the cones from but chicken to spinach n corn and mushroom everything were equally good in flavours n taste.

I liked every other chimney desserts from here. The Nutella swirl was my favourite coz who doesn't love Nutella.", 'I remember a year back I visited the first branch of Kurtoskalacs and I had never hear of Kurtos (chimney cones) but I was totally in awe with the entire concept. And a year later a new branch in Indiranagar is as amazing if not more amazing than the Koramangala. From shakes to lemonades, savoury to dessert chimney cones, surprise you with their yummy taste.\xa0 This is a must visit for any one who hasn‚Äôt tried Kurtos and a worthy visit to all those who have tried as well.
                                                ...Read full post on younus.in', 'Kurtoskalacs Indiranagar has a wide variety of chimney cones and cakes.

Right from the milkshakes to their desserts, the whole meal was great! The best things to order are - the mixed berry milkshake, the Ghee Roast or the Butter Chicken savoury cone (and Magic Shrooms for a vegetarian option) and the Nutella Curl dessert cone. The quality and quantity is top notch, and one cone truly makes up a meal. The prices are affordable and the food is made in front of you as you order. It was a great experience overall.', 'A great place for Hungarian food. The ambiance is fine. Something new and different. They have chimney cones with both savoury and sweet filling. We tried the red velvet and magic shrooms chimney cones which were amazing.The cones were very soft and warm since they were freshly baked. The staff was friendly and very interactive. They explain the menu in detail.
Ambience-3.5/5
Food-5/5
Price-4/5
Service-3.5/5']

address: 56/5, Ground Floor, Center Point Building, Residency Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Not at all the authentic taste as I had expected. Their so-called signature Galawati kabab was a watery bland version of the seekh kabab stuffing served on excessively oily marie-biscuit-sized parathas; forget about melt-in-the-mouth experience! The Irani chicken tikka was small, wrapped with excess cheese and nothing special in taste too. All in all I had entered with lots of expectation which went invain. Actual prices are also more than it was showing on Zomato! A pathetic experience!', 'The ambience is good and gives you a real mughlai feel.
Songs here will remind you of 90s bollywood and are a delight to your ears.
Coming to food, the food here was simply delicious and mouthwatering. 
The murgh peahavari is a must try. Nalli nihari is also good. 
Garlic naans are perfectly baked. 
However the gelwati kebabs were a spoiler to the food. Being a lucknowite we have a soft corner gor kebabs. And their gelawati kebabs are no where near the originals.
Chicken biriyani was also good.
Overall 4/5']

address: Prestige RR 55/1 & 55/9, 2nd Floor, Church Street, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, Live Music, Table booking recommended, Wifi,
reviews:
['I visited this place on a Saturday evening with a wonderful ambience and ample seating area. To start with I had the Mexican margarita cocktail which was just amazing. To start with food, I had the spinach mushroom balls which is bread crumb fried preparation which was just amazing. Then I had the chicken strips which was also just out of the world good. Then I had the baby chicken wings which was very good as well. Then I had the crispy corn which is prepared like a chaat and has amazing flavours. Then I had the crispy corn chaat which is also just amazing and good. Then I tried the veg manchurian balls which had very good flavours. Then I tried the cheesy chicken burger which had cheese oozing out of chicken in every bite and is one of the must try dishes there. Then I also tried the penne in white sauce chicken which was also great. The white sauce was very good. This is a must visit place and is a great place to hangout with friends.', "It's situated right above Starbucks at church street, not crowded for a weekend lunch.
.
We ordered two burgers and nachos.
.
Veg grill exotic burger and Peri Peri burger. The buns of the Burger were amazing and super soft. I like the exotic burger more which had a BBQ flavour.
The Peri Peri burger was average, it was just paneer with Peri Peri sauce.
This was served with crispy fries.
.
Veg and cheese nachos, just onion and tomato spread on nachos and cheese served in the center was good.
.
Overall: 3.5/5", 'Yes yes , a place to hangout with friends, very calm place and relaxing one 

Food was good and mocktail were bad and too many ice cubes and diluted 

Good place to visit 

Staff could improve the service and provide two wheeler parking 

Overall a good place', 'Amazing place in church Street with great food. The mocktails were amazing! The veg and nonveg platters tasted great. The decor is fancy. The staff are very friendly. The chicken wings were super spicy! I just wished the quantity of food they offered was a tad bit more!', 'The food was decently good, starters were nice.
Service was also good.

Since we were there on some random standup comedy show day, so we ended up enjoying a lot because of that as well!', "Nothing special about this place. The ambience, staff, service and even the taste of food and drinks were just average.
Tried~
üî∏Crispy Corn Chat: american corn tossed in tomato and onion. It was just okay.
üî∏Chicken Loaded Fries: fries topped with chicken, and black olives. Tasted good but the quantity of chicken was very less.
üî∏Nachos: just doritos tossed with vegetables.
üî∏Tandoori Chicken Skewers: chicken wasn't roasted properly and it lacked flavour.
üî∏Virgin Mojito: it's a classic and cannot go wrong but here there way too much mint.
üî∏Summer Cooler: it had a strong berry flavour and tasted good.
Few items were unavailable and it made more difficult to like the experience in this place."]

address: Level 5, 1 MG Road Mall, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Great food and service, would highly recommend. Went there on mothering Sunday.We tried desserts and that was so delicious and well presented. Everything perfect. Such friendly staff. Rate 5/5', 'Dessert lovers should definitely try this place. It definitely serves the best desserts in town. The way in which each of them is curated is so artistic that they all look irresistible! We had the chocolate hazelnut mousse that was served with honeycomb ice cream. It was super delicious and creamy with the right balance of a sweetness in it. The red fruit fromage and raspberry delice were equally delicious and finger licking. They have any amazing selection of desserts and it has become a part of my go to list when craving for desserts.', 'Super friendly and polite staff...
They know the art of making the deserts look so appealing. Most beautiful deserts in town. 

The chocolate macaron is worth trying.', 'I love macaroons from  yauatcha. The best in town i believe. They have unique flovours of macarons which are hard to find here in bangalore. Matcha macarons are my fav', 'Their desserts are just amazing. Short selection but amazing taste. I personally like their chocolate hazelnut mouse which they serve with honeycomb ice cream', 'I feel they served the best dessert in town. I happen to their raspberry Delice and red fruit fromage. Both were impeccable. Very out of the box desserts. Kudos to their team.', 'It was a nice evening at Bengaluru, I went for Dinner hoping for a good Chinese experience, what more to ask for I had the best experience ever, I started with their range of teas, white, flower, green, oolong and more then was the starter, I had dimsums and cheung-fun, then forain viruses I had two types of fried rice and last for desserts, I had their signature chocolate pebble and few Macarons

It was a worthful experience and looking forward for another with Yauatcha

Keep it up guys!!']

reviews: ["The restaurant was empty when we dropped by on a Wednesday morning. We ordered Poha, sabudana khichdi, coffee and masala chai. The food was very well prepared - no excess oil, no excess masala. Absolutely loved the food. Tea and coffee was also good. They, unfortunately, don't have filter coffee here.\n\nSince this is an open restaurant, the tables tend to get a little dusty and there are a handful of mosquitoes. Otherwise, no complaints on the ambience. I really enjoyed my breakfast here with old hindi songs playing!"]

reviews:
["I really liked the Biriyani from this place. Though it was a little dry, but that is how Kolkata style Biriyani is, right? Moreover, I'm writing this because last night I ordered and in the package they wrote that they were really sorry for not being able to give a piece of aloo and excganged it with another piece of Chicken. Great thought, and amazing experience. Kudos !", 'I had ordered for fish kabiraji from here.guess this restaurant gets salt supply for free.this is not judging them by one incident.in the past too I have ordered for fish curry and the same experience!!!stop being so generous while using salt chef!makes the whole meal experience bitterly salty so much so that u prefer to starve than to eat this food', "Ordered 2 times from this restaurant. Everytime i am statisfied. Awsome food..they have exact taste of bengal, which i didn't found in any other restaurant.", 'I have never been to this place, but have ordered a few times from this place.

Last day I ordered :

*Mutton Cutler - 1 pc
* Radhaballavi and Aloo Dum

Both were decent , though my expectation was higher!

P.S : Can work more on the packaging!', 'I ordered a cream based prawn gravy as it sounded nice. It was sweet like dessert - I could taste the high amount of sugar and cardamom that over powered the taste of anything else. The quantity was so little for charging me 300 - 5 pieces of medium sized shrimp. I had to throw away the gravy  anyway as it was so bad.', 'I love your food ,my colleague ordered food two times for me and being an Odia guy I love the food.Odia food and Bengal food recipe almost same.', 'My honest review rate will be 3.5 but no option for 0.5 , ordered ü¶Ä crab masala from zomato it was tasty and Ofcourse it was an experiment with the Bangaliana. 
Am satisfied with food ü•ò 

They have two option in crab ü¶Ä like crab masala and crab jhol . Crab masala is good and was fresh crab cooked with proper spicy curry üçõ', 'All foods are very costly compare to quantities, taste from other restaurants. Delivery and packing charges also too high.. If possible see and understand the business of empire restaurants..', 'Favourite Sunday lunch option. Fish fry, dal, aloo posto, bhetki paturi. Everything was good and fresh. Packed in an efficient manner. Worth the money. I have visited their kormangala outlet and loved the seating area also although it used to get crowded during weekends. Worth the pocket pinch. Recommend !!', 'Medium Quality. The spices were not cooked properly.']

address: 473, 10th Main, Jeevanbhimanagar, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mango Lassi', 'Sweet Lassi', 'Death By Chocolate', 'Fruit Faluda', 'Dry Fruit Lassi', 'Sweet Lime', 'Watermelon Juice']
reviews:
['', "I've been to a couple Lassi shops around bangalore and I always end up ordering cold coffee. But I end up tasting what the people with me order and there's nothing I've not liked.

I have one grouse. There are way too many flues troubling you at this particular place. It's a nuisance and the management should do something, anything, to control this. You can't really enjoy your drink/shake/falooda when there are a few hundred flies trying to get a taste of it too.", 'The lassi here is amazing and even the sandwiches are too yumm and in a nominal rate please visit once it‚Äôs worth and satisfying , I had the best lassi in Bangalore till now here', 'A Pocket-friendly place, good for smoothies, milkshakes and lassi.\xa0
Have tried their Mango lassi, banana lassi, Sweet Lime and Watermelon juice and ice cream.

I will not recommend online ordering. go there if you want to get these.
                                                foodavengersblog.blogspot.com', 'It was pathetic and never order anything.', "Really nice loved the fruit falooda it is so filling and pocket friendly I loved it.
The service is also good loved the blue lime juice too basically it's a slush and very thick. Nice place would visit again!", 'Why people think that as it is a home delivery and we can send what ever we can and surely customer can not do anything about it. Why it is so difficult for them to provide the same quality as in front of the shop and home delivery.

Totally disappointed!!', 'Great place for milk shakes and seasonal fruit juices. Affordable and pocket friendly.

Have tried their Mango lassi, Coffee on Rocks, Hard Rock Coffee and Belgian Chocolate.

Personal favorites are ::\xa0 Belgian Chocolate, Sweet Lime and Watermelon juice.

a) Taste ‚Äì 4/5

b) Service ‚Äì Great service, courteous staff - 5/5

c) Value for Money ‚Äì 4/5

d) Ambience ‚Äì 3/5', 'Tried here chocolate milk shake. which was not good. full frozen with ice . There was no milk flavor and no Chocolate flavor properly.
Veg sandwich was good.
3* for the pocket friendly place.', "Pocket friendly place good for smoothies , milk shakes has a wide no of choices taste so good. French fries my son's favourite. But sandwiches not really so tasty.. if want to enjoy milk shake definitely this place is for sure"]

address: 473, 80 Feet Road, Jeevan Beema Nagar Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Free Parking, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Yomama is a cute lil cafe in pretty and cozy ambience. It‚Äôs in the top floor and have open seating as well. 
Coming to food, I had: 
Mexican cheesy fries - Loved the flavours and sauces. amazing taste
Paneer Fries - cottage cheese strip covered in spicy batter. Taste was good and didn‚Äôt seem deep fried or oily.
Brownie shake - it was delicious, well presented and they used freshly whipped cream
Veg Lasagna- it was okay for me, It could have been more cheesy. 
Xmas special roast chicken - It was good too but mashed potato was average
Mississippi Mud pie - nice gooey mud pie rich in chocolate and flavours 
Overall great experience and quick service', 'Yomama is situated just above Beijing bites in Indiranagar. In the first glance, it looks like a sweet little homely cafe with an outdoor as well as indoor seating space. The ambiance is a little dull and could do with some more color.
We ordered the Caesar salad, garlic bread with cheese and spaghetti in red sauce.
The Caesar salad came with huge chunks of raw onion and very oily croutons.
The spaghetti came with some sort of an orange sauce.
All the food was absolutely bland and tasteless. For once, i thought that my taste buds have died.
Terrible food. Terrible service. Never going back.', 'Location : On the junction of Jeevan Bheema Nagar and 80 ft signal
Ambience: 3.5/5 Modern sitting, outdoor sitting, abstract photo frames, spacious but no AC
Service : 3/5 Bit slow even if there were less people, courteous staff.
Food : 5/5
Yomama special chicken steak with mushroomsauce - 5/5
White sauce pasta - 5/5
Chicken juicy burger - 4/5
Caramel Vanilla Shake - 5/5
Tandoori Chicken Sub - 3/5

Chicken steak and Pasta is highly recommended. I went with no expectation but taste of every item surprised me. After a long time I had such amazing steak.

Please give it a try.', 'Visited this place one noon for lunch. This place is kind of semi rooftop having both outdoor and indoor seating. I had ordered veg kebab, cheese corn fritters (corn in it added good taste to the Dish), lime ginger juice, tandoori chicken steak burger (absolutely yummy & soft loved it) & blueberry cheese cake sundae ( this was yummm as well). Every dish served was good though few starters had similar taste. Ambience is good. Service was bit late. But the hospitality is good. Overall had a good experience visiting here and would love to visit again.', "Yo Mama a wonderful place with great food with friendly staff's and soothing Ambience.

Their menu having various options on continental foods

Talking about food
COLD COFFEE WITH ICECREAM AND WHIPPED CREAN - Perfectly blended with balanced taste.

CRUMB FRIED PRWAW - Juicy Tender Prawn was perfectly fried, crispiness with prawn tastes soo good.

YOMAMA SPECIAL CHICKEN STEAK - Grilled Chicken steak toppped with garlic sauce served with french fries, garlic bread along with veggies.

CHOCO LAVA CAKE - this was soo good that the richness cake with chocolate made the dessert wonderful.

Service was quite fast best place to hangout with your loved one's to have wonderful food.
.
Taste - 4.5/5
.
Service - 4/5
.
Hygiene - 4.5/5
.
Ambience - 4/5
.
Value for money - 4/5
.", "This rooftop cafe has a lot of potential and I'm sure it will build it. Yomama can do a lot better if the service and taste gets a little better.
I liked the Tandoori Prawns and Basa in lemon butter sauce the most out of all the things I ordered.
Go here for some chilled out vibes and some of that Basa.", 'Not sure why this place is rated more than 4 here in Zomato. This is just an average cafe with average tasting food. We ordered a chicken white sauce pasta, chicken steak and fish steak. Tastewise, all of them were average and pasta was pretty bland and non appetising. Prices are reasonable but would not go back here for the food again.', 'They have got great English breakfast called the Yomama special breakfast. The chicken steak which I ordered was also really delicious. Ambience is perfect. Staffs are polite and friendly. Service was nice. But the only thing that I didn‚Äôt liked is that the service charge of 10 % is actually optional but they made it compulsory. Otherwise everything was nice about the place.']

address: 18, First Floor, Ramanashree Arcade, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Table Reservation Not Required,
reviews:
["Situated inside Fab India on MG Road, one of the busiest places in Bangalore, fabcafe is a gem with minimalistic decor and soft music playing in the background. Coming to food, I was happy to know that they don't use sugar, oil or wheat instead use ghee, gur and othey healthy grains. We ordered spinach hara pyaaz water chestnut momos, baked dal samosa, gatte ki subzi, singhara flour chapati, wild berry smoothie and fresh fruit payasam. Everything tasted really great and the quantity was also good. Would love to come back again and try other things on the menu.", 'Excellent healthy food, lives upto the name. I honestly enjoyed everything except the Haryali Chicken Tikka. Besides that, the Chicken Tikka Masala and Momos were fabulous. To top it up when ended with the chocolate cake and pancakes, which were to die for. Definitely going back soon, don‚Äôt forget to try the berry blast smoothie, it was perfect.', "Not so delicious as expected, we ordered Beetroot lotus stem tikki chat and Aam Panna.

The chat was well presented and the portion served was normal. The tikki in particular was little bland and the lotus stem crisps topped was little hard. The overall taste of the chat was good but not so relishing.

On the other hand Aam Panna was salty and sour. As we haven't tried aam Panna at many places we cannot get into a conclusion weather it was good or average.

Bottom line, it is a healthy food Cafe with cosy interiors and decorations. This was our experience; Your experience may be a better version of ours & we hope the same for you. Enlighten us about your visit and share your gyan with us.
Cheers!! #BurpOutLoudly 
                                                burpoutloudly.com"]

reviews:
['The taste is so original...Been waiting for quality south Indian food...!! Love the quality and its pretty cost effective ....!! The delivery is most efficient...', 'Authentic south Indian food for south Indian lovers...sambhar is rich in taste..quality of food is really awesome..packaging is fantabulous...tried unique idli chaat...it taste like dahi Bhalla...ordered food at office...', "I had ordered Blossom Idlis from Zomato delivery. They were 4 fluffy idlies but the taste & colour of the idlis were strange. They were not made from rice and looked lightish brown. The chutney which they provide for 4 idlies is not at all enough. Also inspite of requesting for extra chutney, they didn't provide it. So don't waste your time typing for extra chutney. I don't recommend this place. There are many better places where you can enjoy delicious South Indian food.", "I love south Indian food so I had to give this restaurant a try. I'm not dissapointed at all! Great food. I love their dosasüëçüèª I'd recommend this to anyone who loves south Indian foodüëè", 'I usually don‚Äôt rate 1 but common this restaurant serves food like an amateur trying to cook South Indian .. please don‚Äôt spoil our taste buds .. wonder how they even came up with yum yum south .. extremely disappointed I ordered by mistake for the second time you guys need to checkout Chennai express .. FYI no one in  TN says enna rascala ..', "Please change the name to Yuck South .

Not worth for money, sambhar was salty, oothappam was uncooked one side, other side burnt.\xa0

Please don't play with customers and never spoil dishes", 'Decent menu and average taste 
Try multiple time quality is kind of ok ok 
Have to improve on both quality n quantity aspect 
Location is decent', 'Ordered for the madras tiffin which includes 2 dosas, 2 idlis and 2 vadas. The dosas and Idlis were fine but the vadas which are my favourite thing to eat were undercooked. The batter was raw from inside. Also had the idli manchurian which was extremely sour!', "They charge too much for this ..Street food is better packed and well cooked and they don't give chutney and give curds instead. The food was cold when it was delivered...It looked like they packed the leftovers ...", 'Ordered breakfast this morning, Grand madras tiffin and was totally disappointed. The mini dosa was not upto the mark, I agree dosa gets a little soggy by the time it‚Äôs delivered but the chutney filling was too sweet neither liked the aloo palya. Coming to idli vada, the idli was just ok but the vada was too salty. Sambar was again a disappointment. The only good thing was their packaging.']

reviews:
['', '', 'Definitely one of the best budget restaurants in the area.You just cant miss this if you are craving some dhaba style food at low prices.
I ordered the aloo paratha,gobi paratha and paneer paratha(goes well with extra butter). I wont say they were very tasty but for the prices charged,i was very satisfied', 'Was tempted to try seeing the name and the rating. Quantity was good. Taste was average at the most. Expected a ghar ka khana experience. Phulka was good but size was smaller than normal. Muttar paneer was bland. Jeera rice had almost zero salt. No dal on offer which was disappointing.', "Very affordable and good food. Paranthas taste like ghar ka parantha
Have tried all the kinds and it's good. Served with curd and achar. Follows instructions if any", 'Really good food...Homemade .
Service is slow and horrible at times because the seating capacity is too small..kitchen area can be more hygenic i feel.', "We ordered Aloo, Mooli, Onion Parantha's with Boondi Raita and Shhahee Paneer. Must say, it's the best we all had at office in a long while on a regular lunch restaurant. Like paratha plaza etc is no where close. Delicious, looks authentic north Indian style and it's almost there. Would love to order again.", 'The food here is very homely and very tasty, would recommend this place for sure. The phulkas are soft and food is mouth watering. The dish of the day is a must try.', "The best thing that I can say about this place is that for the super super low prices, my stomach has NeVer gotten upset. I'm partial to their dals and paneer preparations! Delicious food, sensible portions (they have full servings and half servings!) and the prices?? 30 rupees for half jeera rice and 40 rupees for a dal fry! üëÑ", 'I am in love with the chicken masala they serve. A regular customer who orders phulka, chicken masala, rice and dal fry. I rated one star less bcoz last time they screwed my order by not sending me rice and I have to wait again for half an hour to get the rice delivered again.']

address: 191, 1st Floor, Chinmaya Mission Hospital Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only, Sugar Free Options,
reviews:
['Food

1) Bombay Masala Quesadilla were very crispy and delicious.

2)Chatapata Paneer Steak was nicely cooked and rice quality was amazing quite equivalent to basmati.

3) Chocolate Fantasy was mouth watering and lovely in taste.

5) Food looked quite hygienic and nicely packed.

Cost
Cost is little expensive but you would get good discounts online while ordering.

Experience
Paneer Steak was soft and delightful to eat.Rice and sauce with paneer steak made the dish complete.

Rating
Food- 4/5
Cost- 3/5
Packing-5/5
Delivery-5/5
Cleanliness - 5/5', 'The meaty lasagne is to die for . Overall the packaging is really good and it keeps fresh for quite a lot of hours. If you are in for some good cheese and chicken then do go for it. Quesadillas are also tasty.', 'Ordered from the outlet

The packaging was neat and the temperature of the food was optimal. The dishes ordered were:

‚û°Ô∏è Chicken steak, served with rice, barbecue sauce and a side of potatoes and veggies

‚ñ∂Ô∏è Chicken quesadilla
Both the dishes were good!ü§ó The chicken was cooked to tender. My pick however was the quesadilla, with a flaky crunchy outer crust and chunks of meat packed inside. It was on the spicier side which thow I like Mexican food

Overall a good experience', 'Do order if you love fusion food.Loved the food, great taste, good quantity.\xa0
Waiting to order again and relish the deliciousness.
The Lasagne is a strong recommend.', "I recently had the Bhuna Chicken Quesadilla and Tandoori Chicken Steak from Firangi Bake. The Firangi Bake franhisee happens to be one of my favourites in the business, but this time they slipped up a bit. I have had the Tandoori Chicken Stak before, but have quite fond memories of this dish. This time around, the taste just didn't seem the same. The rice and the chicken, both should have been more flavourful. Even the quesadilla was pretty average in taste. It can definitely do with some more chicken!

I hope this was just a minor blip in their service, considering that I have always enjoyed eating from here in the past."]

['', 'The cheese chilli toast is nice

Looks like the new location has given them their mojo back:))', 'Tastes good. We had mocha with vanilla flavour and a hot chocolate whcih tastes really yummy. And the service is good here. Not at all justified by the price.', 'I ate paneer tikka wrap , pesto chicken sandwich and pure chocolate drink. Today both I and my wife are having food poisoning. address: 589, 1st Cross, 12th Main Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Nice and beautiful decored place with great staff and delicious food.

Coffee is nice and the starters have unique range.

For mushroom lovers, must try is sauted button mushroom with parmesan cheese...
Good for couples.', 'It‚Äôs a busy place but we were able to book a table.

We ordered the mocha coffee, eggplant sandwich, eggs benedict and masala omelette.

We really enjoyed the mocha and the sandwich. We didn‚Äôt like the other two dishes.
Eggs benedict was quite bad - It came on toast instead of a muffin, and the yolk was not runny enough. I also didn‚Äôt get sufficient taste of the hollandaise.
The masala omelette was juicy, but extremely salty. 

Service was quite slow and took a lot of time for our food to be served. Mushrooms were unavailable (for a Sunday brunch at a breakfast place!!) resulting in multiple re orders. It was an annoying experience.

Would not be visiting again.', "What a beautiful place.
So got here around 10am today and wanted to just have some coffee.
We ordered their iced mocha and cold coffee. They were simple, good drinks. It's such a great place, it's quiet even though it's in a busy area, the ambience further instills the sense of calm. The staff is also very very nice, special mention to their security person, he's such a sweet man. Can't wait to be back to try their food.

Drinks: 4/5
Service: 4/5
Ambience: 4/5
Value for money: 4/5", "Been to this outlet for having a breakfast. The ambience of the outlet was Pretty good. Well cleaned and well maintained. Coming to the food, had ordered Pan Cake s with berries, Cold coffee and Oats peanut butter shake. All were served at perfect temperature. The presentation of pan Cake was pretty good. Coming to the taste all were pretty good. The efficiency of service was good. It would be nice if you could put your attention towards us. Had a nice time. Here's my drill down review.

Ambience:5/5
Taste of food:5/5
Presentation of food:5/5
Temperature of food:5/5
Efficiency of Service:4/5
Worth of money:5/5
Must try: Pancakes.", "Went here for a light dinner and coffee after hearing a lot from people. But it turned out to be such a disappointment.

- The cafe latte was so strong it could have passed as Americano if not for the milk

- The watermelon lemonade was way too sweet

- The veg cigar rolls were an interesting concept but were dripping in oil

- The pasta had barely cooked beans and zucchini in the name of veggies

Don't think I can recommend this place to anyone unless they genuinely improve their food.

2 stars only cos of the nice ambience and the good service.", "A quaint little cafe in Indiranagar.. it's really cosy as I don't think it gets quite crowded here.. they have limited but good food.. I would suggest that the eatery improves the selection of food available.. but whatever is on the menu is all cooked with a lot of good taste.. do visit it for a noise free, cosy catch up with friends", 'The name of this place defines that this place is a Overwhelming feeling of great happiness!
This beautiful cafe is located in the 12th main of Indira Nagar!

Serving you beautiful continental dishes with delicious breakfast!

The place is very Cosy and gives you a soothing ambiance.
Every cafe needs its own theme and this place has the perfect balance!
A beautiful graffiti wall as soon as you enter the place and a seating capacity of 30-40 people at a time.

We ordered - Cafe Mocha
Cold Coffee
Iced lemonade coffee
Big Brekkie
Cigar Rolls
Onion rings
Veg Pizza
Egg Plant Parmigiana
Pancakes

Highly Recommended - Big Brekkie
Cigar Rolls
Pancakes
Cold Coffee

They even sell Coffee Powder which are really good and some beautiful Ceramic pots!
Service is excellent and Staff is quite friendly! This is a Treasure of Indiranagar.', 'This cafe will steal you heart at the very first glimpse with all its grandeur and cozy vibes .Located at 12th main Indiranagar, Bangalore this neighbourhood cafe is done up with big framed glass walls which is so inviting to those who walk past the road. One gets walk to into the space filled with warm ambient lights, graffiti walls, landscaped outward looking bay, modern wood-steel combination furniture and bottle green sofa sitting contrasting the grey textured walls. 
This is Conti cafe serving all day breakfast, open toasts, sandwiches, burgers, pastas, pizzas and other hot/ cold beverages to go with.Menu is easy on pockets and plating of food is total delight to eyes.Overall it‚Äôs a peaceful cafe on busy indiranagar street, which is surprisingly inviting.']

address: Room 4 , St Mary's Building, 39/1, Appareadypalya, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore

reviews: ["order of Chowpatty sandwich and French Fries. Packing was really pretty and colorful. The ketchup was intense as well. Wish they could do something to adress the above."]

reviews:
["It was my first time tasting an Apple Pie. For someone like me, the way T.F.L sent the Pie, was not a pretty sight. (Pl. See pictures) I could have cut it in pretty way. The filling in the pie was sticky, sweet & sour - more like a pulpy Jam. The outer crust was brittle, moist, more like a thick biscuit exposed to air for couple of hours. I really have no idea whether this is how it's supposed to be, but as for me, I might not go for it again (from this outlet, so to say)

Chicken puff was very tasty though, I absolutely loved the filling and flaky outer crust. I had ordered some Brown bread as well, but I am yet to taste it. But, to start with it looks very fresh with nice deep brown color.

Will order Chicken puffs again, bread too if that goes well.", 'Happened to visit this awesome place. got to say that this is one stop destination for all your sweet cravings. Neatly arranged and well presented. Good service. Must visit.', 'I had ordered two times brown bread that was not available in their store i never know that such kind of irresponsible staff in this bangalore i recommend not to order from this store its waste a lot times of to get items from them', 'Food Quality is extremely bad! Ambience is bad and even washroom is not at all maintained.Haven‚Äôt seen such a bad quality across any other French loaf centres.', "The place is too small. They don't have most of the things that's mentioned here in the menu. Was very disappointing. French loof cake is the best to celebrate party..................................', '', 'tasteless cold old']

address: 180, 2nd Floor, Manohar Crest, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Wifi,
reviews:
['After a long time could find a nice Tibetan joint.
GT serves good Tibetan food and that too at a very reasonable price.

The ambience here is very basic but the delicious food they serve will divert your mind and you will enjoy your time spend.

Been here recently with family for dinner and we ordered

Lemon Juice
Tibetan Butter Tea
Veg Steam Momo
Veg Thukpa
and
Veg Thenthuk

Food 4.1 out of 5.0
Ambience 3.6 out of 5.0
Service 4.3 out of 5.0

Finding a vehicle parking may be difficult especially during peak hours.', "Located on the third floor of a Tibetan shopping complex, opposite Samsung Opera house, this places deserves more recognition. Small place yet full of variety. This place serves many dishes ranging from Thukpa, Momos to the spiciest noodles you've ever eaten. My friends ordered Beef momos and chicken noodles and I'm a vegetarian so I ordered Schezwan Noodles and it was the best thing ever! Little bit on teh spicier side, it'll make you cry but trust me it's all worth it. Even after stuffing ourselves the bill came up to only 510! Best service, best food and best ambience.", "Beautiful place for Tibetan food. It's at the brigade road signal, opposite to Samsung opera house, on the first floor.

Ordered Laphing, veg thukpa, chicken thukpa, veg momos, chicken momos, veg fried rice, chicken noodles.

The laphing was pretty spicy. Thukpa was beautiful, just that it could have had more chicken. The noodles and fried rice were good. Chicken momos were top notch, went great with the laphing gravy."]

address: 30, Residency Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['', "We had been to this hotel on a Sunday afternoon and it was not crowded then. The place is pretty basic and nothing fancy. It's a pure veg restaurant. The service was very quick. We ordered for a north indian thali, babycorn Manchurian and aloo parantha. The bill was around ‚Çπ350. The parantha and Manchurian was good. However we did not like the tomato soup, papad and paneer curry from the thali. The dal in the thali was very nice. I would say if you are busy shopping and want a place to fill up your tummy then do visit. The food is pretty decent.", "I visited this hotel in the hopes of getting good south indian meals but i was disappointed. At that time they were only serving north indian thalis. The hotel is easy to locate as it is right opposite to the samsung store in mg road. there are 2 types of seatings available, AC and non AC. we decided to sit in the AC section but that wasn't available. The tables were clean and the hotel was partially full. I ordered 2 north indian thalis and 1 tomato soup. The soup was very bad and i asked them to take it away. The north indian thali on the other hand was pretty good and up to my expectation. there were chapatis, curd, pulav rice and gulab jamun. The staff is good and quick.", 'The food is good. I have my lunch here daily. Recently they have introduced an AC cabin also which is a big plus in such horrible summers. The place is economical and I have deducted one point only because during lunch time the table management needs improvement as it takes as long as 20-25 minutes to get food.', 'Very Good.... For the price you pay for food and service..you will not find any other place at that price on brigade road or nearby..unfortunately one of those underrated restaurants', "Tried this place while i was briefly in Brigade Road. The north India thali was sufficient for one . The rates are reasonable. They served soup and papad before starting off the thali. The thali had Chana, a gravy and dal and choice of Naan or roti. They also served a small katori of Pulao and included a sweet dish. While the thali was enough and filling for one the quality wasn't as such.", "The Channa batura I had here was so bad .The gravy was more like that of paneer butter masala and dint go well with Channa .\nAlso the sounth Indian food served here is not that great I would rather go to brahmin's cafe .\nReally disappointed with this place .", 'Chariot is a good pure veg restaurant end of brigade road . They have good seating capacity. They offer both south n north Indian dishes. Descent pricing. I tried north Indian Thali mini. It only costed 100 bucks. First they will give papad and soup as a starter. Then roti and meals with curries including jamun. But I expected more in Thali dishes.', 'Reminded me of those regular Mumbai vegetarian restaurants I used to visit as a kid. It felt like they lathered an entire slab of butter over my naan. Paneer Butter Masala was ok but lacked the quantity of paneer in them. Methi Mattar malai was good. Would like to try more in their menu soon.', "Though located in such a crowded place in brigade road, it is almost empty all the time including Saturday and Sunday. But considering the food here, it's anytime better. Though ambience is not so good, but the money u spend here is worthy."]

['Tasty food!

.

.
Just BLR, is a lovely place to hang out with your friends on weekends, the DJ plays some kickass tunes and he comes to the table for song recommendations. The food was really delcious and savory. They gave free Kamikaze shots. The service was a tad slow, the staff was so friendly. You must try Just Blr!\xa0
.
Service - üçïüçïüçïüçïüçï

We had ordered Chilli chicken, Chicken steak, Mushroom chilli, jalpeno cheese crocquets, fish, noodles and white pasta along with all 4 mocktails. Overall, the food is good and ambience is nice. It's nice place to hangout.", 'Beautiful ambience & kind staff great food must visit the live music by the DJ is brilliant love it all overall!! üòÄ
& Special thanks to Rebecca and neacy four yr lovely service ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'A very nice place to hang out..!! We went on a Saturday Karaoke night which was awesome. The food is good and tasty. We had chicken steak and pizza. Both were good. Argho served us pretty well. Service was good and the staff was courteous.', 'I had been here on a Thursday it was karaoke night.The place is nice, it‚Äôs also a roof top  they also have hookah.
 It‚Äôs a nice place to celebrate a occasion.
Food:we tried chicken wings which was good.Fish fingers was ok and mutton sukka was not so good and the kerala parotta was hard
Staff:very polite and courteous 

In my 2nd visit we tried almond crusted chicken it was nice and crispy.
Thai basil rice with chilli fish was lovely it‚Äôs a must try 
Prawns newberg was creamy and very tasty
This place has got a nice vibe', 'Had been here on a Sunday, with my friends! Had an amazing time, loved the ambience, food , the service was over the top! Loved the vibe of the place! Now the food: almond crusted chicken. Insanely great! The mutton sukkha with parota is a must try too!!
We tried the guava pinacolada which is pretty well done!", 'Great ambience, great music, delicious food , thats a combo you will get at Just BLR. It is located at brigade Road.
Recommened - Almond crusted Chicken
Mutton sukkha']

address: 4050, Ground Floor, 19th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews:
["I love the salads here, but never understood why they always delivered the salads with a packet of crisps! ü§¶üèª‍‚ôÄÔ∏è It's healthy food, guys. Don't tempt us otherwise. üòÄ Would appreciate some offers and variety in the menu in future. Options to add extra protein to the salad is very welcome! üëç", "Ordered a mushroom pasta chicken bowl with walnuts, peanuts and broccoli tossed in olive oil. Packaging and delivery was neat. Quantity was good. Given with chilli flakes, ketchup sachet and a small pack of Lay's chips.

Taste: was bland-ish and I think the chilli flakes did a good job. Quantity is pretty good and fills your tummy satisfactorily.

Paid 112/- for this on Zomato offer. Not bad.", 'I love the salads here. My favorite is the Reds Nuts and Raisins salad and the Mushroom Pasta Salad. Very light and tasty. Good choice for a healthy meal. Had found it under the Healthy Meal section.', 'Nice array of healthy salads. Quite a lot in terms of quantity, tastes really good. Love the chicken sausage salad. A bowl of salad and a juice or milkshake is good enough for lunch all the way till dinner!', 'Sitting in office, decided to call in some lunch. Honestly, I was surprised by the number of options that popped up thru the various food delivery apps. These days one is spoilt for choice.\xa0

I decided to opt for Caesar‚Äôs Salad, the salad was delivered perfectly on time. It was well packed and presented too. 

The salad per say was average. There was far too much of mayo that made it difficult to eat the salad. If one was not too hungry, it may have found its way to the bin. Disappointed with my own choice since there were so many options to choose from. 

Will I order from Clean Bowled again‚Ä¶. Not sure but will I try the salad again ‚Ä¶No.
                                                diningtales.com', 'Great healthy bowls and salads. Both veg and non veg options. Quantity wise it is enough for a full meal. Available only online, could not find a dine in for this place.']

reviews:
['I ll give 4.0. I really like the cakes n pastries from sweet chariot. Owner is really very cool. You get chicken samosa here which is mind boggling.', 'I like this place.. we get most of our cakes from here.
Almost all the cakes are good here . I like the choco truffle cake here, 
also the butter scotch. Oh yeah, you also get chicken samosas :D :D and they are good :)
its a small place , but whatever they offer you are rightly priced, and tasty :)

The owners friendly and they can deliver customised orders prior to one day :)

Do visit.']

address: 793, 1st Main, 2nd Stage, 4th Phase, BDA Layout, Near BDA Complex, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['One of the worst biryani i would say... it was more like lemon rice and the gravy was literally rasam... never again... chilly chicken was ok ok', "Just had a 'donne' chicken biryani from here. The overall taste was okay. However, I found the chicken pieces to be less and small in the rice. The 'raitha' was flooded with water. That is not 'raitha'; please reduce water in it.", 'Loved Biryani at this place. It tastes so spicy. And loved the raita with extra onion. Onions in biryani tastes awesome. Give a try while going in this way.', 'This is the worst biryani you would ever want to eat and believe i regret till date that i had that biryani.. not even 1% close to the authentic Donne biryani taste.. kebab tasted sad.. biryani even sadder.. rahter i would suggest to go to the Ambur biryani which is next to this place on the right', 'doesnt worth trying this biryani.fully wastage of time although cost is too low,taste is too bad.i will never recommend this donne biryani to anyone.', "Paid 130 bucks for full plate Kabab & Donne biryani and surprisingly both the quantity and quality was good. It's best to do a takeaway here rather than dine in. 


Visit (2): Tried same items and taste is consistent.", "Just moves to Bangalore 5 months back staying in Domlur, used to most often buy from Ambur though never liked the place, when I would wait for my food, I would see this small outlet called Donne Biryani, not many people, so I thought won't be good. But I tried the place this Sunday and the food was awesome. Biryani has very distinct, exclusive to Donne taste with good portion of chicken along with the Kebab, which is good in portion and in taste. Now I am a regular and it tastes the same unlike most places where tastes keep changing.", "Do you like Donne biryani a lot and unable to find a good Donne biryani. Then this place is for you. They are serving some good quality of Donne biryani in this locality again in your pockets. Don't go with their very simple upholstery and no ambience policy. They are good cooks‚Äô not good interior designers.

\xa0 \xa0They have a very simple and tiny menu. But you go with the timings you will find prompt service and hot food. Unfortunately they are not giving home deliveries. They can enhance their hygiene level but in some level you have adjust for a good meal. Please try their kebabs as well. They are serving oil fried kebabs but well in taste. 

\xa0 \xa0 You will find the biryani somewhat spicy but the Donne biryani should be. Please ask for some more raita if you feel chilly.

\xa0 \xa0Bon Appetite @ Chef BB
                                                chefbb.in", 'Another little gem of a Bangalore style donne biriyani that will make you go back for more. This is all about the taste, and none of the fan fare. And it sure is popular. I went at 9pm for a take away parcel and they informed me that the current batch was over and the fresh batch would take some 15 mins. While I waited in the car I could see a crowd gathering, by the time the biriyani arrived there was a crowd of 15 people all eagerly getting their share. For 70 bucks a biriyani it is the super easy on the pocket and what a taste. Loads of ginger, garlic and chillies. This is one must try donne biriyani.', 'They have very limited options, mutton and chicken biryani and chicken kebabs. It is absolutely worth for the price what you pay for. Good taste but small place. Can visit this place for a quick service.']

address: 3051, HAL 2nd Stage, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['Good tamil food. Fast service, pricey for the portion size.', 'Life saver at parties! Love ordering ghee roast dosas from here.', "We had visited this place about 5 years ago when this one was cozy place and I guess was new. It wasn't as posh as this one. Today we ordered podi idli and rawa masala Dosa. Dosa was cold and podi idli was tasteless. Place was deserted only two tables were occupied at 8.30pm. classic example of how attention deficit can create a havoc in otherwise a look forward to place.", '', 'a really delicious breakfast especially their sambar, its really yummy with pongal and mini idlis. A healthy and nutritious breakfast for a perfect day', 'Nothing special nothing to mention specific regular misplacing the orders delivery items were not upto he mark', "Please stop serving in plastic plates, and I found a hair in my plate, very unhygienic and the tables & chairs were too dusty . Staffs are inattentive . Please work on these , I wouldn't recommend this place to anyone . All round very bad experience with food and hygiene", '', 'Good food and nice ambience. I loved their crispy idly. fried idlis topped with podi and onions. its a must try. and their coffee is also a must try.', 'They refused to serve hot food. Got a cold soggy Vada and on asking the server to exchange it for a hot one he refused as if I was being unreasonable !']

address: 1215, 100 Feet Road, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["I generally have this conception that not all food joints can pull off a pizza. It's either too much or too less. It's very very few places who get it just right .
This place has the potential to be that. This pizza does NOT disappoint.

It really is ...........good Pizza!
Highly recommend. Will definitely order again.", '', '', "Ordered through Swiggy a couple of times. The half-pizza & breadsticks are soft & filling. Totally worth the price. Though one of the times the crust of the pizza was a little darker, it's better than Domino's any day.", 'Just looking at the pizza might clog your arteries and give you a heart attack.....but totally worth the risk. You can always have the slice and visit a hospital later.']

cuisines: North Indian, Fast Food, American, Continental

reviews:
['This is such a nice new addition to the streets of Indiranagar, complete with some yummy food and drinks and a fantastic dance floor.

Coming to the food, I would definitely recommend the rainbow sliders, which are sooo delicious and also so colorful! They have a really loved their whole range of starters.
I would recommend the

The drinks were definitely one of my most favorites, loved the electric iced tea. It has such a bright pop of color and very refreshing. They have a really nice bar with some nice cosmopolitans and martinis. And for all the mocktail lovers they have such yummy virgin mojitos and iced teas.', "A new pub opens its doors at Indiranagar! We heard about this online saying that they are a three floor pub with DJ, hookah, dance floor and more. Couldn't hold ourselves, so headed out.
The place is literally huge and has three floors with roof top options and all. This is exactly above food coma. There is parking available.
The Ambience is pretty good with a dance floor and an amazing bar.
Coming to the food, we tried a lot, of which the rainbow sliders were our favourite.
Do try out their cocktails. Their cocktails are just amazing.
The pizza that we had was extremely good as well. The crust was good. But later on we didn't try much since we were totally involved in dancing. But yes totally loved the place.
It's Bakasura Recommended. Head over here today!
                                                bakasuraforever.in", "Visited this newly opened place in Indiranagar for a Friday evening dinner with friends. This is located on the same building as Food Coma and is very conveniently located. This place has a good valet parking too. Coming to the food, we had Chicken Liver Fry, Chilli Fish, Banana Wrapped Prawns, all tasted good. The Chicken Pizza, Tulip Egg and Barbecue Chicken all tasted good. The Jacob's Creek Chardonnay definitely paired well with a few of the dishes. It was a wonderful evening.", 'Well there‚Äôs a new place out there in Indiranagar which is just amazing for everything especially good food and good music, loved the ambience especially the roof top. Coming to drinks I just loved the cosmopolitan drink and Long Island iced tea. Food were pretty good too, starting from the seekh kebab to afghani chicken everything was finger licking good, definitely worth it', '.
.
Food : 4.5/5
Value for Money : 4.5/5
Service : 5/5
Ambience :5/5\xa0

A really good place to visit for great food, amazing drinks and some dance moves during bollywood DJ nights.

Visited it on a Friday evening bollywood night and it was great experience. In food, Veg Slider and Lotus stem was super delicious. Unlike many other places , Lotus Stem also great with less on sweeter side and with feel of crunchiness in every bite of it. Potato wedges was crispy and yummy to the fulles to go good with Beer. They serve Garlic bread prepared in different way which makes the taste refreshing just for a change.

In drinks, LIT is no-brainer to try out here. The variety of cocktails, options for Beer, everything is good enough for a great outing here any day.\xa0

This place is very spacious both for sitting and dancing with amazing staff serving you diligently.

'
'

'

#foodstar_foodlove", 'This place is all about good times , good food and good music. Whether you want to have a heart to heart discussion or a corporate team outing, these place is all you need to head out to. Spread across floors one can choose to sit indoor or  outdoor  or even can choose to grove beside the DJ Console.

When it comes to food it‚Äôs nothing less than an extravaganza. Seafood is worth the try and so are their desserts.

Located at Indiranagar, Bangalore this place is easily accessible and got valet parking too.', "Looking for an awesome place to chill on your Friday Nights, well this is the place where the madness begins. With groovy music and excellent food along with a wide range of cocktails , this place will surely give you wings. Food pricing is moderate condisering all the nearby pubs ,put that with some delicious food with a wide variety makes it excellent value for money. One of the best feature is the dance floor and an excellent DJ to go along.
.
My top three recommendation from this place would be:-
1) Veg Seekh Kebab
2) Spring Rolls
3) Fish Fingers
.
Overall it's an awesome and a must visit place in Indiranagar.", 'First day so maybe too early to judge, however, had a good experience coz we drank in peace and danced üòÄ

The cocktails were strong and food was good. I just hope the license and documents are perfect so no interruptions happen üòÅ', 'One for the road opened their new outlet in indiranagar and this one is massive with three floors which includes a rooftop. I had a good experience at their other outlet too. The service is fast and the drinks and food were really good. I loved the ambiance and the staff was super friendly.']

address: 8, 3rd Floor, Allied Grande Plaza, Diagonally, Opposite Garuda Mall, Magrath Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Nightlife, Craft Beer, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The Phat Abbot Triplet and the Whiskey hot toddy need to be tried. The bacon fries and the chicken pizzas are very good to pair with the beer. Will definitely go here again. Thank you', "Definitely one of the most happening places in bangalore - different type of micro-brewed beers are available, all sorts of non-veg items as in chicken, lamb, pork, beef, buffalo are available. The place is little expensive and it is tough to get a seat on a saturday evening. The place has both inside and open air sitting arrangement. The stuffs shouldn't be judged on the basis of saturday evening rush, the overall experience was good and given a choice I will definitely visit the place again.", 'Love to visit this place again. So much space, outdoor seating available too. Their beer collection was good. Had a honey lavender ale and it was yumm. Absolutely loved the sweet potatoes fry along with it. Had a spicy chicken starter too but sweet potatoes fry is the clear winner', 'Loved their signature cocktails, Arbor gimlet and green tea infused one. Flavour was too good. You should definitely try their Stir fried cottage cheese and pizza. Let down was ambience.', 'Arbor is one of the very fine Breweries in Banglore offering a wide array of beers, drinks and delicious food items. Visited Arbor with a friend on my trip to Banglore and it was one of the best experience. We tried thier Buffalo Chicken pizza along with Smooth criminal- honey lavender ale. The food was delicious, beer was strong with an overall great experience for me to visit this place again on my next trip! üòã', "I've been to Arbor enough number of times but this review is only to give a shout-out to Ora, one of the waitresses here, a very kind and warm-hearted lady. Lookout for her when you're here and please help her grow in her career. I was a bit tipsy, this lady noticed me From somewhere in her workplace and helped me all the way to the restroom. Goes a long way when we think of her ethics and her dedication to her work.
As for the rest of it, drinks and food and ambience, all is good. But people like Ora would definitely want me to come back.", 'I have started frequenting this place more often, recently was reminded that 6 years back I had first visited them.

Recently we were there and had the Big Lizard DIPA, Kokum Kolsch (special), Coconut Ale (special). Have also been regular with their Beach Shack IPA an the Irish Stout.

In pics are the Goan special menu of Prawns, Pomfret Recheado and Pork Vindaloo as well as Bebinca

I am sold as a loyal customer of theirs and will always be my go to place. The staff is so accommodating and courteous. Kudos to Arbor', 'Good place and ambience. Food was great. Their craft beer was really light and tasted great. However was a little disappointed with the crowd management. Service was good too despite being a weekend.', "Centrally located near Garuda mall, this is one of the most popular microbreweries in the city. Excellent place to watch sporting events with it's screening and brewed beer. The food is good but prices are not very reasonable. Table booking is recommended on weekends. The service is good but can get slow on weekends as can be expected.", 'Loved this place. I‚Äôm not a beer drinker but I tried the Phat Abbot Tripel. Really really good brew. The food game was on point with the chilli  chicken being the favorite. Went there on a week night and really surprised at the number of people there. Great vibe over all']

address: 236, Shop No 1, Amarjyothi Layout, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['', '', '', 'Came across this place while exploring new places to eat around Domlur. Initially I was skeptic about it, but the taste of the food just got me mesmerised! It‚Äôs just simply amazing. Initially tried out Benne masala dose, the taste of it pulls you back to authentic Benne masala dose that you get to eat in Davanagere and then we tried benne paddu, its so delicious and feels like the paddu melts in your mouth with buttery flavour.  Describing this is making my mouth water and wanting to go back again.', 'Guys the "Benne Open Dosa" and "Benne Masala Dosa" are lip smacking and extremely scrumptious. The buttery texture to the dosa gives an out of the world foodgasm and finger licking experience. I was literally moaning with with each and every crunchy bite of this out of the world Dosa. I feel extremly lucky to have been introduced to this heavenly eateryüòãüòã A big shout out to DVG Benne Dosaüôåüèªüôåüèªüòç It was literally a slap-on-my-face moment when a veg counterpart totally outclassed the non veg breakfastü§© HIGHLY RECOMMENDED üòçüòç', "The food was absolutely amazing, from preparation to presentation everything was very pleasing. We tried Benne Masala Dosa, Benne Open Dosa and Benne Paddu trust me it's finger licking delicious. One of my friends suggested me this breakfast place where we can get amazing delicious south Indian food and it's worth trying. Also the staff were friendly and helpful. One of the must try breakfast places I can say!!", 'The tea is one of the best i have had in Bangalore. Dosa was also good. Small eatery where you need to stand and eat. Cleanliness and hygine is very good.', '', '', 'Yummiest Davanagere Benne Dose']

reviews: ['', 'Good good!', 'Nice calm place with good food and soothing live music.. Great variety of food and drinks to indulge.. They have a great selection of cocktails, and we thoroughly enjoyed them. The ambience is the star attraction however. Rooftop, open air, you have a view of the city, it's super romantic. Highly recommended for date nights!", 'The view! It‚Äôs amazing. It wasn‚Äôt crowded when we went there a couple times for dinner. The service is great too. Loved their dim sums and satay. Yummiest satay sauce in town. They obliged us and customized something that‚Äôs not on the menu- appreciate that :)', "Ging bar is an excellent place to spend your time, there is an amazing rooftop bar with great ambience, also to mention this place gives a special feel especially at night , the service that is extended is really top notch and i would want to call out the expert service offered by the one of the staff -Linda and the manager is also very friendly and displays a professional attitude and he shared some great information about the hotlel. It is definitely a place to visit with your family and friends if you're in Bangalore.", '']

address: 44/1, Residency Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Wifi, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['My first visit to this place and found it quite impressive. Ambience caught my eyes at first glance ü§©üëåüëå. Then the crowd where almost of all age groups, making it clear that anyone can enjoy this place üòÅüôå. Now, let's come to desserts, i bought "NUTELLA CHEESE CAKE", was really surprised to see that in jar üòÉ‚úåÔ∏è. The first bit i tasted was so yumm that it took me straight to the heaven of sweetness ü§©ü•∞üòãüëåüëå, just loved it. No doubt in saying this was the best one i has ever ü§©üëåüëå and that prices were unbelievably cheap compare to the taste they served ü•∞üëåüëå. Also, the quote written on the wall soon you enter the place was really meaningful üòÉ‚úåÔ∏è. Loved the place, ambience, taste and over all experience üôåüëèüëèüëå.', "Art of Delight is a great caf√© tucked away in Residency Road. It's a place that's got this really chill vibe with a very hipster ambience. You could grab something and work away in peace for hours or come with a friend to catch up.

They have a huge variety in their menu and you feel like ordering everything. And truth be told, you can't go wrong with whatever you order. Everything is really amazing!
We ordered the Mississippi Sundae and the Chocolate Superior.
Both super items with great quantity and if you've got Zomato Gold, then you're sorted.

I'm definitely making it a bucket list challenge to come and try all their menu items!", "This is one of the best places I've been around in the block, serving one of the best cold beverage and ice cream.

Food-7/10
Staff- 7/10
Ambience- 8/10
Menu - 7/10

I hope my next visit will be more promising. ATB", "Ordered a chocolate hysteria. It promised brownie per what was written in the menu but instead it was crushed Oreo. Disappointed. This dessert tasted decent but not worth the hype at all regarding this place. A brownie in place would have changed my review. Don't promise what you don't deliver.", 'The menu is overwhelming. I usually screw up when there are lot of options. But we tried a basic dessert and a signature dessert both were not great. Even though being the great fan of chocolate I didn‚Äôt like the amount of chocolate in chocolate Mississippi jar it was too much. And the lava cake was again a disappointment.', "Happiness greater than calories üòä

Think of desserts think of art of delight.
This tiny dessert place at residency road has been our go to dessert place since forever.
The ambiance is nothing special but the food is amazeballs.
And the red velvet cheese cake is the best.. It's a must try", 'After having a heavy lunch in Meghana‚Äôs, we landed up in art of delight for desserts! I must say, it‚Äôs one of the best dessert place in Residency Road! Ambience is so cozy and makes us to spend more time !', 'Amazing place for dessert with great music and ambience. Price is pretty reasonable. I especially loved the cheesecake and brownies and vanilla ice-cream with hot chocolate sauce.
Rate- 5/5', 'Nice and cozy place with some artwork on the walls. The seating outside is nice as well. The artwork displayed here is for sale too. 

Tried the Red Velvet cheesecake which was smooth, creamy and tasted good. Served in a cute little glass jar. Ordered 3 shakes - Brownie, Mocha and Chocolate. These are thick shakes and can be ranked in the order listed above, with brownie being the best.

I loved their waffles too. You can select the toppings you want on it for an additional charge. I chose Nutella & Chocolate chip Ice cream and it was a delight.']

address: 58/A, 4th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Off 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The newest Asian restaurant in Indiranagar. Delectable food and great service! The tea broth soup with chicken was wonderful. The only thing to improve is the handwash and restroom facilities - they were disappointing...hope they work on it.', 'We loved the food. The aromatic tea broth soup, the Singapore chilly crab, the .. yknow what, it was all excellent. The staff was friendly and efficient, and the fact that each dish was individually excellent made for a fantastic evening out. Oh, and the menu is vegan friendly too :-)', 'A delightful discovery to begin with. Everything on their menu was gob smaking good. Done properly and I am totally impressed and so is my family.
The sushi was not raw (which worked well for my mom who was aprehensive) but smoked salmon there worked really well in the rolls. Highly recommend their signature Singapore chilly crab and the Vietnamese street style cold coffee to go with it. 10 stars.', '', '', '', 'A tiny little place with an interesting and diverse menu. I had the zesty chicken salad and the kafir lime cake, which were both quite good. Friendly and helpful staff. Would love to visit again :)', '#newplacealert 
Singapore is a cauldron of gastronomical culture, it has a significant impact from Far Eastern as well as South Asian cooking and ingredient influence. Chef Surajit Ghara of Republic of Noodles and Oki fame has brought Singapore‚Äôs popular street food in a casual Bistro setting to Indiranagar. 

We tried a variety of dishes but my pick would be the steamed sticky rice with Shitakke, popular Thai style fish cakes made with Red Snapper and the very unique Cassava Cake(tapioca flour dessert). 

A must visit for all Far Eastern food lovers, even if you have to drive across far flung areas of Bengaluru. #singaporestreetfood', '']

reviews:
['', '', 'Worst food whoever Eats stomach pain starts kindly close the dhaba worsttttttt serrrrtfviceeeeeeeegghhhhhhhhh fuuuffdffgyhju ghyggghhjjjjhhhhhggggghhyyhhhu ggfffrffftt', 'Taste wise it is totally dhang ka khana, total homely food, meals are sufficient enough for a single person, however I believe they are slightly over priced.', "It's small out let with very average food. Place is little congested and unhygienic... Service is good as its small stall, u can have mini or largr Thalia depending on ur mood of having veg or non-veg...', 'Going by the rating and reviews, ordered food. Horrible food, throw away. Paneer Butter Masala tasted as if it was cooked using sewer water and the Paneer itself tasted of some chemical. Other dish, Gobhi Masala never arrived. All I got was some aloo gravy that was equally bad.

I can live with bad taste but this is inedible food. Pathetic!!!!', "If you wanna eat the best samosa then this place is the place to go to. Dhang ka Khana has the best samosa and it's  just 10 bucks. You should also try their chole bhatura which is 30 bucks,they make it every  weekend.", 'A place with a name that suggests a lot but doesnt live up to its name.. A small place dishing out a variety of north indian items, has a sitting place and a regularly visited by a lot of people but personally from the taste point of view its average. The quality of food can be enhanced more and also the service time sometimes is slow which can be worked upon..', "So this place is daily Khanna Adda for me and it's never put me down in any aspects. 

Food it's tasty and the name says Dhang Ka Khana. 
Love the food and mostly the chana dal and chicken curry. 

Please do try the best Gulab jamoon here. !! 
See u again and again and again Dhang Ka Khana."]

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["Tried the mutton biryani from here a few days back as that's the first thing I go for when I'm ordering form a new place. Unfortunately, it wasn't as authentic as I thought and the portion size seemed less than what most places offer. The biryani was dry with little pieces to go for and didn't really suffice the money they are charging.\n\nIn Bangalore, biryani is the biggest disappointment for me as most of the places I have tried it has fallen short. Hopefully I like something else from this joint in the future but until then, this is what I have to say."]

 All meat shawarma: we expected good amount of meat but unfortunately there was a good amount of veggies.The all meat shawarma was like regular shawarma and not a all meat shawarma', 'One of my favourite places for lebanese food.
