more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only, Vegetarian Only,
reviews:
['Tasty North Indian food at one place.Felt great to have Chhola Bhature with Authentic taste in Bangalore Loved the taste..can eat daily...
Ordered parathas and kadhai paneer as well. It really tastes great.
Must order from this place if you are looking for authentic North Indian taste.
Thank you.', 'Delicious north Indian dishes, specially paratha are real yum!
Special paratha like sattu paratha is awesome
You should definitely try special thali of this place', 'WORST PARANTHA EVER. THEY ARE SO HARD! They are dry, and have the worst taste ever. Wasted my money completely. Regret having ordered from this place.', "The service is bad. I had ordered sattu Partha as they had listed it on menu. After ordering they called me and said it wasn't available. Also they said I have to opt for some other paratha. If I cancel the order, payment won't be refunded. They list something in menu and deliver something else", 'Never go here!...The guy who sits at the cash counter (may be the owner) is unnecessarily rude. I walked in by mistake just to get something packed. While I was waiting for my food, the guy at the counter suddenly asks me to sit down. I found it weird but I did. This restaurant has tiny little baby chairs so I had I had to cross my legs to sit... and now the guy is telling me to keep my feet down and was quite rude. Never understood what went wrong. Also seems like the food reflects the same arrogance. In a nutshell, the food is below average and the whole experience is retarded.', 'Ordered Chola Bhatura and gulab jamun. They delivered stake chola and gulab jamun.
How can a restaurant survive by serving stale food, which even smells stale?', 'I ordered alu paratha and pyaj paratha. Pyaj paratha was ok but there was no salt and very less potato in alu paratha, it was more like eating plain paratha.

I also found the price too expensive for the quality and size of paratha. So for this experience 2 is the most I can give of 5.', 'Spilled food, not God Packing', 'Very clean n good place for North Indian food.
Ordered khichdi alot of time when I was sick.
Food was delicious Everytime. Recommended for everyone.', 'A small cute and affordable place for an evening snack. Very suitable for people who are single and miss parathas as their dinner. Lot of options for affordable dinner and cost is justifiable. Chai is good and pakodas are crazy crispy.
Sasta and tikau!!!']

address: 19, 2nd Main, 8th Cross, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["As someone who craves for proper homemade Tamil food, this place is heaven! Reminds me of the way grandma used to cook. And the vadas are soft, oil-free and yummy - just like the ones they serve at the weddings! All at super affordable prices. PS: I know they struggle to get orders, which is why I wanted to put this review up. As a regular customer who goes to have breakfast, lunch (and sometimes dinner), I want to thank these guys and tell how happy and grateful I'm to have found this place. :D check it out guys. Home food."]

reviews: ['Kappa is good', 'Catering service was pathetic, not worth to opt for full order\nDumped food to wastage due to tasteless food', '', 'Went to the restaurant for the first time today (decided not to visit again), the tea was the only thing that was ok (1 rating for that). We ordered crab roast parcel. The dish was not worth the money.\xa0 2 small piece of crab and 1 leg with some onion and little water( not even gravy), no salt, no masala. Taste was no good(Tasteless). Will not suggest the restaurant for an authentic/any Kerala food.', "Had an excellent meal here, on the 27th of July, 2019. I walked in pretty late, around 10:30pm, and asked if they were still taking orders. It was possibly the best Kerala thali I've had in the city. And I've sampled many a joint. The food was fresh, in fact it was piping hot, and each dish was made with care. You can tell the difference.", 'Terrible quality of food served. Ordered pathiri, idiyappam and chicken stew. The pathiri was not fresh and I guess was made from the ready to cook packets. The chicken stew was horrendous. The chicken tasted stale and had a bad taste to it. Idiyappam was the only decent thing. For all the people looking to have some decent Kerala food, please avoid this restaurant.', 'This place has the most amazing Kerala food at very reasonable prices. The veg stew and Malabar biryani are must tries. After each bite, we just kept telling each other how amazing the food is. The owner is also very warm and welcoming & ensures we have a great time along with great food. Their snacks are brilliant too. We fell in love with the place instantly and we are sure it is going to be our most sort after Kerala food place. Do give it a try', 'I ordered for an Erachi dry fry, mutton curry and payasam. The payasam was like semiya was cooked up in water and some sugar was added to it.. the Erachi dry was so dry that it was like rubber. The mutton curry was also extremely bad.. reviews:
['Great cafe to work out off. Very refreshing ambiance and friendly staff.', '', '', '', 'Got less than half box soup delivered.. It clearly felt that someone cheated - either restaurant or delivery partner as no restaurant delivers such small quantity.. 

On contacting Zomato, they insisted even if restaurant delivers just 2 spoons soup, its ok as it depends on restaurant what they deliver .. and Zomato cant do anything so here i am..  writing to restaurant .. 

Anyways it sucks going hungry coz of such issues in online deliveries via zomato!', 'Found a gem!
Been here a couple of times and always have loved what they offer. A week back, with few friends, it was poha, kanda and mirchi bhaji, coolers, jowar bhakhari and curry. Majja agaya!\xa0Yesterday, the Bajara roti and Veg curry were perfect, just the way mom makes at home. Millets are healthy and I always keep hunting for good places offering such meals. This joint just cool! Loved the payasam and Kerala style halwa they offer. Halwa could have been less sweet, but never the less liked the subtle flavor and texture.\xa0
Interesting setup, they have co-work facility at prices I felt a cool deal. The ambiance is chill out and seems bigger/open to the carpet size of the cafe. Staff seems cool. The order takes little time but was not a wait to worry about.', 'Polite staff.....must visit for some unique taste....White sause pasta and Garlic bread is good....Service is nice....Cost Friendly and ambiance is good .....', 'Very friendly staff. Good service. Must visit place.
The good is really tasty and light like home food. It‚Äôs really worth for the money. Once visited you can‚Äôt stop yourself from coming back again and again. And for all the north Karnataka folks you would get puffed rice here (uggani/girmit). üòçüòçüòç', "Friendly staff. Good ambience. Food taste is also good. Has more healthy millet options.
But taste could've been much better. Price is a little high compared to quantity of the food.", 'A new place inaugurated just few days back.
Good ambulance with clean tables and lightning. The menu is unique and has a lot of millet based dishes. Staff are polite and great.
Food served was very tasty. Quantity was a little lesser than expected. Place is a little expensive. Desserts are great.
The service was a little slow but apart from that everything is good.']

more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Wifi,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Papaya Salad', 'Pad Thai', 'Tom Yum Soup', 'Tom Yum Prawn', 'Thai Green Curry', 'Thai Spice', 'Phad Thai']
reviews:
['Beautiful place located in indranagar near metro station opposite to truffles. Found it quiet expensive. I appreciate the taste served here. We ordered the chicken noodles in soup. It was a ramen type of experience. The quantity of chicken in the dish was way beyond expectation. The service provided was satisfactory.', 'The closest you can get to authentic Thai Streetfood in Bangalore. Loved every dish we had..would have given them 5 stars but the lack of valet parking has denied them a 5 star rating..', 'the food was a revelation to our tastebuds ... we tried one of the specials - a crisply fried prawn covered in a thick tamarind sauce, #MangoSaladWithSeaFood, #CurryPasteWithBeef ... each dish was uniquely flavored and delicious ...', 'Went here to try their mango based dishes, raw mango salad, and mango with Sticky rice and coconut milk with sabudana. Both the dishes tasted Amazing and were definitely worth the visit. Only let down was the manager accused us of stealing a pair of chopsticks. üòÇ', 'A very small place located in prime locality of indiranagar.
Can accommodate about 20 people at one go.
Parking a 4 wheeler could be problem as this is located at busy 100ft road.

Have had two dishes in here on our search for mango delicacies .
A raw mango salad and a sticky rice with mango dessert.

Raw mango salas was made with fresh n raw mangoes cut in julienne. And had a right balance of spice, salt and tang. The best part was the crunch the mangoes had.

Sticky rice with mango dessert. Came in the authentic Thai style of serving. Where sticky rice was soaked in sweet coconut milk and was accompanied with fresh mangoes. This was served along with a small portion of salted coconut milk cream. And the roasted moong beans to add to the crunch. Exactly the way the dessert is had in Thailand. Only thing that amiss was the mango could have been a little more ripe.

Will visit again try some more thai food at this place.']

["Tried their preparation for the first time today and I was delighted. Although the khichdi portion size seemed less for the price they are charging, the quality and freshness made up for it. I ordered cheese masala dal khichdi and chicken manchurian and it came with a bit of aaloo chokha and curd and the packaging was good.

Also tried their moong daal khichdi and mushroom chili and it tasted way better than many places that I've tried the same earlier. Pepper chicken too tasted great here.

Taste department has been handled pretty well by TKF and I admire the way they added veggies to the khichdi. All in all, a good experience and I'll try more of their preparations in the future."]

Small place but good, also in the heart of the city ( brigade road )', "Not a bad place for rolls but no good either. Ordered a chicken roll. The guy manning the counter made it himself. A tad overpriced, but it's on Brigade Road, where almost all other food outlets are more expensive than this joint. Acceptable. Tea shop is located beside it. So you can combine tea and rolls to survive the day.

Location? A little off Brigade Road on your left if you come from Cauvery Emporium. Entrance lane is after the series of shoe shops.", 'This place is horrible.

['I ordered one paneer 65 and one chilli paneer for Rd 211. The quantity was extremely less. Only 8-9 very small pieces of Paneer. You can say Paneer chunks. The quality was pathetic. He said that talk to ZOMATO and do whatever you want.', 'I ordered chocolate shake, it was milk with bornvita in it there was no sugar in the shake also the quantity was very less, worst milk shake ever', 'The place is called deshi pizza so the pizzas are definitely up to mark but can‚Äôt say the same for other items so please order if you want some great pizza', '', 'I have a good experience here but I have faced issues like missing of stuffed in rolls ( I have ordered chicken roll but i have received veg roll today ).', "This is only a delivery order.

They are running excellent offers currently.
We gave tried most of their pizzas and also their rolls. We recently ordered their blasting veggies pizza and deshi veg pizza. Their large pizza is larger than other places. I wouldn't say the taste is out of the world or anything, but it's definitely novel and above average. Most of their pizzas taste the same. Deshi fusion is open for longer and is a reliable eatery.", "I ordered chef's special non veg pizza which took almost an hour to reach me which is just next street of my house ,coming to the pizza this is the pizza which made me not to eat any pizza next time I had such a worst experience eating it , their presentation was so surprising I forgot abt the delay and started eating the very first bite itself made me spit the pizzas out , the crust were so hard tht I could not chew where ended with spitting out ,
I dont know how the run buisness .", 'I ordered chicken 65 and you have given me chilli chicken . Very bad food and very bad experience for me. I had very bad experience with Zomato also', 'I was cheated, got veg instead of chicken fried rice.', 'Great service.
Even though Zomato rider in late night refused to deliver and ask for cancellation.
They sent their own driver with the food.
Appreciated
Regular customer, pizza are good and tasty.']

reviews: ['', '', 'Great quality & amazing service. Everything about This is too good. Phenomenal.', '', "I was recently told to try out this new cafe (well, new to Indiranagar) and I've never been more pleased to have listened to someone. We got a Brioche French Toast and an Eggs Florentine. The Brioche was flawless. The eggs in the Florentine were poached just so. I'll be ordering pretty frequently and recommend it to anyone who asks (and those who don't).", "I‚Äôve been hearing about the Little Black Choux for a while now, about the coconut and lemon macaroons and passion fruit tarts. The first time I tasted food from here was for a friend's birthday a week ago though - and I was blown! I inhaled two slices of the Opera cake which was nothing short of easy on my palate. I could feel the chocolate ganache and buttercream with every bite - an experience I am definitely going back for, only to top up with more orders.", 'Little Black Choux has never disappointed, even while they were a home run bakery in Whitefield.\nWe ordered their Eggs Florentine and brioche french toast for a weekend brunch, along with a lemon tart and every single thing was perfect. The eggs were perfectly poached, the hollandaise was creamy and delicious. We are told that they bake their own bread fresh every day and even the schmear is made on the premises. The lemon tart was sharp and just sweet enough. And the eco-friendly packaging is a very nice touch - thanks a lot!', 'Thanks for the Birthday cake üç∞!! It was delicious. Opera is a must buy!!', "Thank you soo much for making all my closed ones b'days more yummier & making them drool over the cake & macrons ! Really appreciate the timely delivery & updates & cheers to the team :) üëç", 'Must try the macaroons!']

more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Live Sports Screening, Live Music, Rooftop, Table booking recommended, Smoking Area, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['One of my favorite cafes! Beautiful Mediterranean ambience and even better food. The Azzure special Twisted chicken pizza is a must try for everyone, because I cant emphasize on how yum it is and we also tried the Chicken steak with mashed potatoes which was good.', 'Ambience was good. Food was tasty. A must visit place. Nachos fan must have a visit here. Follow FoodIsLife', 'Cafe Azzure was an instant plan but honestly speaking I had a great experience. We went there to chill out with a bunch of my friends and we tried potato basket and nacho with beans which was yum.

I would definitely recommend the place. Also, if you going over weekend reservation is must.', "I think I had best pizza as of now food was delicious and we'll presentated
Definitely will be back soon after couple of months
Food 4/5
Service 5/
Decor 4/5
Ambiance 5/4/5", "Would give 5 stars if the service wasn't so bad. Even when the place is almost empty it's hard to get the attention of waiters which is very frustrating and some items get too long to be served.
We tried cheese nachos,twister pizza, peri peri pasta and waffles. All the items were good. Ambience is cool and the rooftop setting is very nice during pleasant weather but not so much when it's hot.", "A very beautiful rooftop cafe located very near to MG Road Metro Station.A very colourful ambience with both outdoor and indoor seating.Has wide range of food and this place also serves hookah , so it's a great place to hangout with friends.The place has a fresh vibe and lighting in the evening makes it great along with some good food.The place has comfortable seating arrangement for about 25 to 30 people.
Their pizza,pasta,and shakes are really good.The cafe azzure special pizza is jus perfect with fries on it also the Oreo shake was amazing!
The Overall experience was great with good service, friendly staffs and reasonable prices.
Totally worth a visit üíö", "Cafe Azzure overlooks the hustle of Brigade Road and is a fine place. You can never go wrong with a rooftop ambience and is the perfect place to chill.

Used Zomato Gold here and we just came to grab a bit. So we ordered only starters.
We ordered the Chicken Nuggets and Chicken Shots.
The best thing about these dishes was the quantity. It was really good! The Food tasted like what you would expect it too. Nothing extraordinary but it's definitely good.", 'Just an okayish experience.. Nothing was exceptional.. Chairs and tables were not too great and the taste was just fine only.. Mushroom nachos and fired praws were above average but nothing great about drinks and pasta.. And pizza was not up to the standards.. Wont recommend this place.', 'Awesome cafe with affordable price.

We visited this place and I really enjoyed, the staff was very polite, no hassle for waiting with good service.

The ambiance is like a vertical garden with rooftop definitely gives you good vibes.

Though you will not get alcohol but you can order hukka and enjoy your evening. üòá

The food was good in taste and presented well, we ordered below:

Soup De Camaro (Seafood)
Peri-Peri Chicken Nachos
Sizzling chicken steak served with butter rice

The quantity of food was sufficient for two of us. The soup had finally chopped fish and prawns giving it a unique taste.

The salsa served with nachos was very delicious and the chicken steak on sizzler was giving a good taste.

We really enjoyed there and I will definitely recommended you to go and try out and must order the soup.

Service 4/5
Taste 4/5
Hospitality 4/5', 'This place has a really pretty ambience with an outdoor seating so cool. The food was not that great, but good enough. We really loved the milkshakes here though. You should totally try the milkshakes']

address: 15, Ground Floor, 1st Main, Near Shanti Sagar, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, Vegetarian Only,
reviews:
['', 'value for money food, will order again and again', 'This small juice shop serves the purpose. Usually it is always crowded. The people working are very cordial and fast. I seem to have juices here frequently or sometimes a bowl of fruit. I had a mango juice recently which was such a bliss after hectic office hours.', "Food - 3.0
Ambiance - 2.5
Service - 3.5
Value for money - 4.0

Would have given it a 3.5‚Ä¶!
It's like any other juice shop that doesn't really stand out too much, but just exists and does a pretty decent job of quenching your immediate this with some very low priced fruit juices. I think the maximum beverage they offer is their kiwi shake at about 60 rupeess which is quite refreshing. I just take my usual mosambi juice from time to time when I come here as I like the way it tastes, so natural and fresh. They use all fresh fruits so no need to worry about any preservatives and such.
A good place to have some freshly squeezed juices.", 'The place is usually crowded in summer times as am quite an observer and visitor for last 2 summers here!! Though there no specialized skill involved in making juice varieties,they taste quite good cause the fruits are fresh..As I had a talk once with owner he said they usually dump 200 KGS per day of all fruits..prices are quite reasonable though the surroundings makes such a bad impact as it smells quite bad sometimes !!']

address: 777/I, Opposite New Horizon School, HAL 2nd Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Full Bar Available, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Beer', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Cheesecake', 'Pepper Chicken', 'Masala Peanuts', 'Mutton Chops', 'Masala Papad']
reviews:
["Place is good for weekdays but weekend it's so crowded. With any music n dj you have to speak loudly to convey anything. That's crazy. So many are there but there must be something about this place right dts why it's over crowded, 1st choice for the young stars", "Came here on a Saturday night. The place was super packed. Loved the ambiance.. a lot of tables.. lots of talk and scurrying waiters. The rates are super cheap here and the best place to hangout with friends. We ordered pitchers of beer and the famous Namma desi chips n dip. I could eat plates n plates of it. Good replacement to the usual french fries we order. Also ordered some Malnad Pork which was yum, Bangalore Tin Kebabs & Pork Ribs (with green masala) which were average. There's valet parking available here and the service was pretty good", 'Cheapest bar i have ever visited. They charges only 20-30 rs extra then the MRP. The place is always crowded during weekends and you have to wait to get a table. They have rooftop options also and even a bar counter.
The service what i found is a little slow although. The food tastes awesome. Especially taste the pork chilli fry. It tastes heavenly.', 'Cheapest and coolest place to hangout at Indiranagar, it is always full. Only place that offers half portions. Tried mutton dry and chicken kaleji and both the dishes were nice. Would definitely top my list if in Indiranagar', 'If you want to drink by paying the least, then this is the best place in Indiranagar. The liquor is really cheap. Go through the menu if you want to verify. Coming to ambience, it is a biggg place with rooftop and mostly crowded. Overall the ambience is good. You can say that food is also very cheap, but the quantity is also less but the price and quantity is justified. Service is average. But it has more of a south Indian flavour in food, which is best for anyone wanting to try a bit traditional taste with drinks. But i must mention the cheesecake... It is a must try', 'Three words: Dirt. Cheap. Booze.
Always pass this place and wonder where all the noise is coming from. Finally went in and wasn‚Äôt disappointed.
Service isn‚Äôt the fastest, but the food is decent, and is (just like the booze) super bang for the buck.
Great option for a no frills, drink and local food place, coupled with a great location.', 'Ellarigu Namaskara 

The best pocket friendly place in and around Indiranagar. Prices are very much cheaper when compared to other places in that locality. 

It is on the main road and close to metro as well. 

The crowd gets filled really quick and you can see mostly young crowd. 

Table booking is recommended at least on weekend evenings. 

The food options are little less and quantity too just to match the price. 

Ambience 3.5/5
Service 4/5
Price 5/5
Food 4/5

Overall 4/5', 'Looking for a place where conversation is more important than music, then this place is a must visit.

Located on 100ft road, indiranagar and quite easy to locate the place. Once you enter the place you find people are 8ndulge in l9ng conversation and laughter which attracts me the most.

Coming to the food, we started with malnad pork, royal tawa beef chilli , ghee roast, pork chilli and beef roast. Foods were quite awesome here and very much pocket friendly. Things to remember, this bar serves all south indian dishes.

Main courses we ordered keema dose, keema paratha and biriyani. Keema dose and keema paratha is quite tasty and a must try over here. Biriyani taste can improve a bit.

Service is very prompt and fast.

Over all a very good place to have conversation with friends with some finger licking food and beer in hand.
foodtravelmovie.wordpress.com', 'This place is amazing! The food they serve is yummy and the rates are very reasonable. The vibe is great and the service is good. Loved it. Would definitely visit again', 'The place is usually crowded in the evening. A pocket friendly bar in Indiranagar. Service is quick. The prices are reasonable and the food tasted good. Loved the filter coffee cheesecake, egg roast, ghee rice and raw mango juice.']

address: 40, Kempegowda Service Road, Near Domlur Post Office, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only,
reviews: ['Rajasthani Cuisine, one of the cuisines boasting of a never ending platter with a plethora of dishes was influenced by the war-torn lifestyle of that region. Most of their dishes are prepared keeping in mind the arid climate and the lack of vegetables grown there.\nWe tried Paneer Butter Masala, Veg Kolhapuri, Onion Missi Roti and Laccha Paratha for dinner. The soft and melt in the mouth Paneer pieces in the generous serving of Butter in the gravy made this the star of the evening. The Vegetable Kolhapuri was equally tasty. The Laccha Paratha and Onion Missi Roti complemented the gravies well. Also, the Chole Bature was very delicious. The Chile itself was very tasty even after finishing the Bature.', "I recently ordered poori sabji from this place. The food was neatly packed with hygienic appeal. The gravy was rich and tasting good but excessive oil was floating over it. Poori was a little cold by the time food was delivered. Since I ordered via swiggy and asked for the replacement but they somehow couldn't arrange it."]

address: 606, Ground Floor 80 Feet Koramangala 8th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Neer Dosa', 'Biryani', 'Prawn Curry', 'Pork Chilli', 'Kori Roti', 'Sea Food', 'Chicken Curry']
reviews:
["I can never express in words the joys of being at a Mangalorean restaurant hogging on some delicious ghee roast..
Be it Chicken ghee roast, or prawns or even squid - Tom's makes some delicious in house masala and not the ready made packets of them. It's a little different, not so fine rather chunky on the palette but equally delicious.
That is how the Mangalorean catholics would prepare the same.
I absolutely loved the Need dosa with the prawns sukka, it was a little spicy but what better than something like that for a great dinner?
Do not forget to try out their wholesome ghee roast biryanis .", 'We had an a absolutely amazing time at Toms, love the fact that both the outlets are so unique in their very own way. Food has always been great, highly recommended trying the seafood and curries. Service was excellent, can‚Äôt wait to visit again.', "I had been eyeing this place for some time now. The ambience is super cool with wall paintings and wooden furnitures. First I tried the chicken ghee roast which is very different from what you find in other restaurants here in bangalore as it has a Catholic touch to it more than the coastal flavours. But it didn't disappoint me one bit. It was just amazing and out of the world good. Then I had the seer fish fry which is just amazing with a very good portion for very reasonable price. Then I had the pork pepper Fry which was also very different and very spicy with amazing flavours. Then I had beef sukka, the perfect combination is with the neer dosa. Very tender meat with perfect mix of flavors. Theni had the prawns fry and the prawns ghee roast which was also mind blowing especially with the appam they serve. This is one of the best places I have been to with amazing food, polite staff and amazing ambience.", 'Polite and friendly waiters. Peaceful place for a non-veg lovers.', 'Love their spicy and delicious food. Had beef pepper fry masala and pork baffeh with plain rice and Kerela parota and they were all amazing. Will definitely recommend you to go visit this place.']

reviews:
['Must try the baklava, very nice crisp, perfect sugar level,perfect size , value for money. Great job team the baklava company , hats of to the production team specially', 'Staff : ok. Tried his best to serve.

Ambience : ok. Seems like this is part of another bakery.

I hoped having the name of the place after the sweet "baklava" they may be having some best baklavas. But nah. Almost all were dry and some of them were way too dry.

Price : Reasonable to try.

Recommendation : It is sad that i could not find many places which sell baklava here im bangalore. So whatever is available had to be taken. But yeah I don't think i will be able to try this place again.', 'Went there yesterday and ordered three different baklavas and one cream kunafa. The baklavas were great, but I did not particularly enjoy the kunafa. I had the cream kunafa and it honestly tasted just like sugar. There was not enough quantity of cream in it. reviews:
['Brownie with Blueberry and Cream - Brownie is soft, chocolaty and made of good quality ingredients. The cream and blueberries are fresh. However the whole desert is very sweet.

üó£Ô∏èüó£Ô∏èRecommendations to the restaurantüó£Ô∏èüó£Ô∏è

1. Use natural ingredients
2. Reduce sweetness
3. Keep sugar free/wheat based natural options', "If you love brownies, and are willing to shed a bomb to have a basic brownie with vanilla ice cream - the all time classic, brownie heaven could be your place.
I was here at around 10 in the night, they'd switched of the ACs and the place got really hot. Thankfully my ice cream didn't melt haha!
I ordered inthe Brownie throne which was a nice warm slice of brownie topped with chocolate wafers and vanilla ice cream.
Also ordered a brownie that was topped with a bar of dairy milk. The brownies served hot alongside cold vanilla ice cream, is the perfect forever combination and you'd wanna come back here for these!
However I feel they're pretty overpriced!", "Yummmmmmmm. That sums it up. One of the best brownies I've ever had. It was sumptuous. Service was pretty good and ambience is pretty too, has cafe type setting. I had nutty Brownie with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce. It tasted really good.
Ambience: 4.5/5
Food: 5/5
Service: 5/5
Value for money: 4.5/5"]

address: 322, Shalini Complex, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Went there thrice. Rasmalai, kala jamun and moti choor laddus are the best there can be. Better than kanti‚Äôs. Mysore pak was also good. Rasgulla was average and sweetness was on higher side. Yet to try their chats.', "It's a place gone downhill. It used to have really good pani puri and other chat. Now it's a sad reminder of what it used to be with a poor tasting aaloo mix with no distinctive taste, a very mild and off tasting theeka paani. 50 bucks for 6 puris - hmm, definitely not worth it.\xa0
The Sunday chole, again, is a bit hyped, and feels too much on the spicy/oily side. Not coming back in a hurry!", 'Clean outlet, decent chat items. Bhel was really good. Pani Puri was too too spicy to be able to enjoy. Had kalakand to ease ourselves which was really tasty and fresh', "Went here for having their most sought after chole bhature.
It's tough to get good North Indian food Bangalore, this place breathes a smell of relief to the North Indian food lovers. Coming to the taste of Bhature, it's top notch. Best eaten when it's hot.
The taste of chole was good, wouldn't say excellent though. But, the masala flavours gave a good zing to the tongue.
In the end, a sumptuous breakfast.

Tips/Pointers for the foodies/diners:

-Pre order, else you wouldn't be able to get a plate.
-They only serve on Sunday's
-Good North Indian food is a bit expensive in Bangalore, be ready to pay 130 per plate.

Feedback for the restaurant:

-Please be a bit generous in giving refills of Chole or Aloo Sabji for the people. The server was making a sad face when we asked for refills, politeness/generosity will be much appreciated.

#Bangalore#NorthIndianFood#Sunday", 'Very good and fast delivery', 'A perfect way to start a lazy Sunday brunch. Head to Karthik Mithai for a scrumptious plate of Bhatura, served with chole and a serving of delicious aloo Mirchi. Make sure you book the servings earlier cause it is limited serving up to 200 plates.', 'Samosa Ragda, Dahi Samosa, Pani Puri and Dahi Puri - check. Great taste all of these. Particularly the samosa chat.

Gulab jamun and rasgulla too were devoured with gusto.

Very clean place and prices are surprisingly reasonable.', "The best place to have chole bhature in Bangalore. Just be mindful, it has to be ordered one day before and it's available on Sunday for breakfast."]

reviews:
['', 'Basically we went here only to try the momos and sadly there were only two options, veg and chicken! The spinach, corn etc ones are no longer here which is quite sad.
The chicken momos, definitely plump, juicy, delicious! We felt that there was egg in the filling because the taste was more egg-y than chicken-y but tasted good overall. We also tried the jaljeera and that was good too! Definitely a good place to visit.

Food: 4/5
Ambience: 3.5/5
Value for money: 4/5', 'You can have a taste of THE WORST momos here...had the veg momos which were just awful in taste.The momos were just dipped in oil and the veggies inside also had a very dominant oil taste. ever had tangy momos chutney ? Well you will be lucky to get tangy momos chutney hereüòíüòí...chicken shawarma was also average...
Roadside momos are way better than these pathetic momos.', "Their momo's are super. We had them several times and just end up wanting more. Next time want to the bhel style which looked great on the menu photo. Keep it up guys.", "Chotta dhukaan bada dhamaka... what amazing food. Me and my colleague went after office we were super hungry... we tried herbed egg sandwich, chicken and cheese momos and chicken roll shawarma. OMG what amazing food. Just like they said they served chubby Momo's. Definitely will go back again.", 'Awesome Momos and shawarma.
Best place to hangout and eat.
#Specially BHel Momos are very unique ! 
Had this type of taste for the first time.', 'Very small cute place on the same lane as metro station/cafe coffee day/chung‚Äôs...about 200 mtr walk from the station. 
Clean, hygienic n a tiny hole in the wall place. But the taste is pretty decent I must say.
We had a Classic Chicken Shawarma, Tea n Coffee. 
Not a big fan of the tea n coffee, but do go for the shawarmas n the ice tea. 
Can try out this place...', 'Incredibly tasty shawarma. We also had momos, sandwich and hot chocolate which was great but shawarma is a must try.
PS : They made a perfect masala tea, if you are a chai lover', "Love the shawarmas!!!! Especially the whole wheat ones. All praises to the quality of food. I haven't had better ones anywhere. With online delivery it's very convenient."]

reviews:
["Drove across town when I heard about this place. 2nd floor, lift available. Nice spacious n airy seating area. Staff is friendly. The plates are of a poor quality n light plastic. Could be better.
Chose the following for lunch...
Solkadi...don't miss. Very good, right spice.
Pomfret fry...good. Masala on it, okok.
Mutton ghee roast...a let down. Boiled mutton put in a masala but no taste, there was ghee though in it.
Chapatis...2 per plate. Ok.
Omelette.. eggs can't go wrong. Ok.
Sannas...very good, steaming hot. Soft. Well fermented.
In today's day n age, they gave us onion n lime. Tks.
They also gave a spiced curry for free as a side.
Didn't order any dessert.
Fingerbowl is given on the table.
1200 approx.
Food quality could be better."]

more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Wifi,
reviews: ['Dhyana is a lovely little cafe. Everything about this place is thoughtful, and absolutely lives up to its name. The menu is varied, simple and innovative. Needless to say, most of the food on the menu are healthy. We loved the Buddha bowl, and the protein dosa. The paneer roll was average, so was the dessert. All in all, if you want to have some lone time sipping tea, or enjoy time with friends over wonderful conversations, and enjoy clean eating, Dhyaana is definitely a good place to go.']

reviews: ['All the food is just excellent, when you eat Indian chinese food you tend to see too much oil in the food. Here its just perfect, not much oil and great taste.\nIts a fav place for visit wheneve we are in Indranagar.', 'Looking for a great Indian-Chinese meal in Indiranagar and whereabouts? Look no further than Bangalore Mandarin! Neat little place on Indiranagar Double Road, it will bound to make you satiating for more.The restaurant is decently decorated, nothing fancy. The menu is super elaborate and gives you a wide variety of options to choose from for every course. Do try their hot and sour variety of soups with wantons. Chicken spring rolls are an absolute crowd pleaser. I forget the name of the chicken starter we had, but it was chicken strips with some chilli flakes and it was out of this world (probably Hunan chicken). A must have. The servings and portion sizes are sumptuous and very generous.\xa0Multiple visits to Bangalore Mandarin are warranted for an exquisite Indo-Chinese culinary experience.', 'A good option for those Chinense cravings kinda day. Lovely ambience and decor, smooth service too. Soup, noodles, rice or appetizers all of it were great to taste and quantity was good too.']

address: 621/B, G-05, Ground Floor, 12th Main, Hal Second Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi,
reviews:
['The Cup Chronicles Cafe is a concept cafe for business or college crowd to hangout for long and people who like to work from a place. Concept also have sketch pens to decorate your own cup which is duly presented on the wall.
The recommended dishes are :
üî∏Kulhad Chai
üî∏Cheese Balls
üî∏The Mexican pizza

You can hangout as long as you want here with free wifi and make your work from somewhere fun. The food is pocket friendly priced.
                                                foodndestinations.com', 'Came across this place in TGF Indiranagar exploration videos. Small place which focusses more on people who are going to spend a long time in that cafe. There are things one can do to pass time, like games. What is most interesting is, they can provide you with sketch pens and paper cups to draw over them and you can keep them for display. The ambience is pretty good. Coming to food, it is really expensive and the quantity too is very less, but taste is awesome. So one has the tradeoffs as well as the pros. Suited as per need.']

address: 218, Near BDA Complex, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: City View, Indoor Seating, Kid Friendly, Vegan Options, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Gluten Free Options,
reviews:
['Grilled corn is something i crave for this chilled weather in Bangalore, This place serves grilled corn with loads of cheese and flavours. Roasted zucchini and corn served with tortillas and chopped zucchini and corn burrito bowl was really good but was a little spicy. Service is not that great. They took a lot of time to serve food.', "Visited this place for lunch with my office colleagues. The place wasn't too crowded when we got there so that's a plus. We found a table we liked quickly. The ambience is decent, could be better. Coming to the food, we ordered mushroom Nachos, Tacos with beans and mushroom and caramelized onions, Burrito, and some drinks. The food was really good! The salsa and and the peanut dips were amazing, as was the guacamole. But the star of the show has to be Churros. I've had Churros at quite a places and liked some. But their preparation outdid everything I'd tasted earlier. The Churros were crisp from outside, soft inside, coated in sugar and drizzled with cinnamon. And they're served with chocolate dip! Best preparation I've had. I'd give it 5 starts but the ambience was slightly not upto what I expected. Nevertheless, the food and service and staff is brilliant. Definitely recommend! Would visit again soon and stuff myself with Churros üòÉ", "Well, heard about this Mexican place from a friend of mine.
This little place is a gem. Nice location and easy to find.
This restaurant serves only Mexican food, and good Mexican food.
Loved the ambience of this place and so the service. Quick service and very responsive.
Tried out their, Beef grilled Taco's and Grilled Chicken Taco's.
Grilled chicken tacos was good, but grilled beef taco was something amazing, I just loved it. So juicy and creamy, and the beef was very well cooked.
We ordered a drink made out of Tamarind, oh I tell you , it's very sour (obviously, Tamarind). I couldn't finish it. üòÖ
Prices are very much reasonable.
Overall experience was really good and a decent place to have Mexican food.
Chinita Real Mexican Food", 'Decent place on top of a garage. Ambience is all wooden and lively. Light Mexican music in the background. Food is great. Tried the tosatadas, the enchilada and the hot chocolate.
4 star because the whole area is split in two and inside, ambience is wierd.', 'Great place for a quick and filling bite. Tried two of their burritos, which were made well, would love to go back again for more. Very minimal yet decent ambiance, and helpful service staff.']

reviews: ["Good Meal Options. Authentic North Indian taste. The highlight of this place is it's dehati chicken. This place has variety of menu starting from chaats to meals to parathas. Really great place to order any of your north Indian food need.', 'This place is one of the best places for parathas. The packaging is really awesome and the parathas are genuinely stuffed with ample amount of stuffing. Great place for online ordering and they are open till 3 am in the night so a very good late night option as well.', 'Food is great. Quantity is good and price is reasonable.I love the phulka rotis. Non veg quantity in non veg combo is also good.They deliver food within 30 minutes, which makes it easy for ordering and getting delivery', "Quality is good and everything is fine here. Here you will feel the taste of home cooked food. I have ordered and found it's good. They serve hot and quick. The quantity is also sufficient. Pure North Indian taste and value for money.  Hope this place will maintain the quality and quantity with a good services here in Bangalore.", 'Ordered Dal Chawal Pressure Cooker Chicken Combo and aloo samosa.Food was excellent in taste especially their chicken.\nChicken curry was tasty, chicken was well cooked and soft. Overall it was value for money meal!', 'Ordered Dal Roti Dehati Chicken Combo. The food was simply superb. It came with 4 Pc soft succulent Rotis, 2 Pc chicken cooked in dehati style and a wonderfully spiced dal. The taste reminded me of good food back home.', 'A big fan of the chicken masala combo. The chicken taste was completely homely and loved every bite of it. The Philly‚Äôs were also soft and were home style. Delivery was also on time.']

reviews:
['Super tasty food specially the Christmas curated menu was super amazing. Recommend them to add it to their regular menu. The staff was very courteous and responsive and quick. Must try their tomato soup and peanut crusted pumpkin croquettes (Christmas curated) that too with mint chutney üòç. The spring rolls could be given a miss.', 'I had a great time at sotally tober. Loved the ambiance, the food , the drinks and the service. Located on Residency Road and pretty easy to locate. The pizza was delicious and so was the pasta. The cocktails were perfect and went well with the food. Would love to come back here again üòä', 'The name of the place is very creative and unique and so is the vibe of the place. Beautiful ambience with pleasant music so you can talk and socialize.
Food was good as compared to other restaurants and bars but could improve more.
Dishes
Veg Nachos ( Must try )
SOTO Tandoori Chicken ( soft and juicy. Give it a try )

The best part was when you come out of this place the are where it is situated it very lit. You gonna love it.', 'Went with a group of 5 and was spell binded by the experience!!. The ambiance is electrifying, the food is good( the pizzas especially,) the beer cheap (draught beer) and the service is fine.(Could be faster). However, one of the best experiences of my life. Definitely Definitely recommended.', "Visited this place on weekday to celebrate a friend's birthday. A first for me but loved the ambience. The place has a separate area for smoking which is not too bad. The food was great. Must try their chicken lollipops which is very different from the usual stuff elsewhere. Also, the place has a Gold on drinks so drink up!", 'I went to this place on a Friday evening, first of all, the table I got even after a reservation, was bad. Next, their servers took a lot of time to comprehend what someone is trying to tell. The music was not good and it did not look like a Friday.
I had their Daiquiri, which was good but the LIIT was a total turn off. It was just ice and cola, the worst I have had till date.', "After visiting a very boring place, we had been to sotally tober and it didn't disappoint us. Food, service were great. Ambience was okayish but the experience on whole was good.", 'Ellarigu Namaskara!

Had been here with a group of 5 during weekend,
The place has smoking area as well as AC hall.

They have Zomato gold and ambience is a cozy one. They play live sports on TV not on big screen. 

Not much options for veg lovers, prices are ok for a weekend party. 

Must try: Nachos 


Food: 4/5
Ambience: 4/5
Service: 5/5

Overall: 4.5/5', 'Nice place in residency road. But surely quite expensive as compared to other outlets. But you will surely have nice time with your gang as there is no unneccessary crowd. Food tastes good.

Food : 3.0
Service: 3.5
Ambience: 4.0', "We dropped in just to have a couple of drinks on a Sunday night and fell in love with the ambience of the place..it's a small cute place with sassy interiors and perfect lightings. The menu has a decent variety of food and drinks. Mushrooms on the toast was yummy and should be tried. Since the place was crowded the service was slow and we had to reorder our starters after waiting for 15 mins. Will revisit to taste the main course as there are some amazing options. Over all a nice cozy place to hang out with friends any day of the week."]

reviews:
['Visited loca moca today, nice place good ambience and great shakes and potato wedges :). Recommended for a cool hangout with friends for a nice evening.', 'Visited this place for lunch. Good food good service. Nice decorated......... we speed lovely time.....

It used to be cuppa before, A decent coffee shop that‚Äôs located in a corner. This place has both indoor and outdoor seating. Indoor had some comfortable sofas and also is air conditioned. whereas, the outdoor is little noisy because of the traffic and it right next to main road. But I love sitting here during evenings because of the Bangalore weather and the plants all around keeps the place cooler with a fresh breeze.Loco Moca has a good range of tea that‚Äôs being served here, how ever comparatively the coffee variety is less. A lot of milkshakes varity where you look for your favourite chocolate in your milk shake. To name a few are kit Kat, Snicker, Toblerone and many.

address: 32, 18th Main, Off 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', '', 'Delicious east Indian food. Brings the flavor of Odisha and West Bengal to you. Pocket-friendly and you get a good number of items to choose from.', "Request you to all customers please don't refer this hotel else you will get food poisoning what I felt today .I paid 330 rupees for rice, egg curry with dal,bhalta. It looks so spicy and tasty but quality of food like waste and using rotten egg in curry .", 'Desi odia food is the main part the place belongs to.. the mutton curry and chiken curry will melt your mouth with yummy taste. Pakhala will also give you the feel of odisha. Desert are less in to menu but rasgulla is the best in taste here', 'Compare to other posh restaurants in Indira nagar, Little Orissa is a hidden gem. If you are from Orissa then this is a must visit place for you. This small restaurant can accommodate about 20 people. We recently visited this place to have Summer Special Pakhala and loved it.\xa0

Do check out their Mutton kasa, Badi chura, baiguni, Pohola macha, sorisa besara and chena poda as well. Dead cheap price, high quality and lovely service.Will visit soon. :)', 'Awesome place for odia people. They cook food very ethentic way. I was there on last week. I went there for only Summer special PAKHALA.

That was great like home. Badi chura, Saga bhaja, Baigani, Chatu (Mushrooms) Ambula Besara. My friend Vyshak ordered Mutton kasha, Pohola macha (Fish) Sorisa besara and Chena poda.

Saga bhaja was not good but other things are very tasty. Price is little high. Service also good.

Food- 5/ 5

Ambiance- 5/ 2

Service- 5/ 4

Cost - 5/ 3', 'I have been to this place quite a number of times. Feeling lazy ? Broke ? Craving for home food ? Close your eyes and head to this place. It‚Äôs easy to miss out this place because topographically it‚Äôs in between one of the many houses in indiranagar. A small place with a even smaller kitchen which serves home cooked food. Their food is simple, their service is quick and they are super cheap. I personally love their handi mansa ( mutton cooked in earthern pot ), machha besara. They do have an elaborate menu but they can always customise dishes based on your demands and needs. A decent place to help you during your month end crisis üòÅ', 'Craving for oriya food, then this is the place. Mutton curry tasted like homemade with rice. A must visit place for people from odisha. Planning again sometime next week.', 'The place is in a very narrow street of Indiranagar. We had fish curry, chicken kassa, egg chicken tadka, rice and rotis. The preparation was authentic Odia and the food was delicious with the right spices mix. We enjoyed a cottage cheese delicacy chenna podo as well.']

['Trying to order online, it says not accepting', 'Good experience', 'I recently ordered form UBQ by Barbeque Nation, MG Road.

I loved the concept of UBQ, you can order any think that you like without actually having to eat three course meals.though, I feel pricing of food is tad bit on the higher side.', 'Ordered dinner via online mode. address: 610, 3rd Floor, 12th Main, Off 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wine, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
restaurant_name: The Fatty Bao - Asian Gastro Bar
reviews:
['This place has been in my bookmarks for a while now. I finally got to visit this place on a busy Saturday, it was actually crowded. It attracts a lot of crowd so it‚Äôs better to book a table. I absolutely loved the food. The spinach and chicken dumplings were delicious and the ramen was perfect for the weather. It is a little expensive but worth every penny. Had a great experience here at fatty bao.', "Their teriyaki glazed chicken bao is to die for ! Beautifully cooked soft chicken stuffed in a bao, with the perfect amount of sauce and like this sweet after taste. Also, their wild mushroom and truffle oil dimsums are lovely! Truffle oil, I assume has a peculiar taste but it didnt bother me at all, I still loved the taste ! They have the nicest staff and a great ambience ! It's lovely for a cozy quiet dinner :) highly recommend!", "This place certainly lives up to the hype. There was an issue with our reservation but the manager was super helpful and cleared it up. The place is very busy so reservations are a must if you don't want to wait for a long time.
The food is very good, the service is prompt and their recommendations certainly turned out right. I also liked that the ambience is cosy and was great for long conversations without loud music blaring through the speakers.
We tried the bao, sushi, ramens and noodles. They were all fantastic. Had no space for dessert but was persuaded by our server to try their signature dish and I am glad we didn't miss it.
Awesome lunching experience.", 'We visited on a weekday. The staff was courteous and showed us to our seats. We ordered bao, sushi, dimsums, KFC. We ordered two baos, duck bao and pulled pork bao of which the duck one was my favorite. Ordered salmon sushi, you can order a 4 pieces plate or 8 pieces plate. It was served with wasabi and soy sauce. It was yum. We also ordered a dimsum and Korean fried chicken which was kinda spicy. Overall it was extremely satisfying and I will definitely go back for the bao', "Nice place. Difficult to get reservations on a Sunday evening.
We just felt like having some Asian food, came across this place. Heard a lot about before and it didn't dissapoint.

We ordered a some Sangria, they serve only wine. Although I would love them to serve some beer as well.

We ordered bao, a veg dish, the famous pork belly and sushi. Each one was well made and delicious.

The table arrangements probably could be a bit better.
And beer could certainly improve the overall experience :)", 'Finally got one more olive restaurant off the list. Good food , crisp service , nothing much to complain about other than its Too far for frequent visits though....

Rainbow roll ,
Crab and prawn Bao
Spicy salmon roll
Spicy chicken and celery gyoza
Edamame, chilli , garlic dimsum
Jasmine tea
Brie tempura
Japanese cheesecake
Warm apricot pudding

Value for money and hdfc card holders get a 15% discount as well....
                                                thegastronomix.net', "My favourite Asian restaurant in Bangalore ! Have been here quite a few times, finally writing a review. I love their open rooftop seating with the high chairs. The ambience inside is beautiful as well. My favourite thing to order is their dimsums, I love their chestnut dimsum(it's my favourite). For mains I like ordering their bowls which are very filling, the laksa being my favourite.
The service is prompt and the staff is very polite and helpful with respect to the menu. (They know what and how dishes taste like,so they guide you while taking the order keeping your preference in mind).
I will definitely go back here to try more items from their menu to write a detailed review.", "https://goo.gl/maps/EWwqR1oRXb8JDAh47

A lovely Asean joint, well cooked, great taste and superb service - go there with a pre reservation - thoroughly satisfied , don't miss Sushi n Ramen there", 'Best Japanese cuisine I ever had .
We tried too many dishes out there.
The prawns and chilly Bao were the best ones.
Sushi was well made. I tried oysters for the first time and I would definitely recommend to try oysters here.
In dessert we had fatty hill which had chocolate mousse with peppermint in the middle of the pyramid and the pyramid was made of crunchy chocolate chips served with ice cream.

The staff was very helpful and they made sure we devour all the dishes nicely. The service was quick. As the place is quite famous, recommend advance booking here. We had to wait for an hour to get inside but the wait was worth it.

Very satisfied with the experience.']

reviews:
['Lovely place serving some great churros in the heart of Indiranagar.
You get to try churros with a sauce of your choice - dark chocolate sauce, or white sauce.
You also can customize and go either with plain churros in a pack of 3 or more, or loaded churros with Nutella, banana or more.
Perfect for date nights, or outings with your gang.
Must visit.', "A small young cafe for churros, a Spanish Street food hero snack. We tried chocolate, caramel, and peanut butter churros. Delicious. Must try. Churros are very different snack from traditional desserts. We also tried here rice esplanada, loaded nachos and caramel and hazelnut cold coffee. Evrything's just good and worth trying.
Sure give a visit here and try churros. Available on every leading home delivery apps.", 'It‚Äôs a small cafe in Indranagar serves amazing churros.. must try their Spanish omelette tortillas it‚Äôs really amazing and very fluffy.. never had anything like that before.. really loved it.. their churros was well made and tested delicious.. they also have good variety of milkshakes - tried choco mocha it‚Äôs really good.. a good experience.. nice service .. a must try place üëåüèªüëçüèª', 'GOBBLE UP CHURROS is a cute small place located in Indiranagar. There are not much places that serves Churros, a spanish dish. Ambiance is okay but the service is quick. I had a pleasant experience there because the dishes had quite exquisite flavours. I loved the chicken wings, they were juicy with the balanced spicy and sweet touch. Churro pops was nice. The presentation was really nice as they decorated it really well.
The food i ordered :
Churro pops
Regular strips
Dark chocolate gems churros
Hazlenut churro sundae

I would rate it :

Ambiance: 3/5
Food: 4.5/5
Presentation: 4.5/5
Taste: 4.5 /5
GO/NO-GO : GO

Great work team!', 'We went here late night to get dessert. Our order was a Salted Caramel Churro Sundae, and it was such a nightmare. The peanuts tastes and smelt so old, and the salted caramel was so runny. It was not a nice experience at all, the person handling at the counter does not know how to take complaints.']

address: 493, 13th Cross, 2nd Stage, Behind BDA Complex, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'I paid 275 for a butter dosa ana tea. They only delivered dosa. Never answered by call there after. This is pure cheating!', 'I visited this place last sunday for breakfast after seeing a long queue in MTR. But we were not disappointed. We ordered mango podi dosa, chilly cheese dosa, open masala dosa, idli vada and paddu.
I liked the mango masala dosa and open masala dosa. Everything was extra oily that was the only downside.', '', 'Good place for a quick bite..all the items on the menu are good.
Dont foget to try the avalakai dosa and coffee.
Its a self service joint...', "Amongst all their outlets ,the avlakki dosa is the most consistent and fluffy here .It's a great pairing with the onion chutney that they serve", 'Loved the avalakki dosa,savige bath(though was not hot, loved it) ,idli sambar. Masala dosa was okayish. Filter coffee is a must have for all coffee lovers.However,it was given in a glass (like a chai)rather than the authentic way of serving the coffee. Kesari bath- ITS JUST WOW!Overall loved the place. Just for the masala dosa,I have reduced 1 star.', "This is a small but place visited by the locals or by the people who work in the vicinity. They have a very limited menu but the taste is very authentic l than most popular south indian places in Bangalore.I wish they didn't close their place as early as 8 pm :(", "Love South Indian and want it to be pocket friendly too? Then this is the place to eat!
What to try :
1. The podi idli : The idli covered in ghee and podi is just blissful. An absolute favorite

2. The masala dosa : It's good. Not the best I have had though

3. Filter coffee : who said filter coffee was just a Tamil thing. The filter kaapi here was a killer !

4. The Kesar bath : a chunk of kesari. It's of the right consistency, filled with ghee, but a lovely dessert to end it. (Best for 2 )
.
.
A South Indian breakfast spot which is a must try in Banglore !

Thefoodfella rating : 3.8/5 
                                                thefoodfella.wordpress.com", 'The idli and chutney are to die for. Soul food. Nice. Varieties of pudi can be experimented with. Coffee here is goood. Can walk out with a cup of coffee and light a smoke. Good combination']

address: 57, 3rd Floor, Phoenix Building, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'We went on a Saturday night and the restaurant did not have almost half of the items mentioned on its menu. So much so I had to tell the waiter to tell me what he has so that I could order accordingly. Also the price seemed high considering the ambience', 'Authentic Chinese food, absolutely delicious. Staff is very kind. A must-visit for all foodies!', 'Finally a ‚ÄúReal‚Äù Chinese restaurant in Bangalore. It‚Äôs the only place in this part of the country to get authentic Sichuan food! And it‚Äôs SOO Good!', "Authentic Chinese experience. The food, the chef, the ambience. It's not the typical indianized Chinese food that we typically get.

The pork and beef are ambitious, the vegetable succulent. Overall it's a gastronomic experience reserved for an adventurous palate.

The desserts are something that aren't known for in Chinese cuisine

I love the food here, and would definitely visit again", 'The only real authentic Chinese food in town with a real Chinese chef, reasonable price for large portion of dishes. The only issue is that the waiters need more training on servicing.']

address: 158, Near Sai Baba Temple Road, 1st Main, Koramangala 7th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Smoking Area, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Very poor quality and service. And the behaviour of the staff was very harsh..', 'Getting to have decent Kolkata biryani is a task in itself. Lazeez is a sore disappointment. So after checking out the reviews we went to Aalishan.
Ordered chicken tandoori and chicken biryani for me and hubstar had mutton biryani.
The tandoori was juicy and soft. The biryani was great. Aloo cooked to perfection. Portion size too is a lot for one person.
Definitely going back here again whenever the craving for Kolkata style biryani kicks in.

reviews:
['I ordered for faluda but they gave me fruit salad so disappointed and i ordered for chocolate ice cream and it was melted really disappointing i heard good reviews about this restaurant but never thought i will get disappointed pls refund my amount or deliver me a right order', "Not accepting delivery now... Why.. I think they should be conscious about it.. They should improve their business... I ordered Chocolate milk shake and Sandwich, and it was really fabulous. And the atmosphere also very Good and service also ambience. And I am recommending my friends to visit this place. Don't miss it.", 'Order a fruit salad with ice cream it had a big amul venilla scoops and big ball fillad with fresh fruits and honey at chocolate sauces simply loved it...', 'good try for cafe snacks', 'Got a cake for my friends birthday. Looked pretty decent and taste wise it was average too but then we found hair in the cake. So disgusting. Never going to this place!!', "Food - 3.0
Ambiance - 2.5
Service - 4.0
Value for money - 3.0

I felt that the seating area was very unhygienic. It just felt sticky everywhere on the table and the chairs were somewhat wet. So I don't recommend this place for like a group hangout.

They make some puffs, cutlets and such bakery items as well as some cakes and pastries. They also have a juice bar with some variations. It's a good place if you're really hungry and want to have a quick snack or something. Nothing too great. Their cakes look very lifeless though.

I had a chicken puff at just 20 rupeess which was good price wise but the taste was just sub par. I complimented this with a mint lime soda which was refreshing. All in all I spent just 50 rupeess.

The service was good and were quick in completing their tasks.", 'Food is to good but packing is worst pls improve packing Milk shake is leaking what is the use of ordering', 'I asked for no onions. and they added raw onions. I had to throw out the rolls. Please refund my money']

address: 122B, 2nd Floor, KHB Colony, 1st A Cross Road, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Board Games, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Wifi, Live Music,
reviews:
['It is more like a place to hangout or chill, especially for students as it is close to JNC on the most busiest Street of kormangala.

They have books and games for leisure, so you can have fun while eating or if you plan to laze around for awhile.

The prawns were delicious and steaks to my surprise was quite tasty.

Reasonable yet tasty food', 'Nice place to hangout with friends. Price is reasonable.Taste is also good. They accept zomato gold as well. Liked the place. Chicken steak with barbeq sauce was too yummy..', 'Excellent food and ambiance. Waiter are also very courteous. They did not take much time to prepare the food. You can spend a very good time with good books here. I have loved the steak, fish and chips,lemon butter fish.

In dessert caramel pudding and fried ice cream both were really tasty. Overall i spent a good time here.', 'Lovely and cozy ambience with bunch of games to have lively experience with someone special. Great music üëå.
Dishes
Ratatouille ( grilled vegetables in cheese and pasta sauce üòã. Give it a try )
Paprika penne pasta ( they put very less sauce so we asked to cook it with more sauce. Not good taste need to improve )

Drinks
Black current granita ( crushed ice with black current flavour. Not so good )
Passion fruit mojito ( tasted like virgin mojito.)', 'So we had a late night movie to catch at Forum Mall and plan was to chill late evening at some cafe and that‚Äôs how we landed here. Zomato Gold was another incentive of going to this place. Went there with zero expectations and the place turned out really well. Mocktails and Smoothie were refreshing, fish fingers were nice, fried prawns were a disappointment. Ambience is really nice, entry to this place seems little shady but the cafe is really beautiful.', 'York St is very easy to locate, but is probably one of the quieter places in Koramangala. Loved the food, ambience and service. The gravy in the cottage cheese steak was absolutely amazing. The prices are affordable and the portions justify the prices. Added bonus if you have Gold. All in all, a wonderful place, would definitely visit again.', 'York St. is the perfect place for your economy lunches and dinners. The menu is both compact and balanced and the variety of options available makes its a must visit place.

Our orders :-

üëâ Loaded Nachos - Cheese and Mexican beans to go with salsa. Loaded nachos one of my all time favorites and I was very happy with the one offered here.
üëâ Pasta Marinara - Sauce was on point and the penne tasted really good
üëâ The steak and beef burgers along with the chicken starters were also very good.

Thank you, Team York St.', 'A calm and beautiful cafe on a very busy road. Pleasing interiors. Great service. Mocktails were refreshing and even the food quantity and quality is good enough.', "Loved the fisherman's bake which had a great creamy cheesy flavour. Unfortunately didn't really like the highly recommended Beef Stronganoff - we felt it had way too much of rice and less meat. The ambience and the place was pretty chill and good service too..

Zomato Gold surely helped :D
Will surely revisit to try other dishes.", "A very beautiful well organized cafe which serves Continental dishes. We had Fisherman's choice as starter which was quite decent in taste, triple decker chicken which is a must try, Fisherman's bake which was disappointing in quantity wise. Ambience is good."]

address: 136, Ground Floor, 1st Cross, 5th Block, Jyoti Niwas College Road, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Buffet, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['A must visit place if you love Chinese food. They have a great menu which caters to every type of taste buds.

I visited them for their sea food festival and I was very overwhelmed by the new additions.

My favorites were:

Grilled fish cakes - Soft fish cakes which melt in your mouth.

Fish with orange and black beans - Great flavour and goes well with the fried rice.

Fried Bombay duck - Perfect fried batter fish.

Chocolate dome with warm chocolate sauce - Crazy Dessert to finish proceedings.

The whole meal paired with red wine will be a night to remember.', 'Went during the curry festival and tried following dishes

ü•¢Thai clay pot chicken.
ü•¢Thai jungle curry with lotus stem
ü•¢Caramelised tofu in clay pot.
ü•¢Indonesian vegetables with cottage cheese.
ü•¢Thai Yellow curry

All the dishes were very well prepared and quite tasty.', "Asia Kitchen is one of the best for pan-asian delicacies in the neighborhood. Each time I visit Asia Kitchen, I appreciate the consistency. Seafood and Wine Festival kick-started at Asia Kitchen earlier this week and I knew I need to visit it soon.

Chef Manzil and team has done a great job as always. It is impossible to pick a favorite. I loved the flavour of the fishcake. Prawn dimsums also taste perfect. Bombay duck melt-in-the-mouth. I would recommend the fish in Orange sauce too. Crab was also well prepared. I'm definitely heading back for more.", 'A great place to visit if you love chinese food. Once you enter, you will get those chinese vibes. The menu is great, lots of option. (They give you tablet as menu). Even drinks are available. As complimentary they give you masala gola. The food is awesome and you definitely have to try the dumplings. They will melt in the mouth. The only cons i found is that, they use a bit more oil to cook.', "It was a much awaited visit to Asia Kitchen. We arrived late, thanks to the traffic but staff was courteous, made us feel comfortable.
Rest all was just average. The starters , main course and deserts.
Few things worth mentioning was the fish starter and main course and the chicken dim sum.
Overall it's not worth the travel of 25+ km in Bangalore traffic for this food, lots of better option nearby.", '.
üç≤Crazy about Asian style curries; head to Asia Kitchen by Mainland China where you can savour on curries inspired by the places in Southeast Asia like China, Japan, Indonesia,BurmaThai n Malaysia in their ongoing curry Festival .
.
üç≤On my table
üçΩÔ∏èIndonesian vegetables with cottage cheese.
üçΩÔ∏èCaramelised tofu in clay pot.
üçΩÔ∏èSouth Vietnamese fish curry with dil
leaves.
üçΩÔ∏èThai jungle curry with lotus stem.
üçΩÔ∏èThai Yellow curry.
üçΩÔ∏èThai clay pot chicken.
üçΩÔ∏èLamb shank rendang curry.
.
üç≤The scrumptious flavours, bright colors, exotic ingredients of these warming Asian curries will definitely delight your palate.
The Chef added a zing to the dishes with authentic spices , curry paste n ingredients , procured from some southeast nations and curated the menu keeping Indian taste in mind.
.
üç≤For anyone who love Southeast Asian flavours, must give this a try. .
                                                bytetrails.com', 'Many time I went there for lunch or dinner. The food quality never disappointed me. Mainly I ordered most of the time burnt garlic noodles, chilli fish, burnt garlic chicken. Smoked chicken was delicious. I liked the complimentary sorts and the presentation. The staff were very courteous. I recommend this place who love Pan Asian cousin.', 'Amazing buffet and mocktails. The starters lacked variety, but the quality of food made up for it. The main course was amazing, the fish curry was delectable and the crab curry was amazing too. Will definitely visit this place again and again.']

address: 4121, LR Arcade, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Live Music, Table reservation required, Smoking Area, Buffet, Nightlife, Craft Beer, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, Wifi,
reviews:
['Disappointed with the food variety and taste.', 'For those passionate about gourmet dishes plus drinks, and fancy having it under the starry sky, The Star Lounge at Big Pitcher is a perfect spot to hit. The venue is nestled at the top floor of the Big Pitcher‚Äôs 5 storeyed building ; a club, microbrewery, discotheque being housed on other levels. \xa0But if it‚Äôs the Bangalore‚Äôs beautiful weather you seek to soak up while enjoying the good food, then definitely move \xa0all the way up to the Star Lounge.
                                                ...Read full post on bytetrails.com', 'We went there last evening for some quick drinks and bites... Since it was around 3 pm, it was happy hours and it was 1:1 on all drinks... Got to try the in house brewed Lager and Wheat beers... Ordered an assorted kabab platter which had mutton, chicken, fish and prawns and was very good in taste... Great ambience, great service and a wide array of food and drinks to chose from... What more does one look for in a pub... Strongly recommended...', "It's a damn cool place especially during party night. The starters is amazing except for vegetarian dish. Hard drinks is better compared to their specific cocktails. Even though the dance floor is small but the DJ is incredible so you'll enjoy like anything during Bollywood night.", "A beautiful place for dinner, clubbing, and drinks. The food here is good and tasty. Its costly but worth it. There is a pub too so you can chill, dance and have fun. It's a nice place for hanging out with friends.", 'I loved everything about this place. I have been here a number of times. I have ordered chicken, beef, cheese balls, chicken cooked in curry paste, Fish and everything tastes so good. Also their beer. Special thanks to David and Sukumar for their lovely and apt service every time I went there. I will definitely be there again. Also special mention for the DJ , awesome music.', "Pathetic hospitality. Staff is not well aware about the restaurant policies and it's tie ups with third parties.

A customer like me who doesn't really fight for these issues has to pay the full price instead of availing the offers clearly applicable.

In short staff should be more aware and there should be better resolutions for such issues.", 'So, Nice place for those great beers üçª average mock-tails n good starters. I loved the fish n prawns from their bbq...mock tails are good too, loved the coconut flavoured one ...! So this starter session is very good n they do not have non veg pizza in buffet, o we did not get. Main course is average...sweet side is good. Nice place which was crowded on a week day too...so it‚Äôs a busy place and still each one is taken care of..thanks guys!', "BIG PITCHER is a pub which is located at Old Airport Road. The place is huge as it's got many floors and each floor has different Ambience and different seating options and i like the way the place has been made. Big Pitcher also has a rooftop which is so amazing. i really love the lighting of the place.
Service was good and quick and i was happy with that.
Staff Behaviour also was at best and they were friends and interactive and welcoming.
Food was just amazing, we tried all their dishes and they all turned out to be great. Drinka were well blended as well and perfect mocktail they made i felt. what else do you want, GOOD FOOD, GOOD DRINKS AND GOOD PLACE WITH GOOD COMPANY. this place is define chillout spot for me from now on.

MY RATING : 5/5

Ambience : 5/5
Service : 5/5
Staff Behaviour : 5/5
Food : 5/5
Drinks : 5/5

Do try out this place guys and also have a lovely day ahead. Make sure to follow me here and on Instagram : bangalore_foodtales
Take Care and bye now ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'If you are ever near Murgeshpalya / Domlur, and can‚Äôt decide on whether you want to go for a rooftop restaurant / dance floor to groove / have drinks at the bar, BiG Pitcher is the all-in-one place with every possible combination of a restro-bar you‚Äôd think of. 

The staff is humble, if the weather is favourable I‚Äôd recommend rooftop for chilling but you can‚Äôt apply Zomato Gold on the rooftop so decide beforehand.

Plus, the food is great too, though it burns a hole in your pocket. The Drunken Sicilian pizza aka Fire Pizza here is the most sought after as it is flamb√®ed with Vodka!

Update: The Druken Sicilian Pizza is removed from the menuüò∂ and Bois can‚Äôt visit the dance floor in denim shorts / without shoes so choose wisely!']

address: 60, 1st Floor, GNR Enclave, Indiranagar Double Road, Appareddy Palya, Indiranagar, Bangalore

reviews:
["I've ordered food from here multiple times via swiggy and zomato. Not sure if they have a physical hotel space. The food has been good and neat till now, I've not faced any issue with quantity or quality.", 'Ordered Chicken Biryani combo and phirni via swiggy. Phirni was tasty but too sweet please reduce sweet and it will be great too.', 'Taste of kidney beans was amazing. Quantity was enough for 1 person.

I ordered so many other restaurants what taste of kidney beans not so good. But after long time I had very tasty kidney beans.', "I have ordered the following from this restaurant

1. Dosa, Chicken curry
It was quite delicious. The chicken curry was pretty good, adequate quantity for one person (4 curry cut pieces). The dosa was also not too oily.

2. Chapati, Egg burji
The quantity of egg burji in this portion can easily be shared. The chapati was also soft.

3. Buttermilk
The seasoning of buttermilk was slightly more. So I wasn't a great fan of the buttermilk.", 'Horrible experience. I ordered food from here and it was greasy like anything and had smell of stale food. If you want to ruin your appetite and mood, go ahead and try this place.', 'Horrible Experience ! I was so hungry and ordered food fro FRESH BITE ,Irony is this name is not suitable for this restaurant because food was stinking and it no doubt it was stale food.
How can they even do this a customer during lunch time,trust me ,this people are just making money not bothered about us!
Higly ! recommended ! not to order any thing !', 'Horrible food. Extremely oily. The kadai paneer has 4-5 small pieces of paneer and the chicken had the left over pieces that usually no one eats. Now the concern is how can a digital menu show a dish when it‚Äôs not available? It can be updated as soon as there is unavailability. All in all 3 hungry tummy‚Äôs because of you guys.']
