more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Excellent cakes and really not expensive !
#pie almond #cakes #macaron #delicious #friendly
Really you should try at least one time one of their cakes', 'I was looking to pick up a cake and dropped by to try came Genie. Picked up a half kg strawberry cake.
It wasnt that great, It was too sweet, the cake wasnt fresh as it seems to look, I‚Äôd much rather stick to just bake rather than cake genie.', 'Wonderful food, wonderful place and wonderful people...no words to speak but have you EVER heard of bakery that would melt in your mouth,..be it cupcakes to mudpies to brownies to my favorite tiny bakes, the "blondies". If you have a sweet tooth or a savory, and do want to have a pocket friendly experience Cake Genie is the place to go!! Added to that, the Owner Vijay is an absolute gentleman to the core and gives me FREEBIES at the end of the day (yes you heard it right!! lasagna and sandwiches just to taste). How can I forget.. love you guys!! Telling all I know about you all', 'A friend requested me to pick up their order from this p√¢tisserie, I was impressed by their affordable prices without compromising quality.
I would highly recommend the seasonal strawberry cheesecake and the mud-pie has a nice biscuit base with some coffee essence on top of the chocolate ganache. Anyone in need of party cupcakes will be happy with their selection as well.', 'Fresh and delicious, right from the red velvet cupcake to their blueberry cheesecake, their melt in mouth treats will leave you craving for more. The mixed fruit gateau and pineapple gateau is loaded with fresh fruits and layered with light, fluffy cream and is easily one of the best cakes on the menu.', 'Probably the tastiest cheesecakes I‚Äôve had in quite a long time. Would recommend it over some  of the more popular bake houses around. Not just the cheesecake, even the apple pie which I‚Äôm generally not a huge fan of was pretty neat. The chocolate mousse also one of the highlights of this little place.', 'Over the past 2 years, I have been to this place a few times. The cakes tasted delicious and based on faith, I ordered chocolate truffle for a birthday today. What resulted was utter disappointment and embarrassment.. The cake was dry and flaky , the cherries were sour. It looked delicious from the outside, but was quite contrary when consumed.
I called the shop immediately to express my concern, but the lady who answered the phone was defensive and parroted "Our cakes are fresh" and paid no heed. I didn't know what to say when the mistake is swept under the rug. Hope they learn.', 'The pine apple cake was moist and yum. At first I thought, is this real! Can cake really be this way but the way the flavour holds together convinces you that you were meant to be. Order cake. Order pineapple. Save the world.', 'Shittiest cake shop I have been to, in Bangalore . Pastries served here were spoiled , when I complained the person at the counter offered me another from the same lot saying "maybe" this one is good . Overpriced plus your pastries suck', "Stopped by for Getting few Takeaways , The Lemon Cake Was Like ACID Drops in between each bite, The Pastries were Hard and Smelled Old , The Donut Was Round that's all.. Have some quality check before serving your so called food to customers ...With  Shubha Thomas"]

reviews:
["One must try aloo paratha and peri peri fries. It's really good. The ambience is also nice.
If you are really a food lover I'll recommend you to visit bhookha sher restaurant once", "I ordered French fries, packing is good and taste is awesome. Process of cooking didn't took much time, I got my order in 20 min. Thank you for such wonderful food", 'Had crispy corn from Bhookha Sher. French Fries are also very tasty. I am impressed and will definitely order again and again. Try once you will never regret.', 'Ordered a non veg caesar salad and veg sandwich. The food is just ok. The salad barely had any chicken in it. And had way too much croutons, which made the salad taste very oily. The sandwich also wasnt that great. Filling was just tomatoes and cucumbers.', "Tasty food which makes us to order again and again.
Masala omlete properly coocked with onion and tomato's
Toast given with butter and jam
Yummy üòÉ", "Recently 3 days ago to be precise through Zomato I ordered 2 breakfast from single serving ( bread omelet & one masala omelet) for my aunt at home who is a patient and it was a pathetic service from the restaurant side.

The bread toasts weren't sent & the masala omelet was seriously sad, spite of given specific instructions not to add tomatoes as she is just gone through a kidney stones surgery, yet they went wrong.

Sad ... When called the restaurant to enquire about the missing Toast, the manager Nikhil who attended the call was insensitive & was trying to request for a good review rather than doing anything about the missing Toast.

It comes to me as a surprise that Mr. Nikhil the manager was trying to ask me not to write a review of this than feeling sorry for the missing order . The taste was ok but the omlet was slightly over roasted & left a bad taste in her mouth.", "Recently I have purchased chicken Caesar Salad, taste was not good and salad was smelling badly. I really didn't expected this kind of food. Also would like to mention that the breadcrumbs was quite smells like old oil. And had to throw my order!", 'Ordered Puri sabzi for breakfast. I loved it! The sabzi was spicy and very tasty. Felt like it was homemade. The breakfast made my day. Also not to forget, 2 cups of watermelon juice which was included in the combo.', 'Nice place for day to day visit and eat. especially, one of the rare places for north Indians to have north kitchen food in Old Airport road. Not a very big joint, but good enough for 3-4 guys. I ordered Aloo-paratha, sandwich and loved it. You can tell them how you want it, soft or crispy and they make it.']

more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
['Such a pathetic box of pizza. Disgusting is the word. Restaurant has no number to call on.', "True rating - 4.5/5

This place makes such wonderful pizzas. I don't know why its so under-rated. The rating on Zomato doesn't do justice either. I have had their pizza twice. The first one was the Feast Chicken Pepperoni Pizza. With a yummy layer of cheese running through the crust, the pizza was extremely dilicious. To be honest, I didn't expect the pizza to be this good. The second time, I ordered the Exotic Meat Eater Pizza. This was slightly spicy, and maybe not as good as the former. But on its own, this one was quite tasty actually.

The only problem with this establishment is that they are closed at evening, and you can order only after 9pm. So if you're planning to have an evening pizza party, Woodfire Pizza is not the place for you. As for me, I know from where I am going to order my next pizza too :)


PS - A photo I upload showing the packaging keeps on getting deleted. The package has Swiggy tapes around it. Is Zomato being naughty?", 'Ordered a margarita pizza and burger from here. The packaging was stable and delivery was swift. The pizza tasted average. This restaurant offers value for money.
                                                althingsbeautiful.wordpress.com', "Such a bad pizza I never had till now..It's worst..it didn't cook at all..I wanted to give zero rating.i will never order from this woodfire.Zomato pls respond fo this", 'Burger Sucks..Tasteless and Dry...and Pricey.Bun was dried up..patty was just two small chicken wings..Price is a scam..only other filling in the burger was a dried up capsicum.', 'Worst place to order food. Attached are the photos of their Popocorn Chicken which costs 119 rupees. Just 10 pieces. No value for money! Never ordering again!', 'I have ordered a red sauce pasta. However what I received looked like a pasta salad. The pasta was dry and there were chicken fried pieces in it and that‚Äôs all. It was sad. Also I ordered coke and received thumps up.', 'burnt more than usual', 'I ordered a chicken Burger. It was less of a burger and more of onions, Mayo, Capcicum and Bun.

Very disappointing. Never going to repeat anything here.', 'Loved the burger. The bun was a combination of the crisp and softness. The patty and the sauce was clean topper. Looking forward for pizzas.']

The staff was very polite and the food was incredible. Especially their veg biriyani. Never tasted better biriyani. Will definitely visit again and again.', 'Great food and ambience. Service is excellent. My go to place in the city for good biryani. Would definitely bring my friends and family here!', 'From Horse Gram Biryani to Lollipop Chicken Biryani, they have some of the best variety of Biryanis I have come across in Bangalore! A must try for good food at a reasonable price.']

more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
['The finest Malai chicken I have eaten till date in Bangalore. Not kidding , this one went straight to my heart! Perfectly balanced sweetness of Malai chicken with soft and puffy kulchas. Must have if you are here.', 'The guy basically just roasts pizza base on a tawa and calls it kulcha. Very horrible.aloo Gravy was awful. ate what I ordered cuz I was hungry, but save yourself from eating these so called "kulchas" if you can.', 'I ordered masala kulcha and plain kulcha along with kadai paneer. As the other reviews go, I don‚Äôt really know what and how their kulcha is made but it isn‚Äôt the traditional kulcha we eat. I think it was just flattened white bread roasted with lots of butter.
It tasted good along with the much gravy and very less paneer that came along with it. Their should increase the portion size of their main course and pieces of paneer.', 'The food is definitely tasty. I ordered chicken kheema and kulcha and i found it satisfying. I tried hard but could not understand their concept of kulcha. It looks like a pizza base or rather like a soft AND thick bread to me.... But definitely its a bread and not a kulcha... Whatever it is, tastes good though.. Checkout the pics', 'The Chicken Keema and Kulcha combo is very delectable, indeed. I would describe myself as a heavy eater most of the times and I was satisfied with the quantity. The packing is also very well done.', "Excellent food. The chicken kheema is a must try! Also the kulcha's are very good as well. Wonderful meal packages as well. Everything is a must try! :)", "Great food. I've ordered many times from Kulcha kulture and the food is delicious.
I've ordered for kulcha with paneee bhurji, chkn kheem wuth kulcha as well. Must try both of these dishes.", 'Not that great .\xa0Chole was also not that tasty . I ordered from .swiggy. I dont know\xa0 why after taking so much money the food taste so bad. I did not like it .', 'Never ever ordering from this place again. Placed an order through Swiggy, restaurant confrms it, then calls & says food is out of stock. Then again I get a call saying order will take 30 mins more because they are preparing other order. Pathetic.', "....And it is proved that Indiranagar has a neverending list of eateries.\xa0
Came across this new kid on the block and decided to try out their food. Thanks to zomato it gave a hefty discount on the occasion of Independence day, otherwise, the combos do seem a little overpriced for people just ordering for themselves on a regular basis.
Kulcha and chicken keema \xa0Ordered this combo from @kulchakuture for dinner last night.\xa0
Honestly, the kulcha could have been softer but in their defence, the delivery time takes a toll on the food as Kulcha is best when consumed hot. The keema, however, was fab! It wasn't oily or greasy but extremely tasty and filling. ‚ù§

Desi khana FTW!!"]

reviews:
['', '', '', 'The food was very salty. The mutton chops was salty. The mutton keema was also the same masala. It was horrible.', 'I have no idea how did I end up ordering from this place even though the rating is so poor! The biryani was so bad. Honestly the worst and the mutton cutlet was full of maida and no mutton at all. The biryani rice was over cooked and sticky due to the heat. It was real bad! Thanks.', "This place is awesome for biryani lover's.. Tasty food as always.i love to be here when I feel to have biryani.most recommend for all friends ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'What a sad place. Ordered food and they serve it cold and say this is how we serve food when we asked the lady there if she would eat it in the state it was served she refused to eat. They took the food back heated it in a cooker. Food tasted bad. Service was worse. Regret stepping in. Steer clear of this place put your money to better use.', 'The food was too bland, had no taste at all. The chicken was undercooked. It was raw and taste less.
Needs to improve a lot with proper guidance.', "Quite a few options of combo meals to choose from.

Quantity of the food is really good. Not the best of Biryani in and around the region - but definitely worth a try.

Drop a visit if you're in the mood for Dinner Biryani!", "Visited this restraunt for the dinner tonight. A friend of mine was recommending this place from sometime and I should say it didn't disappoint. According to him the must try was Pepper Chicken, but unfortunately it was already over.

We ordered Biriyani Rice, Guntur Chicken and Chicken Kebab. Guntur Chicken and Biriyani were spicy. Chicken Kebab was served hot. Overall the taste was good, but be ready for the spicy food.

The service was quite fast and the place was not crowded. The price is very reasonable as well."]

reviews:
["One of the best coffees I've tasted. Their brew reminds of the filter coffee flavour we're used to having at home, only its a lot better and creamy.", 'I mostly have my breakfast here. its one the best place to have a chicken tikka sandwich. its just 60 Rs and the stuffing for that money is really worth. and not to forget the cold coffee you would love it.', "I loved the ginger tea, didnt find yet better tea than this one in bangalore. Also bought truesouth coffee decoction, it's great

if possible, can you extend it with swiggy, so we could order online, will be extremely happy", 'Beautiful decor, even better coffee. The cold coffee was simply heavenly. Staff was also friendly and helpful. Will definitely recommend. Go for it, guys!', 'Though I am not too much of coffee lover but true south coffee is awesome ...
The ready to use packets are great for lazy people like us ...
Ambiance is great too...', 'Late evening, my sister who is back from US wanted to drink a good filter coffee, so we decided to try True South. When we reached the True South store on Old airport road, guys were closing the store, infact they were already outside, all lights off and their bags on their back, we were disappointed and we requested them to serve, they were so kind to switch on all the lights and open the store for us for just 3 cups of coffee. We loved your coffee so much that we also picked up a pouch of eighty20 and malabar each for my sister to take it to the US. All thanks to the guys at the store. Abhilash was the person serving us and he was very kind and a great host. We really appreciate the service rendered to us. Truly very South Indian. I have been a fan of your coffee since the soul santhe days. 
Thanks for making our evening perfect.

Coffee- 5/5
Price- 5/5
Ambience- 5/5
Host & Service- 5/5', 'Its a small outlet beside Anand store, easy to locate for tourists like me, Had a Coffee and tea only, which was too good,Malabar filter coffee large was perfect, not too strong, Ginger tea- finally I got a place where people really add crushed ginger in tea, which was really a difficult thing to find in Bangalore', 'Their baked nippat is really good. Coffee is just average - its not very strong. The only good thing about their coffee is that its not as sweet as darshini coffee.', 'Cute standing-only coffee place with a nice selection of filter coffees. I had the Malabar blend coffee, which came in a brass tumbler, along with a cinnamon roll and a quiche. Loved the coffee so much that I bought a few punches to take home.  Food was good, on par the other fancier bakeries around. Loved the compass on the wall pointing "true south".', "I've only had the cold coffee here, but it is amazing. Not too strong and not too sweet. Looking forward to having more cold coffee at True South. Do they deliver?"]

address: 4th Cross, 10th Main, Indiranagar 1st Stage, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [3, 'Donne Biryani', 'Chilli Chicken', 'Chicken Guntur', 'Mutton Biryani', 'Mutton Thali', 'Chicken Biryani']
reviews:
['So I came here to pick up a few donuts the other day at about 12 noon maybe. There was no one at the counter outside. So went inside and placed an order with the one guy who was available. And this is what the guy does:
1. Gets the cardboard and starts making the boxes with his bare hands. Like sliding his hands over the place where the donuts will be kept.
Anyways,, I try to ignore and kept watching.\xa0
2. He goes out and starts picking up the donuts with his bare hands again.\xa0
As soon as I saw that I cancelled the order. He said he'll get the gloves and got the gloves from inside and started packing the donuts again, but I told him that there was no use since he had already touched them.
All I could think was "God knows where those hands have been." I'm sure he's clean but whatever. I've seen people dig noses and scratch where ever, so not going back to this place again. The staff should be taught about hygiene.']

Veg nugget - 1/5
Vada - 5/5
Sambhar - 2/5
Masala omelette - 2/5
Masala dosa - 1/5', 'Went to Bhagini Icon at Indiranagar for a buffet breakfast. We found worm in Doughnut. It was baked along with doughnut. To our complaint they responded by saying just a Sorry.', 'Visiting these guys from the first day of launch and food quality has constantly gone down.

reviews: ['', 'Absolutely fuck all place. Bad quality of food. Portion size not enough for even one person and exhorbitant prices. Someone who cannot even get fried rice and chilly chicken right should shut his chines eatery.', 'I had chinese food in china south restaurant located in Garuda Mall. Food is average not so great and they charged just for a normal water bottle 60 Rs. which is clearly cheat.', "Is it a food court curse or in general food court can't maintain quality. The place is at the entrance of the food court and grabbed out attention as they have Indian and Chinese side by side. Choose Chinese and it was disappointingly ordinary. \n(PS- it's a late review, hope they have improved.)\n                                                younus.in", 'Ordered the Chinese chopsuey. Delicious, light and flavourful. The vegetables were fresh and the nodules were fried well. Very tasty meal, will definitely get this again next time.', 'Been at this place twice now. It is located at the food court of Garuda Mall so a prime location. The first day I had their Chicken Pan Fried Noodles, I was completely floored. It was delicious and very authentic. The chilli chicken was tasty as well. The prices seemed affordable for authentic oriental food. The second time I went with high expectations but was severely disappointed. During lunch time they had absolutely no noodle dishes which was shocking for a chinese restaurant on the top of it, the chicken fried rice was quickly cooked and had a very odd taste to it. Hope they improve their quality in order to manage it better for the future.']

reviews:
['Good place fresh food healthy as well , a lil on the higher side but will not stop from eating here , packed well for delivery as well and the chocolate mousse is yum', '', 'I have been very less disappointed by Chefcraft. I never ordered though from Indiranagar but from a Kammanahalli branch on swiggy. Love their salad and steaks and chicken wings. 
Not giving a 5 because of quantity and one bad meal (fried rice and chicken where rice was flavourful and chicken was smelly)', 'I had ordered Vietnamese veg summer roll. The wrapping outside each roll was like plastic .. I wasn‚Äôt sure if that‚Äôs actually plastic or something that can be eaten. But I could not remove it so had to eat with it and then remove from mouth after chewing rest of stuff! 

The chutney was the only thing good and yummy. 

Further they do not have hot food. This one was also frozen and came with ice pack actually! 

No value for money either. 

Coincidentally my stomach has been upset after that meal. Won‚Äôt order again from here.', "Ordered Nasi Goreng with prawns and prawn crackers. Box it came in was of good quality and decently packed. Food was warm as well.
Pros: Egg in the nasi Goreng was just runny , which was very well done. Taste was also quite good.
Cons: Quantity is just enough for one. You shouldn't be too hungry when ordering this. Also, I felt there could be a bit of freshness added to the dish, like some.cucumber and carrot strips also some greens...
Overall a good box of Nasi Goreng!", 'Decided to try some new stuff, delivery was quick and food was decent too! 
Tried the spring rolls and Penang curry veg! Price was decent too!  Just that the portion of the Penang curry could have been better . Well packed tho !', 'Got a Chicken Arabic Fattoush Salad. 
Terrible portion size! Substandard quality meat. Bad salad dressing. 
And all this for 280 bucks. One wouldn‚Äôt even pay 100 bucks for the salad they provided. NOT WORTH IT AT ALL. Shame!', 'The portion size for a main dish is quite shocking really. Just about 3 pieces of chicken and a handful of veggies is what made up our lemon herb chicken. The portion of sauce that came with the dish was larger than the actual food. Quite disappointed.', 'Ordered a Teriyaki Chicken Pita Sandwich with Pickled Veggies. The chicken was super smelly. I could literally ‚Äútaste the smell‚Äù. This was my first time ordering and I was pretty disappointed.']

address: 3145, HAL, 2nd Stage, Opposite ESI Hospital, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'This roll joint has been serving my cravings for sometime now although, I was never too much intregued by it. As a roll joint, Rolls on Wheels does offer great options to chose from but the taste or flavours and the quantity is just isn't there yet, the charges are slightly higher than average.

Tried their biryani for the first time and I quote "Large" pack. I was not surprised rather shocked to see them packing a large biryani in containers others use to put in side gravy items. The taste seemed like spiced up ghee rice with chicken pieces. I don't understand what's wrong with biryani preparations in this city cause there have been only a very few places that I feel to be serving somewhat good or authentic Biryanis.

Hope they work on the quantity bit going forward.', "Rolls on Wheels definitely justifies it's name by serving good rolls. I'd called for the Chicken garlic kebab roll, the chicken was tender and flavoured well , the paratha was crisp and the roll all together was a good treat. I'd also called for crispy pizza fingers which were a good snack, deep fried with cheese, what could go wrong.
Sadly, the biggest disappointment were the steamed chicken momos. The filling was yummy and the accompanying sauce was delicious but the thickness of the dough was just not acceptable. The covering was just too thick.
May go back for a roll but definitely steering clear from the momos in future.", 'This place is mainly good for combos. You can definetly try combos here as they are cheap and sufficient for your one time meal. Other than that this place serves biriyani, momos, rolls, beverages and light snacks.', 'For an evening snack we ordered for a bunch of rolls including chicken spicy roll,chicken tava fried rolls,potato pops and paneer rolls 
Felt slightly overpriced according to the taste and size of the rolls', 'Too many onions', 'good', 'It was good', 'I pretty much look at this place everyday and I have always wanted to try it ever since it opened. Finally got a chance to visit this place recently and it was a good experience. Just forget the ambience and the place. Just go there for a quick roll and you won‚Äôt be disappointed. The roll sure was a good one and the starters were good too. I personally liked this place.', 'super testing']

address: 14/1, Wood Street, Ashok Nagar, Richmond Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Above 18 Only, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["I juz loved this place..Such properly decorated and designed mainly the outdoor area full of bright sunlight gives you a good vibes ..Comes to the food part we just order appetizers one is Au revoir Colonel Sanders , where chicken is marinated in yogurt and raw mango and cooked in Naga chilli sauce perfectly goes with your gin n tonic..And when in Toast n Tonic u should not miss pork belly it's too yumm.. For gin n tonic we ordered flower power, gentlemen's tonic, citrus basil tonic

Food: 5/5
Service : 5/5
Value for money :5/5
Ambience : 5/5", "The food was good but the restaurant is really good at screwing up your reservation and they cramped 5 of us on a 4 seater. Anyways getting back to the food - The Beef Bone Broth - OH my, it's easily the best sips of soups you will have, it's technically a Pho (a vietnamese dish) and their Steak was cooked to perfection (I always prefer medium rare), this was served on a bed of potatoes and turnips. Overall a delightful food experience, must try.", "Love this place, it's a proper piece of heaven, and I'm glad its survived this long in Bangalore, as most of the really good places never do. I like their small plates the most, and the G&T is to die for!", 'Nestled in the streets of Richmond town is this cozy place, with the perfect blend of Western and  Indian warm decor. Excellent food - the veg topped our pallet with beat salad and the risotto doing the magic. This place has 3 sections, each designed exquisitely with a lovely bar attached. The staff is courteous and recommended us some good food options as we were new to this place. An ideal place for Gin lovers! Though I‚Äôm not one, I wouldn‚Äôt want to go back without trying one. Their cocktails are well made and ‚Äòstiff‚Äô :) Lovely ambience and great vibes is what this place has to offer. It‚Äôs my new favorite and I‚Äôm coming back again.', 'Good ambience and decor although it was a bit cramped and crowded... Very quick service. Food was ok. Very very very limited options for vegetarians and most of those were also not available.

Cocktails were good.

My FAVS score -
Food - 3/5
Ambience - 4/5
Value for money - 3/5
Service - 4/5', 'Simply outstanding!

I loved the place from the moment I entered. The service is excellent. Small details like removing the extra cover show that effort has been put in training. The drinks are to die for and I reccomend you have the fig & tonic! One must have the Victorian Cheese Platter (Bel Paese is my favourite), Tempura Waterchesnuts and Slow Glazed Honey Ribs. The only thing I did not enjoy at all was the Soft Shell Crab which had to be sent back as it was not fresh n edible. This was immediately replaced by the Brik Chicken which was to die for. Service recovery at its best! All in all this is perhaps one of the best places to visit in Bangalore! #amazing']

['Heard a lot bout this place, name has it as the ‚Äúbest thin crust pizzas‚Äù.

reviews: ['Saw the good reviews and ordered the ham and cheese croissant sandwich from this place. Left me utterly disappointed. The croissant wasn‚Äôt cheesy at all and the ham was veryyy chewy. Couldn‚Äôt taste butter as well. One of the worst croissants I‚Äôve ever tasted.', 'Budget and Pet Friendly cafe.If you really need some place for your leisurely conversation then be their guests. Staffs are really welcoming and warm.Service is very customised considering the space is small with limited tables.I visit this place usually on weekends for breakfast with my fur boy and friends. address: Shop.3, AMMA BUILDING, BEHIND NERALUR BUS STOP
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['A Must place to try for tea in Indranagar. They serves one of the best tea. Tea & snacks are very cheap and worth the money you spend. 

Bit overcrowded on weekends.
Ambience : 2.5/5

 Recommended!!', 'Its your end of month hangout place. The food is worth the money you pay. The chai does justice to the name as the adarak kadak chai is quite kadak. The music gives a unique 70s feel to the place. A good place to try.', "Tiny place that serves amazing Chai!!! Our search for Kulhad Chai in Bangalore lead us here. It's a small tea cafe. Serves a variety of Chai and veg snacks. Best part,it's served in a kulhad. There r a few chairs to sit, or u can stand n enjoy ur Adrak Wali Chai! We were lucky,wen we went here,it was kinda empty,so we sat on d bamboo chairs. We had Adrak, Elaichi and Masala Chai. Adrak Chai was amazing. My husband loved his Elaichi Chai. We also had d Masala Biscuit. No ambience,no service,but it doesn't matter, bcoz d Chai is d only thing that matters. Must try!!!", 'Same kind of chai place but with seating arrangement!

I like chai so I bookmarked this place some time back. One weekend I visited this cafe with one of my friend. To locate this cafe was very hard. There is few seating capacity and with few posters on walls. Although this place was nice to relax when we visit with friend. 

We ordered two Bombay cutting chai and one Bombay breakfast sandwich. The cutting chai was very average as it had wired taste of tea powder. The Bombay sandwich was good. It was made of veggies and brown bread. 

Although this place is good to chill and relax and the pricing are very reasonable.', 'The place is good, worth going. It might feel little too congested at times but still, a good quiet place to sip a nice cup with friends or during tea breaks if nearby. Taste is really appreciable and staff is friendly too!', 'A good place for chai over smoke and the person javed makes amazing chai apart from the tea bag ones...people who go there should request him to make chai for the best taste, now a days there is a new chap who denies chai or says no smoking and is very rude and annoying to customers, if this continues i think only houseflies will come to drink chai there..i wish i could take javed and start a new chai shop.', 'Old bollywood retro music playing in the background and you sit outside in a cool green quiet lane of Indiranagar with a khullad of chai. The serenity and timelessness of this experience will make you want to just repeat this experience maybe for hours if you have a book or something. This was on a Sunday afternoon, and this lane is just parallel to the busy and noisy 12th main. So the weekdays would get only better in terms of the quiet.\xa0

I had the Ajwain and ginger khullad chai and followed this with a Monsoon Dum Chai‚Ä¶the quantity is just right but maybe a little less if you want to sit and sip for a while unless you go for multiple repeats. 

Snacks are limited, so if you want something hot, there are not too many options. I was not in the mood for any of the small snacks that they had on the menu. I just had poppins for some time (you can buy this here).

But I loved this place and it is sure to be a weekday afternoon hangout.', 'Small cafe in indiranagar,love the way this cafe,
Variety of tea, I like Vada pao & cutting chai üëåüëå
Would like to visit again for rasta lassi üíï,,,,,', 'A good place to chill and have a chai of your choice from plenty. My favorite is the sulamani chai, its just lemon tea with honey. Seating area is pretty relaxed and informal. Good place to escape from the busy city.', "It's  type of cafe in indiranager .... Nice ambience  food and service..... I like the place.... Vada pao you must try..... And kadak cutting chai they served in kulad which looks awesome.strongly recommend to others we will come back again for sure chears@.........."]

more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
["I'm happy to see such rice only restaurants coming up. I'm not a plain south indian rice guy at all. But I can neither eat fried rice or biriyani on all days. That is where Bowl'd Over Rice comes into picture. It serves you healthy rice with different types of curries both veg and non-veg packed in a bowl. I tried the Dilli Rajma Rice Bowl and I was happy with it. The regular bowl has the right amount of quantity to fill an average person's appetite. But if you're too hungry, you could choose the larger bowl.
I'll surely give their non-veg rice bowls a try soon.

P.S it's delivery only restaurant üòï

Food - 4/5
Packing - 4/5
VFM - 3/5"]

reviews: ['', "Wrost momo I ever had. I paid 150rs and got 6 smallest pieces of momos. First bite I took, I chew stone inside. I would recommend ppl to do order from here and have a great experience.', "Some of the best momos I've had for the price. My husband ordered at 5am and we got yummy, juicy momos delivered. Will definitely recommend if you're hungry.", "Some of the best momos I've had so far. They were simply fresh and juicy. Was delivered so soon. Pocket friendly also. Will definitely order again."]

address: 607, Ground Floor, 12th Main, Hal 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Asian, Burmese, Bubble Tea, Salad, Tea, Desserts, Ice Cream, Beverages
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Mall Parking, Vegan Options, Group Meal, Table booking recommended, Kid Friendly, Wifi, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Private Dining Area Available, Gluten Free Options, Serves Jain Food,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Samosa Soup', 'Khau Suey', 'Avocado Ice Cream', 'Khao Suey', 'Salad', 'Bubble Tea', 'Noodle']
reviews:
["Burma Burma is hands down one of the best Asian restaurants serving vegetarian only!

A cozy, well lit and well laid out ambience is super welcoming. The turquoise colour on the cushions is a big win! The place has crockery and Burma-themed trinkets on display as well that augments the overall appeal of the place!

Straight to the food: I ordered a Samosa soup that was wholesome and tasty to the core!

We were a group of 5, and our picks were the Chickpea tohu, the Panthay Khowsuey and the Kayunin Maw (sticky fried rice). These dishes were splendid, and went great with the array of sauces that were available.

Capped the fantastic culinary journey off with the popular Avocado ice cream. Lived up to the hype!

The service is prompt and super friendly. 5 stars indeed.

Highly recommend this place. I haven't tried their tea options out, will do soon (despite coffee being my beverage of preference)", "What a wonderful experience it is to have a meal here. Burma Burma doesn't let you miss nonveg food, at all, and lets you enjoy the cuisine pleasantly. Every dish here is delicious. Anup was our server and he had great knowledge about everything on the menu. We went with his choice and had a wonderful experience. Samosa soup, raw mango salad, veggie stir-fry, Burma Burma special khau suey, avocado ice cream and eldragon. Each dish was delicious. The ambience and decor is great.

Do remember to book a table in advance. We had to wait for quite a while. Although, it's worth the wait.", 'Definitely a must try! Other than the waiting time (expect 25-30 minutes atleast), everything is fab! The ambience, the service, the food. Tried the samosa soup (a lil tangy), noodles, lotus stem starter...all were good. Spring onion crisps can be avoided, not that great. Tea at the end of the meal (kahwa) was nice too.', "Heard a lot about this place. Decided it's about time to get over my non veg preference.
Food did not disappoint, but it did not make me want to be a regular here. For a once in a way experience, the food was fine.
The samosa soup was nice and had a tangy/spicy taste which made it a delicious concoction. However, in its own, it's really just a basic dish hyped up a by a restaurant.
I liked the khau suey, but depends on whether you have a taste bud for a lot of coconut in food. (atleast the one I ordered!).

The drinks were quite average. The pomegranate sparkler type drink was a glorified virgin mojito and the coconut based drink... Well the less said the better.
The additions served with the khau suey were fresh and nice and added a lot of flavour to the food.

All in all, worth a visit. But definitely, something that will leave you a little light on the wallet.", "There's absolutely nothing that I can say wrong about this place! Get a reservation beforehand and get ready for a beautiful evening. Everything is just perfect and given the inflow of crowd, the service is still super quick!", 'Certainly a 6 üåü place , an incredible experience, this place was on my "to go" list from long time ,

The waiting time was 40 minutes, we had to wait for our turn too, after 20 so min we got a call for our table and voila we were in ,,

The ambience was good with great music ,
I must say Burma Burma is not a restaurant , it's an experience, if u are someone who looks good the novelty factor , it's a place for u.
without having go to through the menu we opted for gold category buffet.
Guava salad was a must try , crispy tofu bun, and avocado icecream etc
Everything was so exotic and we'll presented,
Really quick n hospitable service , impeccable food presentation skills , innovative dishes , and thier USP which is a pure vegetarian menu - a rarity among Asian restaurant.

Keep it up guys ,the next time i find it difficult to choose a place , when i know Burma burma could be my anytime safest n most fav option', 'Best place to try something new, if you are bored of having the same veg food, you can definitely try this place you will get variety. You will definitely love the taste and in addition to it the staffs their are very polite and service is great. And the ambiance is also good.', 'I went to this place with my friends and loved the ambience. I ordered the coco bubble tea, the wa potato, mock meat skewers, khauswey and Burmese fried rice. Overall the food was great. The fried rice was really different and good. The quantity of khauswey could have been better. Would definitely visit again', 'Truly deserving of the excellent Zomato rating. Awesome food, authentic taste, courteous staff and a very fast delivery of finger licking good food. This was a find that I am very happy to have discovered. Must go here again sometime soon. The taste of those toasted sunflower seeds still lingers on my palette. So does the sumptuous mango salad and every other fish thereafter. I just wish they would be a bit less crowded - felt there was too much pressure to have food and leave as there were many people waiting.', 'Well worth the hype. The food is delicious. I like the way they have adapted Burmese food for Indian tastes. The service was good and ambiance was pleasant. Enjoyed my dinner!']

["Delicious and wholesome meal. It will now be my go-to place for Ragi roti and Jowar roti. Chapati was also neatly done. Everything was fresh and felt healthy. I also bought 'Shenga Chutney' (Groundnut chutney) and it was also unbelievably yummy.

Only thing I felt is Jowar roti was thinner. It was crispy and well-cooked, but much thinner.

I had really good meal, thanks to these guys. Now, will go for Akki Roti."]

address: 2nd Stage, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only, Vegetarian Only, Pre-Ordering Required, Gluten Free Options, Desserts and Bakes, Home Baker,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Samosa Soup', 'Khau Suey', 'Avocado Ice Cream', 'Khao Suey', 'Salad', 'Bubble Tea', 'Noodle']
reviews:
['Had ordered a sweet potato bread and chocolate almond cake. You can taste the freshness of ingredients in all her bakes. Its expensive but worth it. Both bakes were lovely, i did not expect a banana flavour in the cake and just enquired about it, was really surprised when Chaitali offered to send another fresh cake to make up for it!!!! Extremely professional and v high ownership. Have never come across a home baker with such expertise and high quality bakes. You must go for it. Its healthy, tasty and pairs well with anything. Her breads are v different which you will not find elsewhere. Just go ahead n order if you are a health freak!! N if u are not, order this so you wouldnt miss the calorie laden store cakes :)', "This is the second time I had ordered the chocolate cake from Taantraa and I have to say it made me supremely happy. The chocolate walnut cake is all kinds of goodness on your plate. The taste is spot on and the best part is that it's guilt free indulgence. Cannot wait to order this again!", 'When asked for delivery of cake online a mail was sent with order number but when approached on phone I was told no orders will be taken till 1st October. Unprofessional', "I ordered multigrain carrot walnut cake and when I had it, it was so delicious üòã and awesome..In future I'll order other products.. Thanks for wonderful cake...", 'Run by a family member, so my opinion runs the risk of being judged as biased. But if you want a truly unique bake, this is your place. The bakes are, as promised, healthy and on the taste front they offer a kind you would have never had before. Chaitali, the baker, takes every order personally, bakes them personally and that makes all the difference. There is no maida, no sugar, no preservative in any of the bakes. The toppings are unique, the almond flour cakes are great. My personal favourite is the Orange Almond Cake. On the other side, the Almond Butter, Chocolate Hazelnut Butter and Chocolate Peanut Butter excel. Again, pure and very, very unique. If you want a very different and very special bake, this is the one place in Bangalore you should order from.', "i have been here twice.the cakes here \xa0with the special toppings from first bite until last bite will definitely make you say yum.still feeling that delicious taste.can't wait for next visit and expecting to try all other cakes", "Awesome cake.. ordered a gluten free cake for my husband's birthday.he is gluten intolerant hence I was looking for a gluten free one. The cake which I got was a chocolate rum dipped nuts. I must say the cake was wonderful.i would always order from them", "The most DELICIOUS cake I've eaten in my life: Chocolate Almond Walnut Cake with chocolate sauce. And that too, vegan and gluten-free!!! It was to die for and the best part, I didn't feel heavy at all after digging into it. It may appear pricey but from personal experience, it did more than justice. Salivate every time I think of it and am writing the review so that foodies like me can enjoy as much as I did. Definitely gonna order the same cake again!! And maybe try something new as well :)", "Whenever I want to treat myself to a healthy bit of deliciousness, Taantraa's what I think of. My birthday cake 4 years back is when I first got a taste of Taantraa and ever since, I've been a big fan. Thank you for making vegan, organic life so delishhhhh.", 'I am SO glad I came across this home bakery. After reading some reviews and seeing that these delights are completely NATURAL and VEGAN I decided to head down.
But her amazing stuff is made to order. Waited and hung around for two hours just so I could pick these Banana walnut and Orange Almond muffins. 
She was so sweet about how I came all the way here and offered to make both of these for me in one box!
SO worth the wait. Waiting for her classes and more flavours of these heavenly no guilt cupcakes.']

['High cost with the worst quality of ice cream. The quantity of ice cream also very very less which i have paid, would have receive the family pack of ice cream with quality & quantity.', "After a beautiful homemade meal v wanted to try something sweet n ordered ice cream from this place, what horrible disappointment v were in for. What v got was some horrible tasting liquid goo. It wasn't ice cream any true sense nor was it worth 150 +taxes. Paying 200+ even with offer was not worth for 100ml of some stupid goo. Please improve ur association zomato or you'll lose ur valuable customers.", 'What horrible experience u guys give in d name of ice cream. When someone orders chocolava brownie ice cream they expect at least a brownie with nice ice cream in a decent looking box. What v got was a 100ml small box of liquid crap. Zomato needs to look into d type of places that u get associated with. Horrible experience.', "Hello foodies,
I ordered for a black current ice cream roll and hot chocolate brownie fudge .... To my surprise, I didn't receive any of the above. A pathetic smelling and tasting brownie, with vanilla milkshake and black current milk shake was delivered. It was one of the devastating experience in terms of online order. Such a service is not expected for zomato's end. Don't you have quality check? Or for commission, do you endrose any one and everyone?

You just lost a loyal customer today. Thank you.", 'Dessert places are plenty on this road so pretty tough to decide where to hit. But for a ice cream lover this is undoubtedly the place to pick.I ordered online and they delivered on time. Taste and quantity was really perfect and satisfied with the quality.']

address: 6th Main Indiranagar, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, Serves Non Veg, No Alcohol Available,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Samosa Soup', 'Khau Suey', 'Avocado Ice Cream', 'Khao Suey', 'Salad', 'Bubble Tea', 'Noodle']
reviews:
['We had chicken rolls. The quantity was good for the price and it tasted good and fresh. They seem to have combos too. Will be sure to try them next time.', "Happen to try them in Cessna business park, was very hungry and confused what to eat . .. I keep a hold of all the food trucks which come to Cessna and I was Keen to try them out as I never seem them before ...

Very Good customer service and awesome food..

Tried their Dragon chicken with Chicken fried rice and I loved it. It could have been better with more spice levels however it was too good. The food portion was apt with well spread of egg and chunks of chicken ( this is how I like)

Not to mention, tried their blue mojito and it's amazing too", "I discovered them in Kasturi nagar near SBI Atm. I try to go there ever so I can on the days they are present there. The dish I always order as a rule is Devil's chicken which is lip smacking good. Their bacon and sausage roll is equally good. Other dishes worth the mention are barbecue chicken, moo burger and the Baconator sub(ITS HUGE). I would urge every food lover to go there and enjoy the food. It's every bit worth the money as well as the taste(WOW). Simple dishes prepared in an excellent manner. They have many types of dishes like goan, Chinese etc. Everything used and served is very fresh. Best of luck and keep up the good work guys!!!", 'Great food! Perfect amount of oil and spices. Loved the "dirty fries"! Very friendly people and the owner is a great person to initiate conversation with! Loved the truck and the food.', "My first food Truck experience and it was great. Their devil's chicken and chicken wrap are awesome. The burgers are juicy and everything is very hygienic. Rahul the owner is a very courteous and fun to chat with while waiting for order. Certainly worth having them on  your list for quick bite.", 'On some days this food truck is at Kasturi Nagar and that is when i happened to pass by and decided to pack some grub. The menu looked interesting enough. We ordered the following :\xa0

> Dark Side of the Moo with Bacon
> Peri Peri Prawn
> \xa0Finding Nemo ( Fish & Chips)\xa0
> Dig the Pig ( Pork Chilli )\xa0

The food in terms of taste was pretty decent, I liked the burger , nothing else really wow-ed me. \xa0Portion sizes were not up to my expectations, given the price points.', "Hello guys, 
Personally not a huge fan for food trucks, but the bite club has changed my whole conception about such joints. Amazing food, quick preparation and some great flavours sets them apart from other food truck I tried after theirs. My personal favourite was the devil's chicken and bacon wraps. Perhaps the only concern was that they don't have card swip facility which the owner has promised will be there when I visit next time. So I am gonna challenge by going tomorrow again, well not to check actually but to eat some good food. 
A must try eat out guys... And get a while new experience of food truck in bangalore.", 'Thoroughly enjoyed the food. Good veg options. Especially the veg burgers, which were awesome! Had a good time waiting for the food as well, as Rahul, the owner, and I picked up an interesting conversation.', 'The baconator sub... awesome creation . A little bit of indulgence in every bite . Great quality bacon with a fine choice of fillings and good amount of passion has gone into making this sub. Loved the juicy and the crunch the sub has to offer . Probably took a bite of this classic after a while ,still the same awesome experience .... Great going mate 
 ... cheers', 'Amazing  burgers and hot dogss .. and guess whatt they have beef too. U busy and looking for quick delicious bite this is the place ...  #the bite club brothers ...  and they will b placed in Indiranagar and kasturinagar .. dont miss it']

reviews:
['Worst Restaurant Ever killing the mangalorean cuisine.!
Ordered appam,Neer Dosa,Prawn ghee Roast,tava Fried mackerel and mackerel curry.
Waited for 45 Minutes and received the prawn ghee Roast which was excess of masala and the shell of the prawn was found in the dish and the flavours were burnt.

Then came the burnt mackerel tava fry soaked in Coconut oil hopelessness 
I
After an hour from the time of order came the appam and the neer Dosa 
Appams were so disgraceful undercooked 
Neer Dosa were like the smashed ,oily and tasted very bad
Ordered A vegetable salad
The cucumber was rotten and was freezing so is the tomatoes 
Please avoid this place and the cashier at this place confirmed that the chefs in the restaurant are not cooperating.
The owner of the place is also aware of the issue.!
This place is a disgrace to the mangalorean Cusine..!', '‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤®‡≥Å ‡≤™‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ü ‡≤Ü‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤°‡≤∞‡≥ç ‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤°‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥ç‡≤¶‡≤∞‡≥á ‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ü‡≤ø ‡≤ï‡≥ä‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤ü‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥Ä‡≤∞‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤∞‡≥Ä ‡≤®‡≤ø‡≤Æ‡≥ç‡≤Æ ‡≤π‡≥ä‡≤ü‡≥á‡≤≤‡≥ç ‡≤®‡≤µ‡≤∞‡≤ø‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤™‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ü‡≤ó‡≥Ç ‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ü‡≥Ä‡≤ó‡≥Ç ‡≤µ‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≤§‡≥ç‡≤Ø‡≤æ‡≤∏ ‡≤ó‡≥ä‡≤§‡≥ç‡≤§‡≤æ‡≤ó‡≥ã‡≤¶‡≤ø‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤µ ‡≤í‡≤Ç‡≤¶‡≥Å ‡≤™‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤™ 45 ‡≤∞‡≥Ç‡≤™‡≤æ‡≤Ø‡≤ø ‡≤Ü‡≤¶‡≤∞‡≥á ‡≤Ö‡≤¶‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤ï‡≥Ü ‡≤∏‡≥à‡≤°‡≥ç‡≤ó‡≥Ü ‡≤ö‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤®‡≥Ä‡≤®‡≥ã ‡≤á‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤ ‡≤ï‡≥Å‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤®‡≥ã ‡≤ï‡≥ä‡≤°‡≤¨‡≥á‡≤ï‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤µ‡≥á ‡≤Ü‡≤¶‡≤∞‡≥á ‡≤¨‡≤∞‡≥Ä ‡≤™‡≤∞‡≥ã‡≤ü ‡≤ï‡≥ä‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤ü‡≤ø‡≤¶‡≥Ä‡≤∞‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤ ‡≤®‡≤æ‡≤µ‡≥Å ‡≤ö‡≤ü‡≥ç‡≤®‡≥Ä‡≤ó‡≥Ç ‡≤ï‡≥Å‡≤∞‡≥ç‡≤Æ‡≤æ‡≤ó‡≥Ç ‡≤é‡≤≤‡≥ç‡≤≤‡≤æ‡≤¶‡≤∞‡≥Ç ‡≤¨‡≤ø‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤∑‡≥á ‡≤é‡≤§‡≥ç‡≤§‡≥ã‡≤¶‡≤ø‡≤ï‡≥ç‡≤ï‡≥Ü ‡≤π‡≥ã‡≤ó‡≤¨‡≥á‡≤ï', 'Chavadi restaurant- Indiranagar review
Been to an lunch with my colleagues.
Less crowded, small place and many varieties in food menu especially know for fish cuisine
Ambience is good.
Ordered prawn ghee roast, taste was good but the quantity was less compared to other restaurants. I brought this to the owner attention and he was kind enough to take a note of this.
Mutton pepper fry, fish Kane masala, chicken ghee roast all tasted well.
Ambience: 3
Service: 4
Food: 3
Value for money: 3', "Best Biriyani I ever tried in Indira Nagar, Full on quantity, it's very hard to complete one plate Biriyani for one single person. Also Raita is just awesome. great ambience, Staff are also too friendly like familiar. Easily can visit with family. Must visit Chaavadi.", 'Good', 'great great experience at chaavadi tonight just loved the prawns ghee roast &\xa0 chicken biriyani here.. i strongly suggest this restaurant for all indiranagar residers... best ethnic taste!!', "Ordered food through a different food portal only to find out that their food isn't good. I had ordered fish fry, squid ghee roast and neer dosa. The dosa wasn't bad but the fish tasted dry. It wasn't fresh. The squid too didn't taste any good. Overall, I had a bad experience ordering food here.", "Visited here as it was close to office. They've decently priced lunch combo meals.

I bought the veg thali and my colleagues had chicken and fish thalis.

The taste was okay. Not the best.

The ambience was pretty good.", "Great mangalorean food served here. I had kori rotti, anjal tawa fry and prawns ghee roast. Taste exceeded my expectation. A must try if you guys are around indiranagar. I can assure the food and service won't let you down.", "Slightly over priced for the taste. Quality should be improved a lot.

Dishes:
Veg Meals (Average)
Chicken Meals (Average)
Fish Meals (Not recommended)

Veg Meals had the usual dishes that we can get anywhere else. Nothing to mention specially as the restaurant says it's Manglore/Goa cuisine.

Chicken Meals had Two Pieces of ChickenFry and A chicken gravy with same amount of pieces. Both were not at all impressive. Rest of the items are as equal as veg meals. Boiled Rice was somehow okay with Chicken gravy.

Fish Meals, totally disappointing!
Saying coastal cuisine restaurant and totally ruining it by serving this terrible fish meal.
Fish gravy was okay to have with Boiled rice.
Fish fry was really bad.

Totally it's not worth paying for the meals. Hope separate fish dishes will be good at least.

Ambience was very nice. Interesting wall posters. Staffs are not so welcoming, could be improved."]

reviews: ["It was OK but sincerely, why it's called 'Toastie'? It was a plain sandwich in plain brown bread. Did they forget to toast it? No chutney or any other spread on the sandwich. It was Hummus & grilled chicken sandwich, so the sandwich strictly had only that - Chicken and Hummus. Hummus can be overwhelmingly bland, and there was no particular effort to elevate the taste. reviews:
['Very small outlet near the Indiranagar metro station with an extremely friendly owner and delicious, flavorful popcorn. Would definitely recommend a try.', 'Not many are aware of this place. Spotted this tiny store while walking to another place and must say, their popcorn is really great.

They have flavoured ones like lemon, masala, tandoori, caramel, butter toffee, cheesy to name a few. I get popcorn from here very often. They are really fresh and tasty.

Do give it a try!']

address: 12th Main Road, Outside ICICI Bank, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available,
reviews:
["This hotdog shack on wheels serves real good food. They have variety of sauces to go with your hotdogs. Prepared super fresh.. it's worth the price. It'll probably be parked at some corner so you gta keep your eyes open to spot this place(since they don't have lit up sign boards). A must visit place.", 'One of best outlet for hot.dog lovers... I had mini hot dogs and cheese hot dog... Taste is awesome.. Amazing... Worth of trying... If your a hot dog lover you definitely like this...', 'Worst place to have food. Everything were still raw. Was of money. The food will actually spoil your mood. Ordered on Uber eats. The delivery guy as well warned about the hygiene', 'Tried their hot dogs with the spicy sauce, consistency and quality is well maintained. Jovial and customer friendly person in charge lightens your mood.', 'Got a Cheese Hot Dog from the HSR auto with Spicy sauce.

Bread was soft and fresh.
Hot dog was good but the icing on the cake was the spicy sauce. It was incredible

They need to reinvent the product on looks and presentation and perhaps work on the exterior lights of the auto. It looks dull and passable. Would not have noticed for the inviting smile of the guy incharge.

Glad I did', "This is a neat little food truck which specializes in hotdogs. I have ordered in a couple of times from this place and while the hotdogs are not top-notch, they are well worth a try.

They have neat choice of sauces as as Brat, Rebel, Insane. I have tried the mini-dogs and the cheese dog, and while the cheese dog was pretty neat, the mini-dogs were not too great. A bit of the hot-dog pokes out from the bun(which isn't a traditional hot-dog bun), and that is the part which tastes a bit bland.\xa0

They have several other options such as Mozzarella sticks, fries paneer-sticks and a few platter options.

You should try this once, and chances are, if this kind of food is up your alley, you might like it too!
                                                theuncliched.com", 'Hot dog was just a bread with cutlet. I was in mod to have nice hot dog, but this dog was upto no good. "Gali ka kutta bhi bafadar hota hai but not this hot dog "', "Damn good taste. Insane, especially, is amazing. Rebel is pretty good as well. The rest are pretty mediocre.
Vegetarian choices aren't that great though.", 'best hot dogs I have had in a long time.
absolutely love the cheesed dog and the flavours are amazing. especially the tripper and rebel.
love the new menu as well. killing it!']

address: 50, Cambridge Layout, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Drums Of Heaven', 'Momos', 'Manchow Soup', 'Chop Suey', 'Clear Soup', 'Spring Roll', 'Manchurian']
reviews:
['Ordered noodles and crispy fried vegetables from here through Swiggy last night. The food was pathetic. The noodles was sent separately and the sauce to mix it with came separately. And it tasted so bland. The sauce did not even stick on to the noodles properly, it felt like eating plain steamed noodles with diluted ketchup. The crispy fried vegetables were not crispy to begin with, and had enough oil to open a gas station. I wanted to puke when I ate that. It was just disgusting. I threw it all out. This is not quality food and I do not recommend this to anyone.', '', 'The food is always very fresh and tasty. Undoubtedly my favourite Chinese restaurant in Indira Nagar.', '', 'Not so good in terms of taste. They need to work in the taste of the food a bit and packaging as well', 'Food was ok but not worth. Ambiance is drastically sad. Less spacious and hardly any privacy. And last but not the least "Highly overpriced" .', 'Drums of heaven is true heavenly dish, Cantonese noodles, fried rice are always superb. Sea food used always fresh, superb taste a must try place if you are Chinese food lover.', 'Order quite frequently from here whenever I am in mood for some Chilly Pork and Rice Noodles. Good wholesome food. Must try if you like Chinese food. They can also customise their dish according to your taste.', "I have been to this place, 3-4 times. Only the schezwan fried rice and manchurian is good. Apart from this, everything is ok-ok. It used to be a nice Chindian place, but other dishes just don't make the cut for that too.", 'We basically went momo trailing around Indiranagar and ended up here.
Sadly, very limited choices when it comes to dumplings. We decided to try the chicken momos.
The momos were good, the filling was good too, but definitely quite overpriced. A very normal plate of momos for ‚Çπ220. The ambience here is also very simple. Maybe next time we can try out some other dishes which may live upto the price.

Food: 4/5
Ambience: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Value for money: 2/5']

more_info: Delivery Only, Variable Menu,
most_liked_Food: [3, 'Chicken Noodle', 'Mixed Fried Rice', 'Fried Rice Chicken', 'Rice Noodle', 'Drums Of Heaven', 'Dragon Rolls', 'Vegetable Noodles']
reviews:
['I wish there was a lower rating than one star. This place is the biggest robber I have ever seen. Rude and unprofessional. They have robbed me off 1200 rupees. I got a message one day saying they will be temporarily stopping my services due to relocation of their restaurant. I asked for a refund of the pending money as I had to move city. They kept me waiting for a month did not answer calls or reply to messages when they did answer they were rude and apparently I was troubling them for just 1200 rupees which dint make any difference to them. Complete money making racket. DO NOT TRUST THESE PEOPLE WITH YOUR MONEY!!', 'There should be a zero rating option for this kind of "tiffin service" :)
Don't ever think to buy from here . Worst service . Maximum day , food will be delivered either very late or will not deliver . Nobody will receive you call or will not response your whatsapp messages. So you will never come to know if your food will be delivered or not. Story isn't end here . Food is over priced and when you will receive the food it will be cold and not eatable. And I really don't know who wrote those nice words in their website in "What People Are Saying"\xa0 section :) Too much .', "I wanted to give it a try, so subscribed for just 3 days. Though INR 125 for a ridged gourd vegetable (tori) and a daal ( which I got the first day üòë) is too much.

Day 1: I waited for 2.5 hours in the evening but it was not delivered. Called them up and the lady had no idea if I am a subscriber. Then they made some lame excuse that you package got leaked etc. etc. So no dinner the first day.

Day 2: I reached home at 6 and the delivery guy handed me over the dinner just when I was about to enter. Snack time with tori and daal!!!

Day 3: On day 1 itself I confirmed to not to deliver on Saturday as I will be out and the lady acknowledged. Came back late last night and saw their package hanging from the handle of the door.

So overall, just making a great website won't get you customers.", "Received my first Mom's curry tiffin for lunch today, around 12 PM. It was all easy breezy. I received two rotis, paneer gravy, rice and dal. Everything tasted great. It obviously wasn't hot by the time I ate it for lunch, but that isn't their fault. 

The packaging was secure and good. I just wish they'd give a spoon with the meal. Would have come full circle. Had to dig my fingers desi style into the meal. No complaints. 

Hope the rest of the days go well. :)", 'My daughter and me were in Blore for a few days and thoroughly relished the food that was served by Momscurry. The food was authentic, and most importantly had the "Ghar ka khana " feel to it. Additionally, the food serving size is just about right and the meal preparation is well balanced ( taste and health). Kudos to the team@ Momscurry for putting the concept together and executing really well. I have no doubt that I will be having their food again- at the earliest possible occasion. Strong recommendation to give Momscurry a try... Thank you. Ajay Jethi', "Thanks Momscurry for being the sole reason for my survival. So difficult to find home made north Indian food in Bangalore. These guys are my one step solution to this problem! So, in short if you wanna have home made north Indian food and don't have cook or are lazy to cook, this the the right place. Apart from the food, the people owning this place are very helpful and friendly. I would strongly recommend it!", 'Pathetic Delivery Service, ok food, nothing great as promised on the website. 

You are better off with other alternative, do not waste your time to satisfy your palate.', "Ordered one day meal for dinner day before. Till 9pm they kept saying that the meal is dispatched and will reach me soon and around 9.15 when I called back to check, they said that the delivery boy is not answering. It never reached. Extremely unreliable, would not suggest anyone. Haven't received my refund till now, waiting for it."]

reviews:
['', 'great taste . i am from chandigarh . i make travel videos so i am in bangalore for making blogs related to cafes . if i can blog about your outlet as i really find the place interesting  for an exchange of some ice cream sample. i can review it in my tripadvisor n zomato also .. i m here till 18 . so if i can come do message on 8872499920', 'This is a small place that had interesting choices on the menu. We ordered the Indian Dhamaka Tower and Nuttela waffles.. The ice cream had Indian pista and masala milk along with the hard boondi and few other sweet condiments.. The ice cream was just normal.. The waffle we got seemed undercooked.. Overall a good experimental ice cream place and you can visit once to try!', 'I ordered 200ml roasted almond ice cream. I love almond very much and so thought of trying it. Their roasted almond taste like eating real almonds in every bite. The ice cream is rich and creamy, just yumm!', "The quantity which we received doesn't justify the price charged. Just one small scoop of ice cream for 110 rs it's not worth. Even the best ice cream parlours doesn't charge for such a quantity", 'ok', 'Heard about the black range ice cream over here from a long time 
Visited the indiranagar branch 
It‚Äôs a small outlet with range of many flavours and sundaes
They have three types of cones also
We took black is black and Madagascar one
Both were super yummy very silky 
Darker ice cream ever had', 'For all sort of mood swings "Ice cream works". It was a sudden plan on a rainy evening when we were not getting cabs and came across this outlet. Ordered pink bubble gum ice cream, king of kassata slice cake and Oreo shake. I must say bubble gum was one of the best I had. For me this ice cream worked. It was a calm and decent ambience and we were just relaxing and remembering our old School incidents. I had a good time with my friends having ice cream and cake over here. It a nice place to go with your family and friends.', 'quantity is comparatively very less though it tastes good', "Ice creams were ok, some of the combinations were lil out of the place. Customer service is poor! We reached the place a lil late around 10.30pm, got our order in abt 15 mins and then were eating in their outdoor seating. Before we finished eating they didn't even inform that it's closing time, turned off the lights! The basic is to give some respect for the money being paid forget abt serving good food. Will never step into this place again!"]

reviews:
['My colleagues absolutely love the banana bread from Breadworks. A must try.', "Order their fresh Bakery breads online via Zomato, is very convenient. The Apple walnut bread in particular is a standout, and is usually sold out quickly, it's available only 1 or 2 days a week and the sales person usually messages when it's in stock.", "I just got back from here. Went in for a short official chat over coffee. But we ordered 2 veg sandwiches- tomato mozzarella and stuffed veg. 

I was pretty happy with it. Except they said they didn't have lettuce and had to go out to bring them! Asked them to o make it without lettuce. I'm sure the lettuce would have added more flavor to it. 

That being said, I liked the sandwich n a little more stuffing would have made me happier. The bread was toasted to perfection- not too soft n not too crumbly. 

Was served with ketchup. 

It's a good place for a short chat n since it's not crowded during the weekdays, it tends to be quiet too.", "Wouldn't recommend this place if you're hungry for sandwiches and pizza. You can go only for their variety of breads. But overall a huge disappointment for me.", "Perfect place to have a great coffee , sandwich and read a book! The service from Chintu and Shashi is outstanding, especially considering that they mulittask as Batista, cook, cashier, steward and cleaner at the same time. While most of the items on the menu are unavailable, it's the place u want to get fresh bread from. Sadly, the place as been falling to pieces and the management does not seem to care. This can truly be a great boulangerie, if only they cared about basics like availability of what's displayed on the menu and maintenance of the cafe. The rating would have been a 5 star if we only looked at service!", 'Surprised to see the reviews here because i think they are one of the best non-frills bakeries in town. \xa0The Croissant and whole wheat bread are quite good and I just love the Butterscotch Pastry here.( Keep on coming back for more)', "Food ordered
Banana muffin: not very sweet, felt v healthy would be perfect with a cup of coffee or tea.
Cappuccino:1/5 
Brownie: should be called something like sugary sugary sweet. It was extremely sweet. 
Chicken sandwich: was made on the spot with our choice of bread. It's suggested.

It's a v calm and quite place, should go in without any expectations. They have vast selections in different kinds of bread.", "A non descript place really. There's no washroom here for starters. Ordered a paneer tikka grill sandwich which was all right, nothing stood out really. Coupled with slightly high prices and decent ambiance, I wouldn't really visit this place again. Would've rated it a 2 had it not been for their 60s jazz playing in the back ground; and that was the only resemblance this place had to a Parisian cafe", 'Ma boulangerie plus aim√©e. This place is a contentment by itself. Went here for brunch and after ages can exclaim satisfaction. Was served by Kala whose lovely smile and warm service added that extra comfort. Would definitely be back here and quite often.

Ambiance : 4/5
Hygiene : 4/5', 'Been here seeking for breakfast but couldnt find many options. So ended up with plain omelette. Not sure how things are during evening. reviews:
['Excellent quality of food and amazing taste ... Just loved it .. not a place to sit n have bt definitely to take away ....', '', '', '', 'Amaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaazing ACKLEY!!!', "The burgers are sooo meaty with each bite. The sauces don't over power the taste of the meat. The ratio is just right for a burger and the quantity is perfect for one. It's definitely a must try. You'll get hooked!", 'The burgers at Ackley are absolutely sensational! The buns are lightly toasted, keeping the burger together and the patties are juicy and flavourful. Packaging was nice and also arrived quickly!', "Was really excited to try this place but sadly it didn't live up to my excitement.

I got the zinger burger. The bun was really nice but when I opened to bun and saw the lettuce it was quite disgusting. The lettuce was quite spoilt and the chicken was undercooked, hard and rubbery.

I really think the management should overlook the lack of hygiene.", 'If you can‚Äôt deliver the food then please reject on time, not after 30 mins. 
It‚Äôs not just you who are busy, even everyone is busy. So value the money', "It's a new Burger cafe in Jeevan Bhima Nagar.. One of the best burger places in town and at very affordable prices.. I tried their Peppercorn chicken burger and the ultimate The jumbo steakhouse burger with bacon n cheese..
Two ppl couldn't finish it was so filling and mouthful with some delicious ingredients and soft buns along with the patty and veggies.. they have their own kitchen where they prepare patties and the buns..
Definitely worth a visit..
You can as well order online if you wish to eat at your convenient place..!! Keep rocking.."]

more_info: Delivery Only, Vegetarian Only,
reviews:
['Placed an order for Paneer Paratha and aloo paratha. The food came nicely packed but the stuffing was not sufficient in the parathas and needs a bit improvement on the taste. The aloo Subzi was good and the red chutney was also good.', 'Parathas (aloo) are good. But delivery packaging is terrible üò£ you can‚Äôt use a pizza box here. See in the pic what happens.  You need to wrap them properly in aluminum foil. 

Cheese aloo paratha is bad. Too thick no aloo. Just cheese', 'Tasty Parathas at one place.Felt great to have Homemade Paratha with Authentic taste in Bangalore Loved the taste..can eat daily...
Ordered Onion and Cheese Paratha. It really tastes great with butter n pickles.
Thank you.', "This place is only for Delivery option and it's such a perfect place to have that North Indian wala parathas.... Parathas are hot when delivered and it is full of fillings and they give the necessary dips and dahi, chutney and what not... I ordered Aaloo paratha, sattu paratha, Gobi paratha and sattu paratha was so yummy. The best part is that they have given chokha of massed potatoes and brinjal with this... Do try it if you are a true Paratha fan.", "Best Parathas in town award goes too 'Wow Paratha' seriously Wow. Feels like I am in Amritsar after having the parathas. So much stuffing. Was surprised to get butter, raita, chutney and pickle. Parathas smell so nice. Must for north Indians. Check out for onion cheese paratha here.", "If you are from North India and are missing your mom's homemade parathas, then this is definitely the place to order from. If you are not from the North and still want to try authentic North India stuffed parathas , then go ahead and order from this place. Wide variety of parathas to choose from at a fairly decent rate.", 'Hi all, I would like to mention that the food here is yummy and tasty. A must try for all. It comes in as a complete meal.The best thing about paratha is that it can be had anytime of the day: lunch, dinner or breakfast.', "It has been a while I've come across a restaurant that strikes a perfect balance between hygiene and taste. Wow Parathas exceed your expectations in every way possible ranging from delicious food to exceptional service.

Would definitely love to visit this place again.", 'Had Onion and Gobi Partha from Wow Paratha today. Total value for money. I can feel the taste of paratha from Delhi. Not oily and stuffing was evenly  spread. Due to this you will enjoy every bite of it. However it was bit hot due to green chili but overall taste was great.
Overall my experience was good. I definitely recommend this place. if you are a Paratha lover you must visit this place.']

address: 86 B Vaastra, 1st Floor, 7th Cross Road, Micheal Palya, New Thippasandra Post, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['Whilst the tummy was craving for dessert, decided to order from the table.
Pretty quick delivery assuming since it was already in the jar, super easy to just pack and send it over.
Ordered for an eggless Raspberry Heaven Cake and an eggless Trio of Chocolate Cake.

Raspberry Heaven
It was more like a mousse, after a point it seemed like an overdose. It was good but too sweet too.

Trio Of Chocolate Cake
So it‚Äôs an understatement to even mention cake on the menu, coz that thin layer of cake crumbs are dried up and doesnt really make a difference. I like the taste of this better than the raspberry though.

I‚Äôm not quiet sure if it‚Äôs over priced, I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs decent for the serving.', 'I had the salted caramel brownie delivered. Found the brownie dry. I had to wrestle with the jar to take a bite. It has potential but needs lot improvement to be in par with other dessert jars in market', "There is nothing special. But not bad . Just regular tasting desserts packed in a jar, that's all. Ordered Red velvet and Black velvet . Both were average.", 'less quantity', 'Quite good. The half baked one maybe needed a little less chocolate', 'A must if your in Bangalore the dessert are well worth works of art just beautiful to eat loved these desserts red velvet trio of chocolate triamisu', "Great dessert paves the way for a great sunday.
The trio of chocolate which i ordered is the perfect dessert for a choco-holic. Can't wait to try the other flavours.üòäüòäüòäüòä", 'Delicious', 'wow! ive never seen a pastry packed in a beautiful way! it was very nice both inside and out.. yum yum. looking forward to order more in future even though its very far from my houseüòÉüòÑüòä', 'date of manufacture not mentioned']

reviews:
["Premium Bombay Kulfi is one of the outlets serving Kulfi in Bengaluru.
5 star for their Matka Kulfi. You really get a taste of Rabri in every Kulfi here. It doesn't matter which flavor you choose, they maintain stuffing and rabri right in each one. I would recommend you to go with either matka or malai Kulfi.
Order one or go there! You will definitely enjoy their Kulfi
Good work! Premium Bombay Kulfi.", 'A real experience of having kulfi‚Äôs after a long long time. Perfect in taste and nicely packed. Definitely would recommend this to who wants to savor the real Kulfi.', 'Amazing milk kulfi..reminded of childhood kulfi memories...
Haven‚Äôt had such ‚Äúmilk kulfi‚Äù and not ‚Äúicecream‚Äù since long...
Best part is it‚Äôs open till 12 in night 
Must try üòç', 'A very great experience of real milky bombay kulfi... Really enojyed nice with awesome taste.. All can try out, no cold only tasteful kulfi..', 'Really yummy mango ,badam and malai kulfi. A new joint in indiranagar which serves really authentic taste and quality.
Must try for all kulfi lovers .', 'good on time delivery thank you Zomato', 'Amazing Taste. We are ordering kulfi on a daily basis now. The delivery of free and you get nice kulfis at your door. Packing is good. Would keep ordering.', 'was very delicious', 'nostalgic!! childhood memories rejuvenated üëç', 'I ordered kulfi from this joint, their menu has really many varieties..I ordered madam and pista ,Malai, paan and coffee walnut kulfi.. coffee walnut is quite uncommon and real good in taste..If you are a kulfi lover I would like to recommend this place']
