#Biriyani #indranagar', 'Had wonderful Biriyaniüòã, enjoyed a lot. Will recommend you to try atleast once in your lifetime. Thanks to black and white biryanis for wonderful Biryani', 'Best for hyderabadi Biryanis.... Traditional taste with love.... Packing also done neatly
If ur a BIRYANI LOVER try it once at resealable cost']

address: Near 21, Gurumurthy Street, Gupta layout, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews: ['', "Yesterday I ordered double chicken burger, bread was soft and good.. I got french fries, miyo, and some pan... I really get shocked... Quantity was good... In burger probably they need to add more miyo and onion's they needs to cut thin... Except that everything is fine.. probably needs to improve packing.. it's eco friendly.. but I liked packing... Thanks for providing such complementary...."]

address: 4062, 19th Main, Beside Carlton Tower, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
restaurant_name: Kolkata Rolls & Hot Dum Biriyani On Dial
reviews:
["As far as kathi rolls go, they got it. Most of the restaurants ruin the roll itself. Overall great taste.
one suggestion - avoid green chilli in rolls. I like spicy but most people don't. plus it was good without them, you dont have to add", 'Taste is too good and quantity is also too good. But it's really not like Kolkata style Biriyani. Its same like Bangalore style. But you will get extra pc of "Aloo(Potato)" and that is only one thing are common with Kolkata Style Dum Biriyani. Must try....', 'good service', 'food is awesome but when it delivered it get cold and swaggy', '4 star just because food came without necessary cutlery else food taste and quantity was very good..', "after taking first bite I threw all the food. couldn't have been worse", 'good...', 'The flour used was really bad. Made my stomach ache after eating. Never ordering from here', "This one seems to be a newly opened joints in the area and offers great rolls without a doubt. I found the authenticity in their rolls as good as I had in Kolkata and would surely rate it above most of the places in this area. Biryani on the other hand isn't good and is below average and falls in the catagory of usual Ambur class but not entirely.

They'll give good quantity but the flavours aren't just there to be honest.

All in all, a great place if you're looking for rolls cause that's the best you'll get it here.", 'bad food']

address: 49/1, 14th A Cross, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
['I really like pathys briyani its very good and package also very nice pathys inthink this is different place to eat here it good chicken curry with dosa its awsome taste really u r improveing you taste its good', "I had a chicken biriyani today ordered through zomato. I couldn't find chicken in it.. The rice is too spicy.. They charge too high. There are many restaurants which serve a lot better biriyani", "This place is closed for more than a six month. This place has been rented out to new tenants. Please don't order from this restaurant. Thanks", "Thrilled!! to have had a homely south Indian cuisine @ Pathy's Kitchen, Indr. Had dosa with mutton kheema
 and tried Fish fry too.. The taste was truly amazing.\xa0

Can't wait to dine at Pathy's again.", "A Delicious home cooked meal is what we all crave for and Pathy's Kicthen is the place for that. 
You can even get a whiff of what's cooking yards away. Try the Yummy chili chicken and the to-die-for-biryani, you'll surely ask for a second helping. 
Needless to say that the friendly owner and staff make sure they go above and beyond to serve the best. 

P.S. You will love the picket fence!", "Best place for biryani. Can't wait to go back. Mutton chops is just out of the world. I ordered it home and the food is just amazing. Home away from home.", "Lovely food.. Just like straight from Mommy's kitchen.. Recommend to try mutton biryani and mutton chops ! Spices in the right amount and tastes yummy..", "Lip-smacking food with home authenticity.

My all-time favourite is mutton chops, reminds me of Grandma's food taste. 

Don't miss to try fish fry and chicken kebab, kids love them!

Calm place and very clean to dine @ Indirangar vicinity.

Friendly owner and he brings out a lot of passion with his foods to taste like homemade; this makes you want to bring more and more people.", 'Good home food. Kheema curry is the best üëçüèº
Clean place. Friendly owner. Food is very tasty. Can skip food at home to eat here. Overall 10 stars for everything. Satisfied üòä', 'Simply Yummy Food !!. If any of you are looking for some Good Homely cooked food , do drop in to this place. A simple menu in which Everything is good. Must try are the Dosas with their curries. My favorites are the Mutton chops and chilli chicken. 

Good value for your money without any regrets üòÅ ‚úåÔ∏è.']

reviews: ["Ausome Vada pav I had till date in Bangalore.also the hospitality level is ausome.people should try once esp north people u won't get better taste than this....", 'I am a regular customer to this place.. Good Quality food.. The food here is value for money. reviews:
['Quite a reasonable option when it comes to Chinese Food. I have tried their combos on multiple occasions and really like the packaging. ORDER AT YOUR OWN RISK. üò°ü§¨', 'I have ordered chicken fried rice and Szechwan fried rice, it was an horrible experience. Szechwan almost looked like soya sauce rice and the taste was very very bad. I have to eat because I have ordered it. Such a worst food wangs can deliver it to customer.', 'The food is really great. After a long time found some decent chinese food, though the Cantonese noodles are worth trying, really amazing. This will be my goto Chinese place for now. The place offers really tasty options. These guys take packaging really seriously. Hot, delicious and healthy food delivered.', "I dropped in here as it was raining heavily and this was the nearest option available.

I ordered for a Veg Manchow Soup, Chicken Szechuan Noodle and Non-veg super bowl with hot garlic sauce.

I have a habbit of checking Zomato reviews of the places I visit and here I checked it after I ordered my food. I got scared looking at the reviews and ratings. I almost cancelled my order but couldn't as it was late.

But to my surprise, it wasn't that bad. The chicken pieces were really less as per the price of the dish (noodle - 285), otherwise the taste of the food was good.

Food - 3.5
Ambience - 2
Service - 3.5
Staff behaviour - 4", 'I ordered Chicken Wonton and Egg Hakka Noodles. The wonton was not hot and not all that tasty. I found a dead spider in the noodles. The packaging was bad too. Please do not order from this restaurant.', 'Dish: Special Chicken Fried rice
Extremely Oily.. Poor packaging.. No sauce or anything provided! Very bland and tasteless.. Kindly avoid üôèüèº', 'Horrible Horrible, Insanely Amazed How a restaurant like this still manages to exist and doupe tax paying Citizens in this City
Being a franchise in many cities around the world it is Really amazing how bad this place is.
infact it was so highly rated on Swiggy I had no choice but to order in my crave for good desi chinese food - seeing what was delivered an how badly it was packaged made me cry within my heart!!!
Pictures speak a thousand word.
Find the missing chicken piece in every dish (clue they were all Chicken something:)
No further efforts will go in ever again for such a place. It is Dead for me and ALL Stay away', 'Its better to remove chopsey from the menu. Hardly any chicken or vegetables in that. The price is noway justifiable. Taste was not good either.']

reviews:
["I was so looking forward to my exotic butter noodles from you but this time it was so bad !!! I dunno what the chef was thinking, it was reeking of some spoilt vegetable and I couldn't even eat a spoon. Damn disappointed Aagaman. Thought you made yummy food!", 'Was looking for a pure veg restaurant near Indiranagar, and found this close to Metro station. Ambiance wasn't as beautiful as seen in Google. Food was okay and is pocket friendly if the dishes are chosen wisely in alacarte. Hospitality not very courteous.

We were there for approximately an hour (including the time they took to prepare dishes), but just because they had new people flowing in, they started asking during main course that " is that all / can we bill" , instead of even asking do you want any deserts - definitely not welcoming. Restrooms weren't very clean too.

We started with Veg Manchow soup , Masala papad and Panneer lal Mirch tikka & in the main course we ordered Kadhai Veg, Butter nan, Dal tadka and finally ended with Jeera rice.

Overall, just ok. Could have been better.']

reviews:
["Got a safety pin!

address: 20/A, 3rd Floor, 1st Cross Road, KHB Colony, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mughlai Paratha', 'Butter Chicken', 'Kadhai Murgh', 'Chicken Biryani', 'Shahi Tukda', 'Shami Kebab', 'Mutton Biryani']
reviews:
["Found the flavour of #lucknow right here in Bangalore. While the food was really delicious, the service was a bit on the slower side. Nevertheless, whatever we ordered was finger lickin' good.", 'Situated at the heart of Koramangala 5th Block, Little Lucknow is a great place to go and have a nice Nawabi dinner.
Great place, with authentic Lucknavi flavoured kebabs and gravy dishes and decor.
Easy on the pocket too. The Breads were delicious too, special mention to the Laccha Paratha and Mughlai Paratha.
Mutton Boti Kebab Masala and the Mughlai Chicken Masala were delicious.
Highly recommended the place.', 'Went there for lunch. Discovered this place due to Zomato Gold. The Mutton Biryani although tastes really good but the quantity of mutton was very bad. All bones. The chicken lajawab is a must try and would like to visit again.', 'A very cosy little piece of place. Staff are uber polite and friendly. We had ordered so much food of variety and were not disappointed in any of bites we took. Their Awadhi kheer is a delight. They definitely know how to make mutton.

P.S: They gladly let you play your playlist over the system, that also by Bluetooth. üôÉ', "A hard to notice gem in the Koramangala food street, this place offers authentic Lakhnavi shahi spices in its licious Mughlai offerings and flavourful Dum Pukht. Awadhi roots can be experienced in its thick rich gravy, enthralling aroma and quite lucrative interior design resembling the Mughal art of dine. I won't say it's the best place for Lucknow-style cuisine in the area but come on a Saturday night with your loved ones, and believe me you won't regret. It's because gems sit silently and are quite hard to find."]

reviews: ['', 'One of the best chicken rolls i have ever tasted... price very expensive but its absolutely worth... double egg burji chicken roll was quite enough to fill my tummy... perfect place for rolls i would say... awesome taste...', 'staff was very polite and used to serve food that was very decent. this was my first experience so much recommended to everyone go and taste.', 'Loved the Gobhi paratha. Overall had a good experience.', "Galli belly a good place for paratha and sandwiches. I had many time chicken roll and sandwich. Vada pav and samosa evening time a nice to had with affordable price. Now I feel like use to daily customer. It's nice place for quick bite near EGL.", "Nice place for quick bite. Specially for paratha and sandwich and evening Vada pav also too good. Near to egl it's best place to have snacks.", "Arresting on the outside; hardly enough inside. Galli Belly may seem like a food joint you'd get what you wish for, but no. We had Egg club Sandwich and Double Egg Roll. The taste was indistinct and weak. The filling was not enough and the bread was a little burnt but you get used to it. more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Smoking Area, Nightlife, Outdoor Seating, Pool Table, Indoor Seating, Dance Floor, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["I had a lot of expectations from this place. But it did not turn out to be that mind blowing. Had some few bad things including the service. The waiter gave a lot trouble in beer menu and most of them were not available. Apart from that all our orders were coming quickly. That was a plus point. Dj was good and Bollywood songs were started around 10 but the dance floor was a bit congested. The food was quite tasty no doubt in that. Veg tandoor platter and veg hawaiin pizza was phenomenonal. The drinks were great aw well including mocktails. Shirley ki jaani was the top pick. Another issue with the place was that the ac fans were directly above our seats and we were shivering. When asked if they can close that fan or something else, they denied. So just because of these 2 things, couldn't give 5 stars. Rest was a good experience.", 'I ordered french fries loaded with cheese, quantity and taste both were great.I have ordered a paneer pizza which tastes amazingly delicious. However , nachos which i order was not at all good in taste.I have also ordered a lime soda which was bad in taste too.
However coming to ambiance, this place is great to dance and enjoy. Service was good üëç', 'Had been here on a Friday night. They had free drinks on the house for all the ladies. Had an amazing time. The DJ and music was superb. The food was tasty and quantity was enough. Loved the dance floor here as it is spacious with a good crowd. Safe for girls too. Overall the best Dj Club I have visited in Bangalore.', 'Nice place to be , food is moderately priced and they have two dance floor playing Bollywood and edm on weekends dj were good and crowd was also nice
, food is average here portions are small
Zomato gold is accepted with same menu
Staff is not that polite, this is with most of clubs these days
guys entry is charged and can be denied also sometimes', 'It is undoubtedly the best club I have visited in Bangalore till date. Its one of those places that you do not go to sit\xa0 and have a conversation. You go here to bust a move. They have amazing DJs .

I love the Cosmopolitan here. The food is average and so is the service. The place gets really crowded at night and its almost impossible to get your orders in time.']

address: St Patricks Complex, 2nd Floor, Brigade Road, Ashok Nagar
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Such a horrible place, if you look at  the face of owner we will not eat anything,soo money minded people. No value for customers . They should learn from other mallu restaurants.', 'I been to adukkla restaurant food was fantastic this my second time i had fish meales prawn fry appam. great service and kudos kitchen team.i will come back', 'I was pleasantly surprised by the packing and authentic Kerala taste that I could find at this place (at least in terms of a couple of dishes). Some dishes are value for money, whereas some are downright expensive.

Plain rice- Was surprised with the amount of rice available for such a cheap price. Plus, they also provided pickle and sambhar, which is quite thoughtful‚úå‚úå. I would not change much because the rice was cooked perfectly every single time.

Prawns Fry- This was a letdown. First of, the price was quite high for the quantity that was offered. The taste was also lacklusterüëé', 'A group of  5 members went to the restaurant today, the restaurant service is worst experience in my entire life .they don‚Äôt even bother about us .were are like waiting for a hour ,after an hour they give a glass of water ..I really pissed off with the service.', 'The restaurant in the Brigade road.. Near a school building in 2nd floor. The Appam & Beef curry is good here. Kerala Poratta and Kerala meals is available here', 'Such a pathetic place..the owner is a fraud..first ask for the estimated price and then order..v ordered n v had to wait for half an hour..over priced not worth the money.. basically a kaththi place..', 'Nothing great, had their fish curry meals in lunch and another day tried appam chicken roast in dinner. Meals was ok . chicken roast was pathetic [instead of roast it was deep chicken fry]\xa0
Huge space in second floor , Space was clean and service was ok. ...\xa0 behaviour was good, but lacked attentiveness .. like for meals the curries on table were missing and need to be called multiple times... Reordering appam took more time as no one was around to take the order', 'Very nice Kerala Food served with passion . The name Adukkala strike me to visit this place and I was stunned by clean and tidy restaurant .

I had puttu + kadala and it was great !! Menu was filled with verity of authentic Kerala food .

I am going to visit them again and again to try all the items in their menu .', 'Very tasty kerala food. Loved the Appam - beef combo. Appam is really soft and sweet, and well cooked beef in light brown masala gravy is something to die for. Pocket friendly. Highly recommended.', "They serve food prepared with their own recipes and even the masalas used are prepared by them. We had a veg meals from there and it was to my surprise veg meals came with a variety of curries especially their aviyal which even had cooked raw jackfruit pieces. All together it tastes very homely and fresh. The place is absolutely neat and tidy, with a very calm and peaceful atmosphere. Its a great place to get the value for money spent and I would be visiting again to try out more dishes. Their pothi choru is another one in the menu I'm eagerly waiting to try out ."]

address: 1, Brunton Road, 1st Cross, Ashok Nagar, MG Road, Bangalore
cuisines: Steak, Italian, Continental, American, Burger, BBQ, Salad
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Wine, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['This is a review of their Halloween Special Dinner menu. The meal started with a refreshing lemonade. Just the right zing. Starter was a Chicken Saltimbocca. A mix of crusted chicken with creamy spinach. Interesting concept. Delicately roasted with cajun or equivalent spices. Spinach was a good foil. Nice plating. Next was the entree. The steak was juicy, soft and paired with a simple tangy red wine sauce. Mushrooms and baked potatoes round off the experience. Zucchini, carrots and shallots bring in a bit of health, thus reducing the guilt. Quality of meat could improve. But that could be put down to a sourcing constraint. Korean grass fed or Angus Prime, is too much to ask. Dessert was a moist walnut cake. Not too sweet. A perfect meal. Great service.', 'Went for a late lunch at around 3:30....nice interiors ordered farmers market salad,double cheese burger,philly cheese beef pizza ,stir fried pepper steak and steak supreme and an apple pie.....the was nice', 'Case of a place which did not live up to the hype. Well done up place with a decent ambience. But the lethargic service ruined the experience. Food wise it was quite decent. Burger, steaks, all was fine. But not the pleasant overall experience which you expect.', "Could have been better. I had heard about portland from my friends. Went there to satisfy my meat cravings. Although I'd say I wasn't disappointed, but I wasnt too happy either.
Service is good and the server new his steaks well. I ordered a filet mignon, ribeye and a turkey/cranberry pizza. The filet was good but the ribeye had unedible fat along with it which was a pain. The pizza was surprisingle good. I also ordered 2 pies and they were decently good too. Decent choice to spend a lazy Sunday afternoon with wine and steaks
So here it goes
Food -3/5
Service- 5/5
Ambience - 3.5/5
Cost- 4/5
Overall- 3.5/5

Can go there again to try something different.", "I had been to this lovely restaurant with my partner in the month of February.We had tried fried calamari and meat balls for starters...The calamari was outstanding and the meat balls too were full of flavours.For main course we ordered, burger and old school steak..loved the steak.For drinks we ordered a passion fruit and kiwi mojito...both the drinks were refreshing..apple pie was our dessert..The ambience was soothing with dim lights and candles..I'd say it's perfect for a quiet romantic date..The staff is very courteous and friendly..would definitely be back...", 'Pretty good steakhouse. I had the Filet Mignon, medium cooked. Not the best steak I have had in Bangalore, but quite good. For dessert I had cheesecake, which was okay, but not noteworthy. Service was kind of indifferent though.', 'This is hands down my favourite steakhouse in bangalore! The interior is a perfect setting, with well lit glass ceilings. 
So they have a reasonable wine menu, ended up ordering a bottle cause it turned out cheaper than per glass. 
Coming to the food, we ordered a T-bone with mushroom sauce and a filet mignon with house bbq sauce. 
So first you choose your cut, then you choose your sauce, then how you want it cooked. We went with medium rare and medium. Which was on point! The juices from the meat were dripping! 
I usually always end with apple pie after a steak, but the apple pie was average! Prefer the apple pie at the only place!', 'Perfect to set the evening with great ambience. I tried their mocktails which were really delicious. I haven‚Äôt tasted the wine though. Next time may be. The steak was nicely cooked just how I asked. It had a great taste. And the cherry on top was the dessert that I ordered. It was hot, melting, yummy and everything. I would definitely love to go there again.']

address: 33/1, RamaKrishna Mutt Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Taste of Chhola Bhature is excellent and must try. But service is very poor. The lady who caters there is very much confused. She will make customers wait like anything. She will pack Bhature and make wait for 10 mins. Then pack Chhole and make wait for 10 mins. Then collect money and give parcel. She can be improved or changed to increase customer experience. Apart from this, food is very good and must try.', "Good taste not great would rate 7/10 owners are courteous and warm all in all good place bhature we're awesome chole not up to mark aloo sabzi was good", "Worth visiting
I tried three things.
Plain Kachori - ‚Çπ10 Great for the price.
Tasted fresh and delicious. It had decent amount of fillings.

Kachori Chaat- ‚Çπ20 Loved the Masaley used. The boiled channa added to the taste.

Bhel Puri -‚Çπ25 This was a downer for me. The puri(puffed rice) used wasn't something I liked. They were soft and thick and the lack of enough masala was a let down.

Nevertheless the Chaat store delivers what it promises at super cheap price. The place is hygienic and is in a small lane.", 'Visited the place this sunday on a friends recommendation. m a big fan of delhi chole bhature... review about the chole bhature here... it is among the best i have had in bangalore... they give alu like delhi style... gazar pickle is missing... bhature is served hot...place is quite crowded and car parking is not possible... must try... the owners are patient to handle so many bhature lovers in a short span of time.. if u go with delhi chole bhature in bangalore in mind... u will be upset... but if u r thinking about something among the best available in bangalore...this place will not disappoint', "Excellent Chhole Bhature on Sunday mornings. Better VFM than Kartik's Mithai Shoppe near Indiranagar BDA, which used to be our default Sunday morning breakfast earlier.", 'People who say taste of choley bhaturey is like Delhi are really not aware of the real taste of Delhi is, road side wala in Delhi makes better than what Maaheshwari chaat guys are making that too at much cheaper rates. Its not even 1% close to that taste, its just ok in taste. If you have not tasted Delhi stuff then this might be a good taste for you.', 'Awesome North Indian (dilli wala) taste of Chole Bhature only available on Sunday . love to be here again and again, Behind Someshwara Temple , Ulsoor. Hosts are a lovely couple with smile to greet and fingerlicking taste.
Also, if u want to try their chat items, do visit the shop from Monday to Saturday after 5 PM. Highly recommended..', 'Best place to have affordable and delicious chole bature on a Sunday morning. The batures are served only on Sundays for breakfast and is super crowded . There is minimum of 20 min waiting to place order and get it but the taste and quantity is super worth and satisfying . The staff is patient enough to handle such crowd and provide quality service . Over all it‚Äôs a must try place for a budget friendly breakfast.', 'Chole bature is the only thing you should concentrate here. That too is available on Sunday from morning 8:30 to 11:30. Try going early,so that you will get it served in less time.', "OMG! They prepare undoubtably the best chole bhature in town.
I haven't tried other items there but Chole Bhature on Sunday morning is worth the travel and time.
Very soft and special black chole."]

address: 3523,14th A Main, Hal 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Board Games, Sugar Free Options,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Momos', 'Thick Shakes', 'Burgers', 'Oreo Shake', 'Peri Peri Fries', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Red Velvet Shake']
reviews:
["Ordered an Aglio Olio - first of all the quantity for what is considered a main course and is priced as 1 is terrible! Secondly, I've never had an Aglio Olio pasta with carrots and capsicum as vegetables, only those two with a few olives btw and as you can see from the image there are NO CHILI FLAKES or GARLIC, two of the main ingredients in the dish. Aglio Olio is one of the simplest pastas to make and means olive oil and garlic in Italian - it has like 3 main ingredients - olive oil, garlic, and chili flakes and the dish tasted nothing like any of them. I'm obviously cautious of trying anything more complicated dishes from this place. Very disappointing. As the name suggests, probably the shakes which get the good reviews are the priority and the others are just accessories.", '', '', "They have reduced the quantity by half. I don't believe it's worth the price now.I was fond of this place previously but drastically reducing the quantity and keeping the prices same is unfair to the customers.", "Tried the french fries, pasta (alfredo), brownie shake and red velvet shake. The shakes were absolutely delicious, they're a must try. Prompt service and polite waiters.", 'The pasta what we ordered was tasteless it almost had no Malala and also the burger wasn‚Äôt served properly', "Looks like a shady place from the outside, but don't be fooled by looks. Quite an interesting Cafe/Snacks hangout in indiranagar. Interiors are nicely done with colorful painting and graffiti. Nice board games and cards too to hangout and play with friends. Enjoyed the food and quick service too. Even the quantity was nice, quite economical too. Targeted at students, good combo options available.", 'Rich, Tasty and healthy. Epitome of goodness.
Cheesecake Shake and chocoholic are too good.
Ask for Jenga or chess to time pass. Short bites are available too. But the shakes are to die for.', 'Ordered cold coffee.. it‚Äôs amazing .. extremely thick.. just enough sweet.. too refreshing! Loved it ! Will try more flavours .. 

Packaging is cool too in a handy glass bottle ..', 'Small cafe for having some chilled milk shakes and some hot maggy or french fries or whatever you like. They have some nice combos which you will definitely like if you are milk shake lover. The way they serve their items are also little unique. It‚Äôs little over priced, but still you can spend some time there by sipping the chilled and thick milk shakes.']

reviews: ["Had ordered filter coffee and ginger chai from Chai Central for one of our events. Both were steaming hot when delivered. Delivery was on time. The packaging was perfect. Usually most of the chai delivery outlet's chai leak by the time it gets delivered. I am very impressed that this did not happen with Chai Central. Absolutely amazed by the quantity provided. There use no plastic which is a big bonus point.\n\nComing to the taste, beverage was very fresh. No ginger extract used. They had used the fresh ginger. Could tell that by the aroma. The best part is, they have customizations available. They provide sugarless chai too. So, if you are craving for some good chai, do order from Chai Central!"]

reviews:
["I've ordered king's Breakfast from this place. They have three type of English breakfast items and most expensive is the one I have ordered. Generally restaurants have the price difference because of item difference for a particular product. This particular product comes with 2 sausages, 2 becons, omelette, baked beans, mash potatoes.
The thing I got was completely different from the description. There was no sausage, no mashed potatoes (instead they gave 1 hash brownies), becons were very small.

Advice for owner: Customers need not to be cheated like this when they are spending a handsome amount for the product. Also, don't keep things you can't afford.", "Great omelets but please stop using so much plastic in your deliveries. A simple paper/cardboard container would suffice. The plastic containers are pretty much why I've stopped ordering."]

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The Mutton Donne Biryani and the Mutton Liver Fry were great, if not amazing. Liver was fresh, and it had a "snap" to it.

Chicken Kebab was a bit dry. Should have been served with a side of onion or coriander n mint chutney.

Ending with drinking 2 small glasses of piping hot rasam to end the lunch was great. If you want, you have a varied range of cold drinks as well.']

address: 322/1, 1st Floor, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Lunch Menu, Indoor Seating, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Sea Food', 'Neer Dosa', 'Fish', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Prawn Ghee Roast', 'Crab Soup', 'Coconut Pudding']
reviews:
["Maravanthe in Indiranagar - just opposite the metro station has been my go to place for Mangalorean sea food since years now. I love their ghee roast dishes specifically their prawns and Crab Ghee Roast. Paired with soft neer dosas and some shell fish sukka and you're done. Also get some coconut desserts if you crave for the sweet tooth. And they have nice juices - - ask for the days special to Relish on some more delight! The service though is a little slow to respond to queries and prices are a little too much compared for the ghee roast compared to its less quantity. Nevertheless tastes amazing.
One disappointment was that I was informed they don't accept Zomato gold on seafood fresh catches which includes prawns and shell fish. Being a seafood place, and putting a restriction on sea food for Zomato gold was a turn off. Team should work around this. Rest I liked the place and food is tasty, so is the good hygiene maintained.", 'Such an amazing coastal food. Chicken and fish are must try here.

Yummy ghee roast goes good with neer dosa.

Service need some improvement, but would still rate 3/5. Cost is average and food is worth every penny spent.

Would love to visit this place again and again', 'Excellent Seafood they serve. There seer fish/king fish tawa fry and prawns with cocunut is very delicious. The food quality is also good. Very fresh and good hygiene.', "It's a typical Mangaloren restaurant!!

If you want to enjoy typical coastal food then visit this place without thinking about price!!

Coz they charge minimum 400 for fish items!!üòä

We ordered Neer Dosa, Koti rotti and fish masala!!üòã

Taste was good and have to mention about ambience and service which was good and comfortable!!!üòç

Overall I can rate 4/5ü§ó", 'Maravanthe is a coastal food fine dining restaurant in Indiaranagar. It has a small entrance but the 1st floor where the restaurant is has a good space. The ambiance is good. The furniture is robust and the wallart work is minimal ,yet to the point.
I thought initially that the service was good but later had a feeling that they were a little too keen on getting the guests done with.. At one point, there were 4 people taking our orders..
The food is the star attraction.. We had ordered, a Buttermilk, Solekhadi ( kokam mixed Buttermilk), a plate of Rava babycorn, a ghee roast Squids, A Maravanthe special veg Thali and a Prawns Biryani.

Well the buttermilk was good, but the Solekhadi was amazing!! The squids and the tabs babycorn were out of the world and fingerlicking good..the Thali was just about OK. The Prawns Biryani was superb, though it felt that the prawns were added later to a Veg Biryani.

All in all, it was a good visit.', 'The food was good.A nice place to get mangalorean food.
We ordered neer dosa,ghee roast and prawn biryani 
The food was tasty the only thing that I felt was the ghee roast was a bit dry otherwise the food was good 
Ambience: its a formal setting  
Staff:very polite and courteous.', 'To start off, the waiters were so humble n polite when ever they were asked to get something. The Neer Dosa was soft and tasty unlike other places and the Mutton Biriyani‚Äôs flavour was exceptional üëåüèº

The reason for 3 stars was mainly cause the Mutton pieces were NOT tender and when asked, he said other ppl did not have a problem. They may not be foodies and the meat that I got was definitely of an old goat. Lost sense of smell so can‚Äôt confirm if it was sheep. So I asked if the pieces can be exchanged for chicken and he did give me by making sure he charged me for Mutton Biriyani though. When questioned, he says it‚Äôs only u who had a problem n u already ate a piece of Mutton (NOT BONELESS JUST SO U KNO). The Ghee Roast was better at Coast to Coast without a doubt as a lot of South Indians love spicy tender meat.']

reviews: ['I love the food here! Always have! Tried the guacamole greens, Arabiatta pasta and Falafel bowl yesterday for lunch. Great food. great quality and always fresh.\nOnly reason for 1 star is the cutlery!!! We kept spilling the salad everytime because of the bad quality fork (made of papery wood). Please get good glass/steel cutlery if you want to run a restaurant thats not only delivery!', 'A great place with great food. The flavours and ingredients are good and fresh. I loved the Mushroom Fettuccini and Chicken Ceaser. The Spaghetti Al Pesto was not to my taste. Overall I had a great time and there are a lot of things to buy from there as well!']

more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ["Of course, after reading the reviews and lacking will to try n take risk, ordered The Cuban Sandwich. When I order sandwich with meat, tenderness of the meat means a lot to me and this sandwich fulfilled my expectations. Other than that, the highlight of this sandwich (according to me) was fermented pickles. Just by the mention of it, my mouth salivated again. Mozzarella was stringy and the whole experience was fun. It truly lives up to its name 'gourmet'. The bread was tasty and fresh, but a bit dry and tough for my taste. Thus, the rating. I don't like it when I have to eat food as a tiger. ‚ò∫Ô∏è Not that it lessened the fun, but I would have liked it more if it was 5/5 food.\n\nWill now try the other ones as well. Attaching elaborate photos to let you know just how big this sandwich was."]

address: 68, 9th Main, Seepthappa Colony, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Free Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', '', 'Order was delivered very fast, food quality and quantity was ok considering the price point. But cockroach in food is something not acceptable. I have attached the picture for your reference. I called up your restaurant 10 mins ago but they disconnected the call so I have no other option than to place a review.', "Are you an Odia? Do you love fish curry (maccha jhola) then u must order from here...
I was excited to see Odia food somewhere in Bengaluru..
Don't know about other dishes but fish curry was tooooooo good..
I wish they would make other Odia dishes also rather than making other North Indian dishes.", 'qualit and taste is really good... but quantity of dry veg and dal is very very low..it is not sufficient for 3 fulkas and chawal ..you should increase little bit dry veg... otherwise food is really good', 'I have ordered 1 item, marked as non-veg (üî¥ ), but when I see its completely veg. I called the restaurant and asked them.. They told its a bengali dish and its called as mentioned in menu. They are cheating people in name of bengali dishes. Zomato Customer service not much help either.', "This a fairly new joint in the vicinity of Thippasandra main road. Located at the 9th Main opposite to the Motis Kitchen, they looked to be promising in the early days but have lost that over the period of time.

Most of the times, the restaurant is almost empty as most of the orders served are through deliveries. The place itself never offered any confidence to me to sit and dine here as I find the joint to be cluttered and not maintained well.

Coming to the preparations, it's not at all at par with the quality that most people would expect and the portion size too is less even for a single person. On top of that, the rates have been kept high which contradicts to everything they have on offer.

Hopefully they work on these things otherwise the competition in this area will choke a place like this..", 'Ordered gobi manchurian, veg noodles and aalo paratha. In the morning this paratha was good but coming to gobi manchurian n veg noodles.. Utterly disappointed. Gobi has lot of color in it and feared to even taste it which is half cooked n noodles was also half cooked and quantity is very less. Not at All recommended', "previously they used to make good food, now quality is degraded & they give very small portion which is not for the value, WORST OIL, DEGRADED TASTE & a recipe to get people sick. They don't have any values as a food serving place. DON'T ORDER FROM HERE. This place definitely don't have health and safety norms & quality for food.", "I'm order for katla fish fry and I'm not satisfied for katla fry and only for gravy thes diss thes is katla kaliya
Then egg kosha vary bad for egg kosha and full gravy
And very bad food"]

address: 2984, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Walked into this place last night randomly because it had an eye catching blue door and looked very warm & welcoming.\xa0

We tried 2 paninis each was about 270-300 rupees each.\xa0

The "Patrick" - Basil Chicken, Caramelized Onions, Egg and Mustard Mayo. I loved the taste of this panini. My only complaint was that the paninis were fried too much and felt very oily. The taste of the filling however was spot on.\xa0

The "Jacques"- Prawn, Garlic Aioli, Fried Onions and Lettuce. This also tasted very fresh and nice (thanks to the lettuce). There were hardly 2-3 prawns in the entire panini - but it had good flavoring.

Along with this, we had the Veloute Soup and Cajun Spiced Fries. Both were average. Also had a watermelon-basil cooler which was average too (my husband said it tasted like watermelon infused tea)

The ambience of the place is beautiful. They have some good desserts like pancakes and biscotti with caramel, which is next on our list to try.', '', '', '', '', 'Tasty panini along with veloute soup. This place is a must try. They serve good food with taste and quality.', '', 'This place is a follow up to the iconic french food truck of bangalore. The french owner and his staff are very courteous and will explain every item on the menu with detail and tenacity. I tried Chloe and Cheese Toast. Both were delectable and fulfilling. The cheese spread amount on toast was too much. It should be reduced :)', 'Menu could have a bit more options', '']

address: 960, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
known_for: wide variety of wine and authentic Italian Cuisine
more_info: Wine, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Great food!
Great service!
Great staff!

Visited this place for 31st Dec dinner and had a great meal along with wine. We had ordered the non veg platter along with a red and white wine. Followed by a dish of pork chops, lamp chops and chicken breast in cream respectively. Each of them were delicious.', 'Quick tip:- kid friendly restaurant. Perfect for a date. Gourmet Italian. The staff recommendation can be considered. Portion size is good. Tiramisu one of the best in the city.

The ravioli was perfectly done in the Roman sauce. Moist pasta with a yummy filling!!
The chicken dish of the day:- chicken was melting. Veggies done perfectly. The sauce could have been given a little more on the side.
Tiramisu presentation was lovely. Taste was one of the best in the city.
The sangria was good with the pineapple pieces for a twist!! 

Will be beach for more for sure!!', 'First experience at this storied restaurant was a mixed bag. Food was just sufficiently good but not the kind to inspire.

It was just Italian enough with a laid back family vibe. Pesto sauce spaghetti - Sauce was delicious but the pasta could have been a little better texturally. It tasted a little raw.

Pizza Verdure - best item of the night!

Garlic butter prawns - I suppose they did the best with the seafood quality available in Bangalore. The prawns themselves were packing in freshness and bite.', "This place was on my wishlist for very long as it's supposed to be the best Italian restaurant in town. . It has a very classy ambience and beautiful decor. The lighting is soft and perfect for a dinner date. However the atmosphere was quite noisy, because of a weekend night.

The food was really delicious,and the slightly higher pricing was justified by the flavours, quantity and beautiful presentation! We ordered the Pork Ribs and Mozarella Basil Ravioli. The latter was from their new menu and upon request, the chef substituted the tomato sauce with Smoked cheese and Mushroom sauce.
For dessert we ordered Vanilla PannaCotta and Hazelnut chocolate mousse. The PannaCotta was slightly bland and could have used more of the raspberry compote.", "No matter where I have pasta , I end up comparing it to Chianti. Their Gnocchi de Patate and Spinach Ravioli are sooooo good. Sometimes you can't stop at one . Have been there en number of times possibly thanks to Gold and also otherwise for their excellent food and service.

This place is a must visit for all Italian food lovers. You surely won't be disappointed. What's even better, they also give you an amazing bread basket with seasoned butter and a Make your own Bruschetta , on the house.

Ambience - 4.5/5
Service - 4/5
Food- 5/5
Overall Experience - 6/5", 'Nice restaurant to eat in. Went with high expectations but still may not be upto the mark but ok. The eggplant dish was a bit soggy but tasted good. The tomato tasted good. The DIY bruschetta was a pleasant experience. Pasta was ok', 'Went to Chianti (pronounced as Ki-anti), named after the famous wine was one of the most sought after Italian restaurant in my list but I wish I could say I liked the food. 

I ordered
- Crostini with Toasted Mushroom & garlic
- Veg. Lasagna Verdure Al Forne
- Mimosa
- Sangria 

Both are authentic Italian cuisines and I did not like the taste nor the quantity was sufficient. The lasagna I tried in several other italian outlets were either too indian or it just didn‚Äôt appeal to my taste buds.

Excitement turned to dust and I‚Äôm not sure if I‚Äôll visit Chianti again for the same reason.', 'Lovely! Its one of those places where you enjoy the ambience and experience and food comes secondary. No doubt the food is delicious but over all dining experience is exceptional.\xa0
Soft music, dim lighting , perfect for laid back evening.

Coming to food , we ordered Gnocci De Pallette, Fusili Primvera, Verdure Pizza and Rustica.
Food was top notch and authentic!

A must visit!', 'Availed my zomato gold option here. ordered spaghetti frute de mare and Pollo del Chianti. Food was great and wine selection is extensive. The other plusses were the night lighting for outside seating was nice, felt like it was a candlelight dinner and the servers were attentive. Do try for great Italian food and wine.', "Their Tiramisu was out of the world. The cream with the cashew cookie went so well. The pizza I loved their texture the Peporoni was cookef so well and they had this pork fat with went so well together. The basa was cooked to perfection. I did not like the little sweet flavouring but the rest was an amazing experience.
I swear I couldn't eat but I was stuffing my self. The staff was very cooperative and mainted a good amount of courteous professionalism.
I loved every experience about this place. :)"]

address: Opposite Snap Fitness, 12th Main Road, 4th Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Live Music, Serves Cocktails, Table booking recommended, Nightlife, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
["We went to this restro-bar looking at the great Zomato ratings however were a tad bit disappointed. The service is extremely slow and food is okayish. The redeeming factor is the lovely rooftop ambience and their wide range of cocktails.

We ordered a LIIT and from their house specials- Mistletoe, which was a fruity cocktail. Both were great and had enough alcoholic punch. For food, we ordered Chicken Wings, Grilled Chicken pizza and Spaghetti Aglio Olio. The pasta was extremely bland and didn't even have a hint of the typical garlic flavour associated with Aglio Olio. The pizza however, was tasty and well made.", 'A very good restaurant for outing with friends.

Good food with almost all verity of food. It being roof top was another add on.

It was a good experience overall with drinks and food, would visit it again with friends']

address: 618, 2nd Main Road, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Wifi, Desserts and Bakes, Live Music, Rooftop, Table booking recommended, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['A Friday evening and an open-mic event were why we visited the place. Ambience - The ground floor has merchandise by various artists - quirky quotes, dreamcatchers, and some cool diaries. Shows are generally hosted on the third floor. Beautiful decor and great use of lights to add a nice touch.\xa0
Drinks - Secret Caramel (195/-) and Skin deep drink (175/-). Coffee lovers should try the secret caramel. The skin-deep is a refreshing drink after having a long week.
Food - Lemon Butter Fish (310/-), Pancake platter (240/-) and Moist maker sandwich (265/-). The fish is great and so is the sandwich. The pancake platter might surprise a few (due to the proportions and taste), so do check with the waite before placing the order.\xa0
Lovely ambience, good service, great food and a host for open-mics - would highly recommend this place.
Meal for two would cost between - 1200-1400/-
Rating -3.5/5', 'Thetealdoorcafe was a perfect place for brunch date with your friend. We visited the place during day and had an amazing experience.

We ordered Peri Peri fries, egg bhurji and idli platter all of which met our expectations and the portion they serve for the price charged is worth it.

In addition to food they have those cute and creative hand crafts and art work which they sell as merchandise which you can purchase.', 'Loved this place as soon as I stepped in. A small and cute cafe with a nice ambience. They have a place to sit outside which over looks the main road and on the 1st floor with lovely lighting‚Äôs. Their menu has a variety from snacks to main course. Loved the Kadak Adrak chai and the bread pakodas. This place has more of college crowd mainly cause of the location and the pricing of the food. The staff was friendly and service pretty quick . Definitely a revisit.', 'Great taste with lovely ambience. The quantity served is sufficient. The staff are really polite.', 'A small cute cafes with a quirky menu.. "swalpa south" "nim-ajji-bhajji" is what is the most interesting thing about this Cafe! This place has outdoor sitting.. perfect for a date as well as a indoor sitting perfect for hangout with friends with some board games! About food.. trying out just few things.. I thoroughly enjoyed my lun h here..! I tried the queserathas which is a quesedila with parantha. The butter battered prawns are amazing as well. ! What I liked the most is "Nam-Amman chicken biryani", served in an earther pot..!', 'Tried breakfast here. Were seated outside, which is nice because its open, however, its just beside a busy road, which is not that good. The food was good though.', "The Teal door cafe is an eatery in Indiranagar that serves continental food.

Ambience:
-Outdoor and inner seating space available.
-Ground floor has some cute show pieces, books and ornaments on display and for sale.
-We avoided outdoor seating due to mosquitoes/drizzling and went to first floor, which was a mistake as it's dull & boring; The gloomy weather made it worse.

Service:
-It takes around 5-10 minutes to get the ordered food/drinks.

Food:
-Nachos: Served with veggie toppings and mayo. Nachos were crispy but I have had better.
-Mango iced tea: Made of mango flavor and topped with mint leaves-overpriced.
-Paneer pav bhaji: 3 big fresh pavs served with paneer bhaji- not bad.

Conclusion:
-Food items are overpriced.
-There are umpteen cafes opening up every other month in Indiranagar and has something better to offer.

Food: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Ambiance: 2/5
QFM: 2.5/5", "Cute cosy place in Indiranagar spread over multiple floors! The first floor is quite perfect for a date and second floor for friends hangout as it has foosball & board games.we ordered an Alfredo pasta which wasn't available so they gave us alredo Maggy which was too cheesy by yummy.the hot choc that we had ordered was sugar free & even after adding your own sugar it wasn't that good & was a waste of money. I may return here just for the ambience (though it has no ac)", "Very nice place to spend time with special someone.
The ambience is very nice and calm and the taste of food is awesome to make your visit wonderful. The day we arrived , it's raining and sitting on rooftop with delicious food is something one must try.
Must try mushroom soup and paneer pav bhaji.", 'Went here for a lunch date and had the best time! The ambience is great and the place is very inviting! Loveddddd the food and impressed with the service! 
We ordered: 

Butter Ke Patashe: Butter Chicken filled in Gol Gappas! Such an iconic dish because who doesn‚Äôt like butter chicken! 

Peri peri Fries: cravings are everything! But perfectly seasoned! 

Strawberry Sunrise: extremely fresh beverage

And a Frappe 

All the food was up to the mark and delicious! Definitely will visit again!']

address: 48, Defence Colony, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Nightlife, Serves Cocktails, Table booking recommended, LGBTQIA Friendly, Private Dining Area Available, Wifi, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Finally a brewery to match up to Windmills although I will say that there is a ways to go. The hefeweizen beer was almost as good what windmills serves on their beer menu.

An interesting although slightly limited menu serving a mix of Pizzas, continental and oriental fare. Amongst the dishes that we tried the calamari was excellent as was the lamb kebab. The pizza too was pretty good.

Overall an excellent ambience (the Johnny walker statue was brilliant) and some amazing retro music which only adds to the experience.

Cheers,', 'This is one of the place I absolutely love the ambience,Jimmy and ravina was very courteous and helpful excellent service,Love the overall experience here at Arena.I would definitely recommend and visit again.', 'Mashed potatoes could be better.', "We went to this place with my Cauliges for hang out. It's really great experience with loud music& craft beer,especially Hafewezen beer I love this beer. Nice ambiance we will visit again", 'The place has a fancy ambience, with pyramid shaped structured, stretching to 3 levels. The interiors are also fine up beautifully.
The food is also good too. We had dimsums, veg nachos, barbeque chicken, flat bread pizza , Thai green curry with rice . Except for green curry which I found little watery, though was full of veggies, everything else was lip smacking. They serve great brewed beer- Belgian wit was good. In mocktail , do Berry Burst, berries based drink.
Overall Arena is a good place to go have good good amidst equally good ambience.
                                                bytetrails.com', "Visited this place for Team dinner on Thanksgiving day. Definitely one of the finest interiors and ambience. Ordered penne pasta, mushroom pizza, crunchy chilli chicken, kungpao chicken, warm chocolate ice cream(the best of all..sorry missed to click a pic). They provide well crafted beers wid perfect blend.. don't miss to try German beer. The food was delicious...Must visit place and i definitely like to visit again.", "We choose this place for our Sunday night dinner.

Ambience : This place have a really amazing ambience with a dome shape and tables on different floors .
[5/5]

The music was also playing good with low volume to enable a good conversation .
[4.5/5]

The service was also pretty quick so that your hungry tummy doesn't have to wait for long .
[4/5]

Food : This is one thing on which they have to work on because the pasta order was pathetic and just spoiled my whole food experience.
[3.5/]

The order dishes we ordered was also pretty okish .

Or maybe we just order wrong set of food . But another visit anytime soon is highly unlikely to occur.", "This place was so crowded even on Wednesday night. It has got a fancy ambience. I am not a fan of Asian food but my friends loved their Sushi. It's a three storey building. Their üç∫ was also good. The place is really amazing and gets filled very soon so have a booking prior. Definitely a must try place and worth every Penny. Both the Pizzas, Tartufata and Spicy Chicken and Cilantro which we bought were good. Crispy fried Chicken wings is a must try.", 'Ambience was one of a kind, their Pizza was good as well as the beer.
Keep up the good work.', 'Loved the food and\xa0 ambience with\xa0service... must visit place in Indiranagar.. Had a great time with close friends . Was really good suggestion to celebrate a friends birthday on weekend in this place.']

address: 55, Surveyor street, Basavanagudi, Bangalore

reviews: ["This yummy crunch fills was once gifted to me d I feel in love with it.as the name says it's crunch yummy healthy and has the right amount of every ingredient to make u eat more d more of it. the chocolate is everyone's favourite d I personally loved the walnut flavour.i gifted these goodie box to some children and they love me for thatüòç", 'Really loved the crunch !! My son really enjoyed the chocolate ones ,very different and tasty would recommend it to everyone .  Personally I loved the walnut ones yum.', 'It is indeed love at first bite. Crunchy Fills . A very novel desert snack. Doubles up as a great gifting idea. They also customise the gift with a personal message. A good substitute to flowers and healthy too. Strongly recommend.', 'This was just a small gift to my mom instead of calling her and saying I love you felt like doing something special. Delisias did a great job sending it on time and these taste out of the world. Would rate 10/10 for the service given by Mr. Varun and his wife.', "Delisias introduces an interesting concept. They have taken the time to perfect a versatile confectionery. It's definitely something a foodie should try. It's a light and crisp outer that envelopes a wholesome flavour bomb. This center ranges from dry fruits to chocolate. Great to have in the fridge for that craving or as a gift for that tea time visit.", "Crunchy fills is the best healthy snack. And it's sooo very tasty. It's a perfect take away box and also a very good gift.\nI crave for it every now and then.", 'Yummy and crunchy snack, something new and different, can be had any time of the day!!! Nicely packed in a very attractive box, ideal for gifting too!!!', 'Bought these crunchy fillings for home. Very well prepared with the right amount of ingredients. The consistency is really good until the last bite. Wil highly reccomend and you can also gift someone since it comes with a sophisticated packing as well! Way to go guys!', 'I bought these Crunchy Fills for a party at home .. The guests totally loved it .. It tastes delicious .. loved the packaging which is great to gift somebody as well ..', 'If your looking for something new , this is the one .. not too sweet just a perfect snack for any time snacking .. loved the variants of flavors they offer .. A must try !']

address: 2148, 17th Main, 2nd Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Near 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['Very bland not a good place to eat. The paneer tasted like rotten cheese. Potato was over cooked . Rice was stale . Got loose motion when I woke up in morning .', 'Pathetic. We ordered veg biryani and mutter paneer combo in which fulka was semi cooked and mutter paneer was stale. In veg biryani there was no salt.', 'The Food was not up to the mark, taste was lacking in food , veg pulao was tasteless and raw. Quantity was also less sweet carrot halwa. And the most important there was no use and throw spoon. Sorry to say but will not order again from the restaurant.', 'Not good at all. The food was bland. Ordered it online, the juices come in white container boxes rather than glasses, they got warm instantly. They should really focus on their taste and packaging. Used to be a good place but it has deteriorated from the past year.', 'FANTASTIC!!! Thank you Sethji for preparing not so hot food I mean not spicy. Everyone enjoyed from 11 to 84 THANKS. But sadly you see the thali is much much lesser quantity compared to other we order. It is not filling though you served a nice tasty yummy Aloo Ka Paratha. Maybe you can provide more rice or maybe extra chapatis or psrathas, you can increase by Rs.10 maybe', "I ordered a couple of Paratha's. I got semi cooked paratha's and tasted bad.
They didn't even wrapped the foil entirely, seems like they tried to save the foil.

The experience was bad and taste was worst.", 'Food quality ok bt Quantity is too less. I Order Dal Chawal Combo no other Extra things like Salad, Pickle etc not Come with this order.Price with  Quantity not match.', 'I ordered dal makhani. What I got was some gravy and it was abysmal. There was a combo of rajma chawal also. Even though the quantity is too less , I couldn‚Äôt even finish that because it tasted bad. You guys should really think about what you‚Äôre putting on the plate and serving. Not ordering from here again! Very dissatisfied!', 'roti ordered was missing', 'This place is simply expensive ..on top of that the quantity is very less...not appreciatable service.
Food taste was average...served hot.(2.5 only for fresh food)
Better option for veg food is SHRINIDHI SAGAR']

I have seen this place from ten years - long time by Indiranagar standards.\n\nI did order delivery from here after a long long time. It is amazing that the food has stayed the same quality and taste. The Kaju Masala from here was yummy with roti.']

reviews: ["Great option for those days when you don't feel like cooking yet want a home cooked meal!! Truly like what you'd be offered at a Mudaliar's house. :-) They cater to party orders as well and their portions are generous. Their pork chops are a must try....besides the fish and Kheema cutlets.", "Thank you Mudaliar's Kitchen for the yummilicious dishes. Mouth watering and finger licking. If anyone is looking for the yummiest mudaliar dishes...This is your pick. The flavours, choice of meat, spice, quantity... All just perfect.", 'Well I really don‚Äôt know what to write as I haven‚Äôt eaten more delicious mudaliar food ever , every single dish is mouth watering , finger licking and tummy kush. Well guys it‚Äôs a must try !!', "So here's the deal. You're sitting at home, getting some of Bangalore's best quality seafood and meat delivered home, cooked to perfection nonetheless, thanks to Mudaliar's catering. As the flavours burst in your mouth, Sandeep's food transports you to a traditional Mudaliar kitchen, replete with all the goodness and aroma of pepper, cinnamon, and ground spices. But I'll stop now and let the food do the rest of the talking.\n\nP.S. = The cutlets are killer. Don't miss them.", 'Ordered from Mudaliars Kitchen, only to eat everything and licked all my fingers at the end of the meal! Trust me! One of the best meals I ever have eaten!! Homely and so full of deliciousness!!!!!', "Looking for a finger lickin' experience with Mudaliar cusine? Look no further...I have been sampling their dishes farely regularly and what stands out is the flavor, importantly the consistency and what's amazing is how light it is. The menu is limited and home cooked....a spoon is enough to send your taste buds into a memorable adventure! Would default to ordering from Mudaliar's kitchen anyday!", 'Best pork chops in Bangalore. Softest mutton curry I‚Äôve ever eaten. All in all a great experience and amazing food. Would recommend it for anyone who is interested in mudaliars Cuisine']

reviews: ["Healthy eating is the buzz these days. What most eateries do is remove sweet out of it which to me is a crime. It is the strongest flavor and the skill lies in balancing it out. So healthy Sapiens is a whiff of fresh air for people with a sweet tooth. Especially if they want calorie less, guilt free food. Ordered a couple of things- Banana walnut chia pudding and Pomegranate parfait. The first thing you notice is the packaging- a glass jar with a premium look- neat. The ingredients are chia seeds, fruits yoghurt, muesli- the usual suspects in a healthy diet. Sapiens are able to balance them out well to give a perfectly sweet flavor- no overpowering honey sweetness alone. The prices are reasonable for the flavor, ingredients and quantity. They don't deliver to all areas of banaglore yet but hope they do that soon. Dunzo is a good way to get their stuff.", "Fresh and tasty breakfast in a jar! Was heading out to work and carried this in my Uber ride. Ordered the Apple cinnamon oatmeal and loved the taste and travel-ready packaging. Would definitely recommend to everyone who's looking for a healthy and on-the-go breakfast option.", 'Was looking for a healthy breakfast option without sugar after workout. Found this new option on Zomato and ordered Parfit . One of the best breakfast I ever had and highly recommended for people who chose healthy lifestyle.', "Healthy n delicious both in one thing !‚ô•\nThe healthylicious breakfast you can have ever , the chocolate pudding had made my dayüôà & I would really recommend you if you're looking for health & taste.", 'Had breakfast delivered in this pretty little jar! The food was good, the quantity sufficient, and the sweetness just right. Was looking for a healthy option and stumbled across this. Loved it!', 'Great option for people who wish to follow a healthy diet without compromising on taste. The oatmeals come is different flavours and you can have them on-the-go as it ia served in jars.', 'Ordered few items of the menu yesterday and found them all to be wonderfully made, and high quality. The Chocolate Chia Pudding and Banana Walnut Parfait were delicious and felt extra good with their healthy ingredients. Would love to continue pampering myself with these sinfree delights.', 'Ordered chia chocolate pudding. Loved the taste of it and being suger free was a blessing. Packaging was also very nice as the jar is reusable.', 'Tried the chocolate pudding. I must say it was amazingly made. I keep on scouting for food which is unique and healthy. Also, loved the cute lil jars which was used to serve.', 'Great flavours, fresh and energizing. Loved the breakfast. Bored from regular breakfast options,I stumbled upon this place on Zomato and decided to give it a shot. Really healthy stuff and would recommend others to try it out.']

reviews:
['Ambiance: 3/5
Cleanliness: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Food: 3/5

A small place located on 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar. Has a very warm and cosy feel to it on entering. Decor is nice and simple with some sketches on one wall coupled with some old pics on the other wall. Staff is nice and friendly. We ordered the Murgh Yakhni soup, Kalmi Kebab, Murgh Amritsari, Malai Kofta and Stuffed Kulcha. The curries and starters were decent, nothing great about it, although I liked the breads.

This restaurant used to be on Zomato Gold and recently logged out of it. The price according to the place and food quality seemed a little on the steeper side. I would suggest this place to anyone looking to try some decent North Indian food around 80 Feet Road area.

Thanks', '', '', 'Moong dal halwa was very oily! and the oil smelling bad.. seems like re-used oil - not sure, but smell bad. Disposed.', "This restaurant sucks! They give yu rotten chicken! You'll literally puke...
Horrible food! Never ever order anything from here.
Y'all treat guys suck! Screw you", 'Horrible experience with the staff of treat especially a guy named amar or so he said his name was . Very rude and arrogant behavior . If the owner has any concern he should take his staff to task and teach them how to behave with customers.', 'Zomato has to remove 1 plus 1 on food for this place. They r becoming so careless. Treat ppl have stopped zomato gold since 10 days n tes zomato ppl have not updated. Wat is the use having zomato gold n not using it. Update all the places which r nit available. Overall food quality is average.', 'The food here is great if someone is looking for north Indian cuisine.....service is quite fast....dal makhni was really great and the paneer was also nice...the ambience was not that good and the place is underground to be careful to find it...... service and food are really good...moreover with Zomato gold its cost effective...... looking forward to visit again', 'This place is one of my favorites in Bangalore.
Pure Bollywood evergreen songs from old times and in a very soothing volume. Can enjoy with family and friends.

Food is awesome!!
Both the menus veg & non-veg are filled with the surprises of the nostalgic taste which is very hard to get easily in Bangalore.

Awesome Food. Friendly staff. Quick service.', 'Nice place, good ambience, food is tasty, reasonable price, good variety of options in Veg food. Must visit once here............theme of Resturant based on old Bollywood style which is also unique']

address: 124, Ground Floor, 2nd Cross Road, Amarjyoti Layout, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
["I'm a North Indian and Matter of Taste is my preferred and go-to place for having some good homely style and flavorful food outside home.
Super friendly staff.

The best part is the food they serve is great! The flavour, spices is just like home, it doesn't get heavy on your tummy or make your stomach feel bloat.

If you ever happen to cross by or around DOMLUR...Give it a try, I am damn sure you will not regret it (to say the least).

If you have a sweet tooth, do try their Besan Ladoo and Gulab jamun...it's just yummm and the perfect dish to sign-off your lunch/dinner.

Not giving a 5* just to ensure they continue serving the beautiful cuisines with same love, passion and dedication!

Cheers to the entire crew of Matter of Taste!

A photo of their Veg Combo Meal offering."]

address: 303, Ashok Terrace, 1st Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
known_for: Authentic Dhaba style North Indian food
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["Have been to Kund many times in the past, they just renovated the place and had gone for dinner with family.
Kund has some amazing Punjabis food.
The ambience is very decent with benches style of seating.
We had tandoori kebab, Lahori Thali, Reshmi kebab and Mutton Biryani.
The kebabs was delicious, especially the makhani dal that came with the Thali was so good.
However I didn't enjoyed or liked the Biryani at all.
The staff was nice and quick service."]

Added special instructions for it to be extra spicy instead it was bland.', 'This is the fabulous restaurant for chicken roll I have ever seen in my life.well anyone can taste from this absolutely worth.packing also good.', 'The best food which I can prefer at late nights tooo .. all my specifications provided will the time of order are fulfilled #lovthefood #thebest', "I wonder what made this place,even have a 3.9 rating!
298 for butter chicken and 4 phulkas.
Phulkas were smaller than average and butter chicken was the worst I ever had! It was sweet as a dessert only to be saved by the hotness of some green chillies! 4-5 chicken pieces out of which 2 were okayish and other two were really small.
From the taste of it, the chicken didn't feel like cooked well together with the gravy.
One can you expect this for a ‚Çπ 60-80 worth butter chicken. But they charge over ‚Çπ200 for this!!
Would never recommend this, and hope people see this comment before ordering from here."]

address: 2008, 2nd Floor, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
cuisines: Chinese, Thai, North Indian, Seafood, Beverages, Desserts
more_info: Home Delivery, Free Parking, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["The concept of the restaurant is simple- You order food with the help of a tab kept on your table and a robot comes with the food you ordered while a waiter serves it for you.
The things that let us down were mainly the ambience. The bright white lights ruin the whole set up and the crowd is usually noisy with kids and people celebrating a special day, it feels like you're inside a market. The washroom was quite dirty. The food was very average for the price they're charging. It's obviously a one time visit for the unique theme here because you wouldnt find another reason to come back again.", "This place is really unique and a first in Bangalore! Till a few years back we could only imagine robots in sci fi movies but this restaurant houses 5 life sized robots as its staff. They are extremely efficient and stops right at your table. There are even bullet trains on conveyor belts to serve your food. The menu are is also in the form of a tablet. So to brief it up ,this is an exemplary technologically advanced eatery in the silicon valley.
Talking about the food, they offer a variety of items starting from Indian, Chinese and Thai.
I tried the Thai prawns and it had the perfect Thai cuisine aroma and taste. Kung Pao chicken was also cooked perfectly . Overall, loved the food.
The price may seem a little on the higher side at first but when you look at the quantity it won't feel too high. The quantity is pretty good! One portion of all items can be easily shared by 4 people.
Food: 5
Service :5
Ambiance:4
Quantity:5", 'The food is average...we had ordered singapore noodles did not find it worth the price. The ambiance is good obviously because of the robots but they just keep moving in a queue with trays on which they carry food and just deliver it near your table.Definitely a good place to take your children once.', "Order placing process in tab is nice, food can be better in terms of taste it's just ohk, but big let down while eating, others waiting guest wait inside the restaurant even in between stop thr robots to click pictures while robot were carrying others food , and no one stop them from the management. Guest should wait out side .", 'It is a new restaurant but the hygiene is not maintained that well. The washroom is really too dirty to be used. Coming to the food. It was good, specially the soup was very good. I think they can still try improving the quality as it has a new concept of robots and will attract lot of customers. Its a nice place to experience it for one time.', 'Use of technology - 5/5
Ambience - 3.5/5
Food - 3/5
Service - 5/5
Seating - 2.5/5
Menu variety - 3/5
P.s - There is no lift to this restaurant. You have to take the stairs.', 'This is one place where they have gone wrong in FOOD.  How terrible that can be. Ordered Chinese. The fried rice and noodles were bad. The basil Chinese chicken starter that I order tasted like chicken lababdar.
Food took forever to come.
There was a glitch in their tab, as when we ordered 7up, it came twice. We had to return it back.
Yes, a robot serving you food sounds fancy. 
The saving grace were the robots who bring food to your table, and there is a coveryor belt in which a  train which brings in your soft drinks and starters.
Food charged is overpriced. 
7up cans are priced at  ‚Çπ30 which is good.
The portions of the starters is good, but it lacked flavours and taste.
3 star for pricing of 7up and the robots. Also, you get to see your bill on the tab, so in that case, you can add or delete anything that you have ordered.', "Pretty cool robot themed restaurant in Indiranagar, where they use robots to serve food to the tables. The ambience is like a laboratory and the place tends to get quite packed so advanced booking is needed.

In terms of food, it was average and very very overpriced.
The chettinad chicken was pretty good for starters.
The wow chicken gravy had a weird taste.
The black mojito was very watery.
The robots do serve you the food pretty fast, but that's about it.", 'The place was packed early , being a Saturday and bustling with children and families..while the concept is mind blowing, the service is slightly laid-back..
We faced a little challenge while differentiating between veg and non veg dishes , the food however was decent
Dragon Chicken : Had a honey chilly sauce with bits of chicken and cashews
Spicy Prawn : pleasantly delicious
Baby corn in HK style : Really a must try
Chilly Garlic Noodles : Lacks taste .. tasted neither of garlic nor of chillies', "There is nothing called as robot in real ,its just a moving device on a fixed track shaped like a robot.
per the food didn't like much anything out of paneer, mushroom starter and veg biryani in terms of fried rice .
On ambience it was clean, a simple standard place and courteous staff which gained two star else 0."]

Waste of 300 bucks", "Amritsari kulcha! I loved my experience here, got here around 2pm today and we quickly ordered a paneer kulcha, mix kulcha with sweet & rose lassi. The lassi, so thick, so luscious, must have! The rose lassi isn't as thick but that's really delicious as well.
