address: 12/1, Ulsoor Road, Sivanchetti Gardens, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I have had the sadya here multiple times(except during onam - avoided visting the restaurant amidst the heavy onam rush) and it has been amazing. The sadya is exactly what you would expect and it is a nice experience to take guests too as well to introduce them to kerala food. As nonvegetarian sides we had ordered the mutton pepper fry and it was an absolutely splendid melt-in-the-mouth meat dish. Good service.', 'Kerala being one of the top ten Paradise on earth, One should know about the heavenly food they make.

Talking about hospitality and food this restaurant located in indranagar is the bench mark for Kerala dishes. The ambience is very well maintained and soothes your mind. The staffs are so friendly and well behaved.
Sadya ( feast ) which origins from Kerala is of most importance to all Malayalis consisting of a variety of traditional dishes served on a banana leaf.

We tried the veg sadya and it was mind blowing and one can have it very easily. The sadya was cooked in traditional manner and one can smell the aromas of coconut oil and makes you feel you are in Kerala.

Well balanced food with no loaded masala and spices. Options of opting kerala boiled rice and normal white rice is also available.

Desserts were top the charts and had those 2 times.

One should try the sadya when ever they visit this food paradise.', "Every year we wait for Onam sadya at Ente Keralam. It's been 5 yrs we always celebrate Onan at Ente Keralam. This yr also we were at Ente Keralam and it was not up to mark or just as every year. Disappointed with it and especially the payasams were horrible. It was water, no taste. Pathetic!! Though we had early lunch around 1.00pm, it was water. Never expected and was not satisfied this yr. Also the crowd was also not heavy this year. 

Hope they will get back next year.", "Amazing Sadhya Luncheon. It was served within minutes and tasted awesome. The yellow curry served by the side being the best. It's located bin heart of MG road Ulsoor area and just a walk from Taj where i am staying. I think i will return for more in days to come.", 'I am rating it a 4 because of the unreasonably pricy menu. Barring that, a fantastic place to experience Kerala food. The food is as traditional as it gets and covers a wide variety in both veg and non veg. We took 2 sadhya meals and 1 neymeen polichathu. Great presentation of food. The kaachiya moru and payar curry in meals were delicious. Nice desserts as well.', "An amazing option for dinner! The unlimited thali is such a great option. I enjoyed everything on the thali. I'm definitely going here again for another (hopefully) great experience. Another thing - the servers here are extremely sweet and helpful, which was very refreshing to see."]

address: 2607, 18th Main, 3rd Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery,
reviews:
["They don't toast the bread in the breakfast. Ordered Additional breads and a jam sachet and they didn't send it out. I don't know who cooks and who manages there but this is not good at all. The coffee was sent in a plastic white container and it got cold till it arrived. The baked beans tasted really bad. I would suggest to avoid this place and rather go to Ants Cafe or Cafe Terra.

The breakfast was 80% fries without salt. Coffee was water. Change your employees and cook. I wonder who gives more than 1* to this place.", "Extremely measly portions of food. I ordered a double delight pork burger that cost 290. The patty was hardly visible among all the raw onions. Upon calling them and speaking to them about my problem I was told that the burger is just given the 'double delight' name and has nothing to do with portion size.

Extremely disappointed with this experience and will truly recommend my friends to never order or eat from this place again.", 'Ordered via Zomato:
- pancakes
- OMG BURGER
- double DELIGHT burger

To say we were disappointed is an understatement. The double delight burger was a size similar to kfc zinger, With raw onions and a patty that was hardly visible.
Pancakes were so bad we could not finish and had to throw.
The only item "good" was OMG BURGER which can pass as being edible

On calling the cafe we were told the chef was new and they will get back. After an hour we called back and were told that "double delight" was just a name. And through she had not seen it but was sure that was the way it was supposed to be and will"try to do better next time".

Be careful in ordering.', "This is a 'Veggie Burger' as their menu states - deep fried patty seasoned with homemade spices, assorted lettuce , salad mayo , handpicked vegetable and cheese. Okay ..did a home delivery..
What i got - 2pieces of bun , 3 slices of tomato and one potato patty ! Pathetic! I do not suggest this place.", 'Great quantity. Good taste.', 'I ordered scrambled egg but the order I received was like egg bhurji .. scrambled eggs should not have onions in it ..', 'Worst service ever. For just a simple order they took freaking 1 hour to deliver. We tried to reach the delivery guy but he too was busy. And the food was ready in the restaurant. Zomato, your service is degrading day by day. Just few credit money in not enough to compensate for the blunder. I want full refund. Make sure you do it fast!!', 'the food was clearly a day old.', 'Worst restaurant to order a burger. I ordered an egg and cheese sandwich through swiggy and I got a potato patty in between two pieces or bun. No trace of egg or cheese in the burger. Disgusting!!?', 'For the money spent quantity is pretty good. Love the chicken cheese sandwich and the English breakfast. The chicken sausages are just too yummy, however their best sellers are the sandwiches!']

address: 23, Survey 10 & 12, 3rd Floor, Domalur Service Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ['A new delivery kitchen. Tried the food couple of times....the food was tasty, fresh.... The packaging is premium.... Rolls are a must try.. fusion rolls...with lemon rice...which I never expected in a roll...their meal box are something which tastes very good and have a nice grill combination...', "This is a new joint in Indiranagar and I'm always curious to go for biryani first. Yesterday was one such day and ordered chicken biryani from this place. The delivery was fast and the packaging looked premium. In terms of quantity, it was sufficient and had freshness to it however, the taste wasn't that authentic. I felt the pepper a bit more than what I'm used to in biryani preparation. Although the pieces were tender and cooked well, the overall biryani experience wasn't there. Also tried the chicken do pyaza the other day and although the quantity was there, I didn't find that much of a taste in it. Too oily and bland to me it was.\n\nI'm sure they have some good surprises in store which for sure, I'm going go explore in time. For now, I wouldn't rate this for a fine plate of biryani."]

["This place is one of the best vegetarians options in the city. Based on Rajasthani theme, the place has its own charm. Restaurant offers only Rajasthani Thali unlike it's online delivery order. We were served almost more than 25-30 dishes including starters, main course, desserts and chutneys and buttermilk. Lassi was charged extra. The taste was really authentic I quite liked the spread.
Ambience-4/5

reviews: ['Finally found my go to place for authentic fresh lassi. Have ordered quite few times from The Lassi Pub for lassi cravings. They never disappoint you. The taste is always consistent. They serve authentic punjabi lassi which is the best part. Water is not added to lassi and it is thick with right amount of sweetness. Just the way I want. Served with fresh cream and white chocolate chips. Definitely recommend you to try lassi here. You would love it.']

reviews:
['It is a small place with hardly 3 tables. They are overpriced for what they serve. French toast was bad but the sandwich was good but not worth the price. The place is either under renovation or is being shut down. There was also no proper place to wash your hands, not even a tap. A street side vendor has better arrangements.', 'You should try aloo tikki chole and cold coffee at this place as they are amazing and gives the taste of north...visited this place due to recommendation from my friends.... Very good experience', 'Very nice place for North indian food.. their paranthas , kulcha and meals are just unexpectedly tasty with very authentic north taste. Good experience for me and my family and very resonable for the taste.. highly recommended!', "Amazingly tasty north Indian food. Can't find anything better in this area. The parathas are just like the ones in north Indian places. Calm and peaceful place where you can have nice food. Keep up the good work. :)", 'Authentic north Indian food... stuffed paranthas, amritsari kulcha and rajma chawal were really good with pure North Indian taste. Really enjoyed the food!', "A completely pathetic place with extremely slow service, bad food and arrogant and rude management. The owner of this place is a person who won't listen to any of his customers' requests or complaints and would try to strong arm them into paying quickly and leaving the place quicker. The kitchen and the seating area is so badly maintained, one might feel like throwing up. Highly not recommended. Stay as far away from this place as possible.", "This place will take you by surprise. It's a cosy little place off Koramangala inner ring road near EGL and serves great food. Loved the aloo paratha, garlic bread and veg fried rice. And all of that, plus a drink, costed 200 bucks. There's a pretty looking gift shop adjacent to and run by the cafe.", 'We normally come to hotspot for chocolate milk shake and rolls which are good.. but they recently introduced delhi chats and cholla bhatura.. which we tried and were presently surprised as they were amazing just like what we get in delhi and the best thing is they always make fresh through out the day... awesome experience!  Will definitely be a regular as we are big chat fans.. we tried suji gol gappa, samosa chana chat, papdi chat and cholla bhatura..', 'Pathetic service. They seems not at all interested in serving. Not even smiling to the customers. U have to self serve the food. When the food was ready they just called me and the behaviour was "Come and take if u want" attitude.

Had tried Veg Noodles. The taste was just below average, something weird taste and smell (I guess some sauce was put non-proportionally)

wont recommend going again']

I think that warrants a 5 star review.", 'To say that Chole Bhature are a must try here would be an understatement. There are an eye-catcher by themselves by the virtue of their size. Value for money. The dim lighting augments the taste of the food.', 'Hospitality needs an improvement by multiple times.

Should prioritise customer needs and then act.

Food is not upto standards of what they serve on plate and what they charge', 'Worst north indian food i have ever tasted.
There was no taste in the food.
Also they were out of a side dish for the thali and told us at the very end that we dont have so plesse take it without that.
Cost was also too high for what they gave.
DONT TRY', 'We were looking for something different and we were craving for sizzlers
They had a wide variety in their menu and we thought of taking a chance and went for having chicken sizzlers.
Well the outlet didn‚Äôt disappoint us. We loved it
Theere were 5 flavours and each one of them was lip smacking good.

address: 16, Wood Street, Ashok Nagar, Richmond Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Brunch, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Smoking Area, Buffet,
reviews:
['One of the places in Bangalore where you could take your date for a perfect dinner with a romantic Ambience. Food is really good but super pricey. Also, the milk cake dessert which i had ordered was not at all good. However, apart from the dessert everything else was fantastic ü§ò', 'I‚Äôm went here for the second time after maybe ten years. Like all legendary restaurants, this place continues to stand the test of time. Still relevant. But maybe my last visit was more memorable. Like most famous chefs keep liking to change their menu, I‚Äôm guessing even this one has. Somehow some of the epic ones have gone missing. Like the apple pumpkin soup if I remember right. But yes the range continues to thrill you. And it is unique. Ideal for a romantic evening. Or just a family out. The only crib I have is that maybe am they should avoid cover versions in the music. And some really badly sung ones.', 'The service is very good, they are there no matter what! Food is yummmm and kudos to the ambience and maintenance team. They are courteous and suggestive

Cons: Service as mentioned is good, but too much of their presence is not good too', 'This place is perfect for a romantic candlelight dinner. Great food, delicious taste, great mocktails and the candlelight set up will definitely lighten up your mood. Only thing is its little bit expensive. Also it may be because a lot of foreigners visit this place. Otherwise its just a perfect place for a romantic getaway. I had a great time here.', "Went here last week and was a bit disappointed compared to my visit last year. Chicken Liver Patte was a let down. The main course is what made us feel better. Giving it a 4/5 based on previous experience. Hope I don't get disappointed next time.", 'Olive beach, This place is as beautiful as the name is. Your go to destination for a romantic date. Food is yummy ambience is way beyond Beautiful. Take your partner if you are looking for a candle light dinner kinda destination in and around bangalore. I loved the pizza here, definitely going back for more.', "I've been to Olive several times, both for special events in the outdoor space and for dinner. It has always been nice. When you step in, the whitewashed walls and quirky decor feel like a Mediterranean home. The food and drinks are to match. Pizza is super yummy as are the prawns with harisa. Service is attentive but could be a bit more friendly.", 'This is usually a place to celebrate for both of us, we go to celebrate birthdays, get together or evening specials. Food, ambience and drinks always bring the mood to the next level and does the job for the day.

A star less for the behaviour from the staff. This time service and behaviour of the staff was not acceptable.

Overall a good place for evening hangout‚Äôs.', 'The moment you enter the restaurant, you are transported to the bylanes of Greece with blue and white decor theme. They have both Indoor and outdoor seating arrangement and you are spoilt for choices.
Coming to food, they offer mix of Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. We ordered Pasta, their woodfired pizza , hazelnut crunch cake and coffee. The food is great and you feel the distinction in the taste and flavours.

The service is impeccable. All in all, it is a must visit place.']

reviews: ['', '', 'A tiny ice cream parlour serving some amazingly yummy and unique flavours. We tried lemongrass, kesar rabdi and south Indian coffee and they resembled in every bit way to the parent source in terms of taste.Loved them all!.Price wise felt bit on higher side for one scoop though.', "If you want a taste of every bit of India , you should go here.. innovative flavours of paan, rose , nalen gur ice creams will take you down memory lane and back to places from your childhood memories.. it's a small quaint shop, but underrated if you ask me.. people should go here more often .. if you like experimental flavours and trying something new, this place could trump all others..", "It was a pleasant surprise when I found pabrai's stall at Manpho convention center during durga puja. I tried their nalen gurer ice cream. Those who know about this Bengali jaggery, know how wonderful it tastes. And they have captured its flavour wonderfully. It has bits and pieces of nalen gurer sondesh and tastes heavenly with a bit of jaggery spread on top of it. A must try.", 'I had been wanting to visit this place for over a year now and finally did today! Had the most amazing icecreams. The Nalen gur was nice and so was the seeta phal. But my favorite here is the Paan, you will love it if you enjoy sweet paan. The place burns a hole in your pocket so will only go there occasionally.', "Quaint little place tucked away in d by lanes with some mind blowing ice creams..! Most of d ice creams v tasted was good n d ones v actually ate was pure bliss..! The house speciality Nalen Gur was so yummy it impressed d most difficult person to impress, my hubby..! Tender Coconut was yummy n so was d Paan.. such explosion of flavour. The sugar free kesar malai was so good.. But it is slightly on d higher side, yes agreed it's natural but so does so many other places with much less prices.. overall worth a visit.", "I have tried your Palm Jaggery ice cream ..it's mouth watery and tried multiple times....I wish to try different varieties of yours as parcel...I m staying in HRBR Layout...can u deliver here...", 'THIS IS THE FIRST PLACE I HAVE TASTED NATURAL ICE CREAM UNTIL NATURALS. THIS PLACE IS OUT OF THE WORLD ICE CREAMS SO YUMMY AND MUST TRY WOULD BE THE NALEN GUR ICE CREAM U WILL BE IN LOVE AT FIRST BITE N LICKüòÜüòÜüòáüòáüç®üç¶üç¶üç¶', 'The person at counter was quite knowledgeable and was answering all questions nicely. I loved the nalen Gur flavour the best. Other chocolate flavoura were also quite nice.']

address: 2, St. Patrick's Shopping Arcade, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["Have you ever got your order mixed up and served Beef Burger when you ordered Chicken Burger. The same happened yesterday. This is horrible as I had to take a bite of the forbidden food in my religion and the a$$ clown of the owner does not even bother to apologize and states it was a chicken burger. Then I pointed out why Beef Burger was charged in the bill and the cook admitted to provide the Beef Burger. These guys take us for granted. I have attached a screen shot of the bill. On top of all this I had to pay the bill. Someone tell me how to shut this place down. Dont even think about stepping in to this pathetic place called fast food restaurant. Wish I could have given a negative rating .... But i have to give 1 as its the minimum. PLS DONT GO TO THIS RESTAURANT!!!!\n\n\xa0Stars 'N' Stripes, MG Road Photos", '', "Their burgers are amazing and I recommend the Jumbo Steak Burger with some fries. Their mayonnaise has a special taste and it's something very unique. The only problem I find with this place is that their service is really bad. Waiters take too long to respond and you have to specially ask for water every time you go there. The place is a tad bit untidy. The combo meals are very economical.", 'Terrible food and hygiene', 'good food and very good value that too on brigade road. The interiors are date and not very well maintained but food is food. service quick also', 'Small restaurant located in Brigade road opposite to Decathlon.. they have small area indoor seating with full of mosquitos... Had a pathetic service. He was busy talking in the phone, Not concentrate with their guest, hope to get good service in next visit.', "I'm surprised how such a restaurant is present in brigade road. Try at your own risk. I'm surprised how such a restaurant is present in brigade road. Try at your own risk.", 'Have to say the overall ambience was a bit off a let down. I was very sceptical seeing the reviews of the restaurant. However, liked their biryani combo offer. The biryani could have been a little better though in terms of the taste. The kabab was nice']

address: Shop 129, 13 Main 3rd Cross M T Street Kodihalli, HAL 3rd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
['First off the Pizza base was very hard - the dough was not kneaded properly.
Sauce was bland, lacked salt
The toppings were terrible: Pepperoni was tasteless, Cheese was like rubber.

I had a similar experience from here before, these guys still serve the same stuff. I have to write this because they never changed despite giving feedback.', 'One eatery which is known for its fabulous food and on time delivery. I have ordered many times from here and everytime had an excellent experience. Food came fresh and taste divine to me. I simply love the taste and their packaging. They got many varieties and I love all of them.3 cheese pizza', 'Whats the point of having a 24 hour delivery if you end up cancelling the order after Valet has been waiting for 30 mins.

address: 6, Ground Floor, Binnamangala 1st Stage, CMH Road, Indranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, Vegetarian Only,
reviews:
['Ordered Kaju Katli and kachori and samosas from this place - all of them tasted good. Samosa and kachoris are priced a little on the higher side though.', 'Reviewing their restaurant named uthara. Have been 4 times to this restaurant, and not disappointed even once. They have very good variety of options and is completely veg. Also I like their presentation. A good place to visit with friends and family and also with kids. The prices is slightly towards the higher side but the taste and quality makes it completely worth it. Must try is their pani puri shots.', 'We regularly order stuff from them through Swiggy. Have a suggestion though. Please add your Thalis and Kulfis to your Swiggy/Zomato delivery menu. Will literally order everyday!

Keep up the same quality and consistency!', "Had been there 3 times. Ambience is good with good service too. Sweets are lil extra sweet. Chats and other street food is nice to have. One can definitely visit at least once to try out from so many options. I've tried papdi chat, suji Pani Puri, paw bhaji and gujiya(ok)", 'The interiors are too good. Service average and food is bad. Didn‚Äôt like a single dish out of five that we ordered- pani puri, dahi bhalla, samosa chat, sev puri nor pav bhaaji', 'They have some lip smacking chaats and sweets!!! Everything super tasty and fresh...
Absolutely In love with their sweets, so tempting they are!', 'An eye catching sweet shop in the busy location of Indiranagar.
Tried dahi puri, masala puri ,rabdi and jalebi.
Prices are decent for the location and decor.
Taste was average, nothing different from the other chat places .', 'Very old and trust worthy sweet shop chain in Bangalore. Started in Malleshwaram now more than 20 locations all over the place. They maintain same quality every day on all the products.']

address: Plot 614-615, 3rd Floor, OYO Townhouse, HAL 2nd Stage, 12th Main, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Awesome place for homely food, must try makke di roti and sarso saag( season special), kali mirch chicken. friendly staff...a must visit place for all foodies!!', 'If you want to have a home cooked food with some good bollywood music ,it is a must visit . Dal mkuani and butter chicken is a must try . Kudos to the food and the place üôÇüôÇüôÇ', "Amazing place, amazing owner and amazing food.
I went with my family and I live their service and food. It was awesome. You must try this place. It's pretty new place but it's worth visiting it", '', "The food is good and not very expensive. The ambience is not that great even though it's a roof top restaurant. But the hospitality by the staff and the manager is worth mentioning.", 'Sometimes the name says it all Swad E Punjab! This place is indeed one of my most favorite when all i can think of is punjabi food!

Swad E Punjab is a new version of their main outlet. Their food menu is indeed tempting. Good thing is they offer a variety of veg and non veg food which makes ur tummy full! Do try one of these!

What i ordered:

1. Dal makhani - they have the best dal makhani in the world!!

2. Kadhai paneer - very well prepared ! Delicious

3. Raita - mix veg. I just hope the quantity would be a bit more

4. Naan- great! Soft crisp what more i can ask!

5. Lassi - this was indeed amazing in this scorching heat this was exactly what i needed.

This place never disappoint for anybody! I Loved every bite!', "Amazing food. Breakfast was delicious.‚Äù ‚ÄúExcellent staff, great location.‚Äù ‚ÄúSuper mind blowing worthful.
Incase if you're looking for a Pool side Romantic Date, this is a place, you should always look forward to"]

reviews:
['I love the fact that secret alley ever started. I have been there since they opened the restaurant and the service has never changed, they are still humble and hospitable as before. Good food , priced well and friendly service.. definitely recommended..wanted to try the chocolate shawarma but didn't have room for it. Next time", "This is tiny Cafe in the streets of indiranagar
The siting arrangements is decent enough not a fancy outlet but a very peaceful one specially in the evenings with a cool breeze
Ordered a white sauce pasta must say for the price it's actually very good
The taste is good
The quality served also was very much
This place has a good tea also
Overall would recommend everyone to visit this place once in the evening Time you will definitely would love it", "Really nice outlet with lovely yummy milkshakes! Even pasta was amazing! Must visit if in Indira Nagar. It's small but seating arrangement is provided.", "I ordered Non Veg Combo via Swiggy from their Combos section.\xa0
Wonderful is so less to speak of it.\xa0
You can choose between 3 types of noodles or 3 types of fried rice and 2 types of chicken gravy dish. Also, you get a glass of fresh lime juice along with all of this.\xa0
Enough for a heavy eater. And, the taste of each and everything was so brilliant.\xa0
Would have liked more if the lime juice was served more chilled. But can't complain because it was a delivery.\xa0

address: Shop 4F-6C, Gopalan Signature Mall, Old Madras Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Vada pav and tea are awesome..love this place..very tasty food..the owner is also very polite and friendly. Enjoyed a lot.best place to enjoy food', 'Nice food items and vada pav was amazing. Really nice place to grab something to eat..

We have tried samasa chat and vada pav and it was good .', "Super mindful lady at the counter 
My child was very hungry today after game zone and in tears because the American corn was not available at one of the other counters. Agreed to have a sandwich instead which has corn in it. So I headed to the grab a grub stall and asked if they had anything with corn. The helpful woman informed me that they indeed had a sandwich and ordered it for me.

Not only she helped me calm my child but also added extra instruction to the cook 'no chilly', which i had forgotten in my super mindless state coz of the crying episode. Cant thank her enough. Yummy sandwich and Absolutely tasty sabudana khichdi too.

Thanks a ton for saving my day!
More power to you", 'This place is my all time favourite. What wonderful food is served here !!!! 
The cheese masala grilled sandwich, pav bhaji and Mac and cheese are prepared with fresh ingredients and have a brilliant taste.
The French fries are the favourite snack for both my nephews, who choose these fries over the Mcd ones!!! 
And the cherry on top is the masala chai which is a must try if you the visit the place.
The owners of this place are so friendly. They never miss out on greeting us. 
Such a happy place that makes my tummy so happy üòÄ', "If you are on fast, then this place is for you.
There are very less places where you cam get dish like Sabudana khichdi.
Khichdi was good, tasty... little bit of more oilyüòÖ.
They don't serve it with anything like Curd. You have to bring it.üòÖüòÖ", 'I had Mac and Cheese pasta which was really yummy. I had gone to the place second time just to have that again. Though it takes 15 mins\xa0 to get ready, it really worth.', 'I love Sabudana Khichdi, but Bengaluru has given me atrocious ones till now. I mean it when I say it - this is my first ever decent and tasty Sabudana Khichdi after coming to Bangalore.

Sometime even small, unnoticeable eateries can surprize you. I was sick and tired of home deliveries and wanted to eat steaming hot food for once. I ordered regular Pav Bhaji and Sabudana Khichdi. They told Sabudana Khichdi will take a while, I was ok with that. It was Friday night. I had time of the entire world.

They served Pav Bhaji first. Though this was no routine Tomato Puree based red Pav Bhaji, it was weirdly tasty. They use small buns and are very frugal while giving cut onions, but the overall experience was good. About Khichdi - Tapioca Pearls were well soaked, there was enough potato, a dash of coriander, it was mildly spicy, in short - it was very yummy!

Felt great after my meal. :) Will visit again for sure.

P.S- Sabu Khichdi was missing peanuts though. Maybe they can look into that.', "it's amazing & so tasty. I'd rather come here than mc Donald's. very hygienic. love this place a lot. authentic food only. just the best. love it so much.", 'Nice little place
We have tried Vada Pav, Bread Pakoda, Dabeli, Misal Pav, Paneer Toast, Poha, Sabudaba Kichadi and more
All were tasty and yummy üòãüòä', 'New place opening in Gopalan Mall\xa0
They have good variety in there menu\xa0
We ordered Vada Pav and Dabeli but was disappointed with the size of the item I have taken a pic item with my friends \xa0Finger it is super mini size , Normal Vada will look like a monster in front of what they server here\xa0

Taste was ok but can improve\xa0

Dont want to rate them low as they are a new place and want to give some encouragement but will visit again too see if they had improved , to re visit on my rating']

reviews:
["The vadas are tiny, the chutney is tasteless, and the sambar bad too.

They'd forgotten to send the vadas, and the owner was very apologetic and courteous, and sent me the missing vadas and one extra, so I appreciate his attitude, which is why this is not a one-star review, but the food needs improvement.", 'Useless food. They are running the hotel to loot customer money.

Thay should improve customer service.

Very poor sidesh. Very poor in hygienic', 'I had ordered masala dosa and vada. The masala dosa and vada were average and not upto the price in same price you can visit other restaurants like Udupi park and get better taste', 'Kisna cafe always reminds me my mom, Sunday specials, the dishes are so authentic that it feels like home! (For South Indians only), waiting for andhra cuisine.', 'I have ordered quite frequently from this place from UberEats. Almost all the times it was a very good experience. I ordered thatte idly, uddina vada, plain utthappa and set dosa. The taste of all the items was really good. Thatte idly was big, soft & fluffy. The dosa and vada also tasted really nice. They provided red chutney, white chutney, sambhar and saagu which were also good. The cost of all the items are affordable. A good place to savour South Indian cuisine near CV Raman Nagara & Old Airport Road.', "üîπHome delivery ‚åö

üî∏I ordered, idli vada, plain dosa and coffee. The idli was okay in taste; soda added was more than required to fluff the idli. Vada was good, crispy but it's small in size. The dosa was above average in taste and soft. Coffee was rightfully balanced.

üîπ Restaurant was able to deliver within 45mins.", 'This is one place I would love to have my breakfast daily when in Bangaluru. It is walking distance from my Sons place in Bengaluru. They have recently registered in Zomato. However I have visited this place number of times for breakfast and dinner too. Delicious food in Budget. It is an open restaurant from 3 sides. Spic and span cooking area, chamacham utensils. Eat your food standing or get it parceled. The aroma of freshly made. idlis, dosas Uttapam is just mesmerizing. I am a Delhi wala where it is masala dosas with varieties of stuffings, Idlis either rice idlis or Rawa idlis. But here I came accross many more, set idlis set dosas which were extremely delicious. Their Poha, lemon rice\xa0 is equally good. Awesome sambhar & chutney. Highly recommended. Looking forward to my next visit in bengaluru.
                                                cookwithreena.wordpress.com']

more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews: ['Ridiculous job! look at the pics! my husband ordered a cake for my bday..both were super disappointed, they should have atleast told us if they were not able to make it well! Never go even if this is the last resort on earth! The finishing is horrible! Wat a waste of money!', 'I had placed an order online through this website, with the delivery to be done today (15th July, 2018). The order was successfully placed and the payment done. However, after trying different numbers obtained from this website and google finally i was able to reach get in touch with someone.\xa0\nAfter constant following up for 2 hours i get a response from an unapologetic idiot that bakery is closed and cake will be delivered tomorrow. When I asked for why order was taken he says talk to madam. A take it or leave it attitude. Pathetic to the core.', "Very unreliable, have had to wait quite some time for the delivery on occasions. They don't stick to the promised delivery time either. Cakes are decent but avoid this place if you have time constraints.", 'My family and I were celebrating my grandparents 50th wedding anniversary at Bangalore club and the cake was arranged by the event planners at the club. I had never heard of this bakery before until we tried it and will surely recommend it for anyone who wants customized cakes for special occasions.', 'A customized order for a Minion theme cake for my four year old was handled really well by the team at Delices. Will surely recommend to family and friends.', 'Ordered, fresh strawberry, vanilla and chocolate cakes from Deices. i thought i ordered a lot of cake for the number of guests i have. Little did I know that the cake will get over in a jiffy! Delicis made really awesome cakes! Thank you guys!']

more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Free Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Best place to get north Karnataka food near my office.
Rotti oota is best with 2 soft corn rottis with 2 varieties of curry, chutny and chutny powder and curd also white rice or coloured rice is optional with best price.
Cons located near sewage area, can feel that sometimes.
Taste and value for money:4/5
Ambience:2.5/5', 'If some body wants to try the North Karnataka style food, this is the perfect restaurant offering good food with affordable price without compromising on quality.
Thanks']

more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,

reviews:
['Was wanting to visit this place always when ever I pass by on 80ft road. Finally happened to go last week for dinner. The place is very minimalist in in ambiance. Service was prompt and polite. We ordered seer fish fry as a starter which was actually bland in taste and not up to the mark. We ordered chicken biriyani for main course which was dominated by spices but was tasting good. Biriyani combo comes with chicken kababs ,sweet and interestingly rasam as an accompaniment.Tried rasam in biriyani for the first time and it was good.
Overall a decent experience but they can fare better', "See not even one star is worth for this food which you have provided me, think like this if customer are not coming what you people Will do..
Even im having my own restaurant.... Don't provide old food to customers for their money", "Don't waste time reading reviews , this is lip smacking spicy Chettinad food and amazing value for money .

Decent sitting area
Superb value for money ( 200 per head )
Food : we had a biryani meal and a kottu paratha which was new to me and loved it !", "I had Dindigul chicken biryani, the rice used is of very poor quality....it was waste of money.....
I'm seeing lots of negative reviews but look like they are not at all bothered..

Good bye to Andal Mess.", 'I ordered the Dindugul Chicken Biryani and the Chicken Kothu Parota. The chicken biryani had really weird pieces and it tasted nothing like a biryani. I also found bones in the Kothu Parota. Never ordering again.', 'Biriyani is good but gets completed so early. Tried the non-veg meals, all the gravies are bad. Ayula fish is very bad. Chicken and mutton chettinad are very good. Parking is also a problem. Service is not good. When a dish is suggested as not good and asked for replacement they do the same mistake and bring an another one. Not the one to be recommended', 'taste was not that good', "The cleanliness and hygiene of the place is very poor. There was so much dust gathered there as if they didn't clean the area in months. Also being greeted by a couple cockroaches at your tables is no fun. The food in general was sub par. The biryani was okay and their chicken chukka was alright but their pepper chicken was literally just a boiled chicken with nothing but pepper. Not even salt. I'm giving 2 stars since some items were edible atleast. I'd honestly give it zero stars for the simple lack of hygiene.", "I didn't get my order", 'Biryani Rice, Chicken Chukka, Fried Fish is a staple here...ask for extra gravy with the Biryani...the kothu parotha is nice too ...
Pocket friendly and Delish!!

I wish they cleaned their wash basin like at least once a year...they never have :-(']

['I ordered quite a few items (almost 7 different items) here beacuse it was available on Zomato delivery.

Then I get a call that not a single item is available.

DONT ORDER from here online because items will not be available and you will have to wait for your payment to get refunded. Simple a waste of time.']

address: 36/1, Ground Floor, Haudin Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['This authentic Chittinad Briyani will boast your taste budsüçó served with raita and flavorful pickel is a great combo.
The briyani is full of Indian whole spices with smoked chicken pieces it in.
You should definitel try thisüëç', "Most Authentic Tamil Style Biriyaniüëåüèª
This is my recent favourite place. I keep ordering the Biriyani combos. Can‚Äôt really control repeating orders from here.
This is heavenly food for me. I was longing to get a place to eat Tamil style biriyani. After Thalappakatti, this would be my affordable choice. ü§ë
The authentic proportion of masala and meats they added are making it incomparable with any other restaurant's Chettinadu biriyani.\xa0
Ordered Chilli Chicken and Chicken Fry biriyanis, both are delicious as hell. üòΩ

I recommend this place for any group of Tamils who don‚Äôt want to wait in Thalappakatti and get disappointed. Go for biriyani without a second thought.ü§§
But other items, I am unaware of. ü§ê", 'Finally, a restaurant which serves authentic chettinad cuisine. I might have jumped the gun in giving 5 stars without tasting their non veg dishes but if the veg is so good I have no doubt their non veg dishes would be finger licking gooddd....

Just back from lunch at this place. I had their  meals and my wife had chapati , idiyapam with Mushroom varuval... the varuval was toooo good...the flavor was bang on...cannot wait to try their chicken dishes...idiyapam was soft and went perfectly well üëå with varuval 

Their meals had everything one could ask for... started with generous serving of ghee n paruppu(dal), followed by sambhar...
Vatha kozhambu was authentic n spicy as well...sambhar n rasam was decent however the brinjal Poriyal had the chettinad punch...payasam was ok...ended the meals with curd...']

reviews:
['Ellarigu Namaskara!

This place is very close to Trinity metro station, Has rooftop ambience which is good and they screen live sports too. 

Live music was amazing and most of the songs were enjoyable, They do accept zomato gold so it‚Äôs a plus.

Prices slightly on higher side however it‚Äôs worth for deliciousness. 

Ambience 4.5/5
Food 4.5/5
Service 4/5
Price 4/5

Overall 4/5', "This was a nice place indeed. After long time I got a new place and it's really very much near to MG road area. This outlet has 2 level where in I visited only the 1 level. It was really nice . They have a good options for the drinks and foods. For the drinks I ordered the LIIT and pitcher of beer. For the food we ordered chicken tikka pizza, peri peri french fries and chilly pork. Compared to the quantity it was okey but taste was really good. Staff is very nice. I would love to visit again and try few more amazing appetizers and main course. Kiddos to team Night Owl"]

reviews: ["Visited urban solace today after almost 4+ years and it was such an absolute hit of nostalgia.\nEverything seems to be the same which I absolutely adore tbh. Today we just had their cold coffee and chocolate thick shake, which were both good. However, I do know that their cheese balls are amazing, so don't miss out on that."]

address: Location Varies, 17, 5th Main Road, NAL Colony, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
['Had ordered the meaty fries on my friends recommendation. Loved it to bits, simple flavours but very tasty.
Have order the wings and burger in the past as well and those were quiet flavourful as well.', 'One of my favourite place for burgers. If you are trying for the first time, go for All american cheese burger. Well cooked patties and fresh buns are their USP.', "Well, the fries was soggy. I don't know whether they have fried it and kept for long. Ice cream was melted too. Disappointed SWAT, not expected.", 'I have ordered here at least thrice. first time ordered i ordered\xa0 the wings and the burger. the burger was good but not too filling, the wings were well done too. the second time ordered two wings and the fried oreos , this time found the wings to be undercooked and had blood stains inside and some of the meat still half boiled . i would have written a review then but thought mistakes do happen at least the food is good.\xa0 third time ordered this week its the same case, so if you need more business, do increase your quantity and quality .\xa0 the bacon you your fries also hardly has any bacon even\xa0 when you charge us etc. rating you 3 hoping for you to realise your mistake.', "Good food. I generally order cheese and bacon fries. It's good but the portion of bacon should have been more.
A negative is they miss to add extra bacon even if you add-on extra bacon for Rs 50.", 'Must try becon cheese fries. A good place for late night hunger. Burgers are also nice. My favourite place to have becon cheese fries. A must have starter with Beer :)', 'good fast food options for burgers and pasta', "Would have given them 0 stars if possible.

I ordered some food late at night. They accepted my order and I waited for over an hour to get my food. The valet who was assigned even came to the place but they didn't bother sending me my food. I understand they it was late, however if that's the case then why did they accept my order and why didn't they have the courtesy to let me know beforehand?

Absolute waste of time. The sad part is that I was really looking forward to their food.", 'The wings are super great but the hotdog is not. If you order one hotdog, the filling is scattered everywhere within the box.... In fact the hotdog just contains a barbecue chicken with the cheese and pickels and all the fillings everywhere else. The presentation was also super bad. Also the size of hotdogs is very small. Not worth the price mentioned. 
Definitely a bad experience.', 'I had ordered the becon cheese hotdog. The food was really good. The becon was nicely cooked, caramelised onions were yummy and the sausage was tender. The delivery guy was polite and delivered it faster than expected. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was the presentation. The food was totally displaced and looked really bad. Had I not tasted it, I would have rated it 2 bcoz it looked horrible. I understand that due to bike ride the food must have been displaced, but if possible try to make it look appealing at the time of delivery. Bcoz I do not like food served like in jail. Rest all was good and I would definitely order next time as well.']

reviews:
['This place is located near halasuru metro station.
Staff: very polite 
Food:spicy salami pizza it was just ok The Pizza was to thin and it was breaking.Meatball spaghetti was ok.We tried prawn  vodka pasta it was bad and the pasta was to soggy I replaced with a pizza
Ambience: they have a outdoor area for smoking which is good
In the inside they have a DJ..', 'If you overlook the drunk guys performing naagin dance to Selena Gomez‚Äôs ‚ÄòTaki Taki‚Äô, you will notice that this place isn‚Äôt that bad at all for a Saturday night. Luckily, there is an outer area which drowns the noise(and dancing) where you can drink and smoke with a little bit of solace. In fact , this pub is underrated probably because of its location.  Though they have spruced up the place with contemporary wall art, chic lighting, and quirky furniture they have retained the old mosaic floor creating a nostalgic edge. There is a DJ and I believe they also have live performances for entertainment. But I shall tip my hat to the bartender who concocted the delicious cocktails for us. The Sunday Slush that I ordered was simply marvellous and the Peshawari Paneer just melted in my mouth. A good place with good food and an efficient service but not entirely a great crowd.', 'We ordered
Bacon wrapped prawns 4/5
Bhatti ka murg 3.5/5
Pasta with vodka prawn 3/5
Drinks:
Tequila sunrise 3.5/5
Sex on the beach 4/5
Cuba libre (a lil too strong) 3/5
A special mention to the team; they were quite attentive and had big smiles all along', "This place is really so good. Plus it's near my place. The outlet have good food and they serve amazing food. They taste good and quality and quantity is really amazing. Overall the place is so good. Price is affordable and the ambience is nice. I would love to visit again."]

The neer dosa, prawn ghee roast and  chicken ghee roast well seasoned and flavourful. The prawn biriani and the chicken biriani were a disappointment, lacking any flavours.', "This place since really great coastal food but at a very high price..üòÑ I had Anjal masala fry,prawns Puliminchi with neer dosa and pundi. Anjal was just one piece and it costed 500. I mean that's really too much. Atleast increase quantity. No complaints about taste and quality. Really great", 'Have tried the appams, neer dosa, prawns ghee roast and mangalorean fish curry from this place - all of them tasted pretty good. Food is packed well and delivered quick too.']

address: 1648/3, Ward 74, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Sea Food', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Neer Dosa', 'Tender Coconut Souffle', 'Fish', 'Prawn Ghee Roast', 'Biryani']
reviews:
["This is a new place and as usual, I went with it. In the past few days, I've tried their chicken pepper masala, murg mussalam, mutton rogan josh and, mutton massala and all this was ordered with jeera rice. The unusual thing to notice was that all their chicken preparations were boneless yet, the quantity was optimum with no room left for complaining. The mutton dish were slightly on the lest impressive side but still better than many other joints.

Didn't like the mutton masala that much as the pieces were hard and had less meat to dig into. Overall, I found this place to be a decent one and one can order without thinking much about quantity or taste. The food here is fresh and tastes well. Their naans are one of the finest I've tried in Bangalore so far.

All in all, a good experience to start with."]

address: 5th Floor, 1 MG Mall, Opposite Vivanta by Taj, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Mall Parking, Smoking Area, Indoor Seating, Rooftop, Buffet, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["My mom and I are huge fans of Asian Food. When I was in the MG Road area, I suggested Tao Terraces, I'd heard quite a lot about their food. So we decided to go here for lunch. They also have an amazing lunch meal too. We tried the Crystal dumplings, which were quite nice. Tried the Glass Noodle spring rolls with garlic sauce and I loved this one. The Pad Thai too was quite tasty but a little too oily though. Overall, not too amazing but not too bad either. I definitely felt its not worth the money though!", "Visited this place for a birthday dinner on a weekday. Being a weekday, it wasn't much crowded.
Good ambience with Chinese kind of presentation. Service was OK.

Coming to the food, we had ordered for Vietnamese pho chicken soup, lettuce wrapped chicken among starters and veg pad Thai noodles.
The food was quite authentic here. The soup was lite and filled with flavours.

Though the name of the starters was lettuce wrapped chicken, the chicken wasn't wrapped in lettuce, both were given as separate. The chicken was cut into very thin ,small peices. It tasted very good.

Pad Thai noodles was different and nice. Was made of flat noodles. It was not the wide, flat noodle, which I had had elsewhere but was flat and thin one. Was lip smacking indeed.

The food plating was appealing.Quantity is a bit low and felt its quite high on the pocket. They have open terrace where alcohol will be served and very romantic with beautiful view.", 'Nice place, food was so good
Ambiance also nice
Service wa excellent
Were they serving mom wow
It was location opp Taj hotel near MG road
It roof mall terrace but so nice
Thank you.', "Tao Terraces is one of the place you want to visit for the beautiful and pretty ambience. There is an indoor sitting as well a pretty lighted up rooftop with dim lit lights and perfect weather treating.
I have come before here and tried their wines and sushi , wasn't much impressed with the food though.
This time I was here to try the Poke bowls, deconstructed sushi bowls with choices of meat, veggies, crunch elements, sauces and much more according to one's choice. A great way to mix and match stuff of your choices.

üî∏Started with the wheat soup , which was quite filling.
üî∏The lahging handmade silky noodles was my first trying the noodle salad and absolutely loved the spice it had.
üî∏Onto the poke bowls, like the concept but felt the bowl was quite dry with the type of rice and lacked the sauce consistency.

Go here for some romantic time with your loved ones and you will love the ambience on the rooftop with some soulful wines.
                                                foodndestinations.com", 'This was a 4 course meal including Soup, Salad, Main-Course and Dessert.
The main course was the most interesting as we had to create our own Poke Bowl and that was a whole new experience.
Poke means ‚Äúto slice or cut‚Äù in Hawaiian and Poke Bowl is a deconstructed sushi served as a main course or appetizer. We were given a sheet, in which we had to choose the Base, Protein, Veggies and Sauce. That sheet reminded me of a multiple choice question paper. üòÑ
We ended the meal on a sweet note with some sticky rice and fresh mangoes.

It was a lovely evening indeed.
                                                littlefoodiegirl.com']

address: 710, 3rd Floor, 80 Feet Road, Above New Bata Showroom, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Serves Jain Food, Buffet, Group Meal, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["Very tasty thali. Heard of this place a lot from some food lovers and it didn't disappointed me. Courteous staffs and good rajsthani themed ambience with soothing rajsthani music . Worth a go !", 'Came here for lunch on Sunday. Just walking into this place feels so festive - the decorations, all the happy people and daaamn the food! They give you colorful turbans as part of the experience.

Every dish they serve is explained.. and Krishna & Rakesh were super sweet - they suggested the order in which we should eat the dishes and what goes better with what.. and made sure we had multiple servings of everything.. felt like we were back home.. being fed so generously. This is a MUST TRY place if you love thaalis.', 'NH8 is authentic place for the people who want to eat nice authentic Indian food.

Thali are full package of good Indian food they service variety of things in it 4 types of vegetables, 2 types of dal, roti, bhakri, farshan, pickle, butter milk and even dahi puri chat which even equally tasty as this whole thali, papad and many more. This is the tastiest thali I ever had.
Taste-4. 5/5', 'Its Durga Pooja season and how could I not try the Navratri menu. It is there for limited dates and the  thali caters to people who are fasting and uses satvik ingredients.  
Has good options, most of them potato based majorly. There was aloo laccha tokri, sabudana wada, aloo chips, jeera aloo, aloo gravy, paneer gravy, sabudana khichri, pumpkin halwa, rasmalai, shrikhand, curd, kuttu poori and lassi.

The flavours were really good, in comparison to other places where  I have tried the Navratri menu. Cooking with desi ghee just added charm to the whole spread. I found my joy in shrikhand, poori and halwa, simply yum!

Totally worth trying, just two suggestions- 

1) I wish it was less oily. 
2) If they would incorporate other ingredients like raw banana for a gravy and not just potato- coz the whole thali seemed too ‚Äúpotatoey‚Äù. 
But nevertheless, flavours just stole the show.
Service was courteous.
Loved the experience .', 'The decor of the place is well done giving some authentic Rajasthani feel, with folk music playing in the background. Also, you could choose to sit in Rajasthani style with a baithak kind of setting or else opt for the regular chair table routine setup. Overall I would summarize the thaali as one with few hits and misses.

A few of my fav picks from the whole thaali were Dahi Vada, Khichdi, Poori, aloo matar, and hot desserts. The rest of the items were average in taste. Dal Bati which is one of my favorites failed to lighten my palate.
One thing which was really commendable was their hospitality. The staff was attentive and equally after everyone till they were full till their necks. I would like to mention Mr. Krishna and Mr. Rakesh who were a great host.', 'This place is located in Indiranagar. This is a pure vegetarian place that servers authentic Rajasthani Thali. The thali is pretty huge and they are very generous with food. Their service is amazing. They feed you till your tummy explodes. They treat all their customers like family. It was a wonderful experience and the quality if food is just amazing. The thali had two chaats, two types of roti and poori and three desserts, rice , Kichdi, khadi, pickle, salad and so on. The ambience is pretty af and this place is good for family outings. This place is also really good with hygiene and everything. This is also a kid friendly place. They treat your kids really well too.', 'Recently visited NH8 for thei smaller portion of Thali during tuesday, must say that was mouthful of dishes for sure. Started off with the dahi vada which is super yumm & not to be missed.. Dal batti is very good here. However kichidi was very comforting in my plate which i relished with rajma curry... Gulab jamun is served hot is the best way to end my meal.. Not to miss the excellent hospitality & the seating NH8 have that makes me come here regularly', "NH8 is one of the most authentic Rajasthani places I have seen in the recent times. All the staffs make you feel welcomed and serve you with utmost care.

They have unique seatings where a small mandir is also present and you've got to go there after removing your slippers.

Once you've settled down in the place the gigantic thali plate with sides are served to you‚ô•Ô∏è it's a visual treat to the eyes. You put on the turban and you are ready to devour the food! The thali is unlimited and they keep serving you even if you are full till neck üòã

They had served two types of rotis, 6 types of curries and dal, khicidi, khadi kachori, Dahi vada, buttermilk,pakodas, kala jamun, moong dal halwa and rasogolla.

Everything was amazing ‚ô•Ô∏è overall a great experience will be back soon"]

address: 1/4, 1st Floor, Lido Mall, Swami Vivekananda Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
cuisines: South Indian, North Indian, Biryani, Street Food, Fast Food
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating, Resto Bar, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, All Day Breakfast, Desserts and Bakes, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
["Theme : cocktail + street food.
It's really a awesome combo. They serve some amazing cocktails. LIIT was my favourite. Rosogolla chat, something unique you should definitely taste. Achari aloo was so delicious. Amazing decoration and lighting. They have both inside and balcony seating arrangements. Courteous staff. Loved the playlist.", 'Ambience : Good seating capacity with different Counters serving different types of cuisines. They have balcony seating as well.

Food :

Rasgulla Chaat : It is a must try. Curd and chutneys topped on the Rasa gulas. Good balance of flavors.

Street FoodIrani Saali Kheem Pav : It was delicious and a must try.

Bafat Masala Fish : It was great. Masala fried fish.

Rava Fried Prawns : Crispy rava fried prawns. Very tasty.

Red Rice Benne idli : The idlies were super soft and delicious.

Karimeen Fry : Masala was very nice and the fish was fresh and tasted great.

Service : Service was little slow. Staffs were friendly & attentive.', 'We had kawabs, fish , biryani and paneer. The taste was yummy and the value for price . As there is ample parking available hence it‚Äôs not a botheration . The ambience is good and with the choice of variety of selections . We loved the ambience. The service Leveln needs improvement though. There is a lack of clarity also in the offers as the staff seemed to be unaware about it', 'If you‚Äôre on the hunt for a quick amuse-gueule from the streets before a movie or full-fledged meal after a movie or wanna to spend quality time with your loved one with awesome food then THE BANGALORE STREET CLUB resto is a perfect hotspot for you. This simple yet luxurious restaurant is nestled on the first floor of Lido Mall and visiting this restaurant is like killing two birds with one stone as it combines the street-style theme with haute aesthetic. Urban, modern, eclectic, gleeful and ritzy are the few words that describe this place. This spot welcomes you with beautiful light shining through the strove of bamboo lamps and alongside artificial green turf wall says the watchword ‚ÄòMajja Maadi‚Äô to maxim in beguiling gorgeous environs with your squad along with the food. The space is spread-out indoor and outdoor.
                                                ...Read full post on abhinieats.com', 'The bangalore street club was a snoothing food stop option with vide range on the menu served. Basically the idea of bringing street food into club dining style was an amazing idea.

They have great ambience and friendly staff. Loved the place.', "Nice ambience, courteous staffs and good food all under one roof. I just wished they had more options of mocktails. Music is okay. Hop in, if you're tired after shopping in the nearby malls!", 'So Lido Mall has a new place where you can head to to catch a quick bite before a movie or enjoy a leisurely meal after your show has ended. Sounds intriguing now? Lets dive in. Ambience and Concept. Located in place of the rather tepid TGIF on the first floor, this place has been completely revamped and looks really pretty and spacious. The inside seating is well-spaced out, brightly lit and comfortable. The outdoor seating is more subdued and is perfect for a dinner date or a quick drink with friends while soaking in the lovely Bangalore weather.
                                                ...Read full post on theuncliched.com']

address: 15, 1st Floor, St Patricks Complex, Brigade Road, Bangalore

reviews:
['A small cafe located right opposite St Josephs College of Commerce on the 1st floor.
Pretty hard to locate but definitely worth finding.
Food here is fresh and clean, customisable to fit your taste buds perfectly. 
Staff here is extremely courteous and go out of their way to make sure your having a nice experience. 
Definitely a place where food is cooked with love. Such yummy food with such reasonable prices. 

The Chicken cheese sandwich and French toast with blueberry and cream cheese are my all time picks.']

address: 11, Armstrong Road, Veerapillai Street, K. Kamraj Road, Commercial Street, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Best class sweets, better to order bulk items in advance, famous for hot jalebi, Chats.
We took Kheerkadam everybody loved it to the core... Staff is not educated but still best in class service...', 'We loved the chats, very different from the chats that you otherwise get in Bangalore. A prefect place to snack at after shopping in commercial street.
We tried Pani puri, Masala puri, Samosa chat and Dahi puri. Off which I would not recommend dahi puri. 
We also had some delicious Jamoon and badushah.', 'Today 18 sep 2018 I purchased rad Mali 10 piece in u r shop u gave 2 piece rasmalai and 8 resgolas pls check and buy  some people r fraud so before u buy pls check', 'I have come to India and visit  Delhi Bhavan Sweets And Chants . The shop was good looking and the sweets and chats are very good and hygiene. the owner and the workers speak  politely to the customer if the customer behave rudely and not give respect then the owner then the owner  speak in loud voice. Diwali and Dasara  time they make the best ,and fresh sweets. From far away the people come to buy sweets and eat chats. I give my special thanks to Mr. DINESH Sharma and Mr. SURESH Sharma who treated well me and my family .I wish I will come back and visit again .   
\xa0

THANK YOU', "Worst place to have street food. Don't go by the name. From taste, service, to cleanliness it wins thumbs down. They intentionally puts chilly in every dish so that.. The other sweets and packaged water gets sold.I am forced to give rating since I cannot submit the review.
;(0"]

address: 788, JK Plaza, 12th Main, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Gluten Free Options, Vegan Options,
reviews:
["Seitan is basically wheat gluten, full of protein and vegan substitute of meat.. That's the name suggests.Basically a vegan restaurant with very limited food options and where u can customize ur sandwich. The base to choose from sour dough, pita pocket or burger..The filling would be mostly of seitan, and add on cucumber, onion ,lettuce, tomato..Though u can ask for your own combi..I liked my sandwich with honey mustard sauce and smoked paprika..So for me it's good but I felt it's a bit over priced .. As one sour dough sandwich costs me 225 rupees.. And the salad could b lil better..And it's a very very small place so if you are big group then don't choose this place , Total seating capacity would not be more than 20..

Ambience : 3/5
Food : 3.5/5
Service : 3/5
Value for money : 2.5/5", "Ambience: Quiet, calm, something that one can enjoy even by themselves. Full marks for that.

Food: I had Broocolli + Apple classic pepper vinaigrette salad and avocado + spirulina smoothie. Both were fantastic. The beverage had no water whatsoever. Great job with that.

Service: This is where I deducted the 1 star. It's very lacklustre. No one to take the order despite 3 people available for the same. And even for billing had to continuously call people when all I could see them doing was keeping themselves entertained in the phone."]

address: 2017, Near Reebok Showroom, HAL 2nd Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
known_for: Classic Italian food with Oriental influences.
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Full Bar Available, Table booking recommended, Buffet, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
["We went to Little Italy yesterday for lunch. My family is a fan of authentic Italian food and that's what we got here. Only thing is that it is pure veg so nonveg lovers you can try the vegetarian Italian here which is actually a must-try. Onion rings were great but we loved the pasta and the pizza. The ambiance at this outlet was ok but the staff and service are great. We are surely going back to try other dishes.", 'We ordered pizza and garlic bread.
Garlic bread was not up to the mark
Pizza we ordered pizza Napoli and it was like over crowded with Jaleponos. Totally a not great experience

Value for money : 2/5
Taste : 3/5
Ambience : 3/5', 'Went to Little Italy for the lunch buffet n found it quite good. The starters are served on the table , really liked the corn fritters. The main course has all the Italian dishes - pizza, ravioli, pasta, spaghetti. And talking of taste - found all good, nothing extraordinary though. They can also have more variety in desserts.
The staff is courteous n the dishes could be prepared according to your taste also ,if requested.
Not a bad option if u want to try something new.
                                                bytetrails.com', 'Went to this place on Saturday afternoon for lunch buffet...the staters are served on the table and pizza as well...they served the pizza of our choice and they were just melting in the mouth...the main course was ok ok...in desserts there were no much varieties except the chocolate bomb...all were cheese cakes so did not try...felt price of the buffet is slight high...the service was good and ambiance was ok...']

address: 7, Anjaneya Complex, Kodihalli, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Most of the celebrations, birthday parties, poojas in office we used to buy sweets from here. We have tried different varieties of sweets from here.', 'I was in the Old Airport Road Outlet of Anand Sweets on 31 July 2019. A fellow customer who was a lady pointed out that there was a fly sitting on the Rasgullas. Instead of doing anything the staff was arguing with her that they are not sure how it has come. Then when she told that it is sitting on the Rasgullas, the staff removed the container and in the process of removing the container the fly which was there on the Rasgullas got all mixed up with Sugar Syrup.
 I am not sure if the container having those Rasgullas was kept back in the food section after we left.

I want to bring to your notice that I have been a customer of Anand Sweets since 2012. This kind of instances of flies on sweets is not something we expect from Anand Sweets.

I request the management to please look into this matter and do the needful so that the Brand Name of Anand Sweets is not spoiled or dented in anyway.', 'Loved the Kesar badam milk! It was rich, creamy, and had a lot of almonds chopped in. The experience was like drinking an excellent kulfi. The dahi puri was a little lacking in character, and the cholay in the samosa chat could do with some zing.', 'Visited for the 1st time to try chats. We were skeptical but it changed our view. We tried bhel and dahi papdi chat... both were very nice. Must visit. @anandsweetsindia', "We tried the dining menu and sweets at Koramangala outlet so thought that chaat would also be good in other outlets. Visited the Old Airport road one on the way back from office and believe me the chaats were extremely disappointing. Samosa and Paneer Pakoda felt like staled, Papri chaat and raj kachori were like not fired properly and some ingredients were missing. to compensate this worried experience we tried rasmalai and malpua. though rasmalai was good the malpua was again felt like half fried. we had a big expectation on Anand Sweets as this is the only famous sweet shop in Bangalore which stimulate our test buds to try our North Indian snacks other than Bharatiya Jalpan. But now we'll think twice before going back there again. And I request my fellow foodies the same.", 'This the taste of sweets that everyone would wishes to eat...... lots of varieties.... lots of loved tastes....i will definitely refer anand sweets for bangloriens', 'Highly recommended for quality sweets and great taste. I love the Motichur laddu the most among sweets. The dry fruits are THE BEST quality.

However rabdi did disappoint in taste. But trust me this place will not let you down in quality though a bit heavy on pocket.', 'One of the best outlet in Bangalore where almost any kind of sweet you try is worth it.. I am one of the regular customer and have tried a lot of things there, just in case you wanna take feedback about anything particular.

This place is seriously worth it. You should definitely try it out once if you are a big time sweets or chats lover.', 'I have ordered different thing and automatically my order has changed after payment and they sent different thing. It happens twice with us.', 'Not so good compared to other Anands. Try dal halwa though which is good. Other stuff is all pretty much expensive for the price which they charge at par with their premium outlets']

address: 4050, Ground Floor, 19th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bengaluru
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
['Ordered peri peri veggies toastizza and Mac n cheese chicken toastizza..New concept and really good in taste..Perfect for evening snacks..would like to try other flavours as well', 'An amazing alternative for bite-sized cravings. Not a generic restaurant and absolutely no generic dishes on offer. Delightful fusions of traditional snacks with western style, very jovial proprietress and a quiet place to hangout with friends. Loved the experience.', 'Different style of food. But there is something for everyone. Rice bowl, noodles, roti, gol gappa, smoothies, lassi, etc. Love the spicy mango smoothie and chatpata litchi smoothie. Also noodles rasam bowl.', 'During my trip to Bangalore heard from my friends about this cool place.... I went there and had a kiwi float and a Mac and cheese toastizza, after I ate that I was like OMG! It was just so awesome and creative.. saw a place for the first time who made the food creative and fun!! I just love your food guys!!üòçüòçüòç
Gonna come back for more of your awesome food', 'This place has something innovative in their spread. Went there assuming it to be an outlet of some other resto, but was not disappointed with the change. Not a place if you are looking for something in traditional food or a specific cuisine, but if you love to try things out, put this as a stop.', 'Superb fusion food and a very warm staff. I ordered Mexican Gol Gappa, Kiwi Lassi and Noodles Rasam Bowl with Chicken. All of them were out of the box awesome. They gave me a shot of Spicy Lychee Smoothie that they would be launching soon, and it was out of the world. Will visit again soon.', 'The order was Chicken + Rice Bowl, but there was no chicken at all.', 'Chance found this place during my recent visit to Bangalore. Quiet ambience, open air seating. They were streaming World Cup as well. Had Mac and Cheese, cold coffee and Mexican Gol Gappa. Loved the food and presentation. We wanted the Mac and Cheese spicy and they were kind enough to customise the dish as per our taste needs. Would highly recommend this food joint.', 'I love the ambiance of the place.\xa0 It is ideal to spend a lazy evening. I work nearby so I usually come by for a toastizza with chocolate milkshake which is really yumm here. I also like the kiwi lassi which is quite refreshing. The staff is courteous and tries to make you feel comfortable.', 'During our visit to Bangalore we came across an amazing newly opened cafe named stuffd.
They offer you a variety of delicious and wholesome food. We had their speciality chicken rice bowl, gol gappe along with kiwi float and strawberry float!
The food was awesome and delicious, the service was amazingly prompt and the price is pocket friendly!
Stuffd is an amazing place for hangout with your friends family and colleagues for a quick bite.']

address: 70 B, 4th Cross, Muniyallappa Garden, Kodihalli, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only,
reviews:
["Since when did Kolkata Biryani started having Kadi Leaves in it is something I don't understand. Ordered Kolkata Mutton Biryani from this new joint and sadly, it was a disappointment. The biryani was nothing like a biryani itself let alone, Kolkata style. Full of Kadi leaves and meatless bone pieces, the biryani was a huge upset.

Most of the biryani hubs in Bangalore are all about this and that but very few actually knows how to make a genuine biryani and certainly, this isn't one of those. Bad taste and overly priced menu!!

Let's see what others have to say but honestly, this was one of the worst I've ever had.", '']

address: 138, Maruthi Towers, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
cuisines: BBQ, Arabian, Chinese, North Indian, Desserts
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Free Parking, Card Upon Delivery, Table booking recommended, Table reservation required, Table booking for Groups, Kid Friendly,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Barbeque Chicken', 'Shawarma', 'Chicken Grill', 'Vegetable Biryani', 'Fish', 'Pepper Bbq Chicken', 'Cream Of Tomato Soup']
reviews:
['I first went to Zaitoon in Chennai near the Adyar beach way back in 2010... Since then in my stint there, frequented the place quite a bit... Was always looking forward to eating at Zaitoon again, so the first thing I did in Bengaluru was to check how far Zaitoon is from the place I am staying now... And call it destiny, it is only a 10 minute walk... So even the unusual wait time on a Tuesday afternoon could not discourage me enough... Coming to food, tried the Pepper Barbeque chicken with hummus and pita, which tasted exactly like it did 10 years back... Also tried the Kozi Laham, which is Mutton in a bed of saffron rice... This is insanely flavorful and delicious... I personally feel Zaitoon should remove those junk Indian and Chinese pages and stick to just those two or three pages of Arabic cuisine... And they should look at serving some Arabic drinks as well... Also they should expand to other big Indian cities as well... Highly recommended...', "When I first came in to Bangalore I was suggested by a friend that this place is a must visit if you are a chicken liver .
And yes it is true.
If you want some lipsmacking chicken, you ought to visit zaitoon.
This place has a western cum Mughal era feeling.
With staff wearing a hat and serving it a smile,with beautifully decorated and lighted this restaurant son my heart.
A heads-up you got to book a table because the waiting time is more as this place is always crowded for known reasons.
We ordered some special chicken zaitoon lollypop.its was delicious.
It was neither dry nor was it muddy , a perfect blend of crisp and flavour.
The quantity is perfect or more for 2 people.
We ordered our favourite butter garlic naan and chicken lazeez( don't remember the name exactly) for out main course and that made our day.
A perfect luncheon !
Happy eating people.
Do visit here once..", 'A good family restaurant with great food. Have been there to try their fish and it was yummy. I looked around and found most of the people enjoying their food- all of them being non-vegetarians. They were quick with the food, however not quick with the fresh lime water and soda- which I believe is because of the separate kitchen who serve dessert and shawarmas- so there was a coordination gap. Of what I have tried and seen this place is a good place to visit to try yummy fish, crab, and Arabic\xa0food.\xa0 Affordable and good dining, hence these places will never go out of style. If i happen to try any other dishes from this place will surely update this review.']

reviews:
['', '', '', '', 'We tried chicken biriyani family pack. We bought 2 packet of family pack biriyani. It was more than enough for 5 people. Super value for miney package', '', '', 'This place was close to my office, used to lunch here quite regularly. Their briyanis and meals are excellent. Esp Boneless chicken briyani and fish briyani r good. You can order any random starter or curry from their menu and it tastes good. Perfect Andhra style food. Value for money. If you order a briyani sitting at the restaurant, one person cannot finish it and if you get the briyani parcel from here, the quantity is sufficient for 2. Ambience is not great. The place is crowded during lunch hours on week days and you got to wait to get a table.', 'Biriyani rice quality is very good. Chiken Biriyani is my favourite from here.service was not that good as ac was not working.food taste is 3/5.', "This place is on a terrace of one a small building.
It's pretty old one. Have been seeing this past from 6years.
We a gang of 7 visited this. And 5 had non veg biryani and 2 had veg biryani.
The taste is decent. Nothing extraordinary. The quantity is large enough for a medium sized appetite.
Rate is just above the average."]

more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["This is such a gem of a place. It's a place that specialises in Kerala Cuisine. In Love with their Food. Soul Food is what I can call the food. Right starting from the aroma and ghee rice will mesmerize you. The kalmi masala was perfect in taste. And the Fish Fry was a show stopper.In fact I am a huge fan of their Shawarma Plate. Such Pocket Friendly price. But there Appam could be better and was cold when served."]

Overall will give 4 rating to this andhra hotel', 'Awesome place for an authentic Indian food lover at affordable prices. biryani , guntur chicken, and meals are a must try.loved the place and mostly the food.', 'It is a regular lunch spot for our colleagues at office.
