address: 51, 1st A Cross Road, Stage 2, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Pre-Ordering Required, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews: ["If you like authentic German bread, look no further. I've lived on Vienesse breads for 3 decades and finding authentic German breads in India was impossible until recently. I tried their Sonnenblumen Vollkorn Brot. It was Just perfekt!", 'This place is a godsend for people looking for authentic Sourdough breads.I have tried their basic Country Sourdough bread on two occasions and have not been disappointed.Plan on trying the rest of their breads very soon!', '', 'Great whole-wheat sourdough bread, which smells like it has been made with natural yeast. I ordered home delivery twice before writing this review.', 'Delicious! The best bread in Bangalore. Since being in India I missed having a proper loaf of bread. Krumb Kraft came to the rescue!  My family enjoys the wide variety of breads on offer. Everyone can have something they like! Also it freezes well:)', 'Absolutely love the sourdough breads from here. Especially the Focaccia one (with cherry tomatoes and olives).\xa0\nDelivery is across Bangalore via Dunzo.', 'It‚Äôs was the first time that I heard about Sour Dough and thought of trying it. My sister learning from the prof got it freshly made for us. I had the bread with Missal & bhaji that same day. It was so good. Next day I had the complete pleasure of tasting just the sour dough without anything in my office. Omg!!! It was so yummy. I ate half the bread trying to hide from others to eat in working hours. The sundried tomatoes and olives was making my heart giggle with each bite. That day, the bread lover in me was happy and content. Must try the amazing sourdough by Krumbkraft.']

address: Oriental Bank of Commerce, Konena Agrahara, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['The atmosphere of the restaurant is clean and spacious. They serve one of the best tandoori chicken. The owner and the waiter are humble. I have been visiting this particular hotel from past 2 years. They serve best chicken biriyani.', 'Always been a fan of this restaurant. This place serves Kerala, Chinese, Arabian and north Indian Cuisine. I usually order my afternoon lunch from here which comes around Rs. 60 includes rice, curry, sambar, sabji 1, sabji 2, rasam, papad etc.', "This place has less than ok food. Had breakfast n dinner items from here. Non veg dishes not recommended, from hygiene perspective. What is really not ok is the behaviour of the staff. Very poor staff attitude, n the cash counter person is equally rude. Once while having south indian breakfast we wanted extra sambar, they said it's chargeable (no such thing mentioned in the menu card). It was so annoying, have been having south indian breakfast elsewhere but nowhere have we faced so much bad behaviour. Advice to management, please be polite to customer. Stop charging 5/- for extra sambar or chutney or atleast put this policy in writing on the menu. For 5/- you are losing on repeat customers who can really give you good business.", 'A very decent restaurant, which serves malabar, Chinese and north indian food. We love their Malayali breakfast puttu and kadala curry. They do have shawarma and other tandoor items. Grill chicken is not that good. kerala porotta and chicken masala is good. just finished having one curd rice and this is how it looks (check the photos)..', 'Every food items are good.... specially mutton pepper fry is awesome....free home delivery of food is also provided. So I must say quick service and good quality food are the plus points for new royal Paris restaurant .', "Decent food. Express delivery but in close vicinity. North Indian dishes don't taste authentic. Dont try Chapatis as u might get disappointed.", 'Good malabari style biryanis. Love their pickles which they serve and most of the curries are well priced and tastes good. 9/10 according to me. Good for take aways as the place is rather small for dining.', 'I m surprised there are no reviews for this restaurant. it s a small little place with amazing Malabar biriyani. I love their fish biriyani the best. Never tried anything other than biriyani. I always made take away orders. I think they do deliver as well.']

address: 2011, 2nd Cross, Papiaha Reddy Lane, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews:
['We ordered a home delivery for three people. Chicken starter, 2 chicken biriyani and one chicken hydrabad curry and butter phulka..!! The food was very tasty. 

Chicken Hydrabadi was rich in flavour and not extremely spicy. The 2 biriyani‚Äôs was sufficient for three people with lots of chicken pieces in it.

Only the starter was a little less in quantity but they were also very tasty.

This is a new found place for me to order in non-veg food..!!
                                                keepitstylishdayita.com', 'Arabian tandoor is a delivery only restaurant readily available on Zomato, Swiggy.
Tried their Chicken Biryani and I must tell you this place has impressed me.
The food was delivered on time.
Food was packaged well, no spillage whatsoever.
The quantity was ample, one biryani can be consumed by two people.
It tasted brilliant too!
Succulent, well marinated-boneless chicken pieces in the flavourful rice was just perfect.
The biryani also comes with a bowl of raita.
Also tried a couple of chicken starters. Chicken kebab was quite juicy and well marinated while the other dish chilly chicken though was made well, I personally feel this place is best at making the Indian/ tandoori delicacies than Chinese.
The butter roti and Hyderabadi chicken is also a must try combination from here. The Hyderabadi chicken is a thick, rich, spicy gravy with chunky chicken in it.
Best part? It is pocket friendly so you can try out the food without burning a hole in your pocket!
Highly recommended! ‚úîÔ∏è', "Delivery restaurants are blessings in disguise!

Ordered dinner from here and I definitely loved the food.

Biryani - thou I can't be easily convinced to eat Biryanis and this was really something that won my heart. I loved this flavorful chicken Biryani, rightly spiced to my taste buds. Generally most of the places make it very spicy.

Chicken wings - the wings in right kind of BBQ sauce made it delicious and it was juicy too.

Chicken starters - boneless ones were very tender and the flavour it had was mild and good.

Chicken Hyderabadi curry was going really well with the butter phulkas.

Overall a great place to order food from.
Quantity is also good and pocket friendly prices will definitely make you order often.

They have a wide variety of dishes on the menu and would definitely order again to try them.", "Tandoori Chicken items have won people's hearts over. This place serves quite good Tandoori dishes. We tried the Chicken Buryani, Chicken Kebab, Hyderabadi Chicken Masala and Butter Phulka. The items were prepared well. The Hyderabadi Chicken Masala tasted really well with the Phulkas. The Biryani had loads of boneless chicken pieces. All in all, this was a very good experience and can say will definitely try again. Thank you for good food served.", "While craving for biryani, got this place as recommendation on zomato.
I ordered chicken biryani, chicken Hyderabadi, butter phulka and one more chicken starter.
The yummiest biryani I have had lately. The chicken was so soft and the biryani so flavour full. Would recommend for sure. Absolutely worth a try. And I'm sure this place is going to be on your ordering list too."]

address: 189, Ground Floor, 4th Main, 3rd Stage, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery,
reviews:
['Have placed order for kabuli chana Rice bowl
Taste-Good
Quantity-Average
packaging-Good
Overall average experience, Rice quantity should be more.
Suggestion:- Increase 25 gm rice qty.', "Ordered Alfredo chicken spaghetti pastaüëé
It looked good, good packing, huge quantity, but taste was HORRIBLE. I felt it was very blank. No taste and bread was worse.
I did not like it. I couldn't even finish half.

Ok after seeing the review. They did replace with another pasta and that was much better and had more veggies but still taste was bad", "This was the first time I tried food from this joint and had Mutton Biryani. To be frank and honest, it wasn't good at all and when I raised the concern, not zomato but the restaurant owner himself got back to me and assured that something went wrong with my order. To my amazement, he not only refunded to whole amount but offered a free meal like whatever I'd like to try further. That's quite a genuine customer centric approach and I admire that.

It's not always the food that sets an eating joint apart but the service that comes with it. Something might go wrong with the preparation as we all are just humans but rectification of the same matters.

In the recent times, I've tried their Chicken and Mutton Curry and both the times I was disappointed. Chicken was undercooked and mutton smelled and tasted stale. It was bad and I would like to have a word from the restaurant's end on this as they are charging 200+ for their main course items."]

reviews:
['This place is located on the Main Street of Jeevan Bhima nagar

Had veg pizza combo that came with oreo shake, veg cheese pizza, potato wedges... Doesn't cost more..."]

address: 1647/1, 2nd Floor, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ['', '', 'The place looks bad from the outside and from the inside. The food is bad, except for prawn fry.\nThe service is bad as well, even if there is very less crowd.', '', '', '', 'Ordered through Swiggy last Sunday. One of the items was beef curry meals. Except my mom, the rest of my family had a bit of the beef curry. By Monday morning, all of them including me had food poisoning. The worst part was that my family was traveling back to Kerala on Sunday night. They were on the bus when it hit them. Needless to say, it was horrible. The beef was probably expired or undercooked.', 'Decent Kerala food in Jeevan bhima nagar. We usually try beef fry and porotta here, however a bit costly compare to other places in indiranagar.', 'At last I found one Best place for Kerala food ..we had Kerala parota, appam n chicken kurma, it was too good. Friendly staff, ambience is ok (average).']

address: 13 Opposite Domlur Bus Depot, Domlur, Bangalore
cuisines: North Indian, South Indian, Chinese, Fast Food, Beverages, Desserts, Street Food
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', '**This place serves Jain main course dishes**

I ordered Paneer Butter Masala, Kaju Masala (Jain), Kulcha, Roti and Laccha Parantha. 

The menu is a bit expensive but the taste is good and the Laccha Paranthas are what one should aim for rather than Roti / Kulcha while ordering online as the Laccha Parantha is still chewable but not the same case with the other two. 

KAJU MASALA (Jain) was really good though!', 'This is a great place to try not only south Indian dishes, but also you can try different north Indian dishes as well. Table dosa might be a good option to try, or Pav-Bhaji here is also very delicious.', 'My comfort place to try out South Indian breakfast. Menu is bit pricey as compared to others but taste is great. They should reboot the place soon.', 'Nothing spectacular. Good hygienic food. Fast and friendly service. Value for money. We did not go here expecting 5 star experience. This place gets the job done.', 'In banagalore you will find sagar restuarant wjere ever you go. This chains of outlet which serves pure veg only. 

Ambience is old classic one. Its a pure karanataka style restaurant. You will get authentic karanataka meals.', 'Good for snacks and lunch. The service is not so impressive. Average quality and quantity. Location is just off the main road. Priced little on the higher side', 'Shanti Sagar has been our favorite south Indian restaurant for 8 years now and we visit once a while with family. Location is right opposite to Domlur bus stand & Food is yum as they invest a lot in quality.

Tip to Management : Please try your staffs to be little more polite. :)', 'Had breakfast here with a friend, visiting the place after almost 9 years and neither the place nor the food have changed. All items breakfast items on the menu are good and serve their purpose of providing you with a good cost effective South Indian breakfast the coffee is good and is worth a special mention.', 'Worst service. I waited for 5 mins and was looking for the waiter everywhere to place the order for breakfast. Ordered Idly, Vada, Coffee. I was really surprised when the bill arrived. It was Rs. 110. A normal AC restaurant will be cheaper than this non AC worst service restaurant. Very expensive and ok ok taste. The water tumbler was very dirty.']

address: House 18, 10th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['', 'Ok', 'I would give it a 3.5/5.
A small chat shop on the main road which offers you yummy chats in this area. A variety of chats, samosa, aloo, kachori They have gol gappas, lassi, paratha and home style thali as well. Kulhad chai and Garma garam jalebis!', "It's a small eatery on the main road and it's quite easy to locate.
The food is yum and the service is pretty quick.
Personally though, VCH doesn't have anything that you wouldn't otherwise find at other places, I don't feel there's anything that I could say is best made at this VCH.", "Chat shop in neighbourhood. okay taste. not very good hygiene. Good for school couples hanging out, maybe. Not sure.\xa0
It's self service, tiny place could accommodate 8-10 people. Can try once. Better options available nearby.", 'Had masala puri at chat place - it was just average. Puri was soggy, not crispy, some where burnt as well. Only the chana masala was good although not spicy enough.', 'Normally this place I visit when I want Aaloo paratha and tea at breakfast. it is cost effective place.\xa0
Food-3/5,\xa0
Ambience- 2/5,\xa0
Service -4/5
                                                foodavengersblog.blogspot.com', 'Heard a lot about this place but its not worth at all in any sense.. no seating arrangement no ambience nothing.. with respect to food i ordered chole tikki which was priced at 45 for one tikki and the taste was pathetic. Overall its a pricey and worthless place both in terms of quality and quantity.', "Excellent Pani Puri (everything from the Puri to the pani to the masala to the meetha was near perfect), very good Raj Kachori (just about the right tanginess and mix of flavors) and good Tikki Chat.

I'm definitely returning!", 'The place is an average snacks place in this neighborhood..the food is basic and does not offers any extraordinary experience. But one should definitely try the kullad tea and jalebi which is somewhat better than any other nearby restaurants.
Food-3.5/5, ambience- 2/5, service -3/5']

reviews:
['A place with good ambience and a really good scenic rooftop. Nicely prepared food and very cooperating staff. Good options available for vegetarians and good collection of drinks available.', 'This place is getting a single star only for the worst behaviour of the waiters and the cashier sitting in the top floor. The cashier is a cheater who is always trying to hike the price in the bill thinking the guests are drunk. To cover it up, he accuses us that we call names to their waiters etc etc...There are many better places around. Don‚Äôt go to this place!', 'Very affordable and a good place to unwind. The bar menu is good and light on the pocket and the same can be said about the food too. Lovely egg chilly.', 'Nice ambience and good quality and tasty food and variety choices at very reasonable price. Go for it if you love boosing. Enjoy this place!', 'Comparetively it‚Äôs a good place to Hangover at the surrounding place worthy and Fits to your pocket party üéà. Good ambience well maintained cleanliness and Well groomed Employees. Service of the speed is good.', 'Very much pocket friendly . food also good .enjoyed with colleagues .Nice place to hang out in a limited budget .Try once u fell the same .cheers', 'Food - Another place in Indhiranagar with great value for money.\xa0

Service and Ambience - Went to the second floor here (family restaurant). The staff here are polite and helpful.', 'Absolute value for money place. Liquor is very reasonably priced and you get sealed quarter bottles. Food is good although a bit spicy. There is a slight delay in service though.', 'What a place to have biriyani. Had mutton biriyani at this place and it was simply amazing and they served about 4-6 mutton pieces which were absolutely tender and yummy. And the biriyani was really good in terms of masala and all. I have been to this place twice and would love to visit again. And this place had a waiting on Sunday lunch time which shows how good this place is.

Ambiance is very good on top floor.\xa0

Would recommend all to visit.', 'This is one of the affordable and decent bar and restaurants to go out with friends near Indiranagara. The interiors and the ambience is good. The food is also good and the service is excellent. Dishes to try out are mushroom & gobi chilly.']

reviews: ['', "Disappointed. Have visited it once and ordered food. After around 20 minutes, they come up and say, they can't serve it. Almost half of the menu is not serviceable. address: 8, HAL 3rd Stage, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I stumbled upon this place during my first week in Bangalore while I was house hunting. I stopped for a chai and snack and ended up trying 7-8 different items, they were that good.', 'Tried a Sunday lunch after going through the reviews. Lunch couldn‚Äôt impress me even the beef fry which I ordered separately.
As reviews speaks a lots on their snacks, I will certainly try next time.', 'A regular at this place for the last one year. 

They open at about 11 in the morning and close by about 8/9 in the evening. 

They are known for their delicious Kerala snacks. At any point of time during the day, you will have 7 to 8 varieties of Kerala snacks to choose from. Right from the usual Banana Fry, Masala Vada , Veg Cutlet, Onion Vada, Bread Pakoda, Sugiyan to the not so common Elanji, Ela ada, Pazham Pattari etc. These and tea/coffee/lemon tea is available through out the day. 

During lunch hours, you also get biryani and Kerala meals wrapped in banana leaf. They also have Dosa, Porotta, Appam along with chicken and veg curries. But all these are served in limited quantities and get over very fast. 

Waiting for them to start serving non veg snacks.', "Place with huge varieties of Kerala snacks... I have tried each and every snack of Thattukada it's mouth smacking...Banana fitter is one of my favourite..my day cannot end without having it...must try", 'The traditional style kerala snacks and samaver tea.

Thattudosa n chicken curry
Appam with vegetable stew
And special item Banana Filled with cocunut(pazham nerachathl', 'This place is just at the right place in New Thippasandra Main Road market. This place is seven days packed and pulls the crowd belonging to all age groups. You can customise your beverage and dig into lip-smacking snacks. They also serve hearty meals for lunch. I love this place for two reasons: you can find interesting strangers to converse and feel the essence of Kerala in every breath you take. There is a long list of food they serve and trust me when I say each dish is better than the other.
Thattukada is an unmatchable experience as is the staff working there!']

address: 92/1, 2nd Cross, Cambridge Road, Ulsoor, Bengaluru
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'Happy to find a budget friendly and tasty Aththo nearby my home in Bangalore. People who love Aththo from Paris corner, Chennai and Mohan anna\xa0kadai from Tanjavur, this place is for you. Typical Street food taste and adequate quantity for\xa0a person. If you are planning to have Aththo post 7:30PM, better call once and start from your place. They start serving from noon 2 PM. Do not take your car here. No space for parking here. 3 - 4 bikes can fit in around the shop. They give you extra spice flavour\xa0if you want. Importantly Aththo comes with Plantain soup only as usual. So, no need to pay extra for it. Very friendly staffs and they are from Tamil Nadu, so they know tamil really well. Not handy with other languages though. So, please be mindful on that as well. I was in terrible hunger so could not take snaps, kindly excuse on that. Anyways there are enough snaps taken and posted already by other review members.', 'The hotel is maintained neatly and price is reasonable. Their south Indian food items tastes quite good . Yet to try their Burmese food as they only serve Burmese food after 6 PM and we were in early during our visit. The staff were courteous and patient in serving.', 'The food was tasty,I ordered for atho and I got it in time.........................

I suggest my friends to try this Burmese food hotel ......

great going.......', 'Definitely a good place to visit if Ur a Burmese food lover. Retired veg atho , soupy noodles n plantain soup all was good. Compared to Chennai taste was bit less. But in Bengaluru getting the food itself a great thing.', 'An excellent authentic Myanmarese joint near Halasuru Metro station. To visit, take the first left lane after station towards Trinity Circle. Landmark: opposite the Rath parking unfinished structure.

Ordered prawns sejo and sejo masala. Both were spot on authentic. The prawns sejo was crunchy and moist at the same time, just as it should be. It came accompanied by fish soup with caramelized Onions floating on top. Delicious.

Masala sejo was good but not great. I believe it needed more character to stand out. But delicious nevertheless.

This restaurant punches far above its weight. It serves authentic Myanmarese cuisine at cheap prices. Will I come back? A resounding yes!', 'Truly continental for burmis food. Indian dishes tastes similar to home food. I ate south Indian meals and chicken atho. Dishes are very cheap.', 'After long time having Atho. I wondered will Rangoon hotel will prepare it in usual way or different but they meet my expectations. Awesome food. Go for it.']

address: 4, HAL, 2nd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I had the worst experience here wherein there was some confusion with the membership...even after calling 3 times and confirming the membership policy, it was never communicated properly.....the policies changed after ordering and collecting the cake...when called to clarify the same the person I spoke to was really rude....I just trying to give feedback about the experience....but the person was rude...the service was really bad....there was a lot of communication cap between them and towards the customer....but keeping the service aside the cake was amazing....they are good at what they do but service atleast from this branch was a real disappointment. Would recommend dbc from just bake...but would not recommend this branch.', "Won't say that it sells the best cakes, but they are good, especially if you are looking for different flavours. Can be marked as overpriced, especially if you are buying a single pastry or tart. Had taken a black current cake and a chocolate cake, and they tasted nice. Good but not great.", "I bought a black Forrest cake from here. I didn't pre order and picked it up directly at the store. What has happened to your standards? Where is cake in the cake? It's full of icing only. This was not how your products used to be. We bought a cake and you literally sold only icing. Disappointing. I would better buy from amma's pastry, at a cheaper price. I paid 400 for a half kg icing. I would like to get a better cake from you next time.", 'I ordered chocolate cake for my colleagues birthday, order got accepted and payment was done online , I ordered at 2 pm in noon, there was no contact number provided it was just showing your order is on the way. I waited in office till 6 pm , but cake didn‚Äôt arrive , it ruin d up my colleagues birthday plan. All of a sudden I get message that cake has been delivered. I don‚Äôt understood what ghost cake was it . No delivery person came neither cake . Worst of all there is no contact of delivery boy and the number is IVRS call which is of no use , such a worst experience ever had üò° after paying money online.', 'We ordered a chocolate cake for my little neice. The cake tasted good. It was packed and delivered on time. They got the writing correct as it was told. The taste could have been better with less cream and more cake. Scope for improvement but value for money. Will try again', 'I got this pure ecstasy cake from Just Bake Jeevan Bheema Nagar area and was not disappointed with the taste and design of the cake. It‚Äôs is the only bakery chain which I feel has very good products (cakes) which are budget friendly . I have been a regular customer here since my time in bangalore and it has been doing a good job . Except for the poorly maintained shop in particular to this branch. Overall a good place .', "Though Just Bake is a famous franchise in Bangalore, the same cannot be mentioned for this particular outlet. No complaints on it's location as situated in Jeevan Bhima Nagar main road.

The issue happened twice when both the times I was making advanced orders for family celebration an both the times they failed to stick to their commitment. Mentioned delivery will be at 7 but finally got those well after 10. Irritating situation is when they are not even apologetic and behaved as if it's a regular affair.

Nevertheless, Mocha Magic and Red Velvet which we ordered were fresh and delicious. But on a serious note, they need to check on their attitude.", 'This is a small cake place in Jeevan Bhima nagar main road.
We stopped by to get Red Velvet cake. I found that compared to other fancy cake places the full Red Velvet cake was cheaper here.\xa0
But be warned though the cakes are in limited supply and you may not find your favourite cake when the demand is high!', 'The brownies that they are serving was the best dessert I had in indiranagar .I had orderrd online cake for some birthdays or Aniversery 4 or 5 times from here.
Staff behavior can be improved', "While the 'chocolate temptation' was a good pastry to have .. soft and adequately sweet.. the butterscotch pastry was a bad choice. It was dry and over sweet! Service was so so.."]

address: 97, 2nd Main, Royal Orchid Road, Amarjyoti Layout, Domlur, Bangalore

reviews:
['As name suggest, being Allahabadi best place to have Ghar ke jaisaaa khaana. Place is not so decorative as others restaurants/eateries in Bangalore are, but food is perfect Allahabadi.', 'Worst hygiene... Chappatis are good, kadhai Panner is good... Panner used sometimes is like rubber... Service is quite good... Slowly the quality has decreased.', "Food quality was not upto mark.
Packing is worst.
Even the delivery time taken was too long.

Experience is not good at all. Please don't order from this Restaurant.", 'I ordered Paneer Biryani and Veg Meal from this place through Uber Eats. It was delivered within time. The packaging was below than average and so was the taste. Even portions were smaller as compared to others. Paneer biryani was packed in cardboard container and was served with watery curd. It tasted below than average. Veg meal had 4 small sized rotis, chhole curry, daal, aloo chokha, curd, rice, onion salad and papad. It tasted average. Overall I had below than average experience ordering from this place even after good discounts from Uber Eats.

Packaging - 2/5

Food - 2/5

Delivery - 4/5

Value for Money - 3/5

Overall - 2.5/5', 'Pathetic food. We ordered Thali from this place and only food edible was chapati and sabji, rest everything was sad. Dal was like water and choley curry was half boiled masala water. Do try out this place if you want to spoil your stomach. :D', 'I have ordered food few times from here just going by the name and also seeing the cheap Prices.
I Tried their Special thali, Aaalu Paratha and Gobi Manchurian.

Gobi Manchurian was pathetic as it smelled like it was made in spoiled oil. Aalu Paratha was decent in taste and size but nothing specific to review about.\xa0 Veg Thali had good daal and curry and Roti was prepared nicely and this thali was only thing i liked here.

Price was this is really decent place to order food from but only specific items.
                                                verdictbyme.in', "It deserves minus rating!!

One of the worst place,!!
If u really wanted to spoil ur taste when ur hungry this could be the best place for u.

Ordered poori plate and badam milk(not a milk it's A WATER)

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!
How swiggy and UBER EATS allowed such cheap place to do business they even dnt know what they are actually preparing .......", "Ordered 1 piece each of Aloo paratha, Onion paratha, Mooli paratha & Paneer paratha for breakfast through Uber eats. To my surprise, I realised that my hostel/pg's stuffed parathas' were far far better than these! Because the parathas' which I got from here had close to 0 stuffing. I'm pretty sure paneer got finished at restro by the time our order came because none of my paratha had paneer. And aloo, onion, mooli were almost finished so got little stuffing of that and rest everything was aata(wheat dough)..with thickness like Punjabi paratha or so. And that too at certain places, uncooked dough too. Totally disappointed!", 'I ordered parathas from this place. I ordered aloo paratha and paneer paratha from this place. The delivery was done right on time. The parathas were good.', 'I order food from uber eats.I order a veg Thali and a paneer labadar,really I love the food and the taste is good like home. I defenatly try more variety again.its pocket friendly also.']

address: House 18, 10th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore

reviews: ['I had ordered twice from here. Both the times I had ordered 5 Ghee chapattis and Fry Bhindi and both the times they were perfect in delivering the order which was readily available, be it anything. They dont care about what you are ordering and inspite of unavailability they are quick in accepting the order, only to deliver wrong items.', 'Worst kind of consistency. You get good food before 2:00 pm after that\xa0 if you order evening food , god bless you,\xa0 they might be serving some 2 days old Dal. I\xa0 will recommend if you want to improve your immunity , order evening food. And one more thing, it is useless to give them feedback on 99720 19567. Super smart system, It is one sided system smartly taken care of. After boosting immunity , it makes you strong pyschologically to prepare yourself food in night. Great way to get rid of laziness and get into gear.', 'Pathetic... do not know how to address the waste of money, time. ordered online some time back. Dal makhani was stale. they served so less quantities - just 2 tea spoons of rajma with thalis. please stop making fools of customers.', 'A pathetic service they provide. Have ordered food and it has been delivered in 2 hours. No one pick the phone there, rather they will cut the phone every time you call them. Definitively not going to recommend to anyone and not going to order anymore from here.', 'Methi Paratha! It couldn‚Äôt worse than what is prepared at this restaurant. address: HASB Khata 675/555, 10th Cross, Behind Airtel Office, Next To Ganesha Temple, New Thippasandra, Thippasandra
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', "Snack'ups in our start up hub, Bangalore. Good tasty food. Great rime pass, momo's are good. Pocket Friendly. Fun place to hangout with buddies. Fine location.", 'Decent snack choice place with minimalist ambience..
Nothing fancy... But worth for money

Recommendations:
Chicken cheese burger
Veg momos
Oreo shake

Cleanliness can be improved', 'Burger bread was properly backed.. Extremely Tasteless Burger.. Waste of. Money', "Ordered a chicken momo and there was literally no chicken in it ..they were just peices of steamed dough ...pathetic food ...just because the food can't be returned does not mean u make a fool out of people", 'juice was not up to the mark', 'I wasn‚Äôt sure if I would like ordering from here, based on the variance in their menu I gave it a shot.
Ordered via Zomato for a Peri peri fries, Sweetcorn Sandwich, Veg fried momos and a paneer burger.

The food was packed super neatly and was delivered on time.
Since it was hot mostly the base of sanwich and burger was a little damp.

Peri Peri Fries
The masala topped on the fries enhanced the taste, it was good.

Momos
It was fried to perfection, it was good. I really liked it, best when it‚Äôs consumed hot.

Sandwich
Usually sanwiches are boring, this was interesting, chopped onions, cucumber, tomato, bell pepper and sweetcorn made the sandwich very tasty.

Paneer Burger
The burger had two patties of fried paneer, the burger was good too.

It adds a lot of value for the money you pay, I ordered all this and it was about 270bucks. They also send you some sorta chutney sorts which had groundnuts, it also had ketchup sachets and watery mayo.', 'Good', 'Excellent taste.. Snickers shake was too good. Sandwich was also tasty. We ordered the food from zomato. It was delivered on time and happy with the taste..', 'approx more than 1 hour late delivered to me']

address: 236, 7th Main, Amarjyothi Layout, Near Hero Show Room, EGL Block Gate, 100ft Road, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
reviews:
['Restaurant is not that clean. Food is good. Price not justifiable. Service is average. They do not serve a simple side dish like omelette. Not coming here for a second visit for sure.', 'I ordered panner biryani combo which included biryani, starter and soft drink, but I was shocked when only biryani was delivered although the restaurant charged me for combo. Very much disappointed with the service of restaurant', "Zero on fanciness. No hanging lights, weirdly shaped tables or artistry on display. Its a simple restaurant. You climb the stairs and reach a small, closed restaurant with a bunch of tables and chairs arranged. But what peaks your interest is their food. Their food is so delicious you'd want to order the same set again, though you are filled up! The pricing is above the average rate but they did not compromise on the quality and quantity. What we had is chappati and chicken kohlapuri, just because we wanted to try something unique. They have a limited breads menu but wealthy in chicken and muttun currys.
If you're ever around Domlur or Embassy buildings, try Bharanis. :)", 'Went there for lunch with a colleague. The place has a very simple setting. Nothing fancy. Ordered chicken briyani and mutton briyani. The chicken briyani tasted really good. The mutton briyani seemed to be just chicken briyani with mutton gravy on top. The mutton gravy was ok. The quantity is quite large. The price is acceptable for the quantity they provide.', "Bharani hotel is right next to embassy golf link, walk able distance from my office. Loved the non veg meals, there chicken fry and chicken curry was awesome. Even the mutton biriyani was good although we found some chicken pieces in mutton biriyaniüòÄ,the food is costly. The non veg meals was about 280rs but you will have an satisfaction of having a mini buffet kind of feeling. If you work nearby don't miss this place, right behind Pot biriyani it is.", 'When I usually give a 4 star. The place and food needs to meet my expectations. Unfortunately they are placed where customers would never think of looking. But the food is something where it makes up for the ambience and service. You will end up really satisfied and happy.', "The meal didn't come with sweet.", 'Lol guys the biryani and the starters are bought from pot biryani restaurant..... They both are in partnership.... In case of u wanna have meals then bharanis chicken biryani and stuff. POT BIRYANI
BHARANI EXPOSED', 'Quantity is low, quality is just fine', "Taste - 3/5, Ambience - 2/5, Service - 3/5, Value for money - 2/5

We were looking for any low cost andhra mess for a quick meal and found this place. This is very close to EGL. We were two people and straightly ordered 2 Veg meals.\xa0

Taste is average, don't compare to the Nandhana, Nandhini or Nagarjunas... Though their price range is similar to these restaurant chains. Green Pappu is average not to the level expected in an andhra style, appalam was smaller size, rice quality was good

Ambience - It is andhra mess kind of setup, don't expect restaurant kind of environment

Service - It is fine, they were responsive and served 2nd servings of pappu, veg porial whenever asked

Value for money - Very high on par with up-scale andhra restaurants. One meal is 160 rupees.

I was looking for andhra mess, though it feels like mess they charge like restaurant.
                                                jpfoodplanet.blogspot.com"]

['Chicken soup and chicken kabab is very tasty and whenever you go to 6th main HAL 2nd Stage please visit shanmukha..you will enjoy the food:)', "If you're at home and wanting to grab some good Andhra style biriyani, after meghana, I prefer shanmukha. Quantity (family pack) is poor. Chicken pieces below par. Shanmukha has a long way to go. ZoDelivery is bang on as usual.", 'Me and my friends had been to this place for lunch as this is very close to my college.

We ordered dragon paneer, baby corn pepper dry, butter naan, paneer butter masala, veg hyderabadi dum briyani.

Everything was sooo yummy but the briyani was supper tasty. We also ordered gulab jamoon it was heavenly.', 'Heard a lot about biryani from this place from my friend, so while I was in old airport Rd I definely wanted to try it out.

Ordered chicken biryani from here, the biryani was full of flavour and had a very nice aroma.

Portion size also was equally good.

It was indeed a very nice experience.', 'food was delicious', 'Prawns special biryani was found none apart from the shanmukha.

It is very very near to my place and so I get all my food on time with nice packaging and hot food. The prawns were also fresh and tasty.', 'The ghee rice and the baby corn masala was the order I made from the shanmukha. This ghee rice was like home made rice and so I liked to order from here.

The corn masala can also be a main course sabji I just came to know from shanmukha only.']

address: 1 & 2, Anjaneya Complex, Kodihalli, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Starving since afternoon I was scouting for some good places to eat...Then I went inside this place and that everything was out of stock, overpriced and poor service. Don't waste your time here. Thank me later...I just saved your pocket. xD", "Whenever I have visited this place, it's mostly isolated. I guess they are much into home delivery. It's just a speculation. I have tasted chicken and egg katti roll here and I am never disappointed. That's all folks I can share.", 'I have been there for freinds get together. There is nothing attractive about ambience. We have ordered chicken fried rice, schezwan noodles, chicken manchurian and veg fried rice. Apart from chicken manchurian everything was bad. Schezwan noodles was not even looking like a schezwan. Please improve the taste and the quality.', "I came to Bangalore in 1991. MAC fast food on Church Street was one of the first 'Fast Food' outlets in Bangalore, Indiana and Lake View being the others. At that young age when fast food was a rage, their chicken katti rolls, pizzas and shakes left an undeniable mark on me.\xa0
Fast forward two decades, the MAC fast food on Old Airport Road is hop skip and jump from where I work. I visit this place purely for the nostalgia. Its uncanny how they continue to retain the same smells and tastes. Other eateries have upped their game and have got ahead of MAC fast food, but I continue to remain loyal to this place. Of the many branches they used to operate, only this branch and the one in Safina plaza, Infantry road continue to operate (atleast I hope so).
Among Bangalore's increasing number of restaurant, pubs and micro-breweries, I hope this endangered and nearing extinction, fast food joint continues to survive.", "I don't know why this outlet is often neglected! We were very hungry and we were searching for food corners, there were many outlets nearby but none of them were as satisfying as Mac fast food! Food was good and worth of what we had spent! They had tables and chairs to sit which was missing in nearby outlets and which is more famous than Mac fast food!", 'If anything below 1 was there would have given that worst food.... Feeling like wasting my internet and phones battery to write review..And now I have to write atleast 140 bad words to post a review', 'worst services worst food worst ice cream ever.
please never try to waste money in high profile hotel.
wo khehate hain na ucchi dukan fikka pakwaan.', 'The place is located in prime location but the folks who run this place seem poised to serve you stumptuous quantities of bad food that will have after effects. The menu is big, presentation and quantity are good too. Most of the food tastes bland and on a average cause some discomfort later. Being a vegan I cant comment on non veg, but u doubt it will be any better going by the headcount', 'Being there during office hour. No rush, average food. Ok delivery time of food. Nothing more than ordinary. Good for silent chit-chating with someone.', 'This is one of the place which is normally missed by anyone because of its location and placement.. 

They were first situated at church street few year before and now they move to anjaneya techno park, old airport road.. Ref: near diamond district..

They are part of Mac hotel and they serve quick bites like sandwiches, noodles, shakes, Burgers, etc..

Quantity and quality is just very good.. And worth the price.. 
So if you are hungry and finding place near old airport road, specially near diamond district or leela palace to suit your pocket..
Just go for it.. 

Else you have other option nearby to this : Anand sweets..']

They serves hot and spicy.', 'Ordered chicken kabab biryani combo it was good coke was not cold it was warm but still need to improve best off luck serve me best biryani in my next order this time it was average üôÇ', "Ambur hot dum biryani
I place the order for home delivery
22 chicken biryani & 1 Veg biryani
That all biryani no test its wrist biryani
Hi put some red chilli powder in biryani
It's test less,
We never order again.", "This place is absolutely the worst ! Their chicken biriyani is possibly the worst tasting garbage that I've had in the name of biriyani, ever ! There are no spices whatsoever in the biriyani, unless of course you consider mounds of salt thrown in to flavor the otherwise insipid rice. The rice itself is of the lowest quality, with a coarse texture and a repulsive odor.
Coming to the chicken, its more a gnarled pile of half chewed bones. You feel so repulsed and nauseated by this unsightly mess, that you'll actually skip a few sessions of usually welcome meat fuelled debauchery after having laid your eyes on it.
To reiterate, it is utter and complete G-A-R-B-A-G-E disguised as food and unless you're the proud owner of a self-destructive streak or majorly intrigued by the concept of dumpster-diving.....KEEP AWAY ! No amount of discounts can justify sliding this steaming pile of crap down your gullet !", 'quantity is very less', 'value for money']

address: M9, 6th Main, LIC Colony, Sector 10, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes, Outdoor Seating,
reviews: ["Though it might seem a little small, the cute interiors add a good vibe to the place.\rDropped by in the afternoon for a quick peek. Was disappointed in seeing that there weren't a lot of varieties on display as I expected.\rPicked up a chocolate cupcake and a red velvet truffle cake (not sure about the name.\rAnd this is all I have to say - THE BEST CHOCOLATE CUPCAKE I'VE EATEN! :D\rIt was super moist and so chocolaty - just melts in your mouth! \rThe red velvet cake was yummy too but I didn't like the aftertaste of the white chocolate ( I think) that was on top.\rThe prices seemed are a bit on the higher side.\rBut I'm definitely going to come back for those killer cupcakes! :D", "Right from the moment i opened the door n stepped in, the warmth of the store and the owner engulfed me. The store is Sandhya's dream and the love she puts into each of those cakes n macaroons is evident from the taste. \nI would definitely come next time to taste their hot chocolate, which i missed last time.", 'The first thing that caught my attention at this store was the warm welcome I got by the owner. The store had many varieties of pastries and cupcakes and I couldnt decide what to taste..and finally i settled with "Melting Moments". They just melted away in my mouth and into my heart. I fell in love with the store and all its pastries. Do not miss out on "Nirvana" , an eggless pastry which according to me is the best pastry I\'ve ever had till date.', "Finally I reached here....  As I got there I was given a warm welcome by the owner.....  So I see what is there and I wanted to have everything..  I tried the melting moments- it's exactly what the name says. The macaroons were splendid. The chocolate cake (eggless) gave a kick of its own. The merengue was also amazing... \nIn all the experience was totally yummy-licious!!!"]

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Ordered appam, swear to gawd. It ruined the affinity toward the dish in it's entirety.

The delay in service can be in termed in light years. 


When to go here? Never.", 'Too suffocating, unorganised , worst fish curry I ever had', "It's a awesome restaurant and I would recommend this place because you will get some continental fusion food in affordable price, it's very good experience.", 'The restaurant only had some appam, rice, porotta, chapathi served with chicken curry or prawns and they are served as combos. Which will cost about 70 rupees and nothing shown in the pictures. 
I ordered white rice and prawns chilly. It was tasteless and the prawns did not have the masala or salt in it.  The rice was overcooked. 
They said they have something called as non alcoholic beer however the staff even forgot about the order and we didnt bother to remind them either.
Overall the experience and the food was a disappointment. I would not go there again nor I would recommend it to anyone.']

address: 17/1 Cambridge Road, Opposite The Frank Antony School, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['good job!', 'This was a beautiful little find in my way home from a long evening walk. Since this place was new I did notice it before. Always love a great paratha. 

Ambience: (3/5)
This is not the ideal place to sit and leisurely eat. It‚Äôs most of a need based dinning. There are two tables/chairs where one can sit down. The place is kept relatively clean. 

Food: (5/5)
Absolutely loved the parathas. Firstly many of the Parathas here costs like 50 INR. These are the conventional ones. I got the aloo and the Palak paratha. Both were incredible. Loved first how big each of them were. The stuffing was also generous by the owner. Also loved how it was allowed to cook so well. The flavours were great 

Summary: (5/5)
Great place to grab a quick bite or ideally a great place to order some fantastic food home. Recommended.', 'Perfectly cooked and well stuffed paranthas. Order today! Properly balanced in spices and economical with the oil. Accompanying chutney is a welcome surprise :)', "Delivery was spot on. I had ordered 2 parathas, 1 aloo pyaj and 1 manchurian cheese.. Both the parathas tasted good and totally value for money if you're looking for quick bite which can be fulfilling as well!!"]

address: B-104, Purva Paradise, 3rd Main, 7th Cross, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Cream and Bakes is a home-based bakery and desserts parlour run by a sister duo. Currently they operate out of two kitchens one in Domlur and the other one in Basaveshwara Nagar. They work on a pure home delivery model where you can get delicious cupcakes, tarts, cakes, muffins and so on right at your doorsteps. I happen to try a bunch of their items from this Domlur outlet. The products were neatly packed.

address: 314/1, 3rd Main, 7th Cross, Domlur Layout, Domlur
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Food - 3.5
Ambiance - 3.0
Service - 4.0
Value for money - 4.0

The place is just a month old. They have 2 time slots from 12pm-3pm and 7pm-10pm. They have a stall outside where you can stand and eat and they also have a pretty good seating area that can hold about 20-30 people.
They have some good non veg options as well.

I ordered the dosa with chicken curry. They have this policy where they give you an extra does only if you sit inside.
The chicken curry was good. It was prepared in a Mangalorean style so it had some rich coconut taste to it. It went well with their dosas.

I can't say that the place is completely hygienic coz I found baby cockroaches on the table where I was sitting. Other than that, the service is good and they are quite courteous."]

["Myself and my Colleague been to this place for lunch, we tried tandoori chicken, Kadi murgh, butter Naan and roti, taste of Tandoori chicken was good, but didn't serve any chutney with it, Kasai chicken was average,
Food. -2.5

Value for money. - 3
Overall. -3", 'Visited on a weekday evening. The place was mostly empty. Ordered romali roti and hyderabadi chicken.

Pros:
The place was decent and clean considering the price.
The waiter was really friendly.
Service was quick.
The dishes are quite cheap.

Cons:
The hyderabadi chicken was just average and was surprisingly a green gravy( not gongura though ).
The chicken was hard and rubbery.', "Food - 2.5
Ambiance - 2.5
Service - 3.5
Value for money - 3.5

Seating area is too narrow and suffocating. Wouldn't recommend to dine in when it's too crowded. You have to place an order downstairs and then enter the seating area upstairs. If you just want to grab a roll then they just make it right in front of you, downstairs and you can eat while standing out.

They've got quite a few items on their menu but after I ate one roll I decided not to try anything else. I had a chicken roll, the rumali roti didn't even feel like it was rumali. It looked pretty dead and tasted just okay. Nothing too great about the chicken inside it either.

The service was ok, nothing too great.", "So I recently visited this restaurant..it's newly opened I guess..we ordered chicken tikka biriyani, chilli chicken biriyani and lime juice..the quantity was sufficient enough and the chicken pieces were soft and juicy..overall a good experience!"]

address: 413, Ground Floor, 7th Cross, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', "Food - 3.5
Ambiance - 3.0
Service - 3.5
Value for money - 3.0

Heard a lot about this place from my colleagues so I decided to give it a try. It had another board out front called chickenation right next to it so I was a bit confused as to where in the building Sbarro was. Turns out they share the same space. Seating area is VERY limited, maybe to about 10-15 people or so and even that seems like a stretch. They have very few staff as well. I ordered the chicken pepperoni regular pizza with a side of garlic bread and cheesy jalapeno dip. The garlic bread along with the dip was a killer combo and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The chicken pepperoni pizza was also pretty good and cheesy, it's base was thick, juicy and soft. I felt like it could have been a bit bigger for 160 rupees which is a bit disappointing. The service was excellent. The staff, courteous. All in all a good experience, and a great place to try some pizza if you're bored of Domino's and Pizza hut.", 'Hi, I am extremely disappointed with kind of service provided. I ordered for pizza, garlic bread along with jalape√±o dip through Zomoto order(order no 1580747670). Order was delivered after 75 minutes. They haven‚Äôt delivered jalape√±os dip and soft drink. Delivery guy has no clue. Garlic bread was over fried and not in a state for human consumption. Pls see the attached snap of it.

I wonder how blatantly it was served? Zomato order has no clue of it and they do not have any customer service number', 'Ive had pizzas from NY and was excited to order this! Got a 6" pepperoni..Was Ok tasting but way over priced for the tiniest of pizza... Felt more like a glorified snack for over 450/- ... not worth it. There's far better options for pizzas these days so Sbarro would need better pricing and value for money to grab the Indian attention.', 'sss', "The pizza was good. It was served warm but they didn't have plates. The garlic bread was burnt and not cheesy enough. They didn't have hot sauce either.", "Wasn't a new york style pizza. It was just a normal pan pizza", 'Pasta was too spicy. The Sbarro Pizza we get in the mall is much better.', "The garlic bread was burnt and the pizza was extremely cold and the crust was bland and over cooked. I hope they improve over time but for now it's beyond help"]

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Opened in March last year this joint is a small version of Mary Cafe that's on the Thippasandra main road near the Durga Temple. Their menu is almost similar serving South Indian fast food (Idly & Dosa items) and Chinese preparations. The quality is always maintained and their charges are very reasonable. I'm a regular to this place and have been eating their food since the day they opened up the shop. Inside, the place is setup neatly with few tables and they have done a good job with the interiors.

To give an idea, chili chicken and fried rice for one would cost between 110 to 150.

All in all, a nice place with good enough food with little pinch to pocket."]

reviews:
["*My rating is 3.5 but Zomato doesn't allow decimals* Today I ordered Pan Fried Chicken Momo and Pan Fried Chilli Fish from this shop through Swiggy. Both the dishes were good and was kind of impressed with them. But although 10 pieces of momo were supposed to be given, only 8 came and the Pan Fried Chilli Fish was a little salty but tasty none the less. I am thinking of trying other things from this store now.", 'Delivered after 2.5 hrs', "I can't imagine why this place has such low ratings. I'm giving it a 5 star not after ordering once or twice but 4 times. Each time the food has been pretty good for the price. The noodles are authentic and the rice is small just like it's supposed to be in chinese cuisine. 

The delivery has always been prompt and in time. They always call in case of any confusion e.g., dry or gravy. 

I have tried the hakka noodles, butter garlic noodles, Chicken hunan style, chilly chicken, Mix vegetables in gravy, momos and everything has been upto mark.

There are so many funny typos in the menu that you end up setting low expectations but if you just ignore that, the food will always please you.", "I had ordered chilli chicken and schezwan wings. Chilli chicken sucked harder than a black hole. It is supposed to be their popular attraction and yet the gravy falls flat on it's face. The gravy thickened after sometime leaving an impression as if flour had been mixed in it. Chicken was terrible and had blunt taste to begin and end with. Chinse food are always high on the distinct taste you get no matter what the dish is and yet this was a collosal disaster.Schezwan wings were still better compared to chilli flour chicken.

NOT RECOMMENDED.", "noodles and honey chicken great but pls don't order the chopsuey or spring rolls", 'terrible food .. soup had no taste, same for the Malay noodles .. dumplings were average', 'Very disappointing! The red and green curry tasted  like a colored water without any spices!', 'Placed an order thru Foodpanda, the order was accepted by the restaurant but it never arrived. After calling the restaurant almost after an hour, they simply said delivery issue and informed me to cancel the order. I should have checked the reviews on Zomato first, my bad.', 'quite happy with the noodles and the honey chicken 
oil was a tad much in the noodles but for the price they are good', "Very bad food if u don't know what is Thai curry then plz remove from your menu because u giving me spinach gravy instead of Thai curry

I am working in fnb service in Marriott ok. I know its not Thai curry becoz Thai means galangal pokchoi coconut milk kafir lime leaves n all thanks plz take care of your restaurant"]

address: 1, Jeevan Bhima Nagar Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table reservation required, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["I've been waiting for almost 15 minutes no staff is bothering to come and ask what's your order. And staff are cheap scums and they don't respond to any questions. Waste of time and money", 'An alright option to spend your time, food is alright, servers are friendly. Did not find anything to complaint about. Food was not amazing but not bad either.', 'I usually have the chicken biryani at Bengaluru House with their chicken green curry, which is oh so yum! 
This time around I tried out the curd rice and mutton fry combination which was also fantastic! 
A simple place with some good food - A must try!', 'Has a homely ambience and an authentic local taste forms the base of their food, which is very simple and satisfying. Sticking to the basics, and perfecting it is just as good as coming up with innovative stuff. There are very few eateries in town that nail the former, and this happens to be one of them. The prices are very very very reasonable. You could visit this place when your pockets are near empty or you just want some great traditional South Indian home made food.

Visiting again soon', 'The food items here are good both quality and quantity wise. Only problem with this restaurant is that many times some of the items will not be available. I have not ordered here via Zomato but I had ordered few times via Food Panda and most of the times after ordering they would call up and tell the ordered food items are not available and would ask me to cancel and reorder the available items. After few times I got fed up and stopped ordering via Food Apps here.', 'it was amazing experience. this is the worst biriyani i had till now. gravy is bad ,hot water is better than rasam. pure waste of money, high cost very low taste.', 'Briyani served cold at 2PM, ask them to heat it again, lot of chipped bone and few stones on it. horrible. just coriander and mint flavored rice to me.\xa0
Mutton fry, cant see any meat, full of fat layer fried and served at medium heat.', "We tried a variety of dishes at Bengaluru house and absolutely loved it! 
The donne biryani and kebabs are my top picks!
The donne biryani was perctly flavoured and paired so well with the Mutton pepper! What I liked about it was that it was light on the tummy and din't leave you feeling stuffed the whole day. And omg the kebabs were out of the world! Undoubtedly one of the best kebabs I've eaten. Soo Crispy and well flavoured üòçüòçüòç 
Thank you so much for that amazing lunch swectha! Had a great time! 
How can I forget the oreo cheesecake!! It was the perfect end to our meal! Reminded me of the oreo cheesecake spiga used to serve! Loved loved it!", "I've been to this place many times and have always had a good experience.
Mostly I've ordered dosa/ egg dosa and chicken curry for dinner and it was always good and safe on the stomach.
I've tried their chapati, Donne biryani, meals and chicken dishes which have also been good. The service is quick and staff are also courteous. On one occasion I'd ordered fish fry and after I placed the order, they were genuine enough to cancel the order because it wasn't fresh. So not sure how the fish tastes here."]

address: Lido Mall, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Mall Parking, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Tried their kulfi and new york cheesecake flavors, not so great but in this hot summer it was satisfying. They should try introducing different flavours in this season.', 'Ordered Chocolate Silk Syrup. Taste was extremely good. Packing was Attractive. Quantity was good for the price. Would Recommend this place.', 'I had gone shopping to LIDO Mall and decided to try out this outlet. I ordered vanilla fudge brownie ice cream. The ice cream was okay and not that tasty.', 'This place is highly overpriced.
Ask the rates before you order because without asking they charge you for two scoops.
Taste wise it was good but the quantity was Very little.', 'Pathetic really pathetic. Gelato was once a very good place to have some good icecream (Gelato). It was really so bad, half of the gelato kept for sale looked like it was ancient icecream preserved for centuries.', 'I took a mix of Vanilla Choco and Swiss Chocolate..
The ice was so crunchy..which I felt weird..
The texture of Swiss chocolate was creamy and smooth..', 'Strawberry Cheesecake Gelato - I dream about this flavour at night! With a little tangy taste from the strawberries and the right mix of vanilla and sugar, this is my absolute fav flavour from Gelato Italiano. Given the outlet proximity to my work place, party packs are my frequent order. Well spoken and courteous staff, this outlet might be tiny - but it definitely has kept my addiction alive!', "Had icecream here with an offer from little app. The icrecream feels different with a gel like feel to it. The taste is not bad, and yet the combination offered didn't compliment each other. Maybe they can work on that", "My sister and I were craving some ice cream and this was the first place we saw in the vicinity and decided to try it out. We tried the Chocolate Brownie Fudge and the Madagascar Fine Chocolate, both were quite creamy and melted within minutes. The first one was pretty decent; milk chocolate with fudge and walnuts, the latter one was pure dark chocolate and was too sweet to actually finish. 

On a side note, I specifically asked if both had any peanuts/walnuts in it as my sister has a severe food allergy and we were told both did not contain any when the Chocolate Brownie Fudge one actually did. Luckily I noticed it and exchanged my ice cream with hers or it would've turned out in a fatal medical emergency. We had already left from the place by then or I would've surely given the server a piece of my mind. Hope they look into this and ensure something like this never happens again. Bad experience overall, wouldn't recommend at all.", 'I have presume this gelato has recently established a working module inside the Lido.I ordered two medium scoops of Madagascar chocolate and black current to be true I expected to have a bit more bitterness of the African coco seeds but it complemented the black current very well .The balance was maintained no one flavor overpowered the other. Well placed and marketed joint it will do exceedingly well']

address: Near Ulsoor Metro Station, Vivekananda Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Panneer Butter Masala', 'Rolls', 'Chicken Roll', 'Paneer Roll', 'Tandoori Chicken', 'Naan', 'Egg Bhurji']
reviews:
["Nice good food and service best friend stuff nice amber and service best friend and it's attachments fantastic food and service best friend and", 'We visit Bhaiyyaji food court for a heavy breakfast on a weekend from time to time. We had poori subzi, jalebis and aloo Paratha. The food is decent, fresh and pocket friendly.', 'Had been here last night to get some rotis I ordered for roti with rajma and roti with panner burji. Horrible experience rajma was almost spoiled and the panner burji was too oily and salty. And they charged too much for the food tat they server. Highly Not recommended', "A place for bachelors.... Don't have high hopes before reaching there. The parathas are good...and the puri sabji is awesome... But I was unfortunate to try my hands over pav bhaji...and it was pathetic... Overall a decent place...", "I personally don't recommend going over here!!
Found a cockroach in the Pav Bhaji served over there!!
Water served in bottles is also not good!!
I am not sure if its good now..but the experience dates back to September-14!
I never dared to go even near this restaurant.\xa0
Rating is given just to enable me to publish this review!", 'Have eaten from here a few times when I did not have a cook. This is one of the dhabas of bangalore which are ideal for bachelors or anyone who needs proper roti sabji food and does not cook at home.. Have never sat there and eaten. Ambience is not great and is cramped. Generally pack it for home. Takes a little time if you order for something apart from their set menu of lunch or dinner. But the taste is good. Food looks hygienic. The rotis are proper wheat ones and are soft and nice. Also they have some chaat options apart from normal food. They have some good sweets also. Do try their aloo and paneer paratha. Really good.
Worth a try if you do not cook at home and need some home cooked food !!', 'This review was due.. good place for evening north indian snacks.. pakore, pav bhaji, some nice sweets in east india style.. since they are very near to office, we are frequent visitors..', 'Good north Indian food. Need to improve on the hygiene part. Taste has always been a plus point and would love to go their again and again.', 'Good and cheap veg food. If you go for lunch then make sure you go at a time where office people don't come otherwise you won't get any place to seat. The price is very "Preiswert" and it's lovely to have a veg restaurant for quick bites which is so cheap. The food is really good and the restaurant can be visited daily.']

address: Hilton Bangalore Embassy GolfLinks, Embassy Golf Links Business Park, Inner Ring Road, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes, Pre-Ordering Required, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Panneer Butter Masala', 'Rolls', 'Chicken Roll', 'Paneer Roll', 'Tandoori Chicken', 'Naan', 'Egg Bhurji']
reviews:
["I have had cookies and cakes from Fudgy Love several times and they are awesome.
Recently, they started delivering breakfast in and around indiranagar.\xa0
I'm not a very big fan of pancakes, but I loved the combination of pancakes and blueberry coulis. It was damn tasty. Breakfast had Pancakes + Blueberry coulis + Fruits + Double chocolate cookies, all these for just Rs. 75/- which I felt was completely worth. Give it a try if you live in and around Indiranagar.", 'The cupcake bombs, plate licking tarts, assorted cookies and the star of the show is the artisan cakes everything is so fresh and items are top notch one of the best places to drop by and with the menu constantly changing, what more can be asked‚Ä¶ jus keeeeeeeeep bakingggggg. ;-) :-)', "I'd ordered a chocolate gooey cake for my bro's b'day,  after searching for every cake shop in b'lore I settled for this place, I ordered 2 days before n d cake was ready on time, it looked amazing n it was very yummy,  thanks to vinay, you r doing an amazing job n you were a delight to talk to...", 'Great place for desserts...... if you have a sweet tongue........ must try. Goodies at reasonable price.. \xa0:):)..yummilicious.. \xa0Try out people. Strongly recommended.', 'Cookies are to die for.
Never miss.. This was an awesome experience.. Loved the taste.  Definitely a place to visit if you love theme based cakes..', 'Well if u have a passion for cakes and pastries or if u want to take your celebration to next level with designer cakes
This is the one stop shop 
The owner Ms. Vidhya is a master of these kinds of cakes.
And whats more u can learn all this in the workshops conducted in this bakery.', "Not surprised that they make some of the finest drool worthy cakes in town as you will know that they are handmade with love if you've attended any of their workshops! They most friendly neighbourhood bakers you will find... A definite choice for anyone looking for custom made cakes & bakes for their loved ones.... All at a pocket friendly price that your wallet will love... Go fudgy love", 'The pastries at fudgy love were amazing and always left me craving for more.The chocolate tart is from another planet for sure.The cookies,cup cakes and chocolates were also incredible.I am definitely looking forward to some more amazing desserts to come my way.', 'Let  me tell you what I love here. The triple chocolate mousse cake. Woowww!! I have had it thrice already. All b-day cakes go thru fudgy love! Their cookies and cup cakes are to die for!', 'Awesome Cookies and lovely theme Cakes!!!
\xa0Loved the taste and definitely a place to visit often whenever you feel to have delicious deserts.']

address: M 28, LIC Colony, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["This place serves various milk & dry fruits sweets, chaats & Paratha's.

Taste - ****
Value for money - ****
Ambience - *** (very less option for sitting)

Recommendation - Milk cake, chole bhature & thandi alu chaat.", 'We were just crossing jeevan bhima nagar so just thought to try some food items. Its a very ordinary place. Staff is very lazy and uninterested.

We ordered aaloo pyaz paratha, chole kachori and Puri sabzi. And I will say each item was up to the mark. We were surprised as place does not look like it will serve that good food. 

I will recommend the owner to make this place lively so that people could feel like coming here. But otherwise it is having good taste.

Ambiance - 2.5/5
Quality - 4/5
Staff - 3/5

EAT WELL STAY HEALTHY!! üòÉüòÉ', 'Food 3.5 / 5
Ambience 2.5 / 5
Staff 2.5 / 5

The taste of the food is good. Can eat a plenty of stuff at a reasonable cost. A good place for a quick healthy lunch or snacks.', "I have been to this place 3-4 times since it is very close to my home. And each and every time it has been a disappointing experience. I have tried some snacks (bhujias, mathris, samosas), and taste was always below average. Today I bought some besan ladoos and they tasted like sugar balls. Had to throw them. 100rs for 4 ladoos. The staff don't even acknowledge your presence when you ask them for some item. No one should go to this place.", "Irrespective of the n number of continental breakfast places that have opened, when you deeply crave something for breakfast, it's usually for some specific desi food. Today I was craving specifically for alu subzi and this is usually good in some of the small eateries or traditional sweets shops. So I went to Bhikaram and the items were just getting ready and they said puri subzi would be ready in 15mts but it was ready in 10mtsüòÅ. I had 3 hot puris with alu subzi. Since it was fresh, tasted good except for the frozen peas which had not cooked. Staff were courteous.", 'Bad shop.... Went to buy chole bhature , pav bhaji. Was highly disappointed to see they serving one day old food from fridge and warming it while serving . It was not fresh, check my pics. I would never recommend it to anyone. The taste was pathetic 

To me it was first and last visit to shop.', 'Fake sweets. Nothing much to say about this place. Please refrain from buying sweets from this place. This feedback is entirely for the outlet at jeevan bheema nagar.', 'Bad place to go to if you are craving vada pav... No taste n a very small vada..', 'Went with hope of having mouthwatering rajasthani food but food was not upto the mark.
Pavbhaji Anf Aloo paratha was good. 
Aloo tikki was not good. 
In Mini meal Chapathi was good but Veg Gravy was not good. 
Rasmalai was too bad.
Overall if you want to have amazing rajasthani food, this is not the place. 
Not Satisfied.', "Visited this place 3-4 months back and could not find a listing on zomato then. Keeping the review brief since its been a while since my visit. 

Ambience
Its a sweet shop doubling up as a eatery. They had a modest setup and nothing mention-worthy about ambience

Pricing
They are priced economically. 

Food
The parata's was quite good while all of the other orders were quite bad. This included chola poori, dahi paapdi chat and badam milk. 

On a summary note, a place I might revisit only for the paratas or sweets.
                                                bingingbanker.com"]

address: Shop 5, Natasha Gulf View Apartments, Opposite Diamond District, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Visited this place to attend the Open Mic Event but that was a mistake. Not because of the event but because of the service and hygiene.
I literally saw the rats roaming around here and there in cafe üòû which is not a good sign for cafe.
Service is super slow.', 'Review is based on my experience for the Whitefield location .

Quite aloof of a location but equally safe and welcoming.We visited in the afternoon and there was no crowd so we could relax and enjoy the food and the ambience.

Food was delicious ,we tried mango milkshake,pasta, chicken crepe, coffee and masala fries. It was served hot and fresh.

Service was prompt as expected.

Food 4/5
Ambience 4/5
Service 4/5', 'Very disinterested team. They do not smile at all. The cups and glasses smell of the cupboards they have been stored in. Overpriced considering the tea is not even brewed but made from tea bags. If eating is not your main focus, it‚Äôs a good hangout if you want privacy or want some quiet. The restroom looks old and could do with some renovation.', 'Went to the place after long for breakfast and was disappointed on the staff not knowing much about the menu and the food also average. I used to recommend this place to others but their quality looks to have dropped significantly.', 'You can shop and eat, have a lovely conversation... No noise and slow music. Has a lovely aura in being a home and being served great food

Not pet friendly though.. üò£

Items ordered - Fresh juice and chicken & mushroom in brown sauce served with softest garlic bread ever had ‚ô•Ô∏è', "Honestly, I've been wanting to visit ants cafe since the longest time and when I did, it was a tad bit below my hyper excitement and expectation level. First of all, for some reason, the place looks SUPER SAD and gives out a very DULL vibe, not peaceful not the me-kind or definitely not a feel good vibe. It's probably the way it's built or managed or I don't know what. The breakfast menu genuinely looks nice and would love to try it someday but I just stuck to pancakes and hot chocolate this time. Both of them were pretty average. The only highlight of the place is the store, showcasing authentic Assamese culture. They need major improvements to life up the vibe of this place for sure!", "I've passed this location multiple times and never noticed a cafe there. It's hard to spot from the road and doesn't look very appealing from the outside.

But I was surprised by the ambience inside! There are some great spots to sit and enjoy your weekend brunch. Spent some time here and didn't notice it go by!

The food's great and the service wasn't as bas described in the other reviews. Maybe they improved on it?

I got the bacon breakfast, sausages, coffee and ice tea. The food was great but the coffee was a bit off. It lacked the aroma and flavour - old coffee beans perhaps?

The prices are reasonable! Would visit again", 'Little cozy and warm cafe. Has balcony and relaxed sitting arrangement. Ordered Maharaja and Spanish omlets, scrambled eggs. Food is tasty and affordable however service is super slow. We ordered chamomile tea and coffee which never came after asking for three times and they charged for it in the bill. Need to improve on service !', 'Terrible sandwiches. The ambience was really nice and the good thing is that they use pyramid bag teas but the sandwiches were tasteless and made with white bread. Big chunks of onion inside with an overdose of mayo and no spices at all.', 'Went to the ants cafe for some brunch after being hungover and it was exactly what I needed. The service was great and it was a very peaceful place to sit and read.']
